tika-s0201t:5_3: taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:5_7: āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā.
tika-s0201t:6_0: “Pūjārahe pūjayato. Buddhe yadi va sāvake”tiādi, tathā –
tika-s0201t:7_0: “Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge te pasannā, agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”tiādi,
tika-s0201t:9_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa.
tika-s0201t:13_1: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:17_3: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetaṃ payojanaṃ sādhetīti.
tika-s0201t:17_7: atha kho karuṇāpaññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva tāva sammāsambuddhassa thomanaṃ kātuṃ tammūlakattā
tika-s0201t:17_12: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:17_13: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
tika-s0201t:17_16: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibandhatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:18_1: byāpādāratīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca parasattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārappavattiyā mettāmuditānampi cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati,
tika-s0201t:18_2: tathāpi paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā parūpatāpāsahanarasā avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇāva visesena bhagavato
tika-s0201t:18_4: Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:18_5: Atha vā asādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya savisayabyāpitāya
tika-s0201t:18_6: mahākaruṇābhāvaṃ upagatā karuṇāva bhagavato atisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti āha “karuṇāsītalahadaya”nti.
tika-s0201t:18_7: Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ sātisaye hadayasītibhāvanibandhanatte sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya
tika-s0201t:18_12: ca sannihitesupi sattasaṅkhārasamupanītahadayūpatāpanimittesu na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti.
tika-s0201t:18_13: Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:19_2: Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto.
tika-s0201t:19_8: sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanato andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti tamo,
tika-s0201t:19_11: Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena avijjandhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhāvimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ
tika-s0201t:19_12: sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatīti
tika-s0201t:20_0: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
tika-s0201t:20_1: tathā sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā,
tika-s0201t:20_2: parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena
tika-s0201t:20_4: Imasmiñca atthavikappe “paññāpajjoto”ti padena bhagavato paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena,
tika-s0201t:21_0: Atha vā bhagavato ñāṇassa ñeyyapariyantikattā sakalañeyyadhammasabhāvāvabodhanasamatthena anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātena
tika-s0201t:21_1: paññāpajjotena sabbañeyyadhammasabhāvacchādakassa mohandhakārassa vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato
tika-s0201t:21_3: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sasantāne mohatamavidhamananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:21_5: parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “mohatamavidhamana”nti vuccatīti.
tika-s0201t:22_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ gayhati,
tika-s0201t:22_3: Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi,
tika-s0201t:23_0: Atha vā vijjā viya sakalakusaladhammasamuppattiyā niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā saṃsārappavattiyā
tika-s0201t:23_1: ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto vuttoyeva hotīti vuttaṃ “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti.
tika-s0201t:24_2: sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti sanarāmaraloko.
tika-s0201t:24_5: Etena devamanussānaṃ viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakāritaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:24_9: Edisesu hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:24_11: garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0201t:24_12: So hi lokīyanti ettha puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:25_0: Atha vā samūhattho lokasaddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti.
tika-s0201t:25_2: sanarā ca te amarā cāti sanarāmarā,
tika-s0201t:25_6: Narāmarānaṃyeva ca gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:25_7: Tathā hi sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā
tika-s0201t:25_9: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamagāravaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:26_1: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:26_13: Atha vā sayambhuñāṇena sakalamapi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
tika-s0201t:26_14: Tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato,
tika-s0201t:26_15: lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato,
tika-s0201t:26_16: lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
tika-s0201t:26_18: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”tiādinā nayena ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0201t:26_21: Yasmā vā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva ca dhammaṃ bhāsati,
tika-s0201t:26_22: tasmā sammā gadati vadatīti sugato da-
tika-s0201t:27_3: Tāhi sakalassapi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena nivattitattā bhagavā
tika-s0201t:27_4: pañcahipi gatīhi suṭṭhu mutto visaṃyuttoti āha “gativimutta”nti.
tika-s0201t:27_5: Etena bhagavato katthacipi gatiyā apariyāpannataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:30_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0201t:31_0: Taṃtaṃgatisaṃvattanakānañhi kammakilesānaṃ aggamaggena bodhimūleyeva suppahīnattā natthi bhagavato gatipariyāpannatāti
tika-s0201t:32_0: Atha vā gativimuttanti anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā bhagavantaṃ thometi.
tika-s0201t:32_1: Ettha hi dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā attahitasampattito parahitapaṭipattito ca.
tika-s0201t:32_2: Tesu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamato savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantappahānato anupādisesanibbānappattito ca veditabbā,
tika-s0201t:32_3: parahitapaṭipatti lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanato viruddhesupi niccaṃ hitajjhāsayato ñāṇaparipākakālāgamanato ca.
tika-s0201t:32_4: Sā panettha āsayato payogato ca duvidhā parahitapaṭipatti,
tika-s0201t:32_5: tividhā ca attahitasampatti pakāsitā hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0201t:32_8: “paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ gativimutta”nti etehi catusaccapaṭivedhatthena ca sugatasaddena tividhāpi attahitasampatti,
tika-s0201t:32_9: avasiṭṭhaṭṭhena tena “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etena cāpi sabbāpi attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipatti pakāsitā hotīti.
tika-s0201t:33_0: Atha vā tīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā –
tika-s0201t:33_4: Phalaṃ catubbidhaṃ ñāṇasampadā pahānasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti.
tika-s0201t:33_5: Tāsu ñāṇapahānasampadā dutiyapadena saccapaṭivedhatthena ca sugatasaddena pakāsitā honti,
tika-s0201t:33_7: rūpakāyasampadā yathāvuttakāyagamanasobhanatthena sugatasaddena lakkhaṇānubyañjanapāripūriyā vinā tadabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:33_8: Upakāro anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ karitvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā.
tika-s0201t:33_9: So sammāgadanatthena sugatasaddena pakāsito hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:34_1: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-s0201t:34_2: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ.
tika-s0201t:34_7: antadvayarahitāya karuṇāpaññāpariggahitāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā pakāsanato sugatasaddassa.
tika-s0201t:34_13: tadubhayena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:34_14: Tena ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ uttamavandanīyabhāvaṃ attano ca vandanakiriyāya khettaṅgatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:35_0: Ettha ca karuṇāgahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato sabbalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā hoti,
tika-s0201t:35_5: Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā karuṇāya,
tika-s0201t:35_6: paññāgahaṇena samaññāya anatidhāvanaṃ sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0201t:35_8: paññāgahaṇena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ catusaccañāṇaṃ catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:36_8: sattasattatiñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:37_2: Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti.
tika-s0201t:37_3: Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti.
tika-s0201t:37_9: paññā pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato dassitattā.
tika-s0201t:37_10: Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo,
tika-s0201t:37_12: Aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ.
tika-s0201t:42_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenapi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ,
tika-s0201t:43_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ “buddhopī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:44_1: bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā niddesanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:44_3: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena.
tika-s0201t:44_4: Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato kammavacanicchāya
tika-s0201t:44_5: abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti buddho yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
tika-s0201t:44_6: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhuñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhastaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro
tika-s0201t:45_1: Anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
tika-s0201t:45_2: tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
tika-s0201t:46_2: Tena “evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā”ti vakkhamānaguṇe dhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:46_15: Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyato ca saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo.
tika-s0201t:46_17: evaṃ vividhaguṇagaṇasamannāgato buddhopi bhagavā yaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā,
tika-s0201t:46_18: phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ pana sacchikatvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigato,
tika-s0201t:46_19: tametaṃ buddhānampi buddhabhāvahetubhūtaṃ sabbadosamalarahitaṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena anuttaraṃ paṭivedhasaddhammaṃ namāmīti.
tika-s0201t:47_1: tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pariyattidhammassapi sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyo labbhatīti sopi idha vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:47_2: Tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā saccikatvā”ti ca vuttattā buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi pāramitāhi saha pubbabhāge
tika-s0201t:47_4: Tāpi hi malapaṭipakkhatāya gatamalā anaññasādhāraṇatāya anuttarā cāti.
tika-s0201t:47_5: Tathā hi sattānaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthāya katamahābhinīhāro mahākaruṇādhivāsapesalajjhāsayo
tika-s0201t:47_6: paññāvisesaparidhotanimmalānaṃ dānadamasaṃyamādīnaṃ uttamadhammānaṃ satasahassādhikāni kappānaṃ cattāri
tika-s0201t:47_7: asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesānaṃ bhāvanāpaccakkhakaraṇehi kammādīsu adhigatavasībhāvo
tika-s0201t:47_8: acchariyācinteyyamahānubhāvo adhisīlādhicittānaṃ paramukkaṃsapāramippatto bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena
tika-s0201t:48_0: Ettha ca “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0201t:48_20: Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi.
tika-s0201t:48_31: Bhāvanāguṇena hi so dosānaṃ samugghātako hotīti.
tika-s0201t:48_34: Tathā “bhāvetvā”ti etena saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā honti,
tika-s0201t:48_35: “sacchikatvā”ti etena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0201t:49_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ “sugatassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:49_6: Tena kilesappahānameva bhagavato orasaputtabhāve kāraṇaṃ anujānātīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:49_8: Tena satipi tesaṃ sattavisesabhāvena anekasahassasaṅkhābhāve imaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ nātivattantīti dasseti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvānātivattanato.
tika-s0201t:49_11: Tena asabhipi ariyapuggalānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyaṃ ariyasaṅghabhāvaṃ dasseti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:50_0: Tattha urasi bhavā jātā saṃvaddhā ca orasā.
tika-s0201t:50_1: Yathā hi sattānaṃ orasaputtā attajātatāya pitu santakassa dāyajjassa visesena bhāgino honti,
tika-s0201t:50_2: evameva tepi ariyapuggalā sammāsambuddhassa dhammassavanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa
tika-s0201t:50_3: vimuttisukhassa ariyadhammaratanassa ca ekantabhāginoti orasā viya orasā.
tika-s0201t:50_4: Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṃ okkamamānā okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato urena
tika-s0201t:50_6: Sāvakehi pavattiyamānāpi hi dhammadesanā “bhagavato dhammadesanā”icceva vuccati taṃmūlikattā lakkhaṇādivisesābhāvato ca.
tika-s0201t:51_0: Yadipi ariyasāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāya karaṇatthaṃ devaputtamāro,
tika-s0201t:51_2: tehi pana apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe vimathite tepi vimathitā eva nāma hontīti āha –
tika-s0201t:51_4: Imasmiṃ panatthe “māramārasenamathanāna”nti vattabbe “mārasenamathanāna”nti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:51_5: Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassapi guṇamāraṇe sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo “senā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:51_7: Sā ca tehi diyaḍḍhasahassabhedā anantabhedā vā kilesavāhinī satidhammavicayavīriyasamathādiguṇapaharaṇehi
tika-s0201t:51_8: odhiso vimathitā vihatā viddhastā cāti mārasenamathanā,
tika-s0201t:52_3: Atha vā sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato upagantabbato upagatānañca tadatthasiddhito ariyā,
tika-s0201t:52_5: ariyo ca so saṅgho cāti vā ariyasaṅgho,
tika-s0201t:52_7: Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ
tika-s0201t:53_0: Ettha ca “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:53_4: Atha vā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti ariyasaṅghassa visuddhanissayabhāvadīpanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:53_8: Tathā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabbhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:53_9: Lokuttarasaraṇagamanena hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā.
tika-s0201t:53_11: Katābhinīhārā hi sammāpaṭipannā māraṃ māraparisaṃ vā abhivijinanti.
tika-s0201t:53_12: “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena paṭividdhastavipakkhe sekkhāsekkhadhamme dasseti puggalādhiṭṭhānena maggaphaladhammānaṃ pakāsitattā.
tika-s0201t:53_16: asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā saṅkhepato sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0201t:54_1: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni taṃnipaccakāraṃ
tika-s0201t:54_5: Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjentassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0201t:55_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:59_0: Cittikatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhantīti.
tika-s0201t:60_1: Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā,
tika-s0201t:60_6: Etena attano pasādasampattiyā ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā taṃ puññaṃ atthappakāsanassa upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ vihanane samatthanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:61_1: Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakāre payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā dhammadesanāya atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo,
tika-s0201t:61_8: Tena vuttaṃ “majjhimapamāṇasuttaṅkitassāti nātidīghanātikhuddakapamāṇehi suttantehi lakkhitassati attho”ti.
tika-s0201t:61_19: ādikalyāṇādiguṇasampattiyā uttamaṭṭhena taṃtaṃabhipatthitasamiddhihetutāya paṇḍitehi varitabbato varo,
tika-s0201t:61_20: āgamo ca so varo cāti āgamavaro.
tika-s0201t:61_22: majjhimo ca so āgamavaro cāti majjhimāgamavaro, tassa.
tika-s0201t:62_1: buddhānaṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā.
tika-s0201t:62_3: Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca buddhānubuddhāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:62_4: Sammāsambuddheneva hi vinayasuttābhidhammānaṃ pakiṇṇakadesanādivasena yo paṭhamaṃ attho vibhatto,
tika-s0201t:62_5: so eva pacchā tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇanāvasena saṅgītikārehi saṅgahaṃ āropitoti.
tika-s0201t:62_8: Ayañhi āgamo mūlapariyāyasuttasabbāsavasuttādīsu diṭṭhigatikānaṃ diṭṭhigatadosavibhāvanato saccakasuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:62_11: yā taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ādito tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa visesaguṇakittanena thomanā.
tika-s0201t:62_15: tassa gambhīrañāṇehi ogāḷhassa abhiṇhaso nānānayavicittassa abhidhammassā”tiādinā thomanā katā.
tika-s0201t:63_4: kāraṃ katvā yathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho”ti āditotiādimhi paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:63_5: Chaḷabhiññatāya paramena cittissariyabhāvena samannāgatattā jhānādīsu pañcavidhavasitāsabbhāvato ca vasino,
tika-s0201t:63_9: Saṅgītāti atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayaṃ etassa attho,
tika-s0201t:64_4: tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassa ca sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:64_7: Aparabhāge hi nikāyantaraladdhīhi asaṅkaratthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitāti.
tika-s0201t:64_8: Tena mūlaṭṭhakathā sabbasādhāraṇā na hotīti idaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ ekantena karaṇīyanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:64_11: sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ vā atthāya sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:65_5: Sā hi sabhāvaniruttibhūtā paṇḍitānaṃ manaṃ ramayatīti.
tika-s0201t:66_3: Aviruddhattā eva hi theravādāpi idha pakāsīyissanti.
tika-s0201t:66_7: tappariyāpannā hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato theravaṃsadīpā,
tika-s0201t:66_11: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo saṇho vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā.
tika-s0201t:66_14: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:66_16: tato eva ca aviparīto saṇho sukhumo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayoti tassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:67_5: Tena ca “tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi atthāyā”ti ayamattho siddho hoti uggahaṇādisukaratāya tesampi bahukārattā.
tika-s0201t:67_8: Idañhi atthappakāsanaṃ aviparītapadabyañjanasunikkhepassa atthasunayassa ca upāyabhāvato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā saṃvattati.
tika-s0201t:67_11: dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0201t:68_5: tadekadesabhāvena visuddhimaggo gahetabboti kathikānaṃ upadesaṃ karonto tattha vicāritadhamme uddesavasena dasseti “sīlakathā”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:68_9: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti niravasesāni yogakammassa bhāvanāya pavattiṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0201t:69_2: Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā paññāya saṃkaletvā sampiṇḍetvā nicchayo paññāsaṅkalananicchayo.
tika-s0201t:72_1: Idāni tasseva avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhārento “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:72_2: Tattha “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhaṭṭhabhāvadīpanena visesato catunnaṃ āgamānaṃ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggo,
tika-s0201t:72_4: “Visesato”ti ca idaṃ vinayābhidhammānampi visuddhimaggo yathārahaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti evāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:73_4: Ettha ca “sīhaḷadīpaṃ ābhatā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathākaraṇassa nimittaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:73_11: Sīlakathādīnaṃ avicāraṇampi hi idha karaṇappakāro evāti.
tika-s0201t:76_1: Vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva paṇṇāsavaggasuttādivasena
tika-s0201t:76_3: Tattha tatthāti yaṃ vuttaṃ “majjhimāgamavarassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti,
tika-s0201t:76_7: Tatthāti vā “etāya aṭṭhakathāya vijānātha majjhimasaṅgītiyā attha”nti ettha yassā majjhimasaṅgītiyā atthaṃ vijānāthāti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:76_8: sā majjhimasaṅgīti nāma paṇṇāsādito edisāti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:76_13: majjhimā ca sā paṇṇāsā cāti majjhimapaṇṇāsā.
tika-s0201t:77_5: ime dhammā sīlakkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ jātisaṅgaho.
tika-s0201t:77_10: ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ sañjātisaṅgaho.
tika-s0201t:77_14: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti ayaṃ kiriyāsaṅgaho.
tika-s0201t:77_16: tena vata re vattabbe cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpakkhandhena saṅgahita”nti ayaṃ gaṇanasaṅgaho.
tika-s0201t:78_3: Tenevāha “ekekāya paṇṇāsāya pañca pañca vagge katvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:78_7: tasmā “akkharato cha akkharasatasahassāni caturāsītuttarasatādhikāni catucattālīsa sahassāni ca akkharānī”ti pāṭhena bhavitabbanti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:78_8: Yasmā pana navakkharo yāva dvādasakkharo ca gāthāpādo saṃvijjati,
tika-s0201t:78_9: tasmā tādisānampi gāthānaṃ vasena aḍḍhateyyagāthāsataṃ bhāṇavāro hotīti katvā “akkharato satta akkharasatasahassāni
tika-s0201t:78_13: Bhāṇavāroti ca dvattiṃsakkharānaṃ gāthānaṃ vasena aḍḍhateyyagāthāsataṃ,
tika-s0201t:78_14: ayañca akkharagaṇanā bhāṇavāragaṇanā ca padagaṇanānusārena laddhāti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:78_15: Imameva hi atthaṃ ñāpetuṃ suttagaṇanānantaraṃ bhāṇavāre agaṇetvā padāni gaṇitāni.
tika-s0201t:83_1: Ekasmiṃ eva hi sutte purimapacchimānaṃ desanābhāgānaṃ sambandho anusandhānato anusandhi.
tika-s0201t:83_2: Ettha ca attajjhāsayānusandhi parajjhāsayānusandhīti duvidho ajjhāsayānusandhi.
tika-s0201t:83_3: So pana katthaci desanāya vippakatāya dhammaṃ suṇantānaṃ pucchāvasena,
tika-s0201t:83_4: katthaci desentassa satthu sāvakassa dhammapaṭiggāhakānañca ajjhāsayavasena,
tika-s0201t:83_5: katthaci desetabbassa dhammassa vasena hotīti samāsato tippakāro.
tika-s0201t:83_8: Tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘kiṃ nu kho, bhante,
tika-s0201t:83_17: Evaṃ pucchantānaṃ vissajjentena bhagavatā pavattitadesanāvasena pucchānusandhī veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:83_18: “Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi ‘iti kira bho rūpaṃ anattā… vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā…
tika-s0201t:83_21: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ,
tika-s0201t:83_23: yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya ‘iti kira bho rūpaṃ anattā…pe…
tika-s0201t:83_27: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavatā pavattitadesanāvasena parajjhāsayānusandhi veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:84_0: “Tassa mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa etadahosi ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ yā tā rattiyo abhiññātā abhilakkhitā cātuddasī pañcadasī aṭṭhamī ca pakkhassa,
tika-s0201t:84_1: tathārūpāsu rattīsu yāni tāni ārāmacetiyāni vanacetiyāni rukkhacetiyāni bhiṃsanakāni salomahaṃsāni,
tika-s0201t:84_2: tathārūpesu senāsanesu vihareyyaṃ appeva nāmāhaṃ bhayabheravaṃ passeyya’nti” evaṃ bhagavatā,
tika-s0201t:84_3: “tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako doso ca pāpako lobhassa ca pahānāya dosassa ca pahānāya atthi majjhimā paṭipadā,
tika-s0201t:84_4: cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā
tika-s0201t:84_5: ca attano ajjhāsayeneva pavattitadesanāvasena attajjhāsayānusandhi veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:84_6: Yena pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā,
tika-s0201t:84_7: tassa anurūpadhammavasena vā paṭipakkhadhammavasena vā yesu suttesu upari desanā āgacchati,
tika-s0201t:84_9: Seyyathidaṃ ākaṅkheyyasutte heṭṭhā sīlena desanā uṭṭhitā,
tika-s0201t:84_15: Kakacūpame heṭṭhā akkhantiyā vasena desanā uṭṭhitā,
tika-s0201t:85_0: Vitthārato panetthāti evaṃ saṅkhepato tividho catubbidho ca anusandhi ettha etasmiṃ majjhimanikāye tasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:85_1: tasmiṃ sutte yathārahaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā viññāyamānā navasatādhikāni tīṇi anusandhisahassāni honti.
tika-s0201t:85_2: Yathā cetaṃ paṇṇāsādivibhāgavacanaṃ majjhimasaṅgītiyā sarūpadassanatthaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:85_4: Evañhi paṇṇāsādīsu vavatthitesu tabbinimuttaṃ kiñci suttaṃ yāva ekaṃ padampi ānetvā imaṃ majjhimasaṅgītiyāti kassaci vattuṃ okāso na siyāti.
tika-s0201t:86_0: Evaṃ paṇṇāsavaggasuttabhāṇavārānusandhibyañjanato majjhimasaṅgītiṃ vavatthapetvā idāni naṃ ādito paṭṭhāya
tika-s0201t:86_1: saṃvaṇṇetukāmo attano saṃvaṇṇanāya tassā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkameneva pavattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0201t:86_3: Tattha yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti,
tika-s0201t:86_4: mahāvisayattā pūjanīyattā ca mahatī saṅgītīti mahāsaṅgīti,
tika-s0201t:86_8: Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:86_14: Tenevāha “evaṃ me sutantiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādī”ti.
tika-s0201t:86_15: Kāmañcettha yassaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkamena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo,
tika-s0201t:86_17: Sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ pana attanā vitthāritattā tattheva gahetabbāti imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya mahantataṃ pariharanto “sā panesā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:91_1: Evaṃ bāhiranidāne vattabbaṃ atidisitvā idāni abhantaranidānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “yaṃ paneta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:91_2: Tattha yasmā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena saṃvaṇṇetabbe dhamme padavibhāgaṃ padatthañca dassetvā tato paraṃ piṇḍattādidassanavasena saṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā,
tika-s0201t:91_6: Atha vā padāni ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgo,
tika-s0201t:91_7: padaviggaho ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgoti vā ekasesavasena padapadaviggahā padavibhāgasaddena vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:91_10: sālo ca so rājā ca itipi sālarājā”tiādivasena samāsapadesu daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:92_1: Taṃ pana padatthaṃ atthuddhārakkamena paṭhamaṃ evaṃsaddassa dassento “evaṃ-
tika-s0201t:92_12: “Evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassū āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalābharaṇā odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti,
tika-s0201t:92_13: seyyathāpi tvaṃ etarahi sācariyakoti. No hidaṃ,
tika-s0201t:93_0: Nanu ca “evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā,
tika-s0201t:93_2: saddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃ- saddoti? Na,
tika-s0201t:93_5: saddo ākāratthoti adhippeto yathā “evaṃ byā kho”tiādīsu,
tika-s0201t:93_7: Evañca katvā “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni upamādiudāharaṇāni upapannāni honti.
tika-s0201t:93_16: sugandhatādiguṇayogato mālāguṇasadisiyo pahūtā puññakiriyā maritabbasabhāvatāya maccena sattena kattabbāti jotitattā puppharāsimālāguṇāva upamā,
tika-s0201t:93_20: So pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamāva hotīti āha “upamāyaṃ āgato”ti.
tika-s0201t:93_21: Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya ākappasampattiyā yo tattha upadisanākāro,
tika-s0201t:93_22: so atthato upadeso evāti vuttaṃ “evaṃ te…pe…
tika-s0201t:93_25: evametaṃ sugatā”ti ettha ca bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0201t:94_4: evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānato daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ,
tika-s0201t:94_5: bhanteti pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāre sanniyojitehi bhikkhūhi attano tattha ṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanavasena vuttattā ettha evaṃ-
tika-s0201t:94_11: evaṃ samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehī”ti yo evaṃ vadanākāro idāni vattabbo.
tika-s0201t:94_13: Evaṃ noti etthāpi tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatigahaṇavasena “saṃvattanti vā no vā,
tika-s0201t:94_14: kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-
tika-s0201t:94_16: So pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno avadhāraṇattho hotīti āha “evaṃ no ettha hotītiādīsu avadhāraṇe”ti.
tika-s0201t:95_4: khandhādivasena saṅgahādivasena samayavimuttādivasena ṭhapanādivasena kusalamūlādivasena tikappaṭṭhānādivasena
tika-s0201t:95_10: attajjhāsayādayo eva vā samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu etassāti anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:95_16: padabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesavasena chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatanti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:96_2: bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi,
tika-s0201t:96_4: Puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0201t:96_5: tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ.
tika-s0201t:96_6: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā,
tika-s0201t:96_9: Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
tika-s0201t:96_11: Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhipakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti.
tika-s0201t:96_12: “Paṭī”ti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,
tika-s0201t:96_14: tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese ca katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti pāṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:96_15: attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:96_16: iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
tika-s0201t:96_17: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakilesaharaṇāni hontīti pāṭihāriyāni bhavanti.
tika-s0201t:96_19: pāṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye bhavaṃ ekamekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:96_20: Pāṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0201t:96_24: Tassa pana iddhiādibhedena visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāyaṃ labbhamānattā āha “vividhapāṭihāriya”nti.
tika-s0201t:97_0: Na aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathāti attho,
tika-s0201t:97_3: Evañca katvā “sabbappakārena ko samattho viññātu”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0201t:97_5: Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnampi atthānaṃ ekavisayattā.
tika-s0201t:97_6: Itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho asamattho cāti āpajjeyyāti.
tika-s0201t:98_1: so attā”ti evaṃ vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya sasantatiyā vattanato tividhopi me-
tika-s0201t:99_1: jotakabhāvato pana satipi tasmiṃ sutasaddo eva taṃ tamatthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa sutasaddassa atthuddhāre
tika-s0201t:99_2: saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ na virujjhatīti dassento “saupasaggo ca anupasaggo cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:99_4: Kammabhāvasādhanāni idha sutasadde sambhavantīti vuttaṃ “upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti vā attho”ti.
tika-s0201t:99_8: Mamāti atthe satīti yadā sambandhavasena sāminiddeso, tadā.
tika-s0201t:100_2: saddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ “evanti sotaviññāṇādiviññāṇakiccanidassana”nti. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:100_3: saddena sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pañcadvārikaviññāṇānaṃ tadabhinīhaṭānañca manodvārikaviññāṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:100_5: kāratthasahitattā “suta”nti etassa sutamevāti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti.
tika-s0201t:100_9: Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti sutanti asutaṃ na hotīti ayametassa atthoti vuttaṃ “assavanabhāvapaṭikkhepato”ti.
tika-s0201t:100_11: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “na idaṃ mayā diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:101_0: Evaṃ savanahetusuṇantapuggalasavanavisesavasena padattayassa ekena pakārena atthayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-s0201t:101_2: Tattha tassāti yā sā bhagavato sammukhā dhammassavanākārena pavattā manodvāraviññāṇavīthi, tassā.
tika-s0201t:101_3: Sā hi nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattituṃ samatthā.
tika-s0201t:101_9: Sutanti dhammappakāsananti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi nānappakārena pavattā,
tika-s0201t:102_3: saddena sakalampi suttaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti dasseti. Suta-
tika-s0201t:102_4: saddassa kiriyāsaddattā savanakiriyāya ca sādhāraṇaviññāṇapabandhapaṭibaddhattā tattha ca puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ “sutanti puggalakiccappakāsana”nti.
tika-s0201t:102_5: Na hi puggalavohārarahite dhammapabandhe savanakiriyā labbhatīti.
tika-s0201t:103_1: saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathā atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:103_2: Tattha ākārapaññattīti upādāpaññatti eva dhammānaṃ pavattiākārūpādānavasena tathā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:103_3: Sutanti visayaniddesoti sotabbabhūto dhammo savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:103_4: Cittasantānavinimuttassa paramatthato kassaci kattu abhāvepi saddavohārena buddhiparikappitabhedavacanicchāya
tika-s0201t:103_5: cittasantānato aññaṃ viya taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā vuttaṃ “cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino”ti.
tika-s0201t:103_6: Savanakiriyāvisayopi sotabbadhammo savanakiriyāvasena pavattacittasantānassa idha paramatthato kattubhāvato,
tika-s0201t:103_7: savanavasena cittappavattiyā eva vā savanakiriyābhāvato taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti vuttaṃ “taṃsamaṅgino kattuvisaye”ti.
tika-s0201t:104_0: Pubbe sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa nidassanassa,
tika-s0201t:104_4: Savanakiriyā pana puggalavādinopi viññāṇanirapekkhā natthīti visesato viññāṇabyāpāroti āha “sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso”ti.
tika-s0201t:104_5: “Me”ti saddappavattiyā ekanteneva sattavisayattā viññāṇakiccassa ca tattheva samodahitabbato “meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:105_0: Sabbassapi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca vijjamānādivasena
tika-s0201t:105_1: chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tesu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ sarūpaṃ niddhārento āha –
tika-s0201t:105_3: Tattha “eva”nti ca “me”ti ca vuccamānassatthassa ākārādino dhammānaṃ asallakkhaṇabhāvato avijjamānapaññattibhāvoti āha –
tika-s0201t:105_8: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti,
tika-s0201t:105_10: ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvo vā attho saccikaṭṭho paramattho cāti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:105_14: Teneva hi “yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdha”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:106_0: Taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbatoti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādino paccāmasanavasena “eva”nti,
tika-s0201t:106_2: Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko viya paṭhamādīni
tika-s0201t:106_3: diṭṭhamutaviññāte apekkhitvāva pavattoti āha “diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbato”ti asutaṃ na hotīti hi
tika-s0201t:106_5: Attanā paṭividdhā suttassa pakāravisesā “eva”nti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti āha “asammohaṃ dīpetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:106_6: Nānappakārapaṭivedhasamattho hotīti etena vakkhamānassa suttassa nānappakārataṃ duppaṭivijjhatañca dasseti.
tika-s0201t:106_7: Sutassa asammosaṃ dīpetīti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:106_12: yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
tika-s0201t:106_13: paññā tattha guṇībhūtāti vuttaṃ “paññāpubbaṅgamāyā”tiādi “paññāya pubbaṅgamā”ti katvā.
tika-s0201t:106_15: Pubbaṅgamatāya vā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādīnaṃ viya appadhānatte paññā pubbaṅgamā etissāti ayampi attho yujjati.
tika-s0201t:106_16: Evaṃ satipubbaṅgamāyāti etthāpi vuttanayānusārena yathāsambhavamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:106_19: akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesavasena chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatassāti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:107_2: Avikkhepaṃ dīpetīti “mūlapariyāyaṃ kattha bhāsita”ntiādipucchāvasena pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa
tika-s0201t:107_3: suttassa savanaṃ samādhānamantarena na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:107_7: saddhammassavanena viya ca avikkhepassa yathā yonisomanasikārena phalabhūtena attasammāpaṇidhipubbekatapuññatānaṃ siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato,
tika-s0201t:107_8: evaṃ avikkhepena phalabhūtena kāraṇabhūtānaṃ saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ siddhi dassetabbā
tika-s0201t:107_10: Na hi vikkhittacittotiādinā samatthanavacanena pana avikkhepena kāraṇabhūtena sappurisūpanissayena ca
tika-s0201t:107_13: saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ bāhiraṅgattā,
tika-s0201t:107_14: avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa ekantakāraṇanti.
tika-s0201t:107_16: no na samatthitā vikkhittacittānaṃ sappurisapayirupāsanābhāvassa atthasiddhattā.
tika-s0201t:107_17: Ettha ca purimaṃ phalena kāraṇassa siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa,
tika-s0201t:107_18: dutiyaṃ kāraṇena phalassa siddhidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ekantavassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
tika-s0201t:108_11: Sammāpaṇihitatto pubbe ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti tadasuddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvatoti āha –
tika-s0201t:108_22: Parisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hotīti.
tika-s0201t:109_5: vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva sotabbadhammavisesaṃ āmasatīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:109_6: Manodiṭṭhikaraṇā pariyattidhammānaṃ anupekkhanasuppaṭivedhā visesato manasikārapaṭibaddhāti te vuttanayena
tika-s0201t:109_8: savanadhāraṇavacīparicayā pariyattidhammānaṃ visesena sotāvadhānapaṭibaddhāti te avikkhepadīpakena suta-
tika-s0201t:109_9: saddena yojetvā dassento sāsanasampattiyā dhammassavane ussāhaṃ janeti.
tika-s0201t:109_14: ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā nayena manasā anu anu pekkhitā.
tika-s0201t:109_16: ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ,
tika-s0201t:110_0: Sakalena vacanenāti pubbe tīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ yojitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:110_2: Asappurisabhūminti akataññutaṃ “idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā
tika-s0201t:110_7: Nayidamevaṃ “evaṃ me suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho vibhāvitoti dassanato.
tika-s0201t:110_8: Keci pana “devatānaṃ parivitakkāpekkhaṃ tathāvacananti edisī codanā anavakāsāvā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:110_9: Tasmiṃ kira khaṇe ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bhagavā ca parinibbuto,
tika-s0201t:110_11: idāni dhammaṃ deseti sakyakulappasuto tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapituputto,
tika-s0201t:110_12: kiṃ nu kho sayaṃ sacchikataṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-s0201t:111_5: Ettha ca paṭhamādayo tisso atthayojanā ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-
tika-s0201t:111_9: pacchimā pana tisso yathākkamaṃ ākāratthaṃ nidassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇatthañca evaṃ-
tika-s0201t:112_2: Tathā hesa “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0201t:112_3: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati,
tika-s0201t:112_8: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhyāyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:112_10: Kālañca samayañcāti yuttakālañca paccayasāmaggiñca khaṇoti okāso.
tika-s0201t:112_14: so ekovāti hi attho mahāsamayoti mahāsamūho.
tika-s0201t:112_17: Tattha hi nisinnā titthiyā attano attano samayaṃ pavadantīti.
tika-s0201t:112_20: abhisamayo attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti pīḷanādīni abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttāni.
tika-s0201t:112_21: Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti.
tika-s0201t:112_23: Tattha pīḷanaṃ dukkhasaccassa taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:113_0: Tattha sahakārīkāraṇaṃ sannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo.
tika-s0201t:113_1: Sameti samāgacchati maggabrahmacariyaṃ ettha tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo.
tika-s0201t:113_4: sabhāvadhammo vā sahajātādīhi uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo.
tika-s0201t:113_5: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viya ca kappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ,
tika-s0201t:113_6: saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo,
tika-s0201t:113_9: Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo,
tika-s0201t:113_11: Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati,
tika-s0201t:113_12: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi;
tika-s0201t:113_17: sammā vā ayanaṃ apagamoti samayo, pahānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:113_18: Abhimukhaṃ ñāṇena sammā etabbo abhisametabboti abhisamayo,
tika-s0201t:113_20: Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
tika-s0201t:113_24: Samayasaddassa atthuddhāre abhisamayasaddassa udāharaṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:113_26: Kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato,
tika-s0201t:113_27: desadesakaparisānaṃ viya suttassa nidānabhāvena kālassa apadisitabbato ca.
tika-s0201t:114_3: Utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamaṃ akatvā samayasaddassa vacanena ayampi guṇo laddho hotīti dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:114_8: Yathāvuttabhedesu eva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “yo cāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:114_9: Tathā hi ñāṇakiccasamayo attahitapaṭipattisamayo ca abhisambodhisamayo,
tika-s0201t:115_6: Tattha yathā kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññāto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ
tika-s0201t:115_7: tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato “pubbaṇhe jāto,
tika-s0201t:115_9: samūho ca avayavavinimutto avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati “rukkhe sākhā,
tika-s0201t:115_13: Yasmiṃ kāle dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:115_14: tasmiṃ eva kāle dhammapuñje ca phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho.
tika-s0201t:115_18: tasmiṃ samaye”ti ca vutte “satī”ti ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvatoti samayassa
tika-s0201t:115_19: sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā phassādīnaṃ bhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyati.
tika-s0201t:115_22: paccayasamavāye vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:115_24: paccayasamavāye vā phassādayopi hontīti ubhayattha samayasadde bhummaniddeso kato lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti dassento āha “khaṇa…pe…
tika-s0201t:116_4: Vītikkamañhi sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā ca
tika-s0201t:116_5: taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadāni paññapento bhagavā viharati sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
tika-s0201t:117_0: Accantameva ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ parahitapaṭipattisaṅkhātena karuṇāvihārena.
tika-s0201t:119_5: na pana idha vattabbo visuddhimaggassa imissā aṭṭhakathāya ekadesabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:121_0: Bhagavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-s0201t:122_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
tika-s0201t:123_1: Ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā,
tika-s0201t:123_2: te anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti.
tika-s0201t:123_3: Tathā hissa sīlaṃ, samādhi, paññā, vimutti,
tika-s0201t:123_85: āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo anantāparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā
tika-s0201t:123_87: tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti “bhāgavā”ti vattabbe ā-
tika-s0201t:126_1: Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi
tika-s0201t:126_5: upekkhāpāramīti dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo,
tika-s0201t:126_16: te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na honti,
tika-s0201t:126_18: evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti “bhatavā”ti vattabbe “bhagavā”ti vutto niruttinayena ta-
tika-s0201t:126_21: Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakaradhamme vuttanayeneva bhari sambhari,
tika-s0201t:128_0: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tenāpi bhagavā matoti.
tika-s0201t:129_2: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā.
tika-s0201t:129_3: Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu kusalādīsu khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
tika-s0201t:129_11: “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā,
tika-s0201t:129_12: te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṃ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ vasena sevi.
tika-s0201t:129_14: Atha vā “ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā,
tika-s0201t:129_15: kinti nu kho te vineyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya”nti mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi,
tika-s0201t:131_0: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tatoti.
tika-s0201t:132_1: Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ bhajīyantīti bhagā,
tika-s0201t:132_3: Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate vani bhaji sevi,
tika-s0201t:132_4: yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato buddhakaradhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi,
tika-s0201t:132_5: buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṃhite anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi,
tika-s0201t:132_10: uttarimanussadhammavasena ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi.
tika-s0201t:133_0: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthu;
tika-s0201t:134_0: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā matoti.
tika-s0201t:135_1: Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā.
tika-s0201t:135_9: guṇādhigatena “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattena lokattayabyāpinā suvipulena suvisuddhena ca thutighosena
tika-s0201t:135_14: dhammappamāṇo dhammappasannoti evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā
tika-s0201t:135_16: Ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti,
tika-s0201t:135_17: kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ pasādabhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā.
tika-s0201t:135_18: Tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti,
tika-s0201t:138_6: taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca.
tika-s0201t:139_0: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:141_0: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccatīti.
tika-s0201t:142_1: Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami, uggiri,
tika-s0201t:142_3: pacchimattabhāvepi hatthāgataṃ cakkavattisiriṃ devalokādhipaccasadisaṃ catudīpissariyaṃ cakkavattisampattisannissayaṃ
tika-s0201t:142_4: sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
tika-s0201t:142_5: tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā.
tika-s0201t:145_5: Te bhagavā sabbaṃ papañcaṃ sabbaṃ yogaṃ sabbaṃ ganthaṃ sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amataṃ dhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri,
tika-s0201t:145_7: Tathā hesa “sabbatthameva pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:145_8: cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ manaṃ,
tika-s0201t:145_9: rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme,
tika-s0201t:145_25: dhammavicāra”ntiādinā anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri,
tika-s0201t:145_29: taṃ tathāgato puna paccāgamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:145_31: Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena
tika-s0201t:147_0: Kaṇhasukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā matoti.
tika-s0201t:149_0: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-s0201t:150_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
tika-s0201t:151_1: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
tika-s0201t:151_2: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo vijjatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:151_4: Na hi bhagavato rūpakāye kenaci sakkā antarāyo kātunti.
tika-s0201t:152_0: Desanāsampattiṃ niddisati vakkhamānassa sakalassa suttassa “eva”nti nidassanato.
tika-s0201t:152_1: Sāvakasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāppattena pañcasu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitena mayā mahāsāvakena sutaṃ,
tika-s0201t:156_3: Mā atikkamīti mā rattivibhāyanaṃ anudikkhantānaṃ ratti atikkamīti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:156_5: Ukkāsu vijjotalantīsu ṭhitā patiṭṭhitāti mūlavibhūjādipakkhepena (pāṇini 3.2.5) saddasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:156_6: Niruttinayena vā ukkāsu ṭhitāsu ṭhitā āsīti ukkaṭṭhā.
tika-s0201t:156_7: Apare pana bhaṇanti “bhūmibhāgasampattiyā manussasampattiyā upakaraṇasampattiyā ca sā nagarī ukkaṭṭhaguṇayogato ‘ukkaṭṭhā’ti nāmaṃ labhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:157_3: vihāresūti iriyāpathavihāro dibbavihāro brahmavihāro ariyavihāroti etesu catūsu vihāresu.
tika-s0201t:157_6: Tathā hi taṃ “idhekacco gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati sahanandī sahasokī”tiādīsu iriyāpathavihāre āgataṃ;
tika-s0201t:157_11: “so mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādīsu brahmavihāre;
tika-s0201t:157_12: “so kho ahaṃ aggivessana tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃ eva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva
tika-s0201t:157_13: cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmi,
tika-s0201t:158_3: Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vā.
tika-s0201t:158_4: Atha vā iriyati pavattati etena attabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:158_8: So ca atthato gatinivattiādiākārena pavatto catusantatirūpapabandho eva.
tika-s0201t:158_17: dibbo ca so vihāro cāti dibbavihāro,
tika-s0201t:158_25: So hi bhagavā ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanantiādi yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:158_26: tathāpi “upādinnakasarīrassa nāma ayaṃ sabhāvo”ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:158_27: Yasmā vā bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto veneyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento,
tika-s0201t:158_28: nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento vasatīti veneyyasattānaṃ attano ca vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ harati upaneti uppādeti,
tika-s0201t:158_29: tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:159_2: Chaṇasamajjaussaveti ettha chaṇaṃ nāma phaggunamāsādīsu uttaraphaggunādi-
tika-s0201t:159_6: Yattha gāmanigamavāsino tayo satta vā divase nakkhattaghosanaṃ katvā yathāvibhavaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattā bhoge paribhuñjantā nakkhattakīḷanaṃ kīḷanti.
tika-s0201t:159_7: Tesaṃ taṃ tatheva hotīti tesaṃ manussānaṃ taṃ patthanaṃ tannivāsidevatānubhāvena yebhuyyena tatheva hoti,
tika-s0201t:159_9: Bahujanakantatāyāti iminā “sundarakāmattā”ti etasseva padassa pakārantarena atthaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:159_12: subhā agā rukkhā etthāti vā subhagaṃ,
tika-s0201t:159_16: Subhagassa nāma yakkhassa vanaṃ tena pariggahitattāti “subhagavana”nti aññe.
tika-s0201t:159_17: Vananaṃ bhattītiatthe taṃ vananaṃ kāretīti etasmiṃ atthe vanayatīti padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:159_19: Yācanatthe vanute iti vananti upacārakappanāvasena vana-
tika-s0201t:160_7: aññasmimpi tādise rukkhe rājavohāraṃ dassetuṃ “supatiṭṭhitassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:160_9: Nippariyāyena sākhādimato saṅghātassa suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhane avayavavisese pavattamāno mūla- saddo.
tika-s0201t:160_10: Yasmā taṃsadisesu tannissaye padese ca ruḷhīvasena pariyāyato pavattati,
tika-s0201t:160_11: tasmā “mūlāni uddhareyyā”ti ettha nippariyāyamūlaṃ adhippetanti ekena mūla-
tika-s0201t:160_15: Lobhasahagatacittuppādānaṃ eva āveṇike nesaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanato mūlaṭṭhena upakārake paccayadhamme dissatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:161_0: Tatthāti “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ vākyaṃ, tatta.
tika-s0201t:161_3: Atha tattha viharatīti yadi subhagavane sālarājamūle viharati.
tika-s0201t:161_6: Idāni codako tameva attano adhippāyaṃ “na hi sakkā”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-s0201t:161_7: Itaro sabbametaṃ aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānantena vuttanti dassento “na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti āha.
tika-s0201t:161_8: Tattha etanti “ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:161_9: Evanti “yadi tāva bhagavā”tiādinā yaṃ taṃ bhavatā coditaṃ,
tika-s0201t:161_10: taṃ atthato evaṃ na kho pana daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:163_1: Tathā hi taṃ yathā subhagavanādikittanaṃ pabbajitānuggahakaraṇādianekappayojanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:163_3: Tattha paccayaggahaṇena upasaṅkamanapayirupāsanānaṃ okāsadānena dhammadesanāya saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0201t:163_5: uggahaparipucchānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyogassa ca anurūpavasanaṭṭhānapariggahenettha pabbajitānuggahakaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:163_12: Pacurajanavivittaṃ hi ṭhānaṃ devā upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññanti.
tika-s0201t:163_24: Bhagavā hi sabbasatte paramāya anukampāya anukampati,
tika-s0201t:163_26: upekkhako ca na ca parahitasukhakaraṇe apposukko mahākāruṇikabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:164_2: Tathā hesa bodhisattabhūto mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso sakalalokahitāya ussukkamāpanno mahābhinīhārato
tika-s0201t:164_3: paṭṭhāya tadatthanipphādanatthaṃ puññañāṇasambhāre sampādento aparimitaṃ kālaṃ anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhosi,
tika-s0201t:164_4: upekkhakatāya sammā patitehi dukkhehi na vikampi.
tika-s0201t:164_13: Tenassa attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:164_14: Tathā mahākāruṇikatāya saccādhiṭṭhānassa cāgādhiṭṭhānassa ca pāripūri,
tika-s0201t:164_16: Evaṃ parisuddhāsayapayogassa mahākāruṇikatāya lokahitatthameva rajjasampadādibhavasampattiyā upagamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:164_18: Iti suvisuddhaupagamāpagamassa mahākāruṇikatāya lokahitatthameva dānavasena sampattīnaṃ pariccajanā,
tika-s0201t:164_20: Evaṃ samudāgamanato paṭṭhāya acchariyabbhutaguṇasamannāgatassa mahākāruṇikatāya paresaṃ hitasukhatthaṃ atidukkarakāritā,
tika-s0201t:165_1: upekkhakatāya uḷāresu devabhogasadisesu bhogesu nirapekkho mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami.
tika-s0201t:165_2: Tathā mahākāruṇikatāya “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā karuṇāmukheneva vipassanārambho,
tika-s0201t:165_3: upekkhakatāya buddhabhūtassa satta sattāhāni vivekasukheneva vītināmanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:165_4: Mahākāruṇikatāya dhammagambhīrataṃ paccavekkhitvā dhammadesanāya apposukkataṃ āpajjitvāpi mahābrahmuno ajjhesanāpadesena okāsakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:165_6: Mahākāruṇikatāya katthaci paṭighātābhāvenassa sabbattha amittasaññāya abhāvo,
tika-s0201t:165_8: Mahākāruṇikatāya gāmādīnaṃ āsannaṭṭhāne vasantassapi upekkhakatāya araññaṭṭhāne eva viharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:165_9: Tena vuttaṃ “purimena cassa paramāya annukampāya samannāgamaṃ,
tika-s0201t:166_1: Desakālaparidīpananti ye desakālā idha viharaṇakiriyāvisesanabhāvena vuttā,
tika-s0201t:166_13: Tena tatrāti yattha bhagavā dhammadesanatthaṃ bhikkhū ālapi abhāsi,
tika-s0201t:166_17: Nanu ca yattha ṭhito bhagavā “akālo kho tāvā”tiādinā bāhiyassa dhammadesanaṃ paṭikkhipi,
tika-s0201t:166_18: tattheva antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhito tassa dhammaṃ desetīti?
tika-s0201t:166_23: tampi tassa akālabhāvasseva pariyāyena dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:166_24: Tassa hi tadā addhānaparissamena rūpakāye akammaññatā ahosi,
tika-s0201t:166_26: tadubhayassa vūpasamaṃ āgamento papañcaparihāratthaṃ bhagavā “akālo kho”ti pariyāyena paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0201t:166_27: Adesetabbadese adesanāya pana udāharaṇaṃ “atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi,
tika-s0201t:166_28: vihārato nikkhamitvā vihārapacchāyāyaṃ paññatte āsane nisīdī”ti ca evamādikaṃ idha ādi-
tika-s0201t:167_2: bālo idha pubbe rasādo idha pāpāni kammāni karitvā”tiādīsu padapūraṇamatte kho- saddo,
tika-s0201t:167_5: satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”tiādīsu ādikālatthe.
tika-s0201t:167_10: tasmā āmantesi evāti āmantane niyamo dassito hotīti.
tika-s0201t:168_4: taṃ panassa yathāvutte ṭhāne viharaṇakiriyāya kattuvisesadassanatthaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0201t:168_7: tasmā tadatthaṃ puna “bhagavā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti tassatthaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavāti lokagarudīpana”nti āha.
tika-s0201t:168_9: Catūsupi parisāsu bhikkhū eva edisānaṃ desanānaṃ visesena bhājanabhūtā,
tika-s0201t:168_10: iti sātisayasāsanasampaṭiggāhakabhāvadassanatthaṃ idha bhikkhugahaṇanti dassetvā idāni saddatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:169_0: Tattha bhikkhakoti bhikkhūti bhikkhanadhammatāya bhikkhūti attho.
tika-s0201t:169_1: Bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti buddhādīhipi ajjhupagataṃ bhikkhācariyaṃ uñchācariyaṃ ajjhupagatattā anuṭṭhitattā bhikkhū.
tika-s0201t:169_2: Yo hi koci appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
tika-s0201t:169_3: so kasigorakkhādīhi jīvikākappanaṃ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatattā bhikkhu,
tika-s0201t:169_4: parapaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṃ bhuñjamānopi bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu,
tika-s0201t:169_5: piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjāya ussāhajātattā vā bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhūti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:169_8: bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhikkhū”tiādinā vibhaṅge āgatanayena.
tika-s0201t:170_4: Bhikkhane sādhukāritā “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti vacanaṃ anussaritvā tattha appamajjanā.
tika-s0201t:170_11: Hīnādhikajanasevitanti ye bhikkhubhāve ṭhitāpi jātimadādivasena uddhatā unnaḷā.
tika-s0201t:170_12: Ye ca gihibhāve paresu atthikabhāvampi anupagatatāya bhikkhācariyaṃ paramakāpaññataṃ maññanti,
tika-s0201t:170_13: tesaṃ ubhayesampi yathākkamaṃ “bhikkhavo”ti vacanena hīnajanehi daliddehi paramakāpaññataṃ pattehi parakulesu
tika-s0201t:170_14: bhikkhācariyāya jīvikaṃ kappentehi sevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti,
tika-s0201t:170_15: adhikajanehi uḷārabhogakhattiyakulādito pabbajitehi buddhādīhi ājīvavisodhanatthaṃ sevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento dīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karotīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:170_17: pakaraṇato sāmatthiyato ca sussūsājananaṃ sakkaccasavanamanasikāraniyojanañca hoti.
tika-s0201t:171_1: Kathaṃ pana pavattitā savanādayo sādhukaṃ pavattitā hontīti?
tika-s0201t:171_2: “Addhā imāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sakalasāsanasampatti hatthagatā bhavissatī”ti ādaragāravayogena,
tika-s0201t:171_6: dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:171_15: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta”nti.
tika-s0201t:172_7: Ekacce bhikkhūyeva sandhāyāti ye suttapariyosāne “te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandu”nti vuttā pañcasatā brāhmaṇapabbajitā,
tika-s0201t:173_0: Pubbe sabbaparisasādhāraṇattepi bhagavato dhammadesanāya “jeṭṭhaseṭṭhā”tiādinā bhikkhūnaṃ eva āmantane
tika-s0201t:173_1: kāraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni bhikkhū āmantetvāva dhammadesanāya payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā”ti
tika-s0201t:173_5: Dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāti tadā hiyyo tato paradivasesu vā sutadhammaṃ pati pati manasā avekkhantā.
tika-s0201t:173_6: Bhikkhū āmantetvā dhamme desiyamāne ādito paṭṭhāya desanaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkontīti imamevatthaṃ byatirekamukhena
tika-s0201t:174_13: atthi me tumhesu anukampā ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0201t:174_16: “māgaṇṭhiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanamabhilāpo”tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye; “iti kho,
tika-s0201t:174_24: “atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā, ānanda,
tika-s0201t:174_26: kiṃ paccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya,
tika-s0201t:174_38: Pubbe “bhagavā āmantesī”ti vuttattā “bhagavato paccassosu”nti idha “bhagavato”ti sāmivacanaṃ āmantanameva
tika-s0201t:174_39: sambandhīantaraṃ apekkhatīti iminā adhippāyena “bhagavato āmantanaṃ paṭiassosu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:174_40: “Bhagavato”ti pana idaṃ paṭissavasambandhanena sampadānavacanaṃ yathā “devadattassa paṭissuṇotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:175_2: nanu bhagavatā bhāsitavacanasseva saṅgaho kātabboti? Vuccate –
tika-s0201t:175_4: Kāladesadesakanimittaparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti asammosadhammā saddheyyā ca,
tika-s0201t:175_6: Teneva ca āyasmatā mahākassapena “mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ āvuso, ānanda,
tika-s0201t:175_7: kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā desādipucchāsu katāsu tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “evaṃ
tika-s0201t:175_8: me suta”ntiādinā imassa suttassa nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:175_11: Na hi sammāsambuddhassa pubbaracanādīhi attho atthi sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya ekappamāṇattā ca ñeyyadhammesu.
tika-s0201t:175_13: Na hi sabbaso khīṇāsavassa te sambhavantīti suvisuddhassa parānuggahappavatti.
tika-s0201t:175_14: Evaṃ desakasaṃkilesabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhisīlasampadādūsakānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ accantābhāvasaṃsūcakehi ñāṇasampadāpahānasampadābhibyañjakehi
tika-s0201t:175_16: tato eva ca antarāyikaniyyānikadhammesu sammohābhāvasiddhito pacchimavesārajjadvayasiddhīti bhagavato
tika-s0201t:175_17: catuvesārajjasamannāgamo attahitaparahitapaṭipatti ca nidānavacanena pakāsitā hoti tattha tattha sampattapariyāya
tika-s0201t:175_19: idha pana pathavīādīsu vatthūsu puthujjanānaṃ paṭipattivibhāgavavatthāpakadesanādīpanatoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:176_1: Ñāṇakaruṇāpariggahitasabbakiriyassa hi bhagavato natthi niratthikā paṭipatti,
tika-s0201t:176_3: Tasmā paresaṃ eva atthāya pavattasabbakiriyassa sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ yathāpavattaṃ
tika-s0201t:176_4: vuccamānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ sattānaṃ anusāsanaṭṭhena sāsanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:176_6: tayidaṃ satthucaritaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi saddhiṃ tattha tattha nidānavacanehi yathārahaṃ pakāsīyati,
tika-s0201t:176_9: Apica satthuno pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:176_10: tañca desakappamāṇabhāvadassanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena “bhagavā”ti ca iminā padena vibhāvitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:176_12: tato eva sabbasattuttamabhāvadīpanena ayamattho sabbathā pakāsito hotīti idamettha nidānavacanappayojanassa
tika-s0201t:179_1: Desanāpi hi desetabbassa sīlādiatthassa vineyyasantānesu nikkhipanato “nikkhepo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:179_2: Suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hotīti sāmaññato bhagavato desanāsamuṭṭhānassa vibhāgaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0201t:179_3: “etthāyaṃ desanā evaṃsamuṭṭhānā”ti desanāya samuṭṭhāne dassite suttassa sammadeva nidānaparijānanena
tika-s0201t:179_10: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādinā ca pavattadesanā anusandhidassanasukhatāya suviññeyyā hoti.
tika-s0201t:179_11: Tattha yathā anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttantāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādipadhānanayavasena soḷasavidhataṃ nātivattanti,
tika-s0201t:179_12: evaṃ attajjhāsayādisuttanikkhepavasena catubbidhabhāvanti āha “cattāro hi suttanikkhepā”ti.
tika-s0201t:180_0: Ettha ca yathā attajjhāsayassa aṭṭhuppattiyā ca parajjhāsayapucchāhi saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati “attajjhāsayo ca parajjhāsayo ca,
tika-s0201t:180_4: evaṃ yadipi aṭṭhuppattiyā attajjhāsayenapi saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:180_5: attajjhāsayādīhi pana purato ṭhitehi aṭṭhuppattiyā saṃsaggo natthīti nayidha niravaseso vitthāranayo sambhavatīti “cattāro suttanikkhepā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:180_6: tadantogadhattā vā sambhavantānaṃ sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepavasena cattārova dassitā.
tika-s0201t:181_17: Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti suttanikkhepo,
tika-s0201t:181_19: Etasmiṃ pana attavikappe attano ajjhāsayo attajjhāsayo.
tika-s0201t:181_26: Tathā aṭṭhuppatti eva aṭṭhuppattikoti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:182_0: Apicettha paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhattā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ suttanikkhepabhāvo yutto
tika-s0201t:182_2: Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanāpavattihetubhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ kathamaṭṭhuppattiyaṃ anavarodho,
tika-s0201t:182_3: pucchāvasikaaṭṭhuppattikānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena pavattikānaṃ kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti?
tika-s0201t:182_5: Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinimuttasseva suttadesanākāraṇuppādassa aṭṭhuppattibhāvena gahitattā parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:182_6: Tathā hi brahmajāla dhammadāyādasuttādīnaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaāmisuppādādidesanānimittaṃ “aṭṭhuppattī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:182_7: Paresaṃ pucchaṃ vinā ajjhāsayaṃ eva nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo,
tika-s0201t:183_1: Sammappadhānasuttantahārakoti anupubbena nikkhittānaṃ saṃyuttake sammappadhānapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ suttānaṃ āvaḷi.
tika-s0201t:185_4: Muñcitvā na kiñci katheti sabhāvaniruttiyā tatheva pavattanato.
tika-s0201t:185_6: Yathā hi rukkhassa gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ dubbinibbedhaṃ duttacchitañca hoti,
tika-s0201t:185_7: evamevaṃ yaṃ padaṃ atthato vivarituṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0201t:186_1: tassa tassa anavasesataṃ dīpetīti iminā imassa sabba-
tika-s0201t:186_3: saddo hi sabbasabbaṃ padesasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbanti catūsu visayesu diṭṭhappayogo.
tika-s0201t:186_4: Tathā hesa “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī”tiādīsu sabbasabbasmiṃ āgato.
tika-s0201t:186_12: mano ceva dhammā cā”ti ettha āyatanasabbasmiṃ.
tika-s0201t:186_17: Tathā hi vakkhati “sakkāyapariyāpannā pana tebhūmakadhammāva anavasesato veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:187_1: Ete caturo dhammāti idāni vuccamāne saccādike cattāro dhamme sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0201t:187_7: Diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatīti yasmiṃ ete saccādayo dhammā upalabbhanti,
tika-s0201t:187_10: atha kho naṃ abhibhavati evāti attho.
tika-s0201t:187_12: Na hi nissabhāvā dhammā kenaci nibbattīyanti.
tika-s0201t:187_13: Attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentīti yadipi lakkhaṇavinimuttā dhammā nāma natthi,
tika-s0201t:187_17: kāyādayo lokavohāramattasiddhā gagaṇakusumādayova saccikaṭṭhaparamatthato na upalabbhanti,
tika-s0201t:187_20: tato eva sattādivisesavirahato dhammamattā sabhāvavantoti dassanatthaṃ “attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:187_21: Bhavati hi bhedābhāvepi sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ upacāramattasiddhena bhedena niddeso yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
tika-s0201t:187_22: Dhārīyanti vā yathāsabhāvato avadhārīyanti ñāyantīti dhammā,
tika-s0201t:188_5: Yatheva hi pathavīādīsu maññanāvatthūsu uppajjamānā taṇhādayo maññanā tesaṃ pavattiyā mūlakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:188_7: Tathā hi “assutavā puthujjano”tiādinā “apariññātaṃ tassāti vadāmī”ti “nandī dukkhassa mūla”nti ca anvayato,
tika-s0201t:188_9: vītamohattā”ti byatirekato ca tesaṃ mūlakāraṇabhāvo vibhāvito.
tika-s0201t:189_0: Pariyāyeti desetabbamatthaṃ avagameti bodhayatīti pariyāyo, desanā.
tika-s0201t:189_1: Pariyāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattati tassa vā kāraṇabhāvaṃ gacchatīti pariyāyo, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:189_5: Tebhūmakā dhammāva anavasesato veditabbā maññanāvatthubhūtānaṃ sabbesaṃ pathavīādidhammānaṃ adhippetattā.
tika-s0201t:190_7: Teneva hi sādhusaddassa atthaṃ vadantena atthuddhāravasena sādhukasaddo udāhaṭo.
tika-s0201t:190_16: “Suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”ti hi vutte sādhukasaddena savanamanasikārānaṃ sakkaccakiriyā viya tadāṇāpanampi vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:191_9: Na hi yāthāvato suṇantassa saddato vipallāsaggāho hoti.
tika-s0201t:191_11: Na hi sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ upadhārentassa atthato vipallāsaggāho hoti.
tika-s0201t:191_13: Dhāraṇūpaparikkhāsūti upaparikkhaggahaṇena tulanatīraṇādike diṭṭhiyā ca suppaṭivedhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:192_9: Desanā nāma tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā.
tika-s0201t:192_11: Paṭivedho nāma tantiyā tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho.
tika-s0201t:192_12: Yasmā cete dhammadesanāatthapaṭivedhā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāḷhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca,
tika-s0201t:192_16: Ettha ca paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato dhammatthānaṃ desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya dukkhogāhatā,
tika-s0201t:192_17: paṭivedhassa pana uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tabbisayañāṇuppattiyā ca dukkarabhāvato dukkhogāhatā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:193_1: Tassa niddisanaṃ bhāsananti idhādhippetanti āha “vitthāratopi naṃ bhāsissāmīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:193_3: Sāḷikāyiva nigghosoti sāḷikāya ālāpo viya madhuro kaṇṇasukho pemanīyo.
tika-s0201t:194_0: Evaṃ vutte ussāhajātāti evaṃ “suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmī”ti vutte na kira satthā saṅkhepeneva desessati,
tika-s0201t:194_2: Idhāti iminā vuccamānaadhikaraṇaṃ tassa puggalassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ adhippetanti āha “desāpadese nipāto”ti.
tika-s0201t:194_11: bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī”ti “katamo ca,
tika-s0201t:194_15: bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hotī”ti ca.
tika-s0201t:194_16: Idheva tiṭṭhamānassāti imissā eva indasālaguhāyaṃ tiṭṭhamānassa.
tika-s0201t:195_5: Tathā hi “antavā ayaṃ loko parivaṭumo”tiādīsu atthitāmattaṃ attho.
tika-s0201t:195_16: “Ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu vibhāvano.
tika-s0201t:195_22: sīlavato sīlasampattiyā kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti ca ādīsu pasaṃsā.
tika-s0201t:195_23: “Paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā”tiādīsu atisayo.
tika-s0201t:195_29: taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipatti ca “sutavā”ti iminā saddena pakāsitā.
tika-s0201t:195_30: Atha vā sotabbayuttaṃ sutvā kattabbanipphattivasena suṇīti sutavā,
tika-s0201t:196_4: Paccayuppannañhi paccayasambandhīti appaccayuppannattā ataṃsambandhitā ettha jotitā.
tika-s0201t:196_24: Atītānañhi uppannapubbattā uppādidhammānañca paccayekadesanipphattiyā āraddhuppādibhāvato kālavimuttassa
tika-s0201t:196_25: ca vijjamānattā uppannānukūlatā pageva paccuppannānanti tabbidūratāva ettha viññāyati “asekkhā dhammā”ti
tika-s0201t:196_29: Idha pana “arūpino dhammā acetasikā dhammā”tiādīsu viya tabbhāvanivattiyaṃ daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0201t:197_0: Idāni tassa atthaṃ vivaranto yasmā khandhadhātvādikosallenapi maññanāpaṭisedhanasamatthaṃ bāhusaccaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:197_3: Yato kho bhikkhu khandhakusalo hoti dhātu, āyatana,
tika-s0201t:198_0: Bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesasakkāyadiṭṭhīnaṃ avihatattā tā janenti,
tika-s0201t:198_4: Puthu satthārānaṃ mukhamullokikāti ettha puthu janā satthupaṭiññā etesanti puthujjanāti vacanattho.
tika-s0201t:198_17: Puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattāti ettha jāyatīti jano,
tika-s0201t:198_20: Puthūsu vā janā jātā rattāti evaṃ rāgādiattho eva vā janasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:198_21: Rattāti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmakarena chandarāgena rattā sārattā.
tika-s0201t:198_22: Giddhāti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhijjhānena giddhā gedhaṃ āpannā.
tika-s0201t:198_23: Gadhitāti ganthitā viya dummocanīyabhāvena tattha paṭibaddhā.
tika-s0201t:198_24: Mucchitāti kilesavasena visaññībhūtā viya anaññakiccā mucchaṃ mohamāpannā.
tika-s0201t:198_25: Ajjhosannāti anaññasādhāraṇe viya katvā gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0201t:198_26: Laggāti vaṅkadaṇḍake viya āsattā mahāpalipe vā yāva nāsikaggā palipannapuriso viya uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena nimuggā,
tika-s0201t:198_27: lagitāti makkaṭālepe ālaggabhāvena paccuḍḍito viya makkaṭo pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena ālaggitā.
tika-s0201t:198_37: Puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānantiādinā puthu jano puthujjanoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:199_0: “Assutavā”ti etena avijjandhatā vuttāti āha “andhaputhujjano vutto hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:199_11: saddo “ye hi vo ariyā parisuddhakāyakammantā”tiādīsu visuddhāsayapayogesu puthujjanesupi vattati.
tika-s0201t:199_12: Idha pana ariyamaggādhigamena sabbalokuttarabhāvena ca ariyabhāvo adhippetoti dassento āha “buddhā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:199_13: Tattha “paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca sappurisā”ti idaṃ ariyā sappurisāti idha vuttapadānaṃ atthaṃ asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:200_1: Tassa hi ekantena kalyāṇamitto icchitabbo paratoghosamantarena paṭhamamaggassa anuppajjanato.
tika-s0201t:200_4: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:200_5: So eva ca aveccapasādādhigamena daḷhabhatti nāma.
tika-s0201t:200_6: Vuttampi cetaṃ “yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:200_8: Kataññutādīhi paccekabuddhā buddhāti ettha kataṃ jānātīti kataññū.
tika-s0201t:200_10: Anekesupi hi kappasatasahassesu kataṃ upakāraṃ jānanti paccekabuddhā pākaṭañca karonti satijananaāmisapaṭiggahaṇādinā,
tika-s0201t:200_13: Sammāsambuddho pana kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyasahassesupi kataṃ upakāraṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayañca jānāti,
tika-s0201t:200_15: sīho viya ca evaṃ sabbattha sakkaccameva dhammadesanaṃ karonto buddhakiccaṃ karoti.
tika-s0201t:200_18: tattha ca ādarābhāvo ariyānaṃ adassanasīlatā ca,
tika-s0201t:200_19: na ca dassane sādhukāritā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:200_20: Cakkhunā adassāvīti etta cakkhu nāma na maṃsacakkhu eva,
tika-s0201t:201_2: Evaṃ vuttepīti evaṃ aññāpadesena attūpanāyikaṃ katvā vuttepi.
tika-s0201t:202_2: Yesaṃ saṃvaravinayādīnaṃ abhāvena ayaṃ avinītoti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:202_8: Ñāṇasaṃvaroti “sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī”ti vatvā “paññāyete pidhīyare”ti vacanato sotasaṅkhātānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritaavijjāavasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ
tika-s0201t:202_11: sā ca tathāpavattā khandhā, adoso vā.
tika-s0201t:202_15: Tena tena guṇaṅgena tassa tassa aguṇaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgapahānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:203_3: Tena “sahagato samupagato”tiādinā vibhaṅge āgataṃ saṃvaravibhaṅgaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:204_0: Kāyaduccaritādīnanti dussīlyasaṅkhātānaṃ kāyavacīduccaritādīnaṃ muṭṭhassaccasaṅkhātassa pamādassa abhijjhādīnaṃ vā akkhantiaññāṇakosajjānañca.
tika-s0201t:204_4: kāyādīnaṃ vā jimhappavattiṃ vicchinditvā ujukaṃ nayanatoti attho.
tika-s0201t:204_5: Paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahānaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ tathā tathā anuppādanameva saṃvaraṇaṃ vinayanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:205_6: natthi ettha attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti evaṃ pavattañāṇaṃ nāmarūpavavatthānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:205_8: sayaṃ vā satī tasmiṃ kāye diṭṭhīti sakkāyadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0201t:205_11: “Natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā”ti ādinayappavattā ahetukadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0201t:205_12: “Issarapurisapajāpatipakatiaṇukālādīhi loko pavattati nivattati cā”ti pavattā visamahetudiṭṭhi.
tika-s0201t:205_14: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇenāti yathā etarahi nāmarūpassa kammādipaccayato uppatti,
tika-s0201t:205_16: Kathaṃkathībhāvassāti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti ādinayappavattāya saṃsayappavattiyā.
tika-s0201t:205_17: Kalāpasammasanenāti “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”ntiādinā khandhapañcakaṃ ekādasasu okāsesu
tika-s0201t:206_0: Yasmā sammadeva saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ passanto “evameva saṅkhārā anurūpakāraṇato uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:206_3: Yasmā pana saṅkhārānaṃ vayaṃ passanto “yadipime saṅkhārā avicchinnā vattanti,
tika-s0201t:206_4: uppannuppannā pana appaṭisandhikā nirujjhante vā”ti passati,
tika-s0201t:206_8: Sabhayeti sabbabhayānaṃ ākarabhāvato sakaladukkhavūpasamasaṅkhātassa paramassāsassa paṭipakkhabhāvato ca sabhaye khandhapañcake.
tika-s0201t:206_21: Saṅkhāranimittaggāhoti yādisassa kilesassa appahīnattā vipassanā saṅkhāranimittaṃ na muñcati,
tika-s0201t:207_3: saddena nīvaraṇapakkhiyā kilesā vitakkavicārādayo ca gayhanti.
tika-s0201t:208_0: Catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā accantaṃ appavattibhāvena yaṃ pahānanti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:208_3: Samudayapakkhikassāti ettha cattāropi maggā catusaccābhisamayāti katvā tehi pahātabbena tena tena samudayena saha pahātabbattā samudayasabhāgattā,
tika-s0201t:208_4: saccavibhaṅge ca sabbakilesānaṃ samudayabhāvassa vuttattā “samudayapakkhikā”ti diṭṭhiādayo vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:208_9: Pahānañca taṃ vinayo cāti pahānavinayo purimena atthena,
tika-s0201t:209_3: Samādānena hi sampādetabbo saṃvaro tadabhāve na hotīti.
tika-s0201t:209_4: Evañhi loke vattāro honti “mahā vata no bhogo,
tika-s0201t:210_9: Kasmā pana bhagavā evaṃ vibhāgena dhammaṃ desetīti?
tika-s0201t:210_11: Ye hi veneyyā dhammādhiṭṭhānāya dhammadesanāya sukhena atthaṃ paṭivijjhanti,
tika-s0201t:210_14: Yassā ca dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā desanāvilāsappatto hoti,
tika-s0201t:210_16: tasmā desanāvilāsappatto dhammissaro dhammarājā yathā yathā icchati,
tika-s0201t:210_17: tathā tathā dhammaṃ desetīti evaṃ iminā veneyyajjhāsayena desanāvilāsena ca evaṃ vibhāgena dhammaṃ desetīti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:211_1: ākāsadhātu viññāṇadhātūti imesaṃ channaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena chadhāturo.
tika-s0201t:211_2: “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā somanassaṭṭhāniyaṃ rūpaṃ upavicaratī”tiādinā vuttānaṃ channaṃ somanassūpavicārānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:211_5: Paññācakkhunā diṭṭhadhammikassa samparāyikassa ca atthassa adassanato andho,
tika-s0201t:212_6: Pariññānañhi avijjādayo kilesā paṭipakkhā tammūlikā ca sabbamaññanāti.
tika-s0201t:212_9: Tena “ariyadhammassa akovido”tiādikaṃ puthujanassa visesanabhāvena pavattaṃ pāḷisesaṃ gaṇhāti puthujjananiddesabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:215_1: Vasati ettha ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāti ārammaṇampi vatthūti vuccati pavattiṭṭhānabhāvatoti āha “pathavīādīsu vatthūsū”ti.
tika-s0201t:215_2: Sakkāyadhammānampi ārammaṇādinā satipi maññanāhetubhāve maññanāhetukatteneva tesaṃ nibbattitoti vuttaṃ “sabbasakkāyadhammajanitaṃ maññana”nti.
tika-s0201t:215_3: Ettha ca pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ sasambhārāsambhārabhāvā satipi pamāṇato samabhāve sāmatthiyato adhikānadhikabhāvena veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:215_5: Taṃtaṃkalāpehi lakkhaṇapathaviyā sesadhammā yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvena parivārabhāvena ca pavattanti.
tika-s0201t:215_6: Tenāha “sā hi vaṇṇādīhi sambhārehi saddhiṃ pathavīti sasambhārapathavī”ti.
tika-s0201t:215_9: Sā hi satipi paricchinnavuttiyaṃ sabbesaṃ sakalāpabhāvānaṃ ādhārabhāvena pavattamānā puthulā patthaṭā vitthiṇṇāti vattabbataṃ arahati,
tika-s0201t:215_10: na pana taṃ anupavisitvā pavattamānā āpādayo.
tika-s0201t:215_17: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “āpo ca devā pathavī,
tika-s0201t:216_3: Yaṃ paneke vadanti “lakkhaṇe diṭṭhe maññanā natthi,
tika-s0201t:216_4: sañjānātīti vuttasaññā ca diṭṭhiggāhassa mūlabhūtā piṇḍaggāhitā,
tika-s0201t:216_11: tasmā lakkhaṇapathaviyāpi kāyadvārānusārena aññathā ca upaṭṭhitāya maññanā pavattateva.
tika-s0201t:216_13: Pathavitoti paccate nissakkavacananti dassento “pathavīti sañjānātī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:216_14: Yasmā catubbidhampi pathaviṃ “pathavī’ti sañjānanto tena tena nayena pathavīkoṭṭhāseneva sañjānātīti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:217_2: nanu ariyāpi “ayañhi bhante mahāpathavī”tiādinā lokavohārena pavattantīti?
tika-s0201t:217_4: atha kho vohāramukhena micchābhinivesoti dassento “saññāvipallāsena sañjānātī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:217_10: Yathā nāma aggimhi mathiyamāne yadā dhūmo upalabbhati,
tika-s0201t:217_16: na pana vibhūtaṃ apākaṭabhāvato saññākiccameva vibhūtaṃ,
tika-s0201t:217_17: taṃ pana maññanānukūlaṃ maññanāsahitaṃ cāti āha “saññāvipallāsena sañjānātī”ti.
tika-s0201t:217_18: Evaṃ pathavībhāgaṃ amuñcantoyeva vā sañjānātīti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:217_19: Yo hi vuttappabhedāya pathaviyā pathavibhāgaṃ amuñcantoyeva avijahantoyeva sīsapiṇḍe suvaṇṇasaññī viya
tika-s0201t:217_22: Na vattabbaṃ puthujjanaggāhassa yuttimaggananivāraṇatoti dassento āha “ummattako viya…pe…
tika-s0201t:217_24: Ariyānaṃ adassāvitādibhedanti ariyānaṃ adassāvitādivisesaṃ vadantena bhagavatāva ettha yathāvuttasañjānane kāraṇaṃ vuttanti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:218_4: Papañcanti sattā saṃsāre cirāyanti etehīti papañcā,
tika-s0201t:218_5: maññanti “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā parikappenti etāhīti maññanāti dvīhipi pariyāyehi taṇhādayova vuttāti āha
tika-s0201t:218_8: aseyyādikassa seyyādito gahaṇato diṭṭhimaññanā viya taṇhāmānamaññanāpi aññathā gāho evāti āha “aññathā gaṇhātī”ti.
tika-s0201t:218_9: Ārammaṇābhiniropanādinā bhinnasabhāvānampi vitakkādīnaṃ sādhāraṇo upanijjhāyanasabhāvo viya anugijjhanuṇṇatiparāmasanasabhāvānampi
tika-s0201t:218_10: taṇhādīnaṃ sādhāraṇena ārammaṇaparikappanākārena pavatti maññanāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:218_13: udayabbayānupassanādīsu viya sukhumanayenapi maññanāpavatti atthīti vibhāvanasukhatāya thūlaṃyeva taṃ dassetukāmo “oḷārikanayenā”tiāha.
tika-s0201t:218_14: Oḷārike hi vibhāge dassite sukhumavibhāvanā sukarāti dassetuṃ ayamatthayojanā vuccatīti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:218_15: Ajjhattikāti indriyabaddhā sattasantānapariyāpannā niyakajjhattā vuttā vibhaṅge paṭisambhidāmagge ca.
tika-s0201t:219_9: Lohanti jātilohaṃ vijātilohaṃ kittimalohaṃ pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:219_10: Tattha ayo sajjhu suvaṇṇaṃ tipu sīsaṃ tambalohaṃ vekantakalohanti imāni satta jātilohāni nāma.
tika-s0201t:219_12: Kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ ārakuṭanti tīṇi kittimalohāni nāma.
tika-s0201t:219_13: Morakkhakaṃ puthukaṃ malinakaṃ capalakaṃ salakaṃ āṭalaṃ bhattakaṃ dusilohanti aṭṭha pisācalohāni nāma.
tika-s0201t:219_14: Tesu vekantakalohaṃ nāma sabbalohacchedanasamatthā ekā lohajāti.
tika-s0201t:219_15: Tathā hi taṃ vikantati chindatīti vikantakanti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:219_18: Tathā hi taṃ lohākāraṃ lohamalaṃ viya ghanasaṃhataṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0201t:219_19: tāpetvā tāḷitaṃ pana bhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ hutvā visarati mudu maṭṭhaṃ kammaniyaṃ vā na hoti.
tika-s0201t:219_23: Teneva taṃ karaṇena nibbattattā kittimalohanti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:219_27: yathāvuttaṃ missakameva katvā yojitaṃ kittimanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:219_29: Tesu yasmā pañca jātilohāni pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ vuttāneva,
tika-s0201t:219_30: tasmā vekantakalohena saddhiṃ vuttāvasesaṃ sabbaṃ idha lohanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:220_4: Tathā hi hatthikumbhaṃ varāhadāṭhā bhūjaṅgasīsaṃ valāhakūṭaṃ veḷū macchasīro saṅkho sippīti aṭṭha muttāyoniyo.
tika-s0201t:220_8: Valāhakajā bhāsurā dubbibhāgarūpā rattibhāge andhakāraṃ vidhamantiyo tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0201t:220_11: te ca veḷū amanussagocare eva padese jāyanti.
tika-s0201t:220_12: Macchasīrajā pāṭhīnapiṭṭhisamānavaṇṇā vaṭṭalā laghavo ca honti pabhāvihīnā,
tika-s0201t:220_13: te ca macchā samuddamajjhe eva jāyanti.
tika-s0201t:220_16: Evaṃ jātito aṭṭhavidhāsupi muttāsu yā macchasaṅkhasippijā,
tika-s0201t:220_20: Yasmā bahulaṃ sāmuddikāva muttā loke dissanti,
tika-s0201t:221_0: Maṇīti ṭhapetvā pāḷiāgate veḷuriyādike seso jotirasādibhedo sabbopi maṇi.
tika-s0201t:221_3: Silāti kāḷasilā paṇḍusilā setasilādibhedā aṭṭhapi silā.
tika-s0201t:221_7: Masāragallanti kabaramaṇi tiṇādīsu bahibhārā tālanāḷikerādayopi tiṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0201t:221_8: Antosāraṃ khadirādi antamaso dārukhaṇḍampi kaṭṭhaṃ nāma.
tika-s0201t:221_9: Muggamattato yāva muṭṭhippamāṇā marumbā sakkharā nāma.
tika-s0201t:221_13: Pāsāṇoti antomuṭṭhiyaṃ asaṇṭhahanato paṭṭhāya yāva hatthippamāṇaṃ pāsāṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:221_17: Tampi hi “rūpāvacaratikacatukkajjhānaṃ kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca catutthassa jhānassa vipāko
tika-s0201t:221_18: ime dhammā bahiddhārammaṇā”ti vacanato “bāhirā pathavī”ti vuccati.
