tika-s0201t:473_14: tasmā kammaṭṭhānameva avatvā imāya anupubbiyā desanā pavattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:474_1: taṃ pana atthato dassanādi evāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:474_4: Evaṃbhūtā ca yasmā pavattidvārapidhānena pihitā nāma honti,
tika-s0201t:474_6: Evaṃ accantikassa saṃvarassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ anaccantikaṃ saṃvaraṃ dassetvā idāni accantikameva saṃvaraṃ
tika-s0201t:474_7: dassento yasmiṃ dassanādimhi sati uppajjanārahā āsavā na uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:474_8: so tesaṃ anuppādo nirodho khayo pahānanti ca vuccamāno atthato appavattimattanti tassa ca dassanādi kāraṇanti
tika-s0201t:474_9: āha “yena kāraṇena anuppādanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ khayaṃ gacchanti pahīyanti nappavattanti,
tika-s0201t:475_1: manatopīti cakkhuviññāṇādivīthīsu tadanugatamanoviññāṇavīthīsu ca kiñcāpi kusalādīnampi pavatti atthi,
tika-s0201t:475_2: kāmāsavādayo eva pana vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharaṇakaasucibhāvena sandanti,
tika-s0201t:475_4: Tattha hi paggharaṇaasucimhi niruḷho āsava- saddoti.
tika-s0201t:475_5: Dhammato yāva gotrabhunti tato paraṃ maggaphalesu appavattanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:475_6: Ete hi ārammaṇavasena dhamme gacchantā tato paraṃ na gacchanti.
tika-s0201t:475_7: Nanu tato paraṃ bhavaṅgādīnipi gacchantīti ce? Na,
tika-s0201t:475_8: tesampi pubbe ālambitesu lokiyadhammesu sāsavabhāvena antogadhattā tato paratābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:475_11: tato paraṃ pana maggaphalasamānatāya aññesu maggesu maggavīthiyaṃ samāpattivīthiyaṃ nirodhānantarañca
tika-s0201t:475_12: pavattamānesu phalesu nibbāne ca āsavānaṃ pavatti nivāritāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:475_17: Tattha mariyādaṃ kiriyaṃ bahi katvā pavattati yathā “āpāṭaliputtā vuṭṭho devo”ti.
tika-s0201t:475_18: Abhividhi pana kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavattati yathā “ābhavaggā bhagavato yaso pavattatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:476_6: koṭi na paññāyati bhavataṇhāyā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:476_7: Avijjāsavabhavāsavānaṃ ciraparivutthatāya dassitāya tabbhāvabhāvino kāmāsavassa ciraparivutthatā dassitāva hoti.
tika-s0201t:476_8: Aññesu ca yathāvutte dhamme okāsañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānesu mānādīsu vijjamānesu attattaniyādiggāhavasena
tika-s0201t:476_12: Na cettha diṭṭhāsavo nāgatoti gahetabbaṃ bhavataṇhāya viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi bhavāsavaggahaṇeneva gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:476_15: Na hi taṃ kiñci saṃsāradukkhaṃ atthi,
tika-s0201t:476_17: Purimāni cetthāti ettha etesu catūsu atthavitappesu purimāni tīṇi.
tika-s0201t:476_19: Tattha yujjanti kilesesuyeva yathāvuttassa atthattayassa sambhavato.
tika-s0201t:477_2: Vivādamūlabhūtāti vivādassa mūlakāraṇabhūtā kodhūpanāha- makkha- paḷāsa- issā-
tika-s0201t:478_0: Yena devūpapatyassāti yena kammakilesappakārena āsavena devesu upapatti nibbatti assa mayhanti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:478_1: Gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo ākāsacārī assanti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:478_2: Ettha ca yakkhagandhabbatāya vinimuttā sabbā devagati devaggahaṇena gahitā.
tika-s0201t:478_3: Avasesā ca akusalā dhammāti akusalakammato avasesā akusalā dhammā āsavāti āgatāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:479_2: upaddavāti idaṃ yadi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na paññapeyya,
tika-s0201t:479_3: tato asaddhammappaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā,
tika-s0201t:479_4: ye ca tannimittā eva nirayādīsu nibbattassa pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavādippakārā anatthā,
tika-s0201t:479_9: Yathāti yena duvidhādippakārena aññesu ca suttantesu āgatāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:480_2: Tattha hi āsavā chadhā āgatā āsava-
tika-s0201t:480_6: saddoti āsavapadeti āsavappakāre saddakoṭṭhāse atthakoṭṭhāse vāti attho.
tika-s0201t:481_0: Tathā hīti tasmā saṃvaraṇaṃ pidahanaṃ pavattituṃ appadānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:481_2: Sīlādisaṃvare adhippete pavattituṃ appadānavasena thakanabhāvasāmaññato dvāraṃ saṃvaritvāti gehadvārasaṃvaraṇampi udāhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0201t:481_3: Sīlasaṃvarotiādi heṭṭhā mūlapariyāyavaṇṇanāya vuttampi imassa suttassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vattukāmo puna vadati.
tika-s0201t:481_4: Yuttaṃ tāva sīlasatiñāṇānaṃ saṃvarattho pāḷiyaṃ tathā āgatattā,
tika-s0201t:481_8: sītassa uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādiniddese khantivīriyānaṃ saṃvarapariyāyo nāgato,
tika-s0201t:481_9: uddese pana sabbāsavasaṃvarapariyāyanti saṃvarapariyāyena gahitattā attheva tesaṃ saṃvarabhāvoti.
tika-s0201t:482_0: Pubbe sīlasatiñāṇānaṃ pāṭhantarena saṃvarabhāvo dassitoti idāni taṃ imināpi suttena gahitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:482_1: Khantivīriyasaṃvarā vuttāyeva “khamo hoti sītassā”tiādinā pāḷiyā dassanavasena.
tika-s0201t:482_3: tañca agocara”nti ayaṃ panettha sīlasaṃvaroti tañca “yathārūpe”tiādinā vuttaṃ ayuttaṃ aniyatavatthukaṃ raho paṭicchannāsanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:482_6: ayaṃ pana ettha etasmiṃ sutte āgato sīlasaṃvaroti attho.
tika-s0201t:482_9: Tathā hi bhagavatā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”ti sīlasaṃvaravibhajane ācāragocarasampattiṃ dassentena “atthi anācāro,
tika-s0201t:482_11: Idañca ekadesena samudāyanidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ samuddapabbatanidassanaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:483_4: Yonisomanasikaraṇampi atthato paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaramevāti evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne yuttametaṃ siyā.
tika-s0201t:483_5: Keci pana “yattha yattha ‘idha paṭisaṅkhā yoniso’ti āgataṃ,
tika-s0201t:483_6: taṃ sabbaṃ sandhāya ‘sabbattha paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaro’ti vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:483_7: Tesaṃ matena “idaṃ dukkhanti yoniso manasi karotī”tiādikassa ñāṇasaṃvarena ca asaṅgaho siyā,
tika-s0201t:483_8: “dassanaṃ paṭisevanā bhāvanā ca ñāṇasaṃvaro”ti ca vacanaṃ virujjheyya,
tika-s0201t:483_10: “Sabbattha paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇasaṃvaro”ti iminā sattasupi ṭhānesu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:483_11: so ñāṇasaṃvaroti parivajjanādivasena vuttā sīlādayo sīlasaṃvarādayoti ayamattho dassito.
tika-s0201t:483_12: Evaṃ sati saṃvarānaṃ saṅkaro viya hotīti te asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “aggahitaggahaṇenā”ti vuttaṃ parivajjanavisesasaṃvarādhivāsanavinodanānaṃ
tika-s0201t:483_15: Te pana aggahite sarūpato dassento “dassanaṃ paṭisevanā bhāvanā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:484_4: upanissayakoṭiyā vā paccayabhūtena anuppannā kusalā dhammā uppattiṃ gacchanti uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:484_5: tathā aniruddhā akusalā dhammā nirodhaṃ gacchanti nirujjhantīti attho.
tika-s0201t:484_6: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anuppannā ceva āsavā na uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:484_7: uppannā ca āsavā pahīyantī”ti akusaladhammānaṃ anuppādapahānāni eva vuttāni,
tika-s0201t:484_12: manasikaroto”tiādinā kusaladhammānampi uppatti pakāsitāva āsavasaṃvaraṇassa padhānabhāvena gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:484_13: Tathā hi pariyosānepi “ye āsavā dassanā pahātabbā,
tika-s0201t:484_14: te dassanā pahīnā hontī”tiādinā āsavappahānameva padhānaṃ katvā nigamitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:485_1: Jānato passatoti ettha dassanampi paññācakkhunāva dassanaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0201t:485_2: na maṃsacakkhunā dibbacakkhunā vāti āha “dvepi padāni ekatthānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:485_10: “Jānato passato”ti ca jānanadassanamukhena puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā pavattāti āha “ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇappabhāvaṃ upādāya puggalaṃ niddisatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:485_11: Jānato passatoti “yoniso ca manasikāraṃ ayoniso ca manasikāra”nti vakkhamānattā yonisomanasikāravisayajānanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:485_13: Tañca kho pana nesaṃ āsavānaṃ khayūpāyasabhāvassa adhippetattā uppādanānuppādanavasena na ārammaṇamattenāti
tika-s0201t:486_1: atha kho rūpādi viya cakkhuviññāṇena yonisomanasikārāyonisomanasikāre paccakkhe katvā tesaṃ uppādavasena
tika-s0201t:486_2: dassananti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “passato”ti vuttanti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:486_6: ajānataṃ apassata”nti ca ādīsu ñāṇakiccassa sāmaññavisesadīpanavasenetaṃ padadvayaṃ āgatanti.
tika-s0201t:486_8: Te hi “samādhinā jānato vipassanāya passato jānaṃ jānāti passaṃ passati,
tika-s0201t:487_1: So pana nesaṃ anuppādo sabbena sabbaṃ khīṇatā abhāvo evāti āha “āsavānaṃ accantakhayamasamuppādaṃ khīṇākāraṃ natthibhāva”nti.
tika-s0201t:487_2: Ujumaggānusārinoti kilesavaṅkassa kāyavaṅkādīnañca pahānena ujubhūte savipassane heṭṭhimamagge anussarantassa.
tika-s0201t:487_5: Tato aññā anantarāti khayasaṅkhāte aggamagge tappariyāpannameva ñāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:487_8: samucchedavasena pana āsavehi khīṇotīti maggo khayoti vuccatīti āha “maggo āsavakkhayoti vutto”ti.
tika-s0201t:487_10: So pana khīṇāsavo hotīti “āsavānaṃ khayā”ti imassa phalapariyāyatā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:488_0: “Jānato passato”ti jānato eva passato evāti evamettha niyamo icchito,
tika-s0201t:488_1: na aññathā visesābhāvato aniṭṭhasādhanato cāti tassa niyamassa phalaṃ dassetuṃ “no ajānato no apassato”ti vuttanti āha “yo pana na jānāti na passati,
tika-s0201t:488_7: “Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti,
tika-s0201t:488_9: Tesu hi keci abhijātisaṅkantimattena bhavasaṅkantimattena ca saṃsārasuddhiṃ paṭijānanti,
tika-s0201t:489_5: Anupāyo eva hi āsavānaṃ khayassa yadidaṃ yoniso ca ayoniso ca manasikārassa ajānanaṃ adassanañca,
tika-s0201t:489_7: Nanu “passato”ti iminā ayonisomanasikāro yathā na uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:489_8: evaṃ dassane adhippete purimeneva anupāyapaṭisedho vutto hotīti? Na hoti,
tika-s0201t:489_9: ayonisomanasikārānuppādanassapi upāyabhāvato satibalena saṃvutacakkhundriyāditā viya sampajaññabaleneva niccādivasena abhūtajānanābhāvo hotīti.
tika-s0201t:489_12: anvayato byatirekato ca vitthāraṃ akatvāti attho. Ñāṇaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:489_15: Ñāṇassa padhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ evamayaṃ desanā katāti nāyaṃ doso,
tika-s0201t:489_16: tathā aññatthāpi “ariyaṃ vo bhikkhave sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra”nti vitthāro.
tika-s0201t:490_1: So hi drabyoti vuccati “drabyaṃ vinassati nādrabya”ntiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:490_4: Yathāha “na kho dabba dabbā evaṃ nibbeṭhentī”ti.
tika-s0201t:490_7: Yo hi parisuddhājīvo kātuṃ ajānantānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ,
tika-s0201t:490_10: Padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbā nāthakaraṇadhammabhāvena upanissayabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:491_2: Aniccādīsu aniccantiādināti aniccadukkhaasubhaanattasabhāvesu dhammesu “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ asubhaṃ anattā”tiādinā eva nayena,
tika-s0201t:491_5: Cittassa āvaṭṭanātiādinā āvaṭṭanāya paccayabhūtā tato purimuppannā manodvārikā kusalajavanappavatti phalavohārena tathā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:491_6: Tassā hi vasena sā kusaluppattiyā upanissayo hoti.
tika-s0201t:491_11: Tadevārammaṇaṃ attānaṃ anubandhitvā uppajjamānaṃ manasi karoti ṭhapetīti manasikāro.
tika-s0201t:491_12: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ upāyapathamanasikāralakkhaṇo yonisomanasikāro nāma vuccati,
tika-s0201t:491_13: yassa vasena puggalo dukkhādīni saccāni āvajjituṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0201t:492_6: Kasmā panettha ayamuddesaniddeso parivattoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yoniso”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:492_7: Tattha manasikārapadaṃ dvinnaṃ sādhāraṇanti adhippāyena “yoniso ayonisoti imehi tāva dvīhi padehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:492_9: ayonisoti ca ayonisomanasikāro tattha anuvattanato vakkhamānattā ca.
tika-s0201t:492_10: Satipi anatthuppattisāmaññe bhavādīsu puggalassa bahulisāmaññaṃ dassetvā taṃ parivattitvā visesadassanattaṃ nāvādi upamāttayaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:493_5: aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā nāma āsavā na santī”ti.
tika-s0201t:493_8: Idāni āsavavasenapi anuppannapariyāyo labbhatīti dassetuṃ “anubhūtapubbepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:493_17: sā ca abhiṇhuppattiyā bahulīkāratoti te laddhāsevanā bahulabhāvaṃ pattā maddantā pharantā chādentā andhākāraṃ
tika-s0201t:493_18: karontā aparāparaṃ uppajjamānā ekasantānanayena “uppannā pavaḍḍhantī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:493_19: Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ uppajjamānā uppannā pavaḍḍhantīti vuccantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:493_20: Ito aññathāti ito aparāparuppannānaṃ ekattaggahaṇato aññathā vaḍḍhi nāma natthi khaṇikabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:494_2: Yassa panātiādinā anuddesikaṃ katvā vuttamatthaṃ purātanassa purisātisayassa paṭipattidassanena pākaṭataraṃ
tika-s0201t:494_7: Ācariyaṃ āpucchitvāti attano uddesācariyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇatthaṃ gantuṃ āpucchitvā.
tika-s0201t:494_10: Tadā kira mukhapāṭheneva bahū ekajjhaṃ uddisāpetvā manosajjhāyavasena dhammaṃ sajjhāyanti.
tika-s0201t:494_11: Tatthāyaṃ thero paññavantatāya uddesaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhorayho,
tika-s0201t:494_13: kiṃ mayhaṃ uddesenā”ti saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā dutiyadivase uddesakāle ācariyaṃ upasaṅkami.
tika-s0201t:494_16: Na hi paccuppannesu āsavesu maggena pahānaṃ sambhavatīti āha “ye pana…pe…
tika-s0201t:494_19: Tesaṃ paṭipattiyā pahānaṃ natthi uppajjanārahānaṃ paccayaghātena anuppādanameva tāya pahānanti.
tika-s0201t:495_5: Dassanāti idaṃ hetumhi nissakkavacananti dassanenāti hetumhi karaṇavacanena tadatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0201t:495_10: disvā pana kattabbakiccassa kilesappahānassa akaraṇato na taṃ dassananti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:495_14: tasmā dhammacakkhu punappunaṃ nibbattanena bhāvanaṃ appattaṃ dassanaṃ nāma,
tika-s0201t:495_15: dhammacakkhuñca pariññādikiccakaraṇavasena catusaccadhammadassanaṃ tadabhisamayoti nutthettha gotrabhussa dassanabhāvappatti.
tika-s0201t:495_30: Paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhe catusaccadhamme bhāvanāvasena uppajjanato bhāvanā,
tika-s0201t:495_32: Na hi taṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ kiñci passati,
tika-s0201t:497_1: Kusalākusaladhammehi ālambiyamānāpi ārammaṇadhammā āvajjanamukheneva tabbhāvaṃ gacchantīti dassento “manasikaraṇīye”ti
tika-s0201t:497_6: Yasmā kusaladhammesupi subhasukhaniccādivasena manasikāro assādanādihetutāya sāvajjo ahitadukkhāvaho
tika-s0201t:497_7: akusaladhammesupi aniccādivasena manasikāro nibbidādihetutāya anavajjo hitasukhāvaho,
tika-s0201t:497_8: tasmā “dhammato niyamo natthī”ti vatvā “ākārato pana atthī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:498_2: devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”tiādīsu vikappattho diṭṭho,
tika-s0201t:498_3: na samuccayatthoti tattha samuccayatthe payogaṃ dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:498_4: Evañca katvā samuccayatthadīpakaṃ panetaṃ suttapadaṃ samudāhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0201t:499_2: Bhavāsavaṃ pana ṭhapetvā sabbo lobho kāmāsavoti yuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0201t:499_5: “Sundaramidaṃ ṭhānaṃ niccaṃ dhuva”ntiādinā assādentassa uppajjamāno sassatucchedadiṭṭhisahagato rāgo bhave āsavoti bhavāsavo.
tika-s0201t:499_6: Evanti sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhisaṅgahato bhavāsaveneva diṭṭhāsavo gahito taṃsahagatarāgatāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:499_7: Apare pana “diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavena ca saṅgahito”ti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:499_8: Ettha ca “bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu uppajjatī”ti vacanato diṭṭhisampayuttarāgassa bhavāsavabhāvo vicāretabbo,
tika-s0201t:499_10: evaṃ sati bhavāsave diṭṭhāsavassa samodhānagamanaṃ kataṃ na siyā.
tika-s0201t:499_11: Na hi tampayogatabbhāvādike asati taṃsaṅgaho yutto,
tika-s0201t:499_12: tasmā yathāvuttapāḷiṃ anusārena diṭṭhigatasampayuttalobhopi kāmāsavoti yuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0201t:500_0: Abhidhamme ca kāmāsavaniddese “kāmesūti kāmarāgadiṭṭhirāgādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūtesu tebhūmakesu vatthukāmesū”ti attho sambhavati.
tika-s0201t:500_1: Tattha hi uppajjamānā sā taṇhā sabbāpi na kāmacchandādināmaṃ na labhatīti.
tika-s0201t:500_4: tadā tena sampayutto avijjāsavo āsavavippayuttoti domanassavicikicchuddhaccasampayuttassa viya tassapi
tika-s0201t:500_5: āsavavippayuttatā vattabbā siyā “catūsu diṭṭhigatavippayuttalobhasahagatacittuppādesu uppanno moho siyā
tika-s0201t:500_9: “kāmāsavaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo”ti ca vacanato diṭṭhisahagatarāgo kāmāsavo na hotīti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0201t:500_11: na abhijjhāya ca noāsavabhāvoti noāsavalobhassa sabbhāvo vicāretabbo.
tika-s0201t:500_12: Na hi atthi abhidhamme “āsavo ca noāsavo ca dhammā āsavassa dhammassa āsavassa ca noāsavassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayo”ti sattamo navamo ca pañho.
tika-s0201t:500_15: Diṭṭhisampayutte pana lobhe noāsave vijjamāne sattamanavamāpi pañhā vissajjanaṃ labheyyuṃ,
tika-s0201t:500_18: Diṭṭhivippayutte ca lobhe noāsave vijjamāne vattabbaṃ vuttameva.
tika-s0201t:500_21: tasmā balavakāmarāgasseva kāmāsavaṃ dassetuṃ “kāmāsavoti pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:501_0: Sāmaññena bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā idha tayo eva āsavā vuttāti tassa tadantogadhataṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ diṭṭhāsavo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:501_2: Catūsu saccesu aññāṇanti idaṃ suttantanayaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:501_9: Vuttanayapaccanīkatoti “kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”tiādinā kāmaguṇesu ādīnavadassanapubbakanekkhammapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0201t:501_10: chandarāgaṃ vikkhambhayato samucchindantassa ca anuppanno ca kāmāsavo na uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:501_13: nissaraṇapaṭipattiyā anuppannā ca bhavāsavaavijjāsavā na uppajjanti,
tika-s0201t:501_14: uppannā ca pahīyantīti evaṃ taṇhāpakkhe vuttassa nayassa paṭipakkhato sukkapakkhe vitthāro veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:502_0: Tayo evāti abhidhamme viya “cattāro”ti avatvā kasmā tayo eva āsavā idha imissaṃ dassanāpahātabbakathāyaṃ vuttā?
tika-s0201t:502_2: Bhavesu niccaggāhānusārato yebhuyyato bhavarāgasampattito bhavāsavassa animittavimokkhapaṭipakkhatā,
tika-s0201t:503_2: Nirayādigamanīyā pana kāmāsavādayo “dassanā pahātabbe āsave”ti ettheva samāruḷhā.
tika-s0201t:503_3: Atha vā yadaggena so puggalodassanāpahātabbānaṃ āsavānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:503_5: Na hi samaññābhedena vatthubhedo atthīti dassetuṃ “ettāvatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:503_7: Kasmā panettha dassanāpahātabbesu āsavesu dassetabbesu “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā vicikicchā dassitāti āha “vicikicchāsīsena cetthā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:504_0: Vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti atīte attano vijjamānataṃ,
tika-s0201t:504_2: tato pubbe na nu kho ahosi”nti atīte attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati. Kasmā?
tika-s0201t:504_4: Tassā pana atītavatthutāya gahitattā sassatādhiccasamuppattiākāranissayatā dassitā.
tika-s0201t:504_5: Evaṃ āsappanaparisappanāpavattikaṃ katthacipi appaṭivattihetubhūtaṃ vicikicchaṃ kasmā uppādetīti na codetabbametanti
tika-s0201t:504_8: Yadi evaṃ tassa ayonisomanasikāreneva bhavitabbanti āpannanti āha “nanu ca puthujjanopi yoniso manasi karotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:506_5: Te hi “kathaṃ nu khoti issarena vā brahmunā vā pubbakatena vā ahetuto vā nibbattoti cintetī”ti āhu.
tika-s0201t:508_0: Vijjamānataṃ avijjamānatañcāti sassatāsaṅkaṃ nissāya “bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhāna”nti anāgate attano vijjamānataṃ,
tika-s0201t:508_2: tato paraṃ na nu kho bhavissāmī”ti anāgate attano avijjamānatañca kaṅkhatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:509_0: Paccuppannamaddhānanti addhāpaccuppannassa idhādhippetattā “paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:509_3: sā assa atthīti kathaṃkathīti āha “vicikiccho hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:509_5: ummattako viya hi bālaputhujjanoti paṭikacceva vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:509_7: Muṇḍesunti muṇḍena anicchantaṃ jāgaraṇakāle na sakkāti suttaṃ muṇḍesuṃ kuladhammatāya yathā taṃ ekacce kulatāpasā,
tika-s0201t:511_0: Attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati kaṇṇo viya sūtaputtasaññī.
tika-s0201t:511_1: Jātiyā vibhāviyamānāya “aha”nti tassa attano parāmasanaṃ sandhāyāha “evañhi siyā kaṅkhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:511_2: Manussāpi ca rājāno viyāti manussāpi keci ekacce rājāno viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:513_1: paramatthato pana sā attabhāvavisayāvāti āha “attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhāna”nti,
tika-s0201t:514_1: Yathā ayaṃ vicikicchā uppajjatīti ayaṃ vuttappabhedā vicikicchā yathā uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:514_4: Yathā hi vicikicchā attābhinivesaṃ nissāya pavattati,
tika-s0201t:514_6: evaṃ attābhinivesopi taṃ nissāya pavattati “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā antogadhāhaṃkārassa kathaṃkathibhāvassa attaggāhasannissayabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:514_13: na atīte tatthapi sati atthitāya ucchedaggāhassa sabbhāvato.
tika-s0201t:515_6: sañjānitabbaṃ nīlādiārammaṇaṃ viya attānampi sañjānātīti evaṃdiṭṭhitopi diṭṭhigatito hotīti vuttaṃ “attanāva attānaṃ sañjānāmī”ti.
tika-s0201t:515_7: Svāyamattho saññaṃ tadaññataradhamme ca “attā anattā”ti ca gahaṇavasena hotīti vuttaṃ “saññākkhandhasīsenā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:515_8: Ettha ca khandhavinimutto attāti gaṇhato sassatadiṭṭhi,
tika-s0201t:515_9: khandhaṃ pana “attā”ti gaṇhato ucchedadiṭṭhīti āha “sabbāpi sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyovā”ti.
tika-s0201t:516_1: Vadatīti iminā kārakavedakasattānaṃ hitasukhāvabodhanasamatthataṃ attano dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:516_5: Īdisānañhi padānaṃ bahulā kattusādhanataṃ saddasatthavidū maññanti.
tika-s0201t:516_7: sati ca udayabbayatte neva niccatāti “nicco”ti vadantassa adhippāyaṃ vivaranto āha “uppādavayarahito”ti.
tika-s0201t:517_13: Añño pana araññapadeso duratikkamanaṭṭhena kantāro viyāti,
tika-s0201t:517_18: Andubandhanādi viya nissarituṃ appadānavasena aseribhāvakaraṇaṃ bandhanaṭṭho,
tika-s0201t:517_19: kilesakammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ paccayabhāvena dūragatampi ākaḍḍhitvā saṃyojanaṃ saṃyojanaṭṭho,
tika-s0201t:517_25: Jātiādike dukkhadhamme sarūpato dassetvāpi “na parimuccati dukkhasmā”ti vadantena bhagavatā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ
tika-s0201t:517_26: nāma sabbānatthakaraṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ sabbassapi dukkhassa mūlabhūtanti ayamattho vibhāvitoti dassetuṃ “kiṃ
tika-s0201t:518_2: evañhi dassanena pahātabbā āsavā anavasesato dassitā hontīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:518_3: Sīlabbataparāmāso kāmāsavādiggahaṇeneva gahito hoti kāmāsavādihetukattā tassa.
tika-s0201t:518_4: Appahīnakāmarāgādiko hi kāmasukhatthaṃ vā bhavasuddhatthaṃ vā evaṃ bhavavisuddhi hotīti sīlabbatāni parāmasanti,
tika-s0201t:518_5: “imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti,
tika-s0201t:518_6: “tattha nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva ṭhassāmī”ti,
tika-s0201t:518_7: “sīlena suddhi vatena suddhi sīlabbatena suddhī”ti ca suttevuttaṃ sīlabbataṃ parāmasanti.
tika-s0201t:518_9: Tassa gahitattāti sīlabbataparāmāsassa diṭṭhiggahaṇena gahitattā yathā “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:519_1: Tāvāti “sutavā”ti ito paṭṭhāya yāva “so idaṃ dukkha”nti padaṃ,
tika-s0201t:519_2: tāva imaṃ padaṃ avadhiṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:519_7: amanasikaraṇīyapadānaṃ yathākkamaṃ mūlapariyāye idha gahetvā vuttanayena attho veditabboti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:519_10: sappurisānaṃ dassāvī”ti etesaṃ padānaṃ sabbākārena vuttaviparītato attho veditabbo,
tika-s0201t:519_12: Arahā hi nippariyāyena ariyadhamme kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto ca nāma.
tika-s0201t:519_18: Tadanurūpena atthenāti tassa puggalassa anurūpena ariyaṭṭhena,
tika-s0201t:519_21: Yathā cassa “yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano”ti ārabhitvā “sopi vuccati sikkhatīti sekkho”ti pariyāyena sekkhasutte sekkhabhāvo vutto,
tika-s0201t:519_23: Vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanālakkhaṇehi ye ariyasappurisadhammavinayasaṅkhātā bodhipakkhiyadhammā tisso sikkhā eva vā sambhavanti,
tika-s0201t:519_26: Ariyassa sāvakoti vā ariyasāvakatthena eva vutto yathā “agamā rājagahaṃ buddho”ti.
tika-s0201t:519_27: Sikhāppattavipassanāggahaṇañcettha vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā anivattipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhitassa gahaṇatthanti
tika-s0201t:520_1: Yathā dhātumukhena vipassanaṃ abhiniviṭṭho dhātukammaṭṭhāniko āyatanādimukhena abhiniviṭṭho āyatanādikammaṭṭhāniko,
tika-s0201t:520_5: kamme vā yathāvuttanaṭṭhena ṭhānaṃ avaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvanārambhokammaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:520_6: tadeva catusaccamukhena pavattaṃ etassa atthīti catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko.
tika-s0201t:520_8: Uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhānoti ca catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ pāḷito atthato ca uggahetvā manasikārayoggaṃ katvā ṭhito.
tika-s0201t:520_9: Vipassanāmaggaṃ samāruḷhoti sappaccayanāmarūpadassane patiṭṭhāya tadeva nāmarūpaṃ aniccādito sammasanto.
tika-s0201t:520_13: Kathaṃ panettha “manasi karotī”ti iminā “vipassatī”ti ayamattho vutto hotīti āha “ettha…pe… vuttā”ti.
tika-s0201t:520_15: Vipassatīti ca yathā upari visesādhigamo hoti,
tika-s0201t:521_1: Tadārammaṇeti taṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatte.
tika-s0201t:521_2: Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvāti aviparītaṃ attano ārammaṇaṃ sabhāvacchedanādikiccañceva aññāṇādilakkhaṇañca asaṅkarato hadaye ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0201t:521_3: Iminā pubbe nāmarūpaparicchede katepi dhammānaṃ salakkhaṇavavatthāpanaṃ paccayapariggahena suvavatthāpitaṃ
tika-s0201t:521_4: nāma hotīti dasseti yathā “dvikkhattuṃ baddhaṃ subaddha”nti.
tika-s0201t:521_5: Evañhi ñātapariññāya kiccaṃ siddhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:521_6: Paccayato paccayuppannato ca vavatthāpitattā pākaṭabhāvena siddhenapi siddhabhāvo pākaṭo hotīti vuttaṃ “ahutvā hontī”ti.
tika-s0201t:521_7: Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ āropetīti asato hi uppādena bhavitabbaṃ, na sato,
tika-s0201t:521_8: uppādavantato ca nesaṃ ekantena icchitabbā paccayāyattavuttibhāvato,
tika-s0201t:521_9: sati uppāde avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti nattheva niccatāvakāsoti.
tika-s0201t:521_10: Sūpaṭṭhitāniccatāya ca udayabbayadhammehi abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanato dukkhamanaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:521_12: Katthacipi saṅkhāragate “mā jīri mā byādhiyī”ti alabbhanato natthi vasavattananti āha “avasavattanato anattāti anattalakkhaṇaṃ āropetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:522_6: na ito bhiyyo”ti paricchinditvā jānanameva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti pariññāpaṭivedho.
tika-s0201t:522_7: Ayaṃ yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0201t:522_11: Pahīnassa puna appahātabbatāya pakaṭṭhaṃ hānaṃ cajanaṃ samucchindanaṃ pahānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:522_13: Ayampi yena kilesena appahīyamānena maggabhāvanāya na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:522_15: tassa kilesassa padaghātaṃ karontassa anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentassa ñāṇassa tathāpavattiyā paṭighātābhāvena nissaṅgacāraṃ upādāya evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0201t:522_17: anussavākāraparivitakkādike muñcitvā sarūpato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ idaṃ tanti yathāsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:522_19: Ayaṃ pana yassa āvaraṇassa asamucchindanato ñāṇaṃ nirodhaṃ ālambituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:522_20: tassa samucchindanato taṃ sarūpato vibhāvitameva pavattatīti evaṃ vutto.
tika-s0201t:523_4: Paṭhamamaggopi hi yathārahaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyaṃ pavattaṃ parijānanādiṃ vaḍḍhento pavattoti tatthāpi vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0201t:523_6: sā eva vuttanayena paṭivedhoti bhāvanā paṭivedho.
tika-s0201t:523_7: Ayampi hi yathā ñāṇe pavatte pacchā maggadhammānaṃ sarūpaparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0201t:523_9: tiṭṭhatu tāva yathādhigatamaggadhammaṃ yathāpavattesu phaladhammesupi ayaṃ yathādhigatasaccadhammesu viya vigatasammohova hoti.
tika-s0201t:523_11: Yato cassa dhammatāsañcoditā yathādhigatasaccadhammāvalambiniyo maggavīthito parato maggaphalapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesanibbānānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā pavattanti.
tika-s0201t:523_14: Ekābhisamayena abhisametīti vuttamevatthaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ “no ca kho aññamaññena ñāṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:524_0: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha “ariyamaggañāṇaṃ catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayavasena kiccakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:524_6: aññathā ekassa ñāṇassa ekasmiṃ khaṇe catukiccakaraṇaṃ na yujjati.
tika-s0201t:524_7: Na hidaṃ katthaci diṭṭhampi suttaṃ atthī”ti.
tika-s0201t:524_11: evaṃ sante paccekampi saccesu nānakkhaṇeneva pavatteyya,
tika-s0201t:524_13: tathā sati dukkhādīnaṃ ekadesekadesameva parijānāti pajahatīti āpajjatīti nānābhisamaye paṭhamamaggādīhi
tika-s0201t:524_15: tato eva ekadesasotāpannāditā ca āpajjati anantaraphalattā lokuttarakusalānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:524_17: Na hi kālabhedena vinā so eva sotāpanno ca asotāpanno cāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0201t:525_0: Apicāyaṃ nānābhisamayavādī evaṃ pucchitabbo “maggañāṇaṃ saccāni paṭivijjhantaṃ kiṃ ārammaṇato paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0201t:525_3: “kiccato paṭivijjhantassa kiṃ nānābhisamayenā”ti vatvā paṭipāṭiyānidassanena saññāpetabbo.
tika-s0201t:525_5: evaṃ sante tassa ñāṇassa vipassanāñāṇassa viya dukkhasamudayānaṃ accantapariññāsamucchedā na yuttā anissaṭattā.
tika-s0201t:525_7: Na hi maggo sayameva attānaṃ ārabbha pavattatīti yuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:525_10: nirodhaṃ kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca paṭivijjhatīti evaṃ asammohato paṭivijjhantassa maggañāṇassa nattheva nānābhisamayo.
tika-s0201t:525_13: Na cetaṃ kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yo nu kho, āvuso,
tika-s0201t:525_19: aññathā purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādidassanamayojaniyaṃ siyā.
tika-s0201t:525_20: Na hi lokuttaramaggo lokiyamaggo viya katakārībhāvena pavattati samucchedakattā,
tika-s0201t:525_21: tathā yojanena ca sabbadassanaṃ dassanantaraparamanti dassanānuparamo siyāti evaṃ āgamato yuttito ca nānābhisamayo na yujjatīti saññāpetabbo.
tika-s0201t:526_0: Nirodhaṃ ārammaṇatoti nirodhameva ārammaṇatoti niyamo gahetabbo,
tika-s0201t:526_2: Tena nirodhe kiccatopi paṭivedho siddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:526_7: Na hi sutte katthaci cattāro āsavā āgatā atthi.
tika-s0201t:526_12: āsavā dassanā pahātabbā”ti vuttanti āha “dassanā pahātabbā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:526_13: Ettha pariyāpannattāti etena sammāsaṅkappassa viya paññākkhandhe kiccasabhāgatāya idha vicikicchāya āsavasaṅgaho katoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:527_0: Sabbo attaggāho sakkāyadiṭṭhivinimutto natthīti vuttaṃ “channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:527_2: Sā hi diṭṭhi ekasmiṃ cittuppāde santāne ca ṭhitaṃ ekaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:527_11: Tasmāti yasmā bahū evettha āsavā pahātabbā,
tika-s0201t:528_0: Dassanā pahātabbātiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-s0201t:531_4: Tathā hi heṭṭhā “upakkilesavisodhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā āsavakkhayapaṭipattidassanattha”nti suttantadesanāya payojanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:531_5: Na hi sakkā ādito eva ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0201t:531_6: atha kho samādinnasīlo indriyesu guttadvāro “saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati,
tika-s0201t:531_9: saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodetī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ caturāpassenapaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjamāno sammasanavidhiṃ otaritvā anukkamena
tika-s0201t:532_6: Tañhi ayoniso manasikaroto kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato “anubyañjana”nti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:532_7: Nimittaggāhoti itthipurisanimittādikassa vā kilesavatthubhūtassa vā nimittassa gāho.
tika-s0201t:532_8: Ādittapariyāyanayenāti ādittapariyāye āgatanayena veditabbā ādīnavapaṭisaṅkhāti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:533_0: Evaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāya cakkhundriye niyataṭṭhāno saṃvaro cakkhundriyasaṃvaro.
tika-s0201t:533_2: Yadipi aññattha asaṅkheyyampi bhavaṅgacittaṃ nirantaraṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:533_3: pasādaghaṭṭanāvajjanuppādānaṃ pana antare dve eva bhavaṅgacittāni uppajjantīti ayaṃ cittaniyāmoti āha bhavaṅge “dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe”ti.
tika-s0201t:534_0: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vātiādi puna avacanatthaṃ idheva sabbaṃ vuttanti chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:534_1: Na hi pañcadvāre kāyavacīduccaritasaṅkhāto dussīlyasaṃvaro atthīti so manodvāravasena,
tika-s0201t:534_3: Muṭṭhassaccādīnañhi satipaṭipakkhādilakkhaṇānaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ siyā pañcadvāre uppatti,
tika-s0201t:534_4: na tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ aviññattijanakattāti.
tika-s0201t:535_0: Yathā kinti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṃvaro “cakkhudvāre asaṃvaro”ti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:535_2: Yathātiādinā nagaradvāre asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ gharādīnaṃ asaṃvutatā viya javane asaṃvare sati
tika-s0201t:535_3: taṃsambandhānaṃ dvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutatāti aññāsaṃvare aññāsaṃvutatāsāmaññameva nidasseti,
tika-s0201t:535_6: Sambandho ca javanena dvārādīnaṃ ekasantatipariyāpannatāya eva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:535_7: Paccayabhāvena purimanipphannaṃ javanakāle asantampi bhavaṅgādi phalanipphattiyā cakkhādi viya santaṃyeva nāma.
tika-s0201t:535_9: tasmā sati dvārabhavaṅgādike pacchā uppajjamānaṃ javanaṃ bāhiraṃ viya katvā nagaradvārasamānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:535_11: Javanassa hi paramatthato asatipi bāhirabhāve itarassa ca abbhantarabhāve “pabhassaramidaṃ,
tika-s0201t:535_13: tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭha”nti ādivacanato āgantukabhūtassa kadāci kadāci uppajjamānassa javanassa bāhirabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:535_14: tabbidhurasabhāvassa itarassa abbhantarabhāvo ca pariyāyato veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:535_15: Javane vā asaṃvare uppanne tato paraṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ asaṃvarahetubhāvāpattito nagaradvārasadisena
tika-s0201t:535_16: javanena pavisitvā dussīlyādicorānaṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīsu musanaṃ kusalabhaṇḍavināsanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:535_17: Uppanne hi asaṃvare dvārādīnaṃ tassa hetubhāvo paññāyati,
tika-s0201t:535_18: so ca uppajjamānoyeva dvārādīnaṃ saṃvarūpanissayabhāvaṃ paṭibāhentoyeva pavattatīti ayañhettha asaṃvarādīnaṃ pavattinayo.
tika-s0201t:535_19: Pañcadvāre rūpādiārammaṇe āpāthagate yathāpaccayaṃ akusalajavane uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe manodvārikajavanaṃ
tika-s0201t:535_21: puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre “itthī puriso”tiādinā visayaṃ vavatthapetvā javanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati,
tika-s0201t:535_25: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi agutta”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:536_1: Saṃvarena samannāgato puggalo saṃvutoti vuttoti āha “upetoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:536_2: Ekajjhaṃ katvāti “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti padañca atthato abhinnaṃ samānaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:536_3: Ayameva cettha attho sundarataro uparipāḷiyā saṃsandanato.
tika-s0201t:536_5: Yanti ādesoti iminā liṅgavipallāsena saddhiṃ vacanavipallāso katoti dasseti,
tika-s0201t:536_9: Yathā panettha āsavā aññe ca vighātakarā kilesavipākapariḷāhā sambhavanti,
tika-s0201t:536_16: yañca saṃvaraphalanti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0201t:536_26: Sabbatthevāti manodvāre pañcadvāre cāti sabbasmiṃ dvāre.
tika-s0201t:539_1: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvarantiādīsu “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā vuttaṃ paccavekkhaṇameva yoniso paṭisaṅkhā.
tika-s0201t:539_3: Bhavapatthanāya assādayatoti bhavapatthanāmukhena bhāvitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assādentassa.
tika-s0201t:539_8: Sītassāti dhātukkhobhato vā utupariṇāmato vā uppannasītassa.
tika-s0201t:540_1: So hi piṇḍolyena bhikkhanāya patte patanato tattha tattha laddhabhikkhāpiṇḍānaṃ pāto sannipātoti “piṇḍapāto”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:540_7: Imāni ca padāni yathākkamaṃ moha- dosa- saṇṭhāna- vaṇṇa-
tika-s0201t:540_10: Purimaṃ vā dvayaṃ attano attano saṃkilesuppattinisedhanatthaṃ,
tika-s0201t:540_14: Ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti pabandhaṭṭhitatthañceva pavattiyā avicchedanatthañca cirakālaṭṭhitatthaṃ jīvitindriyassa pavattāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:540_18: Purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmīti purāṇaṃ abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ paṭihanissāmi.
tika-s0201t:540_19: Navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti navaṃ bhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti.
tika-s0201t:540_20: Tassā hi anuppannāya anuppajjanatthameva āhāraṃ paribhuñjati.
tika-s0201t:540_21: Ettha ca abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā nāma yathāpavattā jighacchānimittā vedanā.
tika-s0201t:540_22: Sā hi abhuñjantassa bhiyyo bhiyyo pavaḍḍhanavasena uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:540_24: Sā hi bhuttapaccayā anuppannāva na uppajjissatīti.
tika-s0201t:541_0: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti yāpanā ca me catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ bhavissati.
tika-s0201t:541_2: idha catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanāti ayametāsaṃ viseso.
tika-s0201t:544_0: Ettāvatā payojanapariggaho, majjhimā ca paṭipadā dīpitā hoti.
tika-s0201t:545_6: atha vā yathāvutto utu ca sīhabyagghādipākaṭaparissayo ca rāgadosādipaṭicchannaparissayo ca utuparissayo,
tika-s0201t:545_8: Idañca cīvarapaṭisevane hirikopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ viya tassa niyatapayojananti puna “yāvadevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:546_2: jīvitassa parivārasambhārabhāvehi parikkhāro cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro, taṃ.
tika-s0201t:546_4: Veyyābādhikānanti byābādhato dhātukkhobhato ca tannibbattarogato ca jātānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:546_8: Navavedanuppādanatopīti na kevalaṃ āyatiṃ eva vipākapariḷāhā,
tika-s0201t:546_9: atha kho atibhojanapaccayā alaṃsāṭakādīnaṃ viya navavedanuppādanatopi veditabbāti attho.
tika-s0201t:549_2: Kammaṭṭhānikassa calanaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānapariccāgoti āha “calati kampati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:549_4: sahanto ca na naggasamaṇādayo viya sahati,
tika-s0201t:549_5: atha kho kammaṭṭhānāvijahanenāti āha “sveva thero viyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:549_10: idaṃ pana tato mudutara”nti evaṃ paccavekkhitvā.
tika-s0201t:550_0: Parisuddhasīlohamasmīti sabbathāpi “visuddhasīlohamasmī”ti maraṇaṃ aggahetvā avippaṭisāramūlikaṃ pītiṃ uppādesi.
tika-s0201t:550_2: Visaṃ nivattitvāti pītivegena ajjhotthataṃ daṭṭhamukheneva bhassitvā.
tika-s0201t:550_4: Cittekaggataṃ labhitvāti “pītimanassa kāyo passambhatī”tiādinā nayena samādhānaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
tika-s0201t:551_0: Paccayesu santoso bhāvanāya ca āramitabbaṭṭhānatāya ārāmo assāti paccayasantosabhāvanārāmo,
tika-s0201t:552_4: Muhuttena khaṇeva vāte hadayaṃ phāletuṃ āraddheyeva.
tika-s0201t:552_5: Anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyīti arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyi.
tika-s0201t:553_0: Evaṃ sabbatthāti “uṇhena phuṭṭhassa sītaṃ patthayato”tiādinā sabbattha uṇhādinimittaṃ kāmāsavuppatti veditabbā,
tika-s0201t:553_1: sītaṃ vā uṇhaṃ vā aniṭṭhanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:553_2: Attaggāhe sati attaniyaggāhoti āha “mayhaṃ sītaṃ uṇhanti gāho diṭṭhāsavo”ti.
tika-s0201t:553_3: Sītādike upagate sahantī khamantī te attano upari vāsentī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “āropetvā vāsetiyevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:553_6: so te nirassanto vidhunanto viya hotīti.
tika-s0201t:556_2: kiṃ mama jīvitena vā maraṇena vā”ti evaṃ acintetvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:557_2: Apica “caṇḍaṃ hatthiṃ parivajjetī”ti vacanato hatthiādiparivajjanampi bhagavato vacanānuṭṭhānanti katvā ācārasīlamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:560_2: ayonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhitattāpi lobhādisahagatattāpi kusalapaṭipakkhatopītiādīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ vitakko akusaloti attho.
tika-s0201t:560_4: Ettha ca akusalotiādinā diṭṭhadhammikaṃ kāmavitakkassa ādīnavaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:560_6: Attabyābādhāya saṃvattatītiādīsupi imināva nayena ādīnavavibhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:560_7: Uppannassa kāmavitakkassa anadhivāsanaṃ nāma puna tādisassa anuppādanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:560_8: taṃ panassa pahānaṃ vinodanaṃ byantikaraṇaṃ anabhāvagamananti ca vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti pāḷiyaṃ “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ
tika-s0201t:560_9: nādhivāsetī”ti vatvā “pajahatī”tiādi vuttanti tamatthaṃ dassento “anadhivāsento kiṃ karotīti pajahatī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:560_11: na samucchedoti dassetuṃ “vinodetī”tiādi vuttanti vikkhambhanavaseneva attho dassito.
tika-s0201t:561_0: Kāmavitakkoti sampayogato ārammaṇato ca kāmasahagato vitakko.
tika-s0201t:561_2: Kāmapaṭisaṃyuttoti hi kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena sampayutto vatthukāmasaṅkhātena paṭibaddho ca.
tika-s0201t:561_3: Uppannuppanneti tesaṃ pāpavitakkānaṃ uppādāvatthāgahaṇaṃ vā kataṃ siyā anavasesaggahaṇaṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:561_6: Anavasesaggahaṇaṃ byāpanicchāya hotīti dassetuṃ “satakkhattumpi uppanne”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:561_7: Ñātivitakkoti “amhākaṃ ñātayo sukhajīvino sampattiyuttā”tiādinā gehassitapemavasena ñātake ārabbha uppannavitakko.
tika-s0201t:561_8: Janapadavitakkoti “amhākaṃ janapado subhikkho sampannasasso ramaṇīyo”tiādinā gehassitapemavaseneva janapadaṃ ārabbha uppannavitakko.
tika-s0201t:561_9: Ukkuṭikappadhānādīhi dukkhe nijjiṇṇe samparāye attā sukhī hoti amaroti dukkarakārikāya paṭisaṃyutto amaratthāya vitakko,
tika-s0201t:561_10: taṃ vā ārabbha amarāvikkhepadiṭṭhisahagato amaro ca so vitakko cāti amaravitakko.
tika-s0201t:561_11: Parānuddayatāpaṭisaṃyuttoti paresu upaṭṭhākādīsu sahanandikādivasena pavatto anuddayatāpatirūpako gehassitapemena paṭisaṃyutto vitakko.
tika-s0201t:561_12: Lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyuttoti cīvarādilābhena ceva sakkārena ca kittisaddena ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭisaṃyutto.
tika-s0201t:561_13: Anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttoti “aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyuṃ,
tika-s0201t:562_0: Kāmavitakko kāmasaṅkappanasabhāvattā kāmasaṅkappapavattiyā sātisayattā ca kāmanākāroti āha “kāmavitakko panettha kāmāsavo”ti.
tika-s0201t:562_3: Kāmavitakkādike vinodeti attano santānato nīharati etenāti vinodanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:565_1: “Satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiyo paripūrentī”ti vacanato vijjāvimuttīnaṃ anadhigamo
tika-s0201t:565_3: vuttavipariyāyena bhagavato orasaputtabhāvādivasena ca bhāvanāya ānisaṃso veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:565_13: Missakanayena hi bojjhaṅgesu vuccamānesu tadaṅgādivivekadassanavasena vipassanābojjhaṅgādayo vibhajitvā vuccanti,
tika-s0201t:565_14: na nibbattitalokuttarabojjhaṅgā evāti bojjhaṅgesu sammoho na hoti bojjhaṅgabhāvanāpaṭipattiyā ca sammadeva pakāsitattā.
tika-s0201t:566_0: Ādipadānanti “satisambojjhaṅga”nti evamādīnaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vākye ādibhūtānaṃ padānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:567_4: Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ sāraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:570_0: Vuttesu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:570_1: Yā hi ayaṃ bodhīti vuccatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:570_3: Taṃ pana paṭibujjhanaṃ atthato catunnaṃ saccānaṃ paṭivedho,
tika-s0201t:570_5: Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viyāti yathā aṅgāni eva jhānamaggā,
tika-s0201t:570_8: Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viyāti etena puggalapaññattiyā avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:571_0: Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgāti idaṃ kāraṇattho aṅga-
tika-s0201t:571_3: bodhiyo eva aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ “bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti.
tika-s0201t:571_4: Anubujjhantīti vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ bujjhitabbānañca saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ bujjhanti.
tika-s0201t:571_5: Paṭibujjhantīti kilesaniddāya uṭṭhahanato paccakkhabhāvena vā paṭimukhaṃ bujjhanti.
tika-s0201t:571_8: saddo hi sabbavisesayuttaṃ bujjhanaṃ sāmaññena gahetvā ṭhito.
tika-s0201t:572_1: Obhāsanaṃ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvapaṭicchādakassa sammohassa viddhaṃsanaṃ yathā āloko andhakārassa.
tika-s0201t:572_2: Yasmiṃ dhamme sati vīro nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:572_5: Kosajjapakkhato patituṃ appadānavasena sampayuttānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ paggaho.
tika-s0201t:572_14: Kāyacittadarathapassambhanatoti kāyadarathassa cittadarathassa ca passambhanato vūpasamanato.
tika-s0201t:573_5: Sampiṇḍanaṃ sampayuttānaṃ avippakiṇṇabhāvāpādanaṃ nhānīyacuṇṇānaṃ udakaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:573_9: Samappavatte dhamme paṭisañcikkhati upapattito ikkhati tadākārā hutvā pavattatīti paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇā,
tika-s0201t:573_10: evañca katvā “paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā gahaṇe majjhattatā”ti upekkhākiccādhimattatāya saṅkhārupekkhā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:573_13: Sampayuttānaṃ asamappavattihetukapakkhapātaṃ upacchindantī viya hotīti vuttaṃ “pakkhapātupacchedarasā”ti.
tika-s0201t:574_0: Sabbasmiṃ līnapakkhe uddhaccapakkhe ca atthikā patthanīyā icchitabbāti sabbatthikā,
tika-s0201t:574_2: Samānakkhaṇapavattīsu sattasupi sambojjhaṅgesu vācāya kamappavattito paṭipāṭiyā vattabbesu yaṃ kiñci
tika-s0201t:574_3: paṭhamaṃ avatvā satisambojjhaṅgasseva paṭhamaṃ vacanassa kāraṇaṃ sabbesaṃ upakārakattanti vuttaṃ “sabbesa”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:575_0: “Kasmā satteva bojjhaṅgā vuttā”ti codako saddhālobhādīnampi bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ āsaṅkati,
tika-s0201t:575_1: itaro satiādīnaṃyeva bhāvanāya upakārataṃ dassento “līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:575_2: Tattha līnassāti atisithilavīriyatādīhi bhāvanāvīthiṃ anotaritvā saṃkuṭitassa cittassa.
tika-s0201t:575_4: Tañhi etehi allatiṇādīhi viya paritto aggi dussamuṭṭhāpiyaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0201t:575_8: so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:575_10: sukkhatiṇādīhi viya paritto aggi līnaṃ cittaṃ etehi susamuṭṭhāpiyaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0201t:575_12: Tattha yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:576_2: Tañhi etehi sukkhatiṇādīhi viya aggikkhandho duvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:576_6: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:576_8: allatiṇādīhi viya aggikkhandho uddhataṃ cittaṃ etehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:576_10: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:576_16: taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ uppādanavasena tathā manasikarontova passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma.
tika-s0201t:576_18: So hi cittaṃ līnapakkhikānaṃ passaddhiādīnaṃ vasena layāpattito,
tika-s0201t:576_20: tasmā so loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu sabbakammikaamacco viya ca rājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbo.
tika-s0201t:577_1: Vaḍḍhi nāma vepullaṃ bhiyyobhāvo punappunaṃ uppādo evāti āha “punappunaṃ janetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:577_7: Tesu purimo vivecanīyato viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātāya viviccanakiriyāya samaṅgī dhammasamūho tāya eva viviccanakiriyāya vasena vivekoti gahito.
tika-s0201t:577_9: Tattha yasmiṃ dhammapuñje satisambojjhaṅgo viviccanakiriyāya pavattati,
tika-s0201t:577_10: taṃ yathāvuttāya viviccamānatāya vivekasaṅkhātaṃ nissāyeva pavattati,
tika-s0201t:577_12: Yathā vā vivekavasena pavattaṃ jhānaṃ “vivekaja”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:577_14: Nissayaṭṭho ca vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena maggaphalānaṃ veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:577_15: Asatipi pubbāparabhāve “paṭiccasamuppādā”ti ettha paccayānaṃ samuppādanaṃ viya abhinnadhammādhārā nissayanabhāvanā sambhavantīti.
tika-s0201t:578_6: saṅkhāresu pana ādīnavaṃ suṭṭhu disvā tappaṭipakkhe nibbāne adhimuttatāya ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitatā
tika-s0201t:578_8: Na paṭisiddhā vipassanāpādakesu kasiṇārammaṇādijhānesu satiādīnaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyattā.
tika-s0201t:578_9: Anuddharantā pana vipassanā viya bodhiyā maggassa āsannakāraṇaṃ jhānaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0201t:578_11: na ca vipassanākiccassa viya jhānakiccassa niṭṭhānaṃ maggoti katvā na uddharanti.
tika-s0201t:578_12: Ettha ca kasiṇaggahaṇena tadāyattāni āruppānipi gahitānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-s0201t:578_13: Tānipi hi vipassanāpādakāni nibbedhabhāgiyāni ca hontīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati tanninnabhāvasabbhāvato.
tika-s0201t:578_16: “Kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja vihareyya”nti ādivacanampetassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.
tika-s0201t:579_1: saddo pariccāgattho pakkhandanattho cāti vossaggassa duvidhatā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:579_14: Paripāko ca āsevanalābhena āhitasāmatthiyassa kilesassa pariccajituṃ nibbānañca pakkhandituṃ tikkhavisadasabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:579_17: sesesu dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīsupi esa nayoti evaṃ tattha netabbanti attho.
tika-s0201t:580_0: Evaṃ ādikammikānaṃ bojjhaṅgesu asammohatthaṃ missakanayaṃ vatvā idāni nibbattitalokuttarabojjhaṅgavasena atthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “idha panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:580_2: Maggo eva vossaggavipariṇāmī bhāvanāmaggassa idha adhippetattā.
tika-s0201t:581_1: Tepi anapāyagamanīyā eva veditabbā apāyagamanīyānaṃ dassaneneva pahīnattā.
tika-s0201t:581_2: Satipi sambojjhaṅgānaṃ yebhuyyena maggabhāve tattha tattha sambojjhaṅgasabhāvānaṃ maggadhammānaṃ vasena
tika-s0201t:581_3: vuttamaggattayasampayuttā bojjhaṅgāti paccekabojjhaṅge “bojjhaṅgabhāvanāyā”ti iminā gaṇhanto “maggattayasampayuttāyā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:583_1: Thomentoti āsavappahānassa sudukkarattā tāya eva dukkarakiriyāya taṃ abhitthavanto.
tika-s0201t:583_5: Ussukkaṃ janentoti evaṃ dhammassāmināpi abhitthavanīyaṃ mahānisaṃsañca āsavappahānanti tattha ādarasahitaṃ ussāhaṃ uppādento.
tika-s0201t:585_1: na tabbiparītaṃ anatthāvahattāti pītisampayuttacittataṃ sandhāyāha “attamanāti sakamanā”ti.
tika-s0201t:588_1: Tasmā taṃ dassetvāti yasmā suttantavaṇṇanā suttanikkhepaṃ dassetvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti,
tika-s0201t:588_7: Yā hi lābhasakkāranimittaṃ tadā bhikkhūsu paccayabāhullikatā jātā,
tika-s0201t:588_8: taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā bhagavā imaṃ desesīti.
tika-s0201t:588_10: Tiṭṭhanti ceva bhagavati katthaci nibaddhavāsaṃ vasante,
tika-s0201t:588_12: Bhikkhūnampi yebhuyyena kappasatasahassaṃ tato bhiyyopi pūritadānapāramisañcayattā tadā mahālābhasakkāro uppajjīti vuttaṃ “evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassapī”ti.
tika-s0201t:589_3: Pūjitoti mālādipūjāya ceva catupaccayābhipūjāya ca pūjito.
tika-s0201t:589_5: Yassa hi cattāro paccaye sakkatvāpi abhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte upanenti,
tika-s0201t:589_15: Bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca loko evaṃ paṭipanno.
tika-s0201t:589_18: Lābhaggayasaggapattanti lābhassa ca yasassa ca aggaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pattaṃ.
tika-s0201t:590_2: Paccayesu giddhā gadhitā paccayānaṃ bahulabhāvāya paṭipannāti paccayabāhulikā.
tika-s0201t:590_3: Bhagavatopi pākaṭā ahosi pakaticārittavasenāti adhippāyo aññathā apākaṭasseva abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:590_5: idha pana so bhikkhūnaṃ lābhagarutādhammavasena veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:591_2: tato laddhabbaṃ arahabhāvena ādiyantīti dāyādā, puttā.
tika-s0201t:591_4: sāsane pana dhammopīti tattha yaṃ sāvajjaṃ aniyyānikañca,
tika-s0201t:591_7: tattha bhikkhū niyojento bhagavā avoca “dhammadāyādā me,
tika-s0201t:591_10: Dhammassa me dāyādāti mama dhammassa ogāhino,
tika-s0201t:591_14: Pariyāyeti sabhāvato parivattetvā ñāpeti etenāti pariyāyo, leso,
tika-s0201t:591_16: Tadabhāvato nippariyāyadhammo maggappattiyā apāyapatanādito accantameva vāraṇato.
tika-s0201t:591_17: Itaro vuttavipariyāyato pariyāyadhammo accantaṃ apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhapātanato paramparāya vāraṇato.
tika-s0201t:591_18: Yathā hi lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dānasīlādi vivaṭṭaṃ uddissa nibbattitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:591_19: ayaṃ taṃ asampādentampi taṃ sampāpakassa dhammassa nibbattakāraṇabhāvapariyāyena pariyāyadhammo nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:591_21: yaṃ taṇhādīhi savisesaṃ āmasitabbato āmisanti loke pākaṭaṃ acchādanabhojanādi, tassa,
tika-s0201t:591_22: taṃsadisassa ca phalavisesassa nimittabhāvapariyāyena pariyāyāmisanti vuccatīti dassento āha “yaṃ panidaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:592_1: brahmacariyassa yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā”ti ādivacanato sāvakehi adhigatopi lokuttaradhammo satthuyevāti
tika-s0201t:592_3: Sāvakānañhi dhammadiṭṭhipaccayassapi yonisomanasikārassa visesapaccayo paratoghoso ca tathāgatādhīnoti
tika-s0201t:592_4: tehi paṭividdhopi dhammo dhammassāminoyevāti vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:592_6: Tattha anuppannassa maggassāti kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti yāva imasmā buddhuppādā asambodhavasena na uppannassa ariyamaggassa.
tika-s0201t:592_10: atha kho parasantānepīti dassetuṃ “asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā,
tika-s0201t:592_12: Tayidaṃ maggassa uppādanaṃ sañjānanañca atthato jānanaññeva asammohapaṭivedhabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “maggaññū maggavidū”ti.
tika-s0201t:592_14: Satthārā yathāgataṃ maggaṃ anugacchantīti maggānugā bhagavato eva taṃ maggaṃ suṭṭhu adhigamanato.
tika-s0201t:592_15: Pacchā parato sammā anu anu āgatā paṭipannāti pacchā samannāgatā.
tika-s0201t:593_0: Jānaṃ jānātīti jānitabbameva abhiññeyyādibhedaṃ jānāti ekantahitapaṭipattito.
tika-s0201t:593_2: Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ jānātiyeva.
tika-s0201t:593_3: Na hi padesañāṇena jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ ekantato jānāti.
tika-s0201t:593_4: Passaṃ passatīti dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu dhammacakkhu buddhacakkhu samantacakkhusaṅkhātehi pañcahi cakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passatiyeva.
tika-s0201t:593_5: Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti yathā aññe savipallāsā kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti,
tika-s0201t:593_8: diṭṭhidassanassa ca abhāvā passanto passatiyevāti attho.
tika-s0201t:593_9: Cakkhubhūtoti paññācakkhumayattā tassa ca pattattā sattesu ca taduppādanato dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena lokassa cakkhu viya bhūto.
tika-s0201t:593_10: Ñāṇabhūtoti etassa ca evameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:593_19: Atthassa ninnetāti dhammatāsaṅkhātaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānañca niddhāretvā dassetā,
tika-s0201t:593_21: Amatassa dātāti amataṃ sacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti amatassa dātā.
tika-s0201t:597_0: Evamādiṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ sutvā eva bhikkhū dānādipuññānaṃ vivaṭṭasannissayataṃ jānanti,
tika-s0201t:597_3: “Edisaṃ paribhuñcitabba”nti kappiyassa ca cīvarādipaccayassa bhagavato vacanena vinā paṭiggahopi bhikkhūnaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:598_0: Pariyāyāmisassa bhagavato santakabhāvo pariyāyadhammassa tabbhāveneva dīpito.
tika-s0201t:599_0: Paccayā cīvarādayo paramā pāpuṇitabbabhāvena uttamamariyādā etassa na uttarimanussadhammā appicchatādayo cāti paccayaparamo,
tika-s0201t:599_7: bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti evaṃ vuttesu catūsu taṇhuppattikoṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0201t:600_3: Imasmiṃ pakkhe tatthāti tasmiṃ ovāde icceva attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:600_4: Adhippāyo āmisadāyādatāya uppajjanakaanatthānuppādassa dhammadāyādatāya uppajjanakaaṭṭhuppattiyā ca ākaṅkhā.
tika-s0201t:600_10: Āmisagaruko appagghabhāvena kūṭakahāpaṇo viya nittejo samaṇatejena anujjalato nibbutaṅgāro viya nippabho ca hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:601_0: Dhammadāyādāti ettāvatā antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ vacananti tena avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “mā āmisadāyādā”ti paṭikkhepo dassito.
tika-s0201t:601_7: karaṇabhūtena vā ādiyaṃ vivecanaṃ viññūhi visuṃ karaṇaṃ vavatthānassa hotīti āha “visuṃ kātabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:602_1: no āmisadāyādā”ti bhikkhūsu attano karuṇāyanākittanaṃ tesaṃ mudukaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:602_2: “ahampi tenā”tiādi pana tatopi savisesaṃ mudukaraṇanti āha “atīva mudukaraṇattha”nti.
tika-s0201t:603_1: Tā pana yasmā nāḷakattherādīhi paṭipannā paramasallekhavuttibhūtā atiukkaṭṭhapaṭipattiyo,
tika-s0201t:603_3: Sakkhibhūtāti tāya paṭipattiyā vuccamānāya “kiṃ me vinā paṭipajjanako atthī”ti asaddahantānaṃ paccakkhakaraṇena sakkhibhūtā.
tika-s0201t:603_4: Imasminti “tumhe ca me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā”tiādike vākye.
tika-s0201t:603_5: Sesanti “tumhe ca me”tiādikaṃ sukkapakkhe āgataṃ pāḷipadaṃ.
tika-s0201t:603_6: Vuttanayapaccanīkenāti “tena dhammadāyādabhāvena no āmisadāyādabhāvenā”ti evaṃ kaṇhapakkhe vuttanayassa paṭipakkhena.
tika-s0201t:604_1: Thomanaṃ sutvāti paṭipajjanakassa puggalassa pasaṃsanaṃ sutvā yathā taṃ saparisassa āyasmato upasenassa paṭipattiyā sīlathomanaṃ sutvā.
tika-s0201t:604_5: Yo hi bhuñjanto bhojanena titto parivesakena upanītabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-s0201t:604_6: so tena pavāritena paṭikkhepito nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:604_9: Pakārehi diṭṭhādīhi vāreti saṅghādike yācāpeti bhatte karoti etāyāti pavāraṇā,
tika-s0201t:604_11: Sā pana yasmā yebhuyyena vassaṃvutthehi kātabbā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:604_17: Sā pana yasmā anatirittabhojananimittāya āpattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:605_0: “Bhuttāvī”ti vacanato bhojanapāripūritā idhādhippetāti āha “paripuṇṇoti bhojanena paripuṇṇo”ti.
tika-s0201t:605_1: Pariyositoti etthāpi eseva nayo “bhojanena bhojanakiriyāya pariyosito”ti.
tika-s0201t:605_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana adhippetatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ bhojana-
tika-s0201t:605_7: bhuttāvitādiggahaṇehi vā itare bodhitā hontīti aññamaññaṃ nesaṃ ñāpakañāpetabbataṃ dassetuṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:605_8: Evaṃ chahipi padehi udarāvadehakaṃ bhojanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:606_1: nāpi siyā”ti ca idaṃ atthadvayampi idha sambhavatīti vuttaṃ “idha ubhayampi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:607_4: saddo “no ca kho paṭivutta”ntiādīsu vāpasamīkaraṇe dissati,
tika-s0201t:608_1: piṇḍapātabhojanaṃ pana anādaritvā dhammānudhammapaṭipattīti ettha kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “piṇḍapātaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:609_1: Nipāto ca nāma yattha yattha vākye payujjati,
tika-s0201t:609_2: tena tena vattabbatthajotako hotīti idha “piṇḍapāta”ntiādinā anuññāpasaṃsāvasena vuccamānassa atthassa
tika-s0201t:609_4: anuññāpasaṃsārambhe pana “asambhāvanatthe”ti vuttaṃ siyā purimeyeva sambhāvanāvibhāvanato adhikattānulomato ca.
tika-s0201t:610_0: Ekavāraṃ pavattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkhipanaṃ kathaṃ dīgharattaṃ appicchatādīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tassa hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:610_15: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “santaguṇasambhāvanatā paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā,
tika-s0201t:611_0: Mahiccho puggalo yathā paccayadānavasena paccayadāyakehi bharituṃ asakkuṇeyyo,
tika-s0201t:611_1: evaṃ paccayapariyesanavasena attanāpīti vuttaṃ “attanopi upaṭṭhākānampi dubbharo hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:611_2: Saddhādeyyassa vinipātavasena pavattiyā aññassa ghare chaḍḍento.
tika-s0201t:611_4: tesaṃ sabbapacchimaṃ attano yathāladdhaṃ datvā tattha kiñci aladdhā rittapatto vihāraṃ pavisitvā nipajjati jighacchādubbalyenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:611_7: yathāladdhapaccayena avaññaṃ akatvā santosāpattiyā upaṭṭhākānaṃ subharatā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:612_7: Cetovinīvaraṇasappāyāti kusalacittuppattiyā nivārakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvakaraṇena cetovinīvaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ sappāyā.
tika-s0201t:612_8: Samathavipassanācittasseva vā vibhūtibhāvakaraṇāya sappāyā upakārikāti cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā.
tika-s0201t:612_9: Ekantanibbidāyātiādi yena nibbidādiānisaṃsena ayaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā ca nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:612_17: Etesu hi ādito tīhi vipassanā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:612_20: Tena samathavipassanā ādiṃ katvā nibbānapariyosāno ayaṃ sabbo uttarimanussadhammo dasakathāvatthulābhino sambhavatīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:612_22: Appicchatādayo hi ekavārauppannā upari tadatthāya saṃvattissanti.
tika-s0201t:613_2: Nibbānapāripūri cettha tadāvahadhammapāripūrivasena pariyāyato vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:613_8: Sarasākhāti yattha upariunnatapadesato udakaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhati ceva sandati ca, te.
tika-s0201t:614_0: Uggahetvāti atthato byañjanato ca upadhāraṇavasena gahetvā aviparītaṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0201t:614_2: Yathā idheva cintesīti yathā imissā dhammadāyādadesanāya cintesi,
tika-s0201t:614_3: evaṃ aññatthāpi dhammathomanatthaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisanto cintesi.
tika-s0201t:614_6: Ayaṃ desanā aggātiādi bhagavā dhammasenāpatiṃ guṇato eva paggaṇhātīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:615_0: Cittagatiyāti cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti kāyassa cittena samānagatikatādhiṭṭhānena.
tika-s0201t:615_1: Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattanacittena samānagatiko hotīti?
tika-s0201t:615_3: Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0201t:615_4: Na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0201t:615_5: “idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū”ti pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti,
tika-s0201t:615_6: tāva kāyagatiṃ anulomentameva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatikaṃ katvā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:615_7: evaṃ “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva lahusaññāya sukhumasaññāya ca sampāditattā
tika-s0201t:615_8: abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahuṃ katipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti,
tika-s0201t:615_9: evaṃ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatikabhāveneva pariṇāmito nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:615_11: Evañca katvā bāhusamiñjanappasāraṇūpamāpi upacārena vinā suṭṭhutaraṃ yuttā hoti,
tika-s0201t:615_13: Na hi dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ iddhibalena kātuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0201t:616_1: Bhagavato adhippāyānurūpaṃ bhikkhūnañca ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvāti vacanaseso.
tika-s0201t:616_2: Desakāle viya bhājanampi oloketvā eva mahāthero dhammaṃ katheti.
tika-s0201t:616_3: Pakkantassāti idaṃ anādare sāmivacananti dassento “pakkantassa sato”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:616_5: Taṃ pana parimāṇaṃ yasmā parimeyyassa atthassa paricchindanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:616_8: saddo idheva pucchāyaṃ āgatoti katvā vuttaṃ. Nu-
tika-s0201t:616_14: Vivekapañcakaggahaṇe panassa sarūpena kāyaviveko gahito na siyā,
tika-s0201t:616_15: tadāyattattā vā satthārā tadā payujjamānavivekadassanavasena “tīhi vivekehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:616_17: Na hi kāyavivekamattena dhammadāyādabhāvo sijjhatīti? Na,
tika-s0201t:616_20: Na hi lokiyajjhānādhigamamattena nippariyāyato satthudhammadāyādabhāvo icchito,
tika-s0201t:616_22: tasmā sabbāpi sāsane vivekānusikkhanā nibbānapoṇā nibbānapabbhārā nibbānogadhā cāti vuttaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatarampī”ti.
tika-s0201t:616_23: Asati āloke andhakāro viya asati dhammadāyādatāya ekaṃsiyā āmisadāyādatāti āha “āmisadāyādāva hontī”ti.
tika-s0201t:616_24: Esa nayo sukkapakkhepīti kaṇhapakkhato sādhāraṇavasena labbhamānaṃ atthasāmaññaṃ atidisati,
tika-s0201t:616_27: “Tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ aññatara”nti idaṃ idha na labbhati.
tika-s0201t:616_29: tesu eko vā itaradvayasannissayo idha labbhati.
tika-s0201t:617_4: attho pana sāmivacanavaseneva veditabboti dassento āha “āyasmatoyeva sāriputtassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:617_14: Puripucchanādinā vā atthassa citte āpādanaṃ paṭṭhapanaṃ pariyāpuṇanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:617_15: Kāraṇavacananti yathāvuttassa kāraṇabhāvena vacanaṃ “hetumhi karaṇavacana”nti katvā.
tika-s0201t:618_2: Aññathā “satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī’ti ekeneva ākārena so attho therenapi vutto.
tika-s0201t:618_3: Tīhi ākārehīti āmisadāyādapaṭipadābhūtehi tiṇṇaṃ vivekānaṃ ananusikkhanākārehi.
tika-s0201t:619_0: Vitthārato suvibhatto hoti anavasesato sammadeva niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-s0201t:619_1: Nanu ca uddese satthunopi ādiyatā bhagavatā gahitā,
tika-s0201t:619_2: sā na niddiṭṭhāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “so ca kho”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:619_3: Sāvake anuggaṇhantassāti “āmisadāyādā satthu sāvakā”ti satthu parappavādapariharaṇatthampi “tumhehi dhammadāyādehi
tika-s0201t:619_5: Sāvakānaṃ taṃ na yuttaṃ sāmīciabhāvatoti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:619_6: Esa nayoti yadidaṃ “ettāvatāyaṃ bhagavā”tiādinā kaṇhapakkhe uddesassa atthavibhāgadassanamukhena sambandhadassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:619_9: satthārā desitāya uddesadesanāya mahātherena desitāya ca anusandhikkamena sambandhoti attho.
tika-s0201t:620_0: Accantapavivittassāti ekantaupadhiviveko viya itarepi viveko satthu ekantikāvāti.
tika-s0201t:620_1: Anusikkhanaṃ nāma anu anu pūraṇanti tappaṭikkhepena āha “na paripūrentī”ti,
tika-s0201t:620_3: na paripūrentīti vā na paripālentīti attho.
tika-s0201t:620_7: Kasmā panettha “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti uddese viya avisesavacane kāyavivekasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “yadi panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:620_8: Pucchāyāti pucchāto aviseso siyā vibhāgassa alabbhamānattā vissajjanassa.
tika-s0201t:620_9: Nanu ca “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti avisesavacanato pāḷiyaṃ vibhāgo na labbhatevāti? Na,
tika-s0201t:620_15: Iminā padenāti “vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”ti iminā padena kāyavivekaṃ aparipūriyamānaṃ dassetīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:621_0: Ettha ca nappajahantīti pahātabbadhammānaṃ pahānābhāvavacanaṃ pahānalakkhaṇavivekābhāvadīpanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:621_1: taṃ vatvā puna “viveke nikkhittadhurā”ti vacanaṃ tato sātisayavivekābhāvadīpananti tadubhayavivekābhāvadassanena
tika-s0201t:621_4: Avigatataṇhatāya taṃ taṃ parikkhārajātaṃ bahuṃ lanti ādiyantīti bahulā,
tika-s0201t:621_6: Te pana yasmā paccayabahulabhāvāya yuttappayuttā nāma honti,
tika-s0201t:621_8: Sikkhāya ādarabhāvābhāvato sithilaṃ adaḷhaṃ gaṇhantīti “sāthalikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:622_8: Upekkhānubrūhanā sattasaṅkhāresu udāsīnatāpi asaṅkhatādhigamassa upāyoti tabbipariyāyato cīvarādimaṇḍanā
tika-s0201t:623_3: Uddesavāre pana kaṇhapakkhe vuttavipariyāyena gahetabbattho “esa nayo sukkapakkhepī”ti atidesena dassito.
tika-s0201t:623_4: Vuttapaccanīkanayenāti “kāyavivekaṃ nānusikkhanti na paripūrentī”tiādinā vuttassa atthassa paccanīkanayena,
tika-s0201t:623_8: Yojanaparamparāyāti gāmantato dūrabhāvena ekaṃ dve tīṇīti evaṃ yojanānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-s0201t:623_11: Upagantuṃ yuttakālo jarājiṇṇakālo gocaragāme dūre gamanāgamanasamatthatābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:623_12: “Evaṃ guṇavantesu dinnaṃ aho sudinna”nti paccayadāyakānaṃ pasādaṃ janenti.
tika-s0201t:623_14: Ayampi mahātherotiādi ekaṃ appamādavihārinaṃ vuddhataraṃ niddisitvā vadantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:623_21: Sabbathātiādito tāva tadaṅgavasena kilesehi cittaṃ vivecento tato vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena
tika-s0201t:624_3: Tena “lobho ca pāpako”tiādinayappavattaṃ uparidesanaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyati.
tika-s0201t:624_4: Ko anusandhīti yā sā bhagavatā saṃkilesapakkhena saha dhammadāyādapaṭipattibhāvinī “dhammadāyādā me,
tika-s0201t:624_7: taṃ “satthu pavivittassa viharato”tiādinā ārabhitvā aṭṭhārasavārapaṭimaṇḍitāya niddesadesanāya vibhajitvā
tika-s0201t:624_8: tato paraṃ “tatrāvuso lobho ca pāpako”tiādinayāya uparidesanāya sambandhaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0201t:624_15: Ime teti ettha kasmā lobhādayo eva pahātabbadhammā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:624_16: nanu ito aññepi mohadiṭṭhivicikicchādayo pahātabbadhammā santīti?
tika-s0201t:624_18: te pana lobhādīhi tadekaṭṭhatā gahitā eva hontīti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:624_19: Atha vā imesaṃyevettha gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0201t:625_1: Tattha sāvakānaṃ yassa dhammassa dāyādabhāvo satthu abhirucito,
tika-s0201t:625_4: na ca bāhulikā”tiādinā kathitattā heṭṭhā pariyāyeneva dhammo kathitoti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:625_8: “bāhulikā ca hontī”tiādinā ca āmisaṃ nippariyāyenapi kathitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:625_9: Atha vā yāyaṃ bhagavatā āmisadāyādapaṭikkhepanā dhammadāyādatā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:625_10: yañca tadatthaṃ vibhajantena mahātherena attanā vivekānusikkhanādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:626_0: Atītadesanānidassananti atītāya therena yathādesitāya desanāya ca paccāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:626_3: Tatthāti yaṃ vuttaṃ visesato “yesaṃ dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāhā”ti,
tika-s0201t:626_5: Tattha hi pahātabbadhammā lobhādayo sāmaññato vuttā.
tika-s0201t:626_7: Lobhadosā hi hetuto paccayato sabhāvato phalato nissandato saṃkiliṭṭhapakatikā,
tika-s0201t:627_1: Āmisadāyādassa paccayānaṃ lābhe hotīti idaṃ lobhassa ārammaṇaggahaṇasabhāvataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:627_2: taṇhāya vasena pana anugijjhanaṃ sandhāya “aladdhaṃ patthetī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:627_3: Alābhe paccayānaṃ āmisadāyādassa hotīti ānetvā yojanā.
tika-s0201t:627_7: Lobho ca deyyadhamme hoti āmisadāyādassāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:627_9: Deyyadhammeti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ sattakelāyanādivasenapi tassa lobhuppattisabbhāvato.
tika-s0201t:627_11: pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho”ti evamādayo nava taṇhāmūlakā.
tika-s0201t:628_3: sayaṃ vā sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena nibbānaṃ maggatīti nippariyāyena “maggo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:628_4: Eko antoti itarena asammisso eko koṭṭhāso,
tika-s0201t:628_6: Kāmaṃ aññepi kusaladhammā ete ante asampayogato na upenti,
tika-s0201t:628_8: ayaṃ pana accantavimuttiyā na upetīti āha “vimutto etehi antehī”ti.
tika-s0201t:628_10: Etesaṃ majjhe bhavattāti idaṃ maggassa ubhayantavimuttatāya eva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:628_13: Tathāti yathā itarena asammissaṭṭhena lāmakaṭṭhena ca lobho eko anto,
tika-s0201t:628_16: Maggassa anupagamanañca nesaṃ antānaṃ sabbaso appavattikaraṇeneva daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:628_17: Purimanayenāti “ete dve ante na upetī”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena.
tika-s0201t:629_1: Dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhenāti dassanassa pariññābhisamayādibhedassa parito sabbathā nayanaṭṭhena pavattanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0201t:629_3: Tayidaṃ satipi paṭipadāya dhammacakkhuto anaññatte avayavavasena sijjhamāno attho samudāyena kato nāma hotīti upacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:629_4: Tathā hi vakkhati “maggoyeva hi maggatthāya saṃvattati maggena kātabbakiccakaraṇato”ti.
tika-s0201t:629_9: Dukkhādīnaṃ pariññeyyādibhāvo viya abhiññeyyabhāvopi maggavaseneva pākaṭo hotīti āha “catunnampi saccānaṃ abhiññeyyabhāvadassanato”ti,
tika-s0201t:629_13: Na hi maggato añño maggakiccakaro atthi.
tika-s0201t:629_15: Atha vā sammādiṭṭhi uppajjamānā sahajātādipaccayabhāvena itare uppādeti,
tika-s0201t:629_16: evaṃ sesamaggadhammāpīti evampi maggatthāya saṃvattanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:629_23: Ito aññathāti “dukkhassa pariññāya diṭṭhivisuddhiṃ karotīti cakkhukaraṇī”tiādinā atthavaṇṇanāpapañco kevalaṃ vitthāratthāya.
tika-s0201t:630_0: Ayamevāti ettha ayanti iminā attano aññesañca tassaṃ parisāyaṃ ariyānaṃ maggassa paccakkhabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:630_3: Sattāpaṭikkhepo hi idha paṭisedhanaṃ alabbhamānattā aññassa maggassa.
tika-s0201t:635_3: Arayo pāpadhammā yanti apagamanti etenāti ariyo.
tika-s0201t:635_4: Ariyena desitoti ettha ariyassa bhagavato ayanti ariyo.
tika-s0201t:635_5: Ariyabhāvappaṭilābhāyāti ettha ariyakaro ariyoti uttarapadalopena ariya-
tika-s0201t:635_8: samudāyo ca samudāyīhi samannāgato nāma hotīti āha “aṭṭhahi aṅgehi upetattā”ti,
tika-s0201t:635_9: tasmā attano avayavabhūtāni aṭṭha aṅgāni etassa santīti aṭṭhaṅgiko.
tika-s0201t:635_11: tasmā vuttaṃ “na ca aṅgavinimutto”ti yathā “chaḷaṅgo vedo”ti.
tika-s0201t:635_12: Sadisūdāharaṇaṃ pana dassento “pañcaṅgikatūriyādīni viyā”ti āha. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:635_16: Ariyamaggo hi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonto taṃ gavesanto viya hotīti.
tika-s0201t:635_17: Maggīyati nibbānatthikehi vivaṭṭūpanissayapuññakaraṇato paṭṭhāya tadatthaṃ paṭipattito.
tika-s0201t:635_19: “Seyyathidanti nipāto”ti vatvā tassa sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanasādhāraṇatāya “katamāni tāni aṭṭhaṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:635_20: Nanu ca aṅgāni samuditāni maggo antamaso sattaṅgavikalassa ariyamaggassa abhāvatoti?
tika-s0201t:635_22: maggapaccayatāya pana yathāsakaṃ kiccakaraṇena paccekampi tāni maggoyevāti āha “ekamekañhi aṅgaṃ maggoyevā”ti,
tika-s0201t:635_23: aññathā samuditānampi nesaṃ maggakiccaṃ na sambhaveyyāti.
tika-s0201t:635_24: Idāni tamevatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ “sammādiṭṭhimaggo ceva hetu cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:636_0: Sammā aviparītaṃ pariññābhisamayādivasena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ dassanaṃ paṭivijjhanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sammādassanalakkhaṇā.
tika-s0201t:636_1: Sammā aviparītaṃ sampayuttadhamme nibbānārammaṇe abhiniropanaṃ appanālakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sammāabhiniropanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0201t:636_2: musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato siniddhasabhāvattā sampayuttadhamme,
tika-s0201t:636_3: sammāvācappaccayasubhāsitasotārañca janaṃ sammadeva pariggaṇhātīti sammāvācā sammāpariggaho lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti sammāpariggahalakkhaṇā.
tika-s0201t:636_4: Yathā kāyikā kiriyā kiñci kattabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0201t:636_7: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:636_10: ājīvasseva vā jīvitappavattiyā suddhi vodānaṃ etenāti sammāvodānalakkhaṇo sammāājīvo.
tika-s0201t:636_11: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho.
tika-s0201t:636_16: Sammā saṅkappeti sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhiniropetīti sammāsaṅkappo.
tika-s0201t:636_23: Sammā samādhiyati cittaṃ etenāti sammāsamādhīti evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ nibbacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:637_14: Pariññābhisamayo pana nānantariyatāya atthato vutto eva hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:638_0: Kathaṃ pana ekameva ñāṇaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri kiccāni sādhentaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0201t:638_2: na āgamo vā tādiso atthīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:638_3: Yathā hi padīpo ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe vaṭṭiṃ dahati,
tika-s0201t:638_11: dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṃ ñāṇanti suttapadaṃ ettha udāharitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:638_12: Yathā ca sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge dukkhādīsu visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe ekāva catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ kiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati,
tika-s0201t:638_13: evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādayo pubbabhāge nekkhammasaṅkappādināmakā hutvā kāmasaṅkappādīnaṃ pajahanavasena visuṃ
tika-s0201t:638_14: visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ catunnañca kiccaṃ sādhentā pavattanti.
tika-s0201t:638_15: Sammāsamādhi pana pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi nānāyeva hutvā pavattatīti kāmañcettha sammādiṭṭhiyā sabbepi pāpadhammā paṭipakkhā,
tika-s0201t:638_16: ujuvipaccanīkatādassanavasena pana sammādiṭṭhiyā kiccaniddese micchādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0201t:639_0: Yesaṃ kilesānaṃ anupacchindane sammādiṭṭhi na uppajjeyya,
tika-s0201t:639_1: te micchādiṭṭhiyā sahajekaṭṭhatāya tadekaṭṭhāva tappaccanīyakilesā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:639_5: yassa pana so samudayo taṃ dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0201t:639_9: Kasmā panettha lobhadosānaṃ visuṃ ādito ca gahaṇaṃ?
tika-s0201t:639_10: Visuṃ gahaṇaṃ tāva tathābujjhanakānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena,
tika-s0201t:639_13: tadanusārena catusaccayojanāya evaṃ ekekassa niyyānamukhaṃ hotīti dassanatthañca.
tika-s0201t:639_15: Ādito gahaṇaṃ pana ativiya oḷārikatāya supākaṭabhāvato vakkhamānānaṃ aññesañca pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhāvato tadekaṭṭhatāya ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:640_4: Āghātakaraṇarasoti “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā citte āghātassa karaṇaraso.
tika-s0201t:640_5: Dussanapaccupaṭṭhānoti saparasantānassa vināsanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto.
tika-s0201t:640_6: Upanandhanaṃ nānappakārassa uparūpari nandhanaṃ viya hotīti katvā.
tika-s0201t:640_10: saddena “upanayhanā upanayhitattaṃ āṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā anusaṃsandanā anuppabandhanā daḷhīkamma”ntiādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:640_12: Upanāhasamaṅgī hi puggalo verassa anissajjanato ādittapūtialātaṃ viya jalati eva,
tika-s0201t:641_0: Paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇoti udakapuñchaniyā udakaṃ viya paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanasabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:641_1: Tathābhūto cāyaṃ attano kārakaṃ gūthena paharantaṃ gūtho viya paṭhamataraṃ makkheti evāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:641_2: Tathā hessa saparasantānesu guṇaṃ makkhetīti makkhoti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:641_5: Paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena attano guṇānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti āha “paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena upaṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti.
tika-s0201t:641_6: Tathā hesa paresaṃ guṇe ḍaṃsitvā viya attano guṇehi same karotīti paḷāsoti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:643_1: Tassa pāpassa āvaraṇabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti tadāvaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā, māyā,
tika-s0201t:643_2: yāya samannāgato puggalo bhasmachanno viya aṅgāro,
tika-s0201t:643_6: yena sāṭheyyena samannāgatassa puggalassa asantaguṇasambhāvanena cittānurūpakiriyāviharato “evaṃcitto,
tika-s0201t:643_7: evaṃkiriyo”ti dubbiññeyyattā kucchiṃ vā piṭṭhiṃ vā jānituṃ na sakkā. Yato –
tika-s0201t:647_4: yena samannāgato puggalo gilitanaṅgalasīso viya ajagaro,
tika-s0201t:647_5: vātabharitabhastā viya ca thaddho hutvā garuṭṭhāniye ca disvā onamitumpi na icchati,
tika-s0201t:647_9: Parena hi kismiñci kate taddiguṇaṃ karaṇavasena sārambho pavattati.
tika-s0201t:648_1: Omānopi hi evaṃ karaṇamukhena sampaggahavaseneva pavattati.
tika-s0201t:648_4: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “pubbakāle attānaṃ hīnato dahati aparakāle seyyato”ti.
tika-s0201t:649_1: yassa vā dhammassa vasena puggalo matto nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:649_4: Mado hi attano majjanākāraṃ sampayuttadhamme gāhento viya pavattamāno taṃsamaṅgiṃ puggalampi tathā karonto viya hoti.
tika-s0201t:649_5: Ahaṅkāravasena puggalaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ karonto cittassa ummādabhāvo viya hotīti ummādapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-s0201t:649_8: Yathāvuttassa vossaggassa anuppadānaṃ punappunaṃ vissajjanaṃ vossaggānuppadānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:649_19: Thambho vā mānaviseso cittassa thaddhabhāvena gahetabbato,
tika-s0201t:649_21: Tathā hi so “māno maññanā”tiādinā vibhaṅge niddiṭṭho.
tika-s0201t:649_22: Idha pana mānātimānānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā majjanākārena pavattadhammā eva “mado”ti gahetabbā.
tika-s0201t:650_0: Kasmā panettha ete eva aṭṭha dukā gahitā,
tika-s0201t:650_3: ime pana āmisadāyādassa savisesaṃ kilesāya saṃvattantīti taṃ visesaṃ vibhāventena āmisadāyādassa lobhādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:650_11: Tathā hi sā “issati dussati padussatī”tiādinā niddiṭṭhā.
tika-s0201t:650_12: Yasmā vā issaṃ janento ekaṃsato paduṭṭhacitto eva hoti,
tika-s0201t:650_15: Evaṃ paṭipannoti evaṃ asantaguṇappakāsanaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
tika-s0201t:650_16: Ovadituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti etena thambho nāma dovacassakaraṇo dhammoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:650_19: maññantoti iminā ca thambhassa mānavisesabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:650_22: pamajjatīti etena madavasena ekaṃsato pamādamāpajjatīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:651_0: Evanti iminā āmisadāyādassa lobhādīnaṃ uppattikkamadassaneneva idha pāḷiyaṃ nesaṃ desanākkamopi dassitoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:651_2: atha kho aññehi ca evarūpehi pāpakehi dhammehi aparimutto hotīti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:651_5: Evaṃ mahādīnavā āmisadāyādatāti tato balavataro saṃvego janetabboti ayamettha ovādo veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:651_8: Nibbisesoyevāti eteneva paṭhamataraṃ idha dassitasaccayojanānayena sabbavāresu yojetabboti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:652_0: Ñāṇaparicayapāṭavatthanti maggassa aṭṭhaṅgasattaṅgatādivisesavibhāvanāya ñāṇassa āsevanaṭṭhena paricayo ñāṇaparicayo,
tika-s0201t:652_7: kadāci sattaṅgiko”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto puna “ayaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:652_9: Ettha ca keci jhānadhammā maggasabhāvāti ekantato jhānaṃ maggato visuṃ katvā vattuṃ na sakkāti “lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānasahito”ti
tika-s0201t:652_11: Atha vā lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānavasenāti lokuttarā hutvā paṭhamajjhānassa vasenāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:652_13: sammasitassa vā paṭhamajjhānassa vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko hoti.
tika-s0201t:652_16: pakiṇṇakasaṅkhārānaṃ vā sammasane uppanno ariyamaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko hoti,
tika-s0201t:653_3: evaṃ bojjhaṅgavasena sattaṅgikachaḷaṅgikabhedo veditabbo appītikajjhānavasena chaḷaṅgikattā,
tika-s0201t:653_4: maggavasena pana desanā āgatāti svāyaṃ bhedo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na uddhaṭo.
tika-s0201t:653_5: Ito paranti ito aṭṭhaṅgato paraṃ ukkaṃsato,
tika-s0201t:653_6: avakaṃsato pana sattaṅgato paraṃ maggaṅgaṃ nāma natthīti.
tika-s0201t:653_7: Nanu maggavibhaṅge pañcaṅgikavāre pañceva maggaṅgāni uddhaṭāni,
tika-s0201t:653_13: svāssa hoti sammāsamādhī”ti vatvā pubbabhāgavasena pana “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti sammāvācādayo āgatāti?
tika-s0201t:653_15: taṃ pana sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ kārāpakaṅgānaṃ atirekakiccadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:653_16: tasmā na ariyamaggo sammāvācādivirahito atthīti “ito parañhi maggaṅgaṃ natthī”ti suvuttametanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:654_3: Tassā seṭṭhabhāvena hi “paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:654_12: Tappabhavābhinibbattānipi “tadabhinibbattānī”ti vuccanti kāraṇakāraṇepi kāraṇūpacāratoti āha “tappabhavābhinibbattāni sesaṅgānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:654_20: tasmā “purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa visesapaccayo hotī”ti iminā visesapaccayabhāvadassanatthena
tika-s0201t:654_21: kamena etāni sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṅgāni vuttānīti dassitāni.
tika-s0201t:655_2: Tassa pana pubbabhāge bhāvanānayo kassaci samathapubbaṅgamo hoti,
tika-s0201t:655_13: tatthāpi jhānamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ karontīti katvā vutto.
tika-s0201t:655_14: Vipassanaṃ bhāvayatoti paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ ārabhitvā yathādhigataṃ taruṇavipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa.
tika-s0201t:656_2: Na hi khaṇikasamādhiṃ vinā vipassanā sambhavati.
tika-s0201t:656_4: Tatthajātānanti tasmiṃ ariyamaggakkhaṇe uppannānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:656_7: Vavassaggo vossaggo paṭinissaggoti ca apavaggoti ca atthato ekaṃ,
tika-s0201t:656_11: Ariyamaggo hi ekanta samāhito asamādhānahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchedanato.
tika-s0201t:657_0: Yuganaddhāva honti tadā samādhipaññānaṃ samarasatāya icchitabbato.
tika-s0201t:657_1: Maggakkhaṇe hi na samathabhāvanāyaṃ viya samādhi,
tika-s0201t:657_2: vipassanābhāvanāyaṃ viya ca paññā kiccato adhikā icchitabbā,
tika-s0201t:657_3: samarasatāya pana aññamaññassa anativattanaṭṭhena dvepi yuganaddhā viya pavattanti.
tika-s0201t:660_5: Tattha yassā desanāya nimittabhūto ñātuṃ icchito attho kiṃ-
tika-s0201t:660_7: sā pākaṭā pucchā yathā “kiṃsūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”nti evamādi.
tika-s0201t:660_8: Yassā pana desanāya nimittabhūto ñātuṃ icchito attho kiṃ-
tika-s0201t:660_13: tasmāyeva idha “ye me bho gotamā”tiādikā apākaṭāti “pucchāvasiko nikkhepo”ti.
tika-s0201t:660_15: yasmā so brāhmaṇo “yeme bho gotamā”tiādīni vadanto na tattha kaṅkhī vicikicchī saṃsayamāpanno avoca,
tika-s0201t:660_16: atha kho attanā yathānicchitamatthaṃ bhagavati pasādabhāvabahumānaṃ pavedento kathesi.
tika-s0201t:660_31: Idameva hīti avadhāraṇena “brahmato jātā”tiādikaṃ niruttiṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0201t:661_0: Yena vā kāraṇenāti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:661_3: tasmā nānappakāraguṇavisesādhigamatthā idha upasaṅkamanakiriyāti “annena vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthamevetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:661_4: na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:662_1: Sampattukāmatāya hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami,
tika-s0201t:662_8: Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchantoti yathā bhagavā “kacci te brāhmaṇa khamanīyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:662_9: kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā khamanīyādīni pucchanto tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi pubbabhāsitāya,
tika-s0201t:662_10: tadanukaraṇena evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:662_11: Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:662_14: Khamanīyanti “idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ khaṇabhaṅguratāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ,
tika-s0201t:662_16: Yāpanīyanti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:662_21: Sukhavihārasabbhāvena kacci phāsuvihāro atthīti tattha tattha kacci-
tika-s0201t:663_4: Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti imaṃ pana atthaṃ dassento “sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:664_1: taṃ pana avakaṃsato ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthasaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:665_0: Yemeti ettha sandhivasena ikāralopoti dassento “ye ime”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:665_6: Tena brāhmaṇena adhippetā bhikkhūsu duvidhāpi saṃvijjantīti āha “idha pana dvīhipi kāraṇehi kulaputtāyevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:666_7: Bhikkhanasīlatādilakkhaṇo bhikkhubhāvo pabbajjāsahacaritāya saddhiṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ anvācinantoti āha “pabbajjaṃ bhikkhubhāvañcā”ti.
tika-s0201t:666_8: Kammavācālakkhaṇe pana bhikkhubhāve adhippete samuccayattho ca-
tika-s0201t:666_10: Anagārassa bhāvoti etena pabbajjānissito suvisuddho sīlācāraguṇaviseso gahito,
tika-s0201t:666_21: Diṭṭhānugatinti diṭṭhiyā anugamananti dassento “dassanānugati”nti vatvā sikkhāttayasaṅgahaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ tena diṭṭhattā diṭṭhi,
tika-s0201t:667_1: Devaputte viyātiādi kassaci pārijuññassa abhāvadīpanato “saddhāyā”tiādinā vuttassa pabbajitabhāvassa pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:667_2: Saddhāya gharā nikkhamma pabbajitvāti idaṃ haṭṭhapahaṭṭhādibhāvassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:667_3: Ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭheti idaṃ anussaṅkitāparisaṅkitatāya kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:668_5: nipātapadaṃ vā etaṃ “ma”nti iminā samānatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:668_7: saddena najīvikāpakatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti īdisānaṃyevāti saddhāpabbajjāya vibhāvitaanabhijjhāluādisabhāvānaṃyeva,
tika-s0201t:669_2: bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pade padaṃ nikkhipanto,
tika-s0201t:669_3: so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākaṭindriyo,
tika-s0201t:669_4: atha kho ārakāva mama ahañca tassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:670_0: Ajjhogāhetvā adhippetatthaṃ sambhavituṃ sādhetuṃ dukkhānīti durabhisambhavāni.
tika-s0201t:670_1: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tattha nivāsoyeva dukkhoti dassetuṃ “sambhavituṃ dukkhāni dussahānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:670_4: saddo hi saṇḍabhūte rukkhasamūhepi vattatīti araññaggahaṇaṃ.
