tika-s0201t:880_5: “Yathānusandhivasena desanā āgatā”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārento tappasaṅgena itarepi anusandhī dassetuṃ “tayo hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:880_9: Yena dhammenāti sīlādivodānadhammesu akkhantiyādisaṃkilesadhammesu ca yena yena dhammena.
tika-s0201t:880_10: Cha abhiññā āgatāti iminā “anurūpadhammavasena vā”ti vuttavikappaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:880_15: na meso attā”ti evaṃ paṭibhāgā suññatākārena.
tika-s0201t:880_17: “Citte saṃkiliṭṭhe duggati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti heṭṭhā kilesadesanā āgatā.
tika-s0201t:881_1: “Mettā bhāvetabbā byāpādassa pahānāyā”tiādivacanato mettādayo byāpādavihesāratirāgānaṃ paṭipakkhā.
tika-s0201t:881_2: Yasmā “so atthī”tiādinā bhagavatā anāgāmino aggamaggādhigamanaṃ catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:882_3: Nāmantipi hi īdisesu ṭhānesu cattāro arūpino khandhā vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:882_4: Iminā nayenāti etena bhūtanissitānaṃ sesupādāyadhammānaṃ sabbesampi pahātabbataṇhāvajjānaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ pariggahavidhiṃ ulliṅgeti.
tika-s0201t:882_5: Sabhāvato vijjamānaṃ taṃ attapaccakkhaṃ katvā ñāṇena yāthāvato paṭivijjhiyamānataṃ upādāya “atthi ida”nti yathāvavatthāpitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ.
tika-s0201t:882_9: ito bāhirakaparikappitaṃ pakatiādi drabyādi jīvādi kāyādi viya ca na paramatthato natthi,
tika-s0201t:882_11: Pajānātīti pubbabhāge tāva lakkhaṇarasādivasena ceva paṭiggahavibhāgavasena ca pakārato jānāti,
tika-s0201t:882_13: Ekantahīnā nāma akusaladhammā sampati āyatiñca dukkhamūlattā,
tika-s0201t:882_14: tatthāpi visesato taṇhāti āha “dukkhassa samudayaṃ paṭivijjhanto atthi hīnanti pajānātī”ti.
tika-s0201t:882_15: Attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ nītattā paṇītanti iminā atthena ariyamaggova “paṇīta”nti vuccatīti āha
tika-s0201t:882_17: “Uttamaṭṭhena ca paṇīta”nti vuccamāne nirodhasaccassapi saṅgaho siyā,
tika-s0201t:882_18: tassa pana padantarena saṅgahitattā vuttanayenevettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:882_21: Na cettha asaṅgaho tassāpi saññāya āgatabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:882_22: Lokaṃ uttaritvā samatikkamitvā nissaritvā visaṃyuttaṃ hutvā ṭhitattā vuttaṃ “uttari nissaraṇaṃ nibbāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:883_1: Anvayañāṇatāya anubodhabhūtāya vipassanāpaññāya jānanattho dhammañāṇatāya paṭivedhabhūtāya maggapaññāya
tika-s0201t:883_2: dassanattho sabhāvasiddhoti dassento “vipassanāpaññāya cattāri saccāni jānanato maggapaññāya passato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:883_3: Bhayabherave vuttanayenevāti bhayabheravasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ attanā vuttaatthavacanatthapāṭhena idha pāṭhassa sadisattā atidisanto “kāmāsavāpi…pe…
tika-s0201t:883_6: avijjāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatī”ti “khīṇā jātī”tiādīni vadatā bhagavatā catutthamaggo niddiṭṭho,
tika-s0201t:883_7: tasmā yaṃ heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “so ca upari catutthamaggasseva niddiṭṭhattā yujjatī”ti,
tika-s0201t:884_0: Tassa codanatthāyāti tassa brāhmaṇassa bhagavā attano codanatthāya “puccha maṃ tvaṃ brāhmaṇa yadettha tayā manasābhisamīhita”nti codanāya,
tika-s0201t:884_2: Desanāsannissayo brāhmaṇassa tathārūpo ettha ajjhāsayopi natthīti yathāvuttaanusandhittayavinimuttattā “pāṭiyekkaṃ anusandhiṃ āhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:885_1: Dhammasabhāmaṇḍapaṃ tāvadeva upagatattā bāhukā nadito āgataṃ viya maññamāno.
tika-s0201t:885_5: Lokkhasammataggahaṇena “tathā sā nadī loke pākaṭā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ attano micchāgāhaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:885_10: Puññasammatāti pujjabhavaphalanibbattanena sattānaṃ punanena visodhanena puññāti sammatā.
tika-s0201t:885_13: Cuṇṇikavacanaṃ asambhāventā tathā ca vutte atthamabujjhanakā pajjavacanaṃ sambhāventā tathā ca vutte bujjhanakā gāthārucikā.
tika-s0201t:886_0: “Gacchati pana bhavaṃ gotamo bāhukaṃ nadiṃ sināyitu”nti heṭṭhā vuttattā bāhukanti idameva ettha tadatthadīpakaṃ.
tika-s0201t:886_1: Sesāni adhikakkādivacanāni tato visiṭṭhassa atthassa bodhanato visesatthadīpakāni.
tika-s0201t:886_2: Kasmā panettha bhagavatā brāhmaṇena avuttāni adhikakkādīni gahitānīti āha “yatheva hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:886_4: nhāyitvā adhikaṃ kakkaṃ ettha gaṇhantīti adhikakkaṃ.
tika-s0201t:887_2: Vuttāneva hontīti lokasammatālakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇatā brāhmaṇassa adhippāyena,
tika-s0201t:887_6: Na hi naṃ sodhayeti naṃ puggalaṃ na sodhaye.
tika-s0201t:888_1: Tatthāyaṃ paṭibāhanavidhi yathā yaṃ kiñci udakorohanaṃ na pāpapavāhanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:888_2: evaṃ yo koci nakkhattayogo pāpahetūnaṃ paṭipakkhābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:888_5: Yathā āloko andhakārassa vijjā ca avijjāya,
tika-s0201t:888_6: na evaṃ udakorohanaṃ nakkhattayogo vā pāpahetūnaṃ lobhādīnaṃ paṭipakkho,
tika-s0201t:888_8: Niccaṃ phaggunīnakkhattanti suddhasīlādikassa sabbakālaṃ maṅgaladivaso evāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:888_21: Yathā sabbabhūtāni tapavasena khemappattāni abhayappattāni honti,
tika-s0201t:888_22: evaṃ karohīti taṃ heṭṭhā dassitaṃ mettādibhāvanaṃ brāhmaṇassa saṅkhepena upadisantenassa ekaccasamādhisampadā
tika-s0201t:889_0: Tassa pana sampadādvayassa nissayabhūtaṃ sīlasampadaṃ dassetuṃ “sace musā na bhaṇasī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:889_1: Ettha ca yathā “sace musā na bhaṇasī”tiādinā musāvāda-
tika-s0201t:889_4: paṭivirativacanena avasesakāyavacīduccaritaviratīpi vuttā eva hoti lakkhaṇahāranayena,
tika-s0201t:889_6: hotīti saddhādayo vimuttiparipācanīyadhammā brāhmaṇassa pakāsitā evāti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:890_5: Ekaggahaṇeneva kāyena vūpakaṭṭhatā vuttāti āha “vupakaṭṭho cittavivekenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:890_7: Tathābhūtassa cassa ekādasahi aggīhi āditte tayo bhave passato yathā pamādassa lesopi nāhosi,
tika-s0201t:890_9: Katthaci saṅkhāragate anapekkhacitto nibbānādhimutto eva vihāsīti dassetuṃ “appamatto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:893_3: Attano vā cundaṃ nāma bhāgineyyattheraṃ upādāya āyasmato sāriputtattherassa bhātā ayaṃ mahāthero “mahācundo”ti paññāyittha yathā “mahāpanthako”ti.
tika-s0201t:893_18: Tena na tathāgatā samparāyikaṃyeva sattānaṃ sukhaṃ āsīsanti,
tika-s0201t:893_20: Kasmā evaṃ tathāgatā abhivadantīti tattha kāraṇamāha “sukhakāmā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:893_24: Abhivadantīti āsīsitamevatthaṃ ñāṇakaruṇāhi abhimukhaṃ katvā vadanti.
tika-s0201t:894_0: Yāti aniyamato gahitā niyamato dassento “imā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:894_1: Imāti ca āsannapaccakkhavacananti āha “abhimukhaṃ karonto viyā”ti,
tika-s0201t:894_2: taṃ taṃ diṭṭhigatikaṃ cittagataṃ sammukhā viya karontoti attho.
tika-s0201t:894_3: Diṭṭhiyoti purimapadalopena pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti dassento “micchādiṭṭhiyo”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:894_5: sattesu vā visayabhūtesu ārabbha uppajjamānā “sattesu pātubhavantī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:894_7: Paṭisaṃyuttāti “atthi attā”ti gāhe gāhaṇe ca visayabhāvena paṭisaṃyuttā.
tika-s0201t:894_8: Diṭṭhigatikena diṭṭhiṃ gāhantehi gahaṇe gāhāpaṇe ca diṭṭhi diṭṭhivādassa visayoti tena paṭisaṃyuttā nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:894_9: “Atthi attā”ti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi idha attavādapaṭisaṃyuttā,
tika-s0201t:894_11: Sā ca visayabhāvato tathāpavattena vādena paṭisaṃyuttā.
tika-s0201t:894_13: Vīsati bhavanti tato paraṃ attavādavatthuno abhāvā.
tika-s0201t:894_14: Pañcapi hi upādānakkhandhe paccekaṃ “attā”ti te ca attano nissayabhāvena gaṇhato etāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ sambhavo,
tika-s0201t:894_15: tabbinimutto panāyaṃ visayo attaggahaṇākāro ca natthīti.
tika-s0201t:894_16: Sassato attā ca loko cāti rūpādīsu aññataraṃ “attā”ti,
tika-s0201t:894_17: “loko”ti vā gahetvā taṃ sassato sabbakālabhāvī nicco dhuvoti.
tika-s0201t:894_18: Yathāha “rūpī attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapetī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:895_2: Appatvāpi sotāpattimagganti iminā avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:895_4: ayaṃ idha ādimanasikāroti adhippeto paññābhāvanāya ārambhabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:895_9: Kāmañca tāsaṃ tena tadaṅgavasena pahānaṃ hotiyeva,
tika-s0201t:895_11: tasmā samucchedavasena pahānaṃ paṭinissaggo ca hotīti pucchati.
tika-s0201t:895_15: tesaṃ udayabbayañāṇādhigamena adhimānuppatti tadavasāno ca manasikāroti adhippeto.
tika-s0201t:895_16: Tena diṭṭhīnaṃ pahānaṃ na hotīti kathāpanatthaṃ ayaṃ pucchāti āha “adhimānappahānatthaṃ pucchatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:895_18: paṭinissaggo hotī”ti anabhisametāvī viya vadanto adhimāne ṭhito viya hotīti āha “adhimāniko viya hutvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:895_20: Tesaṃ atthāyāti tesaṃ attano antevāsikānaṃ bhagavatā etassa micchāgāhassa vivecanatthāya.
tika-s0201t:895_21: Thero kira dhammasenāpati viya saddhiṃ attano antevāsikehi bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami.
tika-s0201t:896_3: Yasmā diṭṭhīnaṃ anusayanabhūmipi samudācaraṇaṭṭhānampi khandhā eva,
tika-s0201t:896_4: tasmā āha “yattha cetā diṭṭhiyo uppajjantī tiādi pañcakkhandhe sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-s0201t:896_5: Rūpaṃ abhinivissāti “idaṃ rūpaṃ mama attā”ti diṭṭhābhinivesavasena abhinivisitvā ārabbha.
tika-s0201t:896_6: Abhinivisamānā eva hi diṭṭhi naṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati.
tika-s0201t:896_21: Punappunaṃ āsevitāti anādimati saṃsāre aparāparuppattiyā laddhāsevanā.
tika-s0201t:896_28: Appahīnā hi thāmagatā kilesā anusentīti vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:896_29: Etena tesaṃ kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanārahataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:897_0: Taṃ pañcakkhandhappabhedaṃ ārammaṇanti yaṃ taṃ “yattha cetā diṭṭhiyo uppajjantī”tiādinā vuttaṃ rūpupādānakkhandhādipañcakkhandhapabhedaṃ
tika-s0201t:897_2: Etaṃ mayhaṃ na hotīti etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ mayhaṃ santakaṃ na hoti mama kiñcanapalibodhabhāvena gahetabbatāya abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:897_4: Ahampi eso na asmīti eso pañcakkhandhapabhedo ahampi na asmi,
tika-s0201t:897_5: ahanti so gahetabbo na hotīti attho.
tika-s0201t:897_7: Eso me attāpi na hoti attasabhāvassa tattha abhāvato mamañcassa kiñcanapalibodhabhāvena gahetabbatāya abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:898_3: Papañceti santānaṃ vitthārento satte saṃsāre cirāyatīti papañco.
tika-s0201t:898_9: Sahajekaṭṭhā pana diṭṭhiyā taṇhā eva, na māno,
tika-s0201t:898_18: Suṭṭhu passantassāti yathā puna tathā na passitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:899_2: Maggeneva taṃ hotīti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “sotāpattimaggena diṭṭhippahānaṃ dassetvā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:900_1: so attho tattha vāsīnaṃ āgatāgatānaṃ idha ijjhatī”ti taṃ udikkhanto saṅghena yāvatatiyaṃ pahitopi na gato na agāravena.
tika-s0201t:900_3: Paṇḍito hi tattha attano kiccameva karotīti aññataraṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ pāhesi.
tika-s0201t:900_4: Kimetanti saṅghassa āṇāya akaraṇaṃ nāma kimetanti karaṇe ādaraṃ dīpento evamāha.
tika-s0201t:900_6: Yasmā pesalā pesalehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samānādhimuttitāya,
tika-s0201t:900_7: tasmā thero “sādhāvuso”ti vatvā hatthimāpanādiṃ sabbaṃ akāsi.
tika-s0201t:901_0: Tādisovāti anantaraṃ vuttattherasadisova appatte pattasaññī eva saṭṭhivassātītoti attho.
tika-s0201t:901_2: Pāsādaṃ pāvisi vissaṭṭhaṃ olokanenassa puthujjanabhāvo attanāva paññāyissatīti.
tika-s0201t:901_3: Tissamahāvihāre kira therā bhikkhū tadā “sakacittaṃ pasīdatī”ti vacanaṃ pūjentā kālasseva cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:901_4: sammajjitvā ettakārammaṇameva buddhārammaṇapītiṃ uppādetvā divase divase tathā karonti.
tika-s0201t:901_7: idha pattacīvaraṃ ṭhapetī”ti vattāpi paṭisanthāravasena kiñci pucchitāpi nāhosi.
tika-s0201t:901_8: Guṇaṃ jānātīti nimujjanādīsu vivaradānādinā guṇaṃ jānāti viya.
tika-s0201t:901_9: Tumhe pana na jānittha āgantukavattassapi akaraṇato.
tika-s0201t:901_12: ettakampi ajānantehi me saṃvāso natthīti ākāse abbhukkami.
tika-s0201t:902_0: Yaṃ tassa evamassa sallekhena viharāmīti yo “paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyā”ti vutto,
tika-s0201t:902_1: tassa bhikkhuno yaṃ “paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ paṭipattividhānaṃ kilese sallekhati,
tika-s0201t:902_2: tena sallekhena ahaṃ viharāmī”ti adhimānavasena evamassa evaṃ bhaveyya ṭhānametaṃ vijjatīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:902_3: Taṃ na yujjatīti taṃ adhimānikassa “yathāvibhaṅgaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ sallekho”ti parivitakkitaṃ na yujjati yuttaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0201t:902_5: Tattha sammā sabbaso ca kilese likhatīti sallekho,
tika-s0201t:903_1: Cittuppādavasena anekavāraṃ pavattamānampi jhānaṃ ekāvajjanatāya ekavīthipariyāpannattā ekā samāpatti evāti “punappunaṃ samāpattivasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:903_2: Cattāri arūpajjhānāni yathāsakaṃ ekekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe pavattantīti āha “ārammaṇabhedābhāvato”ti.
tika-s0201t:904_2: Tasmā tānīti tesaṃ vasena tāni jhānāni santāni,
tika-s0201t:905_2: añño vā ito bāhirako tāpasaparibbājakādiko na hi sammasati.
tika-s0201t:905_3: Tattha adhimāniko appatte pattasaññitāya na sammasati,
tika-s0201t:906_0: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo nāma kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena pavattā uttaruttari santapaṇītā dhammā,
tika-s0201t:906_2: Tattha kathaṃ avihiṃsādayo eva sallekhabhāvena vuttā,
tika-s0201t:906_3: na itarāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento codako “kasmā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:906_5: vaṭṭapādakatāya pana kilesānaṃ sallekhapaṭipadā na honti,
tika-s0201t:906_6: avihiṃsādayo pana vivaṭṭapādakā sallekhapaṭipadāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “lokuttarapādakattā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:906_7: Imināyeva aṭṭhasamāpattīhi avihiṃsādīnaṃ visesadīpakena suttena yathā mahapphalataraṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:906_9: Idañhi dakkhiṇeyyataratāya dakkhiṇāya mahapphalatarataṃ sandhāya vuttanti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:906_12: Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tisaraṇaṃ gato upāsakopi sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno nāmā”ti.
tika-s0201t:906_13: Yo hi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkamitukāmo pasannacitto ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0201t:906_14: tassa taṃ adhisīlādīnaṃ upanissayo hutvā anukkamena dassanamaggādhigamāya saṃvatteyyāti.
tika-s0201t:907_2: Antamicchādiṭṭhiñca micchattānaṃ ādimicchādiṭṭhiñcāti idaṃ desanākkamaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:907_4: Tathāti iminā yathā kammapathamicchattānaṃ ante ādimhi ca vuttamicchādiṭṭhiṃ missetvā ekajjhaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:907_5: tathā tesaṃ ante vuttasammādiṭṭhīti imamatthaṃ upasaṃharati.
tika-s0201t:908_2: Atipātenti saraseneva patanasabhāvaṃ aticca antarā eva pātenti,
tika-s0201t:908_10: pisati pare satte hiṃsatīti vā pisuṇā.
tika-s0201t:909_2: Esa nayoti iminā “ayāthāvā aniyyānikā akusalā vācā”tiādinā tattha tattha ayāthāvādiatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0201t:909_6: Tathā hi loke evaṃ vadanti “yaṃ me pahūtaṃ dhanaṃ ahosi,
tika-s0201t:909_11: Sā pana kodhavasena vā “akkocchi maṃ avadhi ma”ntiādinā upanayhantassa,
tika-s0201t:909_12: rāgavasena vā “yānissa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni anussaratī”ti vuttanayena subhato anussarantassa,
tika-s0201t:909_13: diṭṭhivasena vā “so kho pana me atto nicco dhuvo”tiādinā micchāabhinivisantassāti evamādinā nayena pavattatīti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:910_1: “sukataṃ mayā”ti pāmojjanimittaṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇākārena moho aññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:910_2: Tattha pana “asive sivā”ti vohāro viya ñāṇavohāro.
tika-s0201t:910_4: Ekūnavīsatibhedaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sammā pekkhitattā sammāñāṇaṃ vuccati,
tika-s0201t:910_6: Rūpārūpasamāpattilābhitāmattena vaṭṭato avimuttāyeva samānā “vimuttā maya”nti evaṃsaññino.
tika-s0201t:910_9: attano mahābrahmunā salokatā tassa samīpatāsaṃyujjanasaṅkhātāyaṃ vā avimuttiyaṃ vimuttisaññino.
tika-s0201t:910_15: Sabbepi pana phaladhamme vimuttikkhandhasaṅgahato “vimuttī”ti vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-s0201t:911_3: Yassa dhammassa atthitāya uddhatā nāma honti,
tika-s0201t:911_4: so dhammo uddhaccanti āha “uddaccena samannāgatāti uddhatā”ti.
tika-s0201t:911_5: Vicinantāti dhammoti vā adhammoti vā ādinā yaṃ kiñci sabhāvaṃ vinicchinantā.
tika-s0201t:911_8: Saṭhayantīti saṭhā aññathā attānaṃ aññathā pavedanakā.
tika-s0201t:911_10: tasmā āha “na sammā bhāsantīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:912_0: Dukkhaṃ vaco etesu vippaṭikūlaggāhitāya vipaccanīkagāhesūti dubbacā.
tika-s0201t:912_1: Te pana vacanakkhamā na hontīti āha “vattuṃ dukkhā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:912_4: Attanā visesitabbavasena kāyaviññattiādīnaṃ kāyakammadvārādibhāvo viya assaddhiyādiasaddhammasamannāgamenaasataṃ
tika-s0201t:912_5: asappurisānaṃ dhammānanti tāniyeva assaddhiyādīni asaddhammā nāma,
tika-s0201t:912_6: tesaṃ vasenāha “saddhā etesaṃ natthī”ti yathā taṃ “duppaññā”ti.
tika-s0201t:912_9: Natthīti gahetabbanti iminā abhāvattho ayaṃ appa-
tika-s0201t:912_11: Sammāpaṭipattiyā anārambhanato kucchitā gārayhā sīdanti osīdanti saṃkilesapakkheti kusītā da-
tika-s0201t:912_14: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya āraddhaṃ paggahitaṃ vīriyaṃ etesanti āraddhavīriyā.
tika-s0201t:912_15: Anuppādanena muṭṭhā naṭṭhā sati etesanti muṭṭhassatī.
tika-s0201t:912_17: Duppaññā nāma dūsitabhāvo paṭipakkhena vināsitabhāvoti āha “naṭṭhapaññāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:912_18: Heṭṭhā sammādiṭṭhiggahaṇena kammassakatāpaññāya maggasammādiṭṭhiyā ca gahitattā subbacakalyāṇamittatāparivārāhi
tika-s0201t:912_19: idha saddhādīhi vipassanāsambhārassa uddhaṭattā ca vuttaṃ “idha vipassanāpaññā veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:912_21: Yuttiṃ anapekkhitvāpi ayamattho gahetabboti dassento āha “porāṇānaṃ āṇā”ti.
tika-s0201t:913_2: yaṃ vā taṃ vā attanā yathāgahitadiṭṭhinti attho.
tika-s0201t:913_6: Kummovāti yathā kacchapo attano pādādike aṅge kenaci ghaṭṭito sabbāni aṅgāni attano kapāleyeva samodahati,
tika-s0201t:913_9: chaḍḍehi na”nti vutto taṃ na vissajjeti.
tika-s0201t:913_10: Antoyeva attano hadaye eva ṭhapetvā taṃ vadati.
tika-s0201t:913_12: Gaṇhantīti yathā saṃsumārā gahitaṃ na vissajjenti,
tika-s0201t:914_5: sā ca visesato sīlassa mūlakāraṇaṃ parūpaghātalakkhaṇā dussīlyā oramāpanato.
tika-s0201t:914_19: Vihiṃsalakkhaṇā dussīlyā oramā avihiṃsalakkhaṇā visesato sīlassa balavakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:914_21: samādhipadaṭṭhānā ca paññāti sabbaguṇānaṃ mūlabhūtā avihiṃsā.
tika-s0201t:914_22: Apica uḷārajjhāsayānaṃ nisammakārīnaṃ dhīrānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ sīlaṃ viya samādhipaññāpi paresaṃ hitasukhāvahāva
tika-s0201t:914_23: sampajjantīti evampi karuṇā sabbaguṇānaṃ mūlanti sā ādito vuttā.
tika-s0201t:915_0: Tato paraṃ visesato “avihiṃsāsamuṭṭhānā ime dhammā”ti dassanatthaṃ kusalakammapathadhammā gahitā.
tika-s0201t:915_2: ettha patiṭṭhitena ime dhammā uppādetabbāti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭha sammattā gahitā.
tika-s0201t:915_3: Tesaṃ visodhanāya paṭipannassa ādito evaṃ hotīti dassanatthaṃ nīvaraṇaviveko gahito,
tika-s0201t:915_4: ādito nīvaraṇadvayassa aggahaṇe gahitāgahitakāraṇaṃ aṭṭhakathāya vuttameva.
tika-s0201t:915_5: Kodhassa pana byāpādato bhedo vatthasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:915_6: Kodhādippahānena cettha sallekhasiddhīti dassanatthaṃ tato upakkilesavisuddhi gahitā.
tika-s0201t:915_7: Sā ca subbacakalyāṇamittaappamattatāhi sijjhatīti dassanatthaṃ pakiṇṇakā gahitā.
tika-s0201t:915_9: vipassanaṃ paribrūhetvā ariyamaggādhigamāya saṃvattantīti dassanatthaṃ saddhammā gahitā.
tika-s0201t:915_12: evaṃ yathāvuttāya sammāpaṭipattiyā ariyamaggaṃ adhigacchanto sallekhaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetīti dassanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:915_13: “sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī”tiādi vuttanti evametesaṃ catucattālīsāya sallekhākārānaṃ gahaṇapayojanaṃ anupubbī
tika-s0201t:915_15: Payogato sallekhapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjituṃ asakkontānaṃ cittuppādopi bahūpakāroti āha “cittuppādassapi bahūpakārataṃ dassetu”nti.
tika-s0201t:916_4: Idāni yathāvuttadhammaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “kasmā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:916_5: Saraṇagamanaṃ vācāya viññāpetuṃ asakkontassa vasena vuttaṃ “kāyena vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:916_7: Ettha ca tathā tathā pavattasallahukakāmāvacarakusalacittuppattiṃ upādāya tathārūpakusalakāyavacīkammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:916_8: bahūpakāratā vuttāti na sabhāvato cittuppādassa bahūpakārataṃ ñāyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:917_4: Parivajjanavasena kamanaṃ pavatti parikkamananti āha “parikkamanāya parivajjanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:917_7: Eteneva upāyenāti eteneva avihiṃsāpade vuttena vidhinā.
tika-s0201t:918_1: Akusalā paṭisandhiajanakā nāma uddhaccasahagatacittuppādadhammā aññepi pavattivipākamattadāyino,
tika-s0201t:918_3: paccayavekallena vipaccituṃ aladdhokāsā ahosikammādayo vā ajanakā.
tika-s0201t:918_6: Evaṃnāmāti nāmaggahaṇena sabhāvaṃ upalakkheti sati paccayasamavāye taṃsabhāvānativattanato.
tika-s0201t:918_12: Sabbe akusalāti ettha vihiṃsamekaṃ ṭhapetvā itare sabbe akusalā upamābhūtā.
tika-s0201t:919_3: taṃ pana ekantato gambhīrampi hotīti “gambhīrakaddame nimuggo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:919_4: Palipaṃ viya palipanti pañca kāmaguṇā vuccanti,
tika-s0201t:919_5: tasmā evaṃ idāni vuccamānena upamopameyyasaṃsandananayena ettha imasmiṃ ṭhāne atthayojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:919_6: Na hi taṃ kāraṇanti ettha kāraṇaṃ nāma hatthassa vā pādassa vā apalipannabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:920_0: Tattha siyā kassaci parivitakko “bhagavato desanānubhāvena bhikkhuādayo kathentī”ti.
tika-s0201t:920_1: “Bhagavāyeva hi tattha uddharatī”ti vatvā upamāya tadatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “rañño”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:920_3: sāvakasikhāppattavisesānampi ariyānaṃ desanā satthuyeva desanāti dassetuṃ “kiñcāpī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:921_2: Te pana vinayā tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ sikkhāpanena hotīti āha “tisso sikkhā sikkhāpessatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:921_4: “Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ kiṃ pana ṭhānanti āha “apalipapalipannatta”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:921_5: Yasmā pāḷiyaṃ “so vata cundā”tiādinā sāmaññatthaṃ upamābhāvena gahetvā visesattho upameyyabhāvena vutto,
tika-s0201t:921_6: tasmā tamatthaṃ “evamattho veditabbo”tiādinā sādhāraṇato vatvā puna asādhāraṇato vivaranto “kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:921_7: Parassa vihiṃsācetanaṃ nibbāpessatīti idaṃ yo avihiṃsāsaṅkhātaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ disvā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanto dhammadesanāya paro avihiṃsako hoti,
tika-s0201t:921_12: Vihiṃsāpahānāya maggaṃ bhāvayatotiādinā attano eva avihiṃsāya vihiṃsāparinibbānāya saṃvattanamāha.
tika-s0201t:922_14: aññena vā kenaci pamādakāraṇena mā pamādaṃ āpajjittha.
tika-s0201t:922_17: Yathāvuttā pañca pariyāyā aññepi sabbe sāsanaguṇā idheva saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti āha “jhāyatha,
tika-s0201t:925_1: Kathetukamyatāpucchā evāti avadhāraṇena itarā catasso pucchā nivatteti itarāsaṃ asambhavato,
tika-s0201t:925_2: tattha yathāpucchitassa atthassa vissajjanato ca “ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhī”ti yāthāvato ajānantāpi puthujjanā
tika-s0201t:925_3: bāhirakatāpasādayo attano samānasīle ṭhitaṃ sammādiṭṭhīti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:925_5: Yathāsamaṅgitākārassa atthassa evametanti nijjhānakkhamāpanato ekantato yāthāvaggāho hotīti āha “attapaccakkhenapī”ti,
tika-s0201t:925_6: yāthāvato lakkhaṇassa paṭividdhattā attano paccakkhabhāvenāti attho.
tika-s0201t:925_7: Bahunnaṃ vacanaṃ upādāyāti iminā sāsane loke ca niruḷhatāya ayaṃ āmeḍitapayogoti sāsanassa niruḷhatāya
tika-s0201t:925_8: ca sampasādaṃ upādāyapi tadubhayiko āmeḍitapayogo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:925_14: Tesu purimena dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvāvabodhasaṅkhātaṃ sammādiṭṭhisabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:925_15: Tena hi sā sabbadhamme abhibhavitvā sobhati.
tika-s0201t:925_17: Tena hi sā sampayuttadhamme ñāṇamaye viya taṃsamaṅginañca puggalaṃ ñāṇapiṇḍaṃ viya karoti,
tika-s0201t:925_18: tassa “paṇḍito nipuṇo cheko viññū vibhāvī”tiādinā disāsu pasaṃsā pattharati.
tika-s0201t:926_4: Saccānulomikañāṇanti ariyasaccānaṃ paṭivedhassa anulomato saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:926_6: No saccānulomikāyāti bāhirako saccānulomikāya sammādiṭṭhiyā no sammādiṭṭhi sabbena sabbaṃ tassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:926_8: Kammassa katādiṭṭhi pana bāhirakassa attadiṭṭhiṃ anurujjhantī pavattati “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattito.
tika-s0201t:926_9: Sāsaniko dvīhipīti sāsaniko puthujjano kammassakatāñāṇādīhi dvīhipi sammādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0201t:926_12: Tīsupi puggalesu sekkho idha sammādiṭṭhīti adhippetoti dassento “niyatāya niyyānikāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:927_7: Dhamme pasādaggahaṇena satthari saṅghe ca pasādopi gahitoyeva hotīti “dhamme”icceva vutto tadavinābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:927_8: Yasmā esa niyatāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato sammādiṭṭhīti adhippeto,
tika-s0201t:927_9: tañca vaṭṭato niyyānaṃ vivaṭṭādhigamena hotīti āha “āgato imaṃ saddhamma”nti.
tika-s0201t:927_10: Nibbānañhi santo sadā vijjamāno dhammoti katvā saddhammoti imaṃ phalehi asādhāraṇena pariyāyena vattabbataṃ labhati.
tika-s0201t:927_12: so ca pahānābhisamayādīhi saheva idha ijjhatīti dassento “sabbadiṭṭhigahanānī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:927_13: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhigahanāni vinibbeṭhento sabbakilese pajahantoti padadvayena pana pahānābhisamayamāha,
tika-s0201t:928_2: yo so akusalapajānanādinā paricchinno maggavuṭṭhānakālo maggakkhaṇo,
tika-s0201t:928_12: yasmā paṭhamavārena uddesavasena desitassa atthassa vitthāradesanā dutiyavāro.
tika-s0201t:928_15: tasmā nirodhārammaṇāya pajānanāya maggapaññāya kiccavasena sammohato “idaṃ dukkha”nti dasaakusalakammapathaṃ
tika-s0201t:929_1: kucchite pāpadhamme salayati calayati kampetīti kusalaṃ,
tika-s0201t:929_5: Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato tanukaraṇato ñāṇaṃ kusaṃ nāma,
tika-s0201t:929_7: Yathā vā kuso ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthapadesaṃ lunāti,
tika-s0201t:929_8: evamidaṃ uppannānuppannavasena ubhayabhāgagataṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ lunāti chindati,
tika-s0201t:929_10: Kucchitānaṃ vā sāvajjadhammānaṃ salanato saṃvaraṇato kusalaṃ.
tika-s0201t:929_11: Kusaladhammavasena hi akusalā manacchaṭṭhesu dvāresu appavattiyā saṃvutā honti.
tika-s0201t:929_12: Kucchite vā pāpadhamme salayati gameti apanetīti kusalaṃ.
tika-s0201t:929_13: Kucchitānaṃ vā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ sānato nisānato tejanato kusā,
tika-s0201t:929_17: Kucchitānaṃ vā sānato antakaraṇato vināsanato kusāni,
tika-s0201t:929_21: adhiṭṭhānabhāvena taṃsadisassa attano nissayabhūtassa rūpārūpapabandhassa sampati āyatiñca anudahena vināsanato kuṃ sasantīti kusā, rāgādayo.
tika-s0201t:929_22: Te viya attano nissayassa lavanato chindanato kusalaṃ.
tika-s0201t:929_23: Payogasampāditā hi kusaladhammā accantameva rūpārūpadhamme appavattikaraṇena samucchindanti.
tika-s0201t:930_1: kusaladhammānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena akusalanti padassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:930_3: Yathā yaṃ dhammajātaṃ na arogaṃ na avajjaṃ na sukhavipākaṃ na ca kosallasambhūtaṃ,
tika-s0201t:930_9: taṃ akusalaṃ nāmāti ayampi attho dassitoti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:930_11: Tathā bujjhanakapuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena desanā pavattāti āha “akusalādipajānanenāpī”ti.
tika-s0201t:930_13: Bhāvanāmanasikāro pana “sabbaṃ bhikkhave abhiññeyya”nti vacanato anavasesato rūpārūpadhammānaṃ pariggahavaseneva pavattati.
tika-s0201t:930_15: Tattha manasikārapaṭivedhoti pubbabhāge pavattavipassanāmanasikāro ariyamaggapaṭivedho ca.
tika-s0201t:930_16: Kassaci akopanato vitthāravaseneva vuttaṃ vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantā maggaṃ paṭivijjhantāpi vitthāranayeneva
tika-s0201t:931_2: Vatthasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena pana mahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa antevāsikabhikkhū sandhāya “āhaṃsū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:931_4: So hi imasmiṃ majjhimanikāye taṃ taṃ vinicchayaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0201t:933_3: Ñāṇapaṭipakkho aññāṇaṃ mittapaṭipakkho amitto viya kusalapaṭipakkho akusalaṃ kusalena pahātabbattā,
tika-s0201t:933_17: Purimena vā avajjavantatādassanato kiccaṭṭhena rasena anatthajananarasataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:933_21: Purimena ca ayonisomanasikāraṃ akusalassa padaṭṭhānaṃ pakāseti.
tika-s0201t:933_27: upatāpitaṃ vā tehi vidūsitaṃ malīnakatañcāti attho.
tika-s0201t:933_28: Idañcassa dukkhavipākatañcāti atthe idañca dukkhavipākataṃ apaccakkhatāya asaddahantānaṃ paccakkhato ādīnavadassanena saṃvejanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:934_0: Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atīva pātanaṃ atipāto,
tika-s0201t:934_1: saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho.
tika-s0201t:934_3: Payogavatthumahantatādīhi mahāsāvajjatā tehi paccayehi uppajjamānāya cetanāya balavabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:934_4: Ekassa hi payogassa sahasā nipphādanavasena sakiccasādhikāya bahukkhattuṃ pavattajavanehi laddhāsevanāya
tika-s0201t:934_6: Satipi kadāci khuddake ceva mahante ca pāṇe payogassa samabhāve mahantaṃ hanantassa cetanā tibbākārā uppajjatīti vatthussa mahantabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:934_8: Yathāvuttapaccayapariyāyepi taṃtaṃpaccayehi cetanāya balavatāya eva mahāsāvajjabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:934_10: tabbipariyāyena appasāvajjatā ca vatthussa mahattāmahattesu viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:934_11: Kilesānaṃ upakkamānaṃ dvinnañca mudutāya tibbatāya ca appasāvajjatā mahāsāvajjatāpi yojetabbā.
tika-s0201t:934_14: Pañca sambhārā hi pāṇātipātacetanāti sā pañcasambhāravinimuttā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:935_1: uttānaseyyakadārakasantake kathaṃ tassa pariggahasaññāya eva abhāvatoti āha “yattha paro”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:935_2: Paro nāma viññū vā aviññū vā atthi tassa vatthussa sāmiko.
tika-s0201t:935_3: Aviññūpi hi viññukāle yathākāmaṃ karonto adaṇḍārahoti.
tika-s0201t:935_5: vinā mantena parasantakassa kāyavacīpayogehi parikaḍḍhanaṃ tādiseniddhivasena iddhimayo payogoti adinnādāne cha payogā sāhatthikādayo vuttā.
tika-s0201t:935_6: Yathānurūpanti ettha sāhatthiko tāva pañcannampi avahārānaṃ vasena pavattati,
tika-s0201t:936_20: Sevanācitte sati payogābhāvo appamāṇaṃ yebhuyyena itthiyā sevanāpayogassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:936_21: Tathā sati puretaraṃ sevanācittassa upaṭṭhānepi tassā micchācāro na siyā,
tika-s0201t:936_23: tasmā attano ruciyā pavattitassa vasena tayo,
tika-s0201t:936_24: balakkārena pavattitassa vasena tayoti sabbepi aggahitaggahaṇena cattāro sambhārāti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:937_4: imasmiṃ pakkhe atathākārena vatthuno viññāpanapayogo musā,
tika-s0201t:937_5: taṃsamuṭṭhāpikā cetanāmusāvādoti vuttattā tato aññathā vattuṃ “aparo nayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:939_8: sammukhā payoge agāravādīnaṃ balavabhāvato siyā cetanā balavatī,
tika-s0201t:939_11: Yathā ca akkosite mate āḷahane katā khamāpanā upavādantarāyaṃ nivatteti,
tika-s0201t:939_12: evaṃ parammukhā payuttā pharusavācā hotiyevāti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0201t:939_17: Evaṃ anvayavasena cetanāpharusatāya pharusavācaṃ sādhetvā idāni tameva byatirekavasena sādhetuṃ “vacanasaṇhatāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:940_4: Yo koci pana samphappalāpo dvīhi sambhārehi sijjhati.
tika-s0201t:941_5: Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvenāti yāthāvaggāhassa abhāvena aniccādisabhāvassa niccādito gahaṇena.
tika-s0201t:941_7: Samphappalāpo viyāti iminā āsevanassa mandatāya appasāvajjataṃ,
tika-s0201t:942_1: Koṭṭhāsatoti phassapañcamakādīsu cittaṅgakoṭṭhāsesu yaṃ koṭṭhāsā honti,
tika-s0201t:943_0: Paṭipāṭiyā sattāti ettha nanu cetanā abhidhamme kammapathesu na vuttāti paṭipāṭiyā sattannaṃ kammapathabhāvo na yuttoti? Na,
tika-s0201t:943_2: Na hi tattha cetanāya akammapathattā kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:943_7: yadi cetanāya sabbadā kammapathabhāvābhāvato aniyato kammapathabhāvoti kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:943_8: nanu abhijjhādīnaṃ kammapathabhāvaṃ appattānaṃ atthitāya aniyato kammapathabhāvoti tesampi kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-s0201t:943_10: Yadi evaṃ cetanāpi tattha vattabbā siyā?
tika-s0201t:943_20: kammaṃyeva ca sugatiduggatīnaṃ tattha uppajjanakasukhadukkhānañca pathabhāvena pavattaṃ kammapathoti vuccatīti pākaṭo tassā kammapathabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:943_21: abhijjhādīnaṃ pana cetanāsamīhanabhāvena sucaritaduccaritabhāvo cetanājanitapiṭṭhivaṭṭakabhāvena sugatiduggatitaduppajjanakasukhadukkhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:943_22: pathabhāvo cāti na tathā pākaṭo kammapathabhāvoti teyeva tena sabhāvena dassetuṃ abhidhamme cetanā kammapatharāsibhāvena na vuttā,
tika-s0201t:943_23: atathājātiyakattā vā cetanā tehi saddhiṃ na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:944_0: Adinnādānaṃ sattārammaṇanti idaṃ “pañca sikkhāpadā parittārammaṇā eva vā”ti imāya pañhapucchakapāḷiyā virujjhati.
tika-s0201t:944_4: Sattārammaṇanti vā sattasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva upādāya vuttanti nāyaṃ virodho.
tika-s0201t:944_5: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “yāni sikkhāpadāni ettha sattārammaṇānīti vuttāni,
tika-s0201t:944_6: tāni yasmā sattoti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ saṅkhārameva ārammaṇaṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0201t:944_14: “Natthi sattā opapātikā”ti pavattamānāpi micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmakadhammavisayāvāti adhippāyenassā saṅkhārārammaṇatā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:944_15: Kathaṃ pana micchādiṭṭhiyā sabbe tebhūmakadhammā ārammaṇaṃ hontīti?
tika-s0201t:944_17: “Natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti hi pavattamānāya atthato rūpārupāvacaradhammāpi gahitā eva hontīti.
tika-s0201t:945_1: hāso pana tesaṃ aññavisayoti āha “sanniṭṭhāpaka…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:946_3: Upanissayapaccayaṭṭhenāti etena mūlaṭṭhena lobhassa upakārataṃ nivatteti.
tika-s0201t:946_7: nippariyāyato pana pubbe “kesañcī”ti vuttānaṃ sahajātānaṃ mūlabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:946_8: Ratto khotiādinā suttapadenapi pāṇātipātādīnaṃ akusalānaṃ lobhassa mūlakāraṇataṃ vibhāveti,
tika-s0201t:949_2: taṃ maṇati “mayi idha ṭhitāya kathamāgacchasī”ti tajjentī viya nivāretīti veramaṇī.
tika-s0201t:950_2: Saccaṃ vatvā “etena saccavajjena mayhaṃ mātu rogo sammatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0201t:953_1: sikkhāpadavibhaṅge pana cetanāpi āharitvā dīpitāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto “cetanāpi vaṭṭanti viratiyopī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:954_0: Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā kammapathakoṭṭhāsaṃ patvā anabhijjhāti vuttadhammo mūlato alobho kusalamūlaṃ hotīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:955_0: Dussīlyārammaṇā tadārammaṇā jīvitindriyādiārammaṇā kathaṃ dussīlyāni pajahantīti taṃ dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:956_2: Na hi manoduccaritato virati atthi anabhijjhādīheva tappahānasiddhito.
tika-s0201t:957_1: Ekena nayenāti vedanādivasena arūpamukheneva anekavidhesu vipassanākammaṭṭhānesu ekena kammaṭṭhānanayena.
tika-s0201t:957_3: Dasāti vā idaṃ “kusalakammapathā”ti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ “akusalakammapathā ca dasa kusalakammapathā cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:957_4: “Ṭhapetvā abhijjha”nti hi imināva akusalakammapathānaṃ navabhāvo vutto hoti.
tika-s0201t:957_5: Atha vā dasāti idaṃ ubhayathāpi sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:957_6: Abhijjhā hi pahātabbāpi sati pariññeyyataṃ nātivattatīti.
tika-s0201t:957_8: tasmā sā tāya pariññeyyatāya dukkhasaccepi saṅgahaṃ labhateva,
tika-s0201t:957_11: Abhijjhālobhānaṃ pavattiākārasiddhabhedaṃ upādāya “ime dve dhammā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:957_14: Sappaccayatāya saṅkhatasabhāve dukkhasacce gahite appaccayatāya asaṅkhataṃ nirodhasaccaṃ paṭipakkhato āvattati,
tika-s0201t:957_15: ekantasāvajje ācayagāmilakkhaṇe samudayasacce gahite sāvajjā vigamanaṃ apacayagāmilakkhaṇaṃ maggasaccaṃpaṭipakkhato
tika-s0201t:959_0: Āvattati paṭipakkhe, āvatto nāma so hāro”ti.
tika-s0201t:960_6: Kañci dhammaṃ anavakārīkaritvāti rūpavedanādīsu kañci ekadhammampi avinibbhogaṃ katvā,
tika-s0201t:960_9: So pana yasmā pañcakkhandhe niravasesato gaṇhāti,
tika-s0201t:960_13: “Yaṃ rūpaṃ taṃ aha”ntiādinā yathā diṭṭhi rūpādiṃ “ahamasmī”ti gaṇhantī pavattati,
tika-s0201t:960_14: evaṃ mānopi “seyyohamasmī”tiādināti āha “mānānusayo asmīti pavattattā diṭṭhisadiso”ti.
tika-s0201t:963_5: Paṭisandhiggahaṇato pana paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchito nikkhamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:963_11: Paṭhamacittapaṭhamairiyāpathakkhaṇesu hi te sambhavaṃ uppattiṃ esanti upagacchanti nāma,
tika-s0201t:963_12: na tāva bhūtā uppattiyā na suppatiṭṭhitattā.
tika-s0201t:963_14: Na puna bhavissantīti avadhāraṇena nivattitamatthaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:963_17: saddo cettha sampiṇḍanattho “agginā vā udakena vā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0201t:964_0: Yathāsakaṃ paccayabhāvena attabhāvassa paṭṭhapanamevetthaāhārehi kātabbaanuggahoti adhippāyenāha “vacanabhedo…pe…
tika-s0201t:964_3: Yathā “vassasataṃ tiṭṭhatī”ti vutte anuppabandhavasena pavattatīti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:964_6: Anuppabandhadhammuppattiyā sattasantāno anuggahito nāma hotīti āha “anuppannānaṃ uppādāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:965_0: Vatthugatā ojā vatthu viya tena saddhiṃ āharitabbataṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ “ajjhoharitabbato āhāro”ti.
tika-s0201t:965_1: Nibbattitaojaṃ pana sandhāya “kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharatī”ti vakkhati.
tika-s0201t:965_5: tasmā yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ parittā ojā hoti,
tika-s0201t:965_17: atha kho sukhumo icceva niṭṭhaṃ patto tato paraṃ sukhumassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:966_1: sā cassa appojamahojatāhi veditabbāti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:966_4: Na pana sakkoti pāletunti sarīraṃ yāpetuṃ nappahoti nissārattā.
tika-s0201t:966_5: Na sakkoti parissamaṃ vinodetuṃ āmāsayassa apūraṇato.
tika-s0201t:967_4: na sattassāti dassanatthaṃ manogahaṇaṃ yathā “cittassa ṭhiti,
tika-s0201t:968_0: Pubbe “āhāranti paccaya”nti vuttattā “yadi paccayaṭṭho āhāraṭṭho”tiādinā codeti.
tika-s0201t:968_1: Atha kasmā imeyeva cattāro vuttāti atha kasmā cattārova vuttā,
tika-s0201t:968_3: Visesapaccayattāti etena yathā aññe paccayadhammā attano paccayuppannassa paccayāva honti,
tika-s0201t:968_4: ime pana tathā ca honti aññathā cāti samānepi paccayatte atirekapaccayā honti,
tika-s0201t:968_6: Idāni taṃ atirekapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ “visesapaccayo hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:968_8: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “rūpārūpānaṃ upatthambhakattena upakārakā cattāro āhārā āhārapaccayo”ti.
tika-s0201t:968_9: Upatthambhakattañhi satipi janakatte arūpīnaṃ āhārānaṃ āhārajarūpasamuṭṭhāpakarūpāhārassa ca hoti,
tika-s0201t:968_10: asati pana upatthambhakatte āhārānaṃ janakattaṃ natthīti upatthambhakattaṃ padhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:968_11: Janayamānopi hi āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhayamāno eva janetīti upattambhakabhāvo eva āhārabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:968_16: “Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti pana vacanato nāmarūpassa viññāṇaṃ visesapaccayā.
tika-s0201t:968_20: api nu kho nāmarūpaṃ mātukucchismiṃ samuccissathā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:969_1: visesapaccayatāya pana ime eva āhārāti vuttāti taṃ nesaṃ visesapaccayataṃ avibhāgato dassetvā idāni vibhāgato dassetuṃ “ko panetthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:969_3: tattakenapi abbhantarassa āhārassa paccayo hoti eva.
tika-s0201t:970_0: Sabbathāpīti idhāpi phassāhāre vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:970_4: paccayo hontoyeva āhārapaccayatāya taṃ āhāretī vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:970_5: sahajātarūpesu pana vatthuno sampayuttapaccayaṃ ṭhapetvā vippayuttapaccayena,
tika-s0201t:970_7: Tānīti napuṃsakaniddeso anapuṃsakānampi napuṃsakehi saha vacanato.
tika-s0201t:971_4: Yathā tassa tassa phalassa visesato paccayatāya etesaṃ āhāraṭṭho,
tika-s0201t:971_6: Tattha taṃsampayuttataṃsamuṭṭhānadhammānanti tehi phassādīhi sampayuttadhammānañceva taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpadhammānañca.
tika-s0201t:972_0: Upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādhetīti upatthambhentoyeva rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0201t:972_4: Vijānantamevāti upapattiparikappanavasena vijānantameva āhārakiccaṃ sādhetīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:973_1: Nanu kammajādirūpaṃ kammādināva pavattatīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kammajanitopī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:973_2: Upādinnarūpasantatiyā upatthambhaneneva utucittajarūpasantatīnampi upatthambhanasiddhi hotīti “dvinnaṃ rūpasantatīna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:974_1: Ārammaṇampi hi vasati ettha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tadārammaṇā dhammāti vatthūti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:974_3: Na hi dhammānaṃ sabhāvena vinā pavatti atthi.
tika-s0201t:974_4: Vedanāpavattiyā vinā sattānaṃ sandhāvanatā natthīti āha “sukhādi…pe… hotī”ti,
tika-s0201t:974_6: tassāpi vā kāraṇabhūtavedanāpavattivaseneva ṭhitiyā hetuno abyāpitā.
tika-s0201t:974_9: tato eva “viññāṇaṃ vijānantamevāti upapattiparikappanavasena vijānantamevā”ti vuttovāyamatthoti.
tika-s0201t:975_7: Upagamanaṃ visayindriyaviññāṇesu visayaviññāṇesu eva ca saṅgativasena pavatti,
tika-s0201t:975_14: Abhinipāto tattha tattha bhave paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena nibbatti.
tika-s0201t:975_15: So bhavūpapattihetukānaṃ sabbesaṃ anatthānaṃ mūlakāraṇattā “bhaya”nti vutto.
tika-s0201t:975_16: Idāni nikantiādīnaṃ sappaṭibhayataṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “kiṃkāraṇā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:976_2: Kāyasamphassavasena hi sattānaṃ phoṭṭhabbataṇhā pavattatīti dassetuṃ phassāhārādīnavadassane phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:976_5: Sati hi phassāhāre sattānaṃ phassārammaṇe assādo, nāsatīti.
tika-s0201t:978_1: Paṭhamābhinibbatti hi sattānaṃ tattha tattha aṅgārakāsusadise bhave abhinipātasadisīti.
tika-s0201t:979_2: atha kho bhūtaṃ bhūtapubbaṃ atthaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:979_4: gacchantaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “gantvā pātheyyaṃ niṭṭhāsī”ti.
tika-s0201t:979_6: Khuppipāsāturatāya ghanacchāyaṃ rukkhaṃ upagantuṃ asamatthā viraḷhacchāyāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
tika-s0201t:979_7: Na dāni sakkā taṃ mayā kātuṃ atidubbalabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:980_12: tatthāpi adhūpitanti evaṃ heṭṭhimato uttaruttarassa paṭikūlatarabhāvakāraṇatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:980_14: Tattha nikantiṃ pariyādiyatīti ariyamaggena āhāre sāpekkhaṃ khepeti.
tika-s0201t:981_0: Sā gāvīti “seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāvī”ti evaṃ sutte vuttagāvī.
tika-s0201t:982_0: Sādhusammatāpi gati vipariṇāmasaṅkhāradukkhatāvasena kilesadukkhavasena ca mahāpariḷāhāyevāti vuttaṃ “mahāpariḷāhaṭṭhena tayo bhavā”ti.
tika-s0201t:982_4: tathā paṭipajjanto tattha nikantiṃ pariyādiyatīti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:983_5: Dukkhassa pamāṇaṃ natthi anekassa aparāparaṃ uppajjanato.
tika-s0201t:983_11: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti yathā viññāṇaṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhivasena na pavattati,
tika-s0201t:984_2: Pariññāto hotīti paricchijja jānanena samatikkanto hoti.
tika-s0201t:984_3: Rasataṇhāya hi sammadeva vigatāya rūpataṇhādayopi vigatāyeva honti.
tika-s0201t:984_4: Tathā ca sati kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ samucchinnameva hoti,
tika-s0201t:984_6: Pariññābhisamaye hi siddhe pahānābhisamayo siddho evāti.
tika-s0201t:984_7: Pahīne ca kāmarāgasaṃyojane orambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ lesopi nāvasissatīti dassento āha “natthi taṃ saṃyojana”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:984_9: Sesāhārapariññā pana arahattaniṭṭhā evāti dassento “phasse bhikkhave”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:984_10: Tattha tisso taṇhāti kāmataṇhā rūpataṇhā arūpataṇhāti imā tisso taṇhā.
tika-s0201t:985_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe purimataṇhāsamudayā āhārānaṃ samudayadassaneneva pavattikkhaṇepi upādinnakaāhārasamudayo
tika-s0201t:985_3: dassito hotīti taṃ anāmasitvā anupādinnakānaṃ taṇhāsamudayaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:985_4: Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte missitvā kathitā avisesitattā.
tika-s0201t:985_5: Sahajātataṇhāpaccayanibbattoti ettha sahajātaggahaṇaṃ asahajātataṇhāpaccayanibbattopi anupādinnakaāhāro labbhatīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0201t:985_6: So pana asahajātataṇhāpaccayanibbattatāsāmaññenapi yathāvuttaupādinnakāhārena saṃsayaṃ janeyyāti na uddhaṭo,
tika-s0201t:985_7: na ca etaṃ kāraṇaṃ “rāgaṃ upanissāya domanassaṃ uppajjatī”ti vacanato,
tika-s0201t:985_8: taṇhopanissayapaṭighacittasamuṭṭhānāya ca ojāya vasena anupādinnakaāhārassa labbhanato.
tika-s0201t:985_10: na hi paṭṭhāne katthaci rūpassa upanissayapaccayo vutto atthīti.
tika-s0201t:985_12: so tassa upanissayo”ti suttantanayassa adhippetattā yathāvuttatthasambhavato.
tika-s0201t:986_0: Kāraṇe sabbaso niruddhe phalampi sabbaso nirujjhatīti āha “āhāranirodho paññāyatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:986_1: Āhārānaṃ dukkhasaccekadesattā āhāraggahaṇaṃ dukkhasaccaggahaṇameva hotīti āha “idha cattāripi saccāni sarūpeneva vuttānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:986_3: tasmā jarāmaraṇādīsu pariññeyyādibhāvo asammohato sallakkhetabboti dassento “sabbattha asammuyhantena saccāni uddharitabbānī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:989_1: Yena yena pariyāyena byākarotīti yena yena dukkhādijarāmaraṇādipariyāyena ariyasaccāni saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca katheti.
tika-s0201t:992_2: tasmā yathā “gāmo gāmo ramaṇīyo”ti vutte ramaṇīyatāya tādisā sabbepi gāmā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0201t:992_3: evaṃ “tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ jātī”ti vutte jātisaṅkhātavikāravasena sabbepi sattā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0201t:993_12: Dantādīnaṃ vasena khaṇḍaṃ jātaṃ etassāti khaṇḍito, puggalo.
tika-s0201t:993_22: tasmā khaṇḍiccādiggahaṇaṃ jarāya kiccaniddesoti vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:993_23: Na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarāti kalalakālato pabhuti purimarūpānaṃ jarāpattakkhaṇe uppajjamānāni pacchimarūpāni
tika-s0201t:993_24: paripakkarūpānurūpāni pariṇatapariṇatāni uppajjantīti anukkamena supariṇatarūpānaṃ paripākakāle uppajjamānāni
tika-s0201t:993_26: tāni udakādimaggesu tiṇarukkhasaṃbhaggatādayo viya paripākagatamaggasaṅkhātesu paripakkarūpesu uppannāni “jarāya gato maggo”icceva vuttāni,
tika-s0201t:995_1: sā pana yasmā santānavasena pavattiyā paribyattāva hotīti “pākaṭajarā”icceva vuttā.
tika-s0201t:995_2: Avīci nirantarā jarā avīcijarā sati santāne sattānaṃ anuppabandhato.
tika-s0201t:995_3: Tato aññesūti mandadasakādīsu pubbadasakādiparicchedato aññesu yathāvuttesu.
tika-s0201t:995_4: Antarantarāti tesu eva vuttappakāresu purimadasakādito pacchimadasakādīnaṃ antarantarā.
tika-s0201t:996_3: Taṃ pana ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu cutiyā avisesato gahaṇanti āha “ekacatupañcakkhandhānaṃ sāmaññavacana”nti.
tika-s0201t:996_4: Cavanakavasenāti vā cavanakassa puggalassa vasenāti attho.
tika-s0201t:996_10: Yathā bhinnassa ghaṭassa kenaci pariyāyena ghanaghaṭabhāvena ṭhānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0201t:996_11: evaṃ bhinnānaṃ khandhānanti cavanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāmāti āha “antaradhānanti…pe…
tika-s0201t:996_15: tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “maccu maraṇa”nti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:996_16: Kālassa antakassa kiriyāti yā loke vuccati, sā cuti,
tika-s0201t:996_18: Cavanakālo eva vā anatikkamanīyattā visesena kāloti vuttoti tassa kiriyā atthato cutikkhandhānaṃ bhedappattiyeva.
tika-s0201t:997_0: Idāni nibbattitaparamatthanayeneva niddesoti dassetuṃ “paramatthena dīpetu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:997_1: “Cavanakavasenā”tiādinā hi puggalavasena ca vohārādhiṭṭhānā saṃvaṇṇanā katā.
tika-s0201t:997_2: Na kiñci kaḷevaraṃ nikkhipaki opapātikānaṃ cutikkhandhānaṃ antaradhānamevahoti,
tika-s0201t:997_5: taṃ “taṇhāsamudayā”tiādīsu vuttanayaneva sakkā viññātunti na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1000_1: Jāyanaṭṭhenātiādi āyatanavasena yonivasena ca dvīhi dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā jātiṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1000_3: sañjāyanavasena sañjātī”ti vuttattā tattha ekekeneva padena sabbasatte pariyādiyitvā jātiṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1000_4: Sampuṇṇā jāti sañjātīti katvā “sā paripuṇṇāyatanavasena yuttā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1000_5: Eteneva kevalaṃ jātisaddena vuttāya jātiyā aparipuṇṇāyatanatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1001_6: Yadipi cutikkhandhā anantarānaṃ paṭisandhikadhammānaṃ anantarādinā paccayā honti,
tika-s0201t:1001_9: Janako eva bhavoti adhippetoti dassento “jātiyā paccayabhūto kammabhavo veditabbo”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1004_2: Tattha kammabhavo “bhavati etasmā upapattibhavo”ti bhāvanaṭṭhena bhavo.
tika-s0201t:1004_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana upapattibhavaṃ “bhavatīti bhavo”ti vatvā tassa kāraṇattā kammaṃ phalūpacārena bhavoti ayamattho vutto,
tika-s0201t:1004_4: ubhayatthāpi upapattibhavahetubhāvanettha kammassa kammabhavapariyāyoti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1004_6: Kāmabhavoti vuttaṃ kāmataṇhāhetukato kāmataṇhāya ārammaṇabhāvato ca.
tika-s0201t:1004_10: rūpārūpabhavabhāvo pana tesaṃ “kāmabhavo”ti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1007_3: bhavassādavasena vā taṃtaṃsugatibhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ karontassa kāmupādānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1007_4: evaṃ ucchedādimicchābhinivesavasenāti cattāripi upādānāni yathārahaṃ tassa tassa kusalakammabhavassa upanissayavaseneva paccayā honti,
tika-s0201t:1007_10: sesaupādānāni tattha hetupaccayabhāvaṃ pahāya maggapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā sattadhāva paccayā honti.
tika-s0201t:1007_17: Kāmetīti kāmo ca so upādiyatīti upādānañcāti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1008_0: Sassato attāti idaṃ purimadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyamānaṃ uttaradiṭṭhiṃ nidassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1008_1: Yathā esā diṭṭhi daḷhīkaraṇavasena purimaṃ purimaṃ uttarā uttarā upādiyati,
tika-s0201t:1008_3: Attaggahaṇaṃ pana attavādupādānanti nayidaṃ diṭṭhupādānadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1008_4: Loko cāti attaggahaṇavinimuttagahaṇaṃ diṭṭhupādānabhūtaṃ idha purimadiṭṭhiuttaradiṭṭhivacanehi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1008_5: Sabbadiṭṭhigatassa “diṭṭhupādāna”nti etaṃ adhivacanaṃ “sabbāpi diṭṭhi diṭṭhupādāna”nti vacanato.
tika-s0201t:1009_3: Sīlabbatasahacaraṇato sīlabbatañca taṃ daḷhaggāhabhāvato upādānañcāti sīlabbatupādānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1009_4: Evaṃ suddhīti abhinivesatoti evaṃ gosīlagovatādicaraṇena saṃsārasuddhīti abhinivesabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1009_5: Etena taṃ sahacaraṇato abhinivesassa taṃsaddārahataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1011_1: Yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasneho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1011_2: Idaṃ vuccati kāmupādāna”nti vacanato taṇhādaḷhattaṃ kāmupādānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1011_3: Taṇhādaḷhattanti ca purimataṇhāupanissayapaccayato daḷhabhūtā uttarataṇhā eva.
tika-s0201t:1012_3: tasmā vuttalakkhaṇā taṇhā vuttalakkhaṇasseva upādānassa anānantarassa upanissayavasena paccayo,
tika-s0201t:1012_6: Sabbassapi hi lobhassa taṇhāpariyāyopi kāmupādānapariyāyopi labbhatevāti.
tika-s0201t:1012_9: asahajātānaṃ anantaraupanissayādivasenāti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1015_1: “Cakkhusamphasso”tiādi phassassa mātito nāmaṃ viya puttassa vatthuto tassa nissayabhāvena uppattihetuttā,
tika-s0201t:1015_2: ārammaṇaṃ pana kevalaṃ uppattihetūti vuttaṃ “seṭṭhi…pe… nāma”nti.
tika-s0201t:1015_4: Rūpaṃ assādentīti rupārammaṇaṃ taṇhābhinandanāvasena abhiramamānā eva assādentī.
tika-s0201t:1015_6: Pecca na bhavissatīti bhijjitvā na hoti puna anuppajjanato.
tika-s0201t:1015_7: Tathā saddakaṇhādayopīti yathā rūpataṇhā kāmarāgabhāvena sassatarāgavasena ucchedarāgavasenāti ca pavattiyā tisso taṇhā,
tika-s0201t:1016_2: Asmīti hotīti yadetaṃ ajjhattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ upādāya taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena samūhagāhato asmīti evaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1016_4: Itthasmīti hotīti khattiyādīsu “idaṃpakāro aha”nti evaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena hotīti idamettha anupanidhāya gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1016_19: apāhaṃ aññathā siya”nti imesaṃ taṇhāvicaritānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1016_20: Tattha evaṃsmīti idaṃ samato upanidhāya gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1016_27: tato aññathā ahaṃ hīno vā adhiko vāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1016_28: Iti imāni pubbe vuttāni dveti etāni paccuppannavasena cattāri taṇhāvicaritāni.
tika-s0201t:1016_38: Ito parāni siyantiādīni cattāri saṃsayaparivitakkavasena vuttāni,
tika-s0201t:1016_40: Apāhaṃ siyantiādīni cattāri “api nāmāhaṃ bhaveyya”nti evaṃ patthanākappanavasena vuttāni,
tika-s0201t:1017_0: Ettha ca sassatucchedavasena vuttā dve diṭṭhisīsā nāma, asmi,
tika-s0201t:1017_2: apāhaṃ siyanti ete pana cattāro suddhasīsā eva,
tika-s0201t:1017_6: dvādasa sīsamūlakāti ajjhattikassupādāya aṭṭhārassa taṇhāvicaritāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0201t:1018_6: Asmīti iminā khaggena vā chattena vā abhisekena vā “khattiyohamasmī”ti abhinivisati.
tika-s0201t:1019_1: Niddesavitthārāti tassa ca niddesassa aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritavasena vitthārena.
tika-s0201t:1019_2: Vitthārassa ca puna saṅgahatoti dvīhi ākārehi vitthāritassa aṭṭhārasataṇhāvicaritapabhedassa chaḷeva tissoyevāti ca puna saṅgahaṇato ca.
tika-s0201t:1020_8: Vejjā hi rasāyatanojāvasena tadupatthambhitavasena ca dhammārammaṇassa dāyakā.
tika-s0201t:1023_1: Cakkhusamphassajā eva vedanā atītādibhedabhinnā rāsivasena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā eko vedanākāyo yathā vedanākkhandho,
tika-s0201t:1023_2: evaṃ sotasamphassajādikāti pāḷiyaṃ “chayime āvuso vedanākāyā”ti vuttanti āha “vedanākāyāti vedanāsamūhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1023_5: tadubhayassapi saṅgaṇhantena atthavaṇṇanāya katattā āha “ayaṃ tāvettha sabbasaṅgāhikakathā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1024_5: manodvāre pana tadārammaṇavedanānaṃ manosamphasso upanissayavasena paccayo.
tika-s0201t:1024_7: Na hi paṭisandhiādivedanānaṃ kiñci dvāraṃ atthi.
tika-s0201t:1027_6: Paccayuppannena viya paccayenapi upādinnakeneva bhavitabbanti “channaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1030_2: tasmā yathā ettha arūpalokāpekkhāya chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti ekaseso icchitabbo,
tika-s0201t:1030_5: Tesaṃ matena bāhirāyatanavasenapi ekaseso veditabbo “chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1033_1: Namanalakkhaṇanti ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanasabhāvaṃ tena vinā apavattanato.
tika-s0201t:1034_2: Samūhasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ etanti “samūhatthe etaṃ sāmivacana”nti vuttaṃ tena vinā sambandhassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1034_4: Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ bhūtupādāyapabhedaṃ sabbampi sattavīsatividhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1034_12: itarassa upanissayādivasena tassa nāmassa yathārahaṃ tassa tassa viññāṇassa paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1037_2: Saṅkhāro yassa viññāṇassāti ettha aṭṭhavidhopi kāmāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhāro soḷasavidhassa kāmāvacaravipākaviññāṇassa,
tika-s0201t:1037_5: catubbidhopi āneñjābhisaṅkāro catubbidhassa arūpāvacaravipākaviññāṇassa yathārahaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu
tika-s0201t:1037_6: kammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena ca paccayo hoti.
tika-s0201t:1043_4: Dukkhasaccañcassāti vatthusaṅkhātaṃ sampayuttakhandhasaṅkhātañca dukkhasaccaṃ assa aññāṇassa.
tika-s0201t:1044_1: Idha sampayuttakhandhavaseneva vatthuto samudaye aññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1044_3: Yadipi aññāṇaṃ nirodhamagge ārammaṇaṃ na karoti,
tika-s0201t:1044_5: te pana jānitukāmassa tappaṭicchādanavasena anirodhamaggesu nirodhamaggaggāhahetutāvasena ca pavattamānaṃ “nirodhe paṭipadāyañca aññāṇa”nti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1044_9: Agādhaapatiṭṭhābhāvena taṃvisayassa ñāṇassa uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā duddasaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1044_11: Vañcanīyaṭṭhenāti vañcakabhāvena ayāthāvabhāvena upaṭṭhānato duddasattā gambhīraṃ,
tika-s0201t:1044_14: Tatthāti tasmiṃ purimasaccadvaye aniccādisabhāvalakkhaṇassa duddasattā eva niccādivipallāsavasena pavattati aññāṇanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1045_0: Idāni niddesavibhāgenapi avijjāya saccesu pavattivibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1045_9: Kiccatoti byāpanatthaṃ chādanavasena taṃ byāpetvā pavattanato.
tika-s0201t:1048_4: nanu avijjādikāva paṭiccasamuppādadesanāti codanaṃ sandhāya “ayaṃ vāro”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1048_7: Tassāpi paccayadassanavasenāti nāyaṃ kāpilānaṃ mūlapakati viya appaccayā,
tika-s0201t:1048_9: Āsavasamudayenāti atītabhave āsavānaṃ samudayena etarahi avijjāya samudayo,
tika-s0201t:1048_10: etarahi avijjāya samudayena anāgate āsavasamudayoti evaṃ āsavāvijjānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannakabhāvena
tika-s0201t:1048_11: aparāparaṃ pavattamānaṃ ādikoṭiabhāveneva tannimittassa saṃsārassa ādikoṭiabhāvato anamataggatāsiddhi
tika-s0201t:1049_2: Imamhā sammādiṭṭhisuttāti yāya ariyasāvako sammādiṭṭhi nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:1049_3: sā ariyā sammādiṭṭhi ettha vuttāti sammādiṭṭhisuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1054_6: Akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya saliṅgavacanāni (pāṇini 1.251) icchanti,
tika-s0201t:1054_14: Tena puthuatthavisayatāya evaṃ taṃ bahuvacananti “bahuke panā”tiādinā vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0201t:1054_15: Sutvāti mandhātumahārājassa ānubhāvadassanānusārena paramparāgataṃ kathaṃ sutvā.
tika-s0201t:1054_23: Dovārikabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti sudhammāya devasabhāya devapurassa ca catūsu dvāresu ārakkhāya adhikatattā.
tika-s0201t:1055_0: Pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsīti bhassitvā pathaviyā āsanne ṭhāne aṭṭhāsi,
tika-s0201t:1055_1: ṭhatvā ca nacirasseva antaradhāyi tenattabhāvena rañño cakkavattissariyassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1055_3: Devabhāvo pāturahosi devaloke pavattivipākadāyino aparāpariyāyavedanīyassa kammassa katokāsattā.
tika-s0201t:1055_4: Avayave siddho viseso samudāyassa visesako hotīti ekampi raṭṭhaṃ bahuvacanena voharīyati.
tika-s0201t:1056_2: Kammāsoti kammāsapādo vuccati uttarapadalopena yathā “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti.
tika-s0201t:1056_3: Kathaṃ pana so kammāsapādoti āha “tassa kirā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1056_4: Damitoti ettha kīdisaṃ damanaṃ adhippetanti āha “porisādabhāvato paṭisedhito”ti.
tika-s0201t:1056_6: te pana cūḷakammāsadammaṃ sandhāya tathā vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1056_7: Yakkhiniputto hi kammāsapādo alīnasattukumārakāle bodhisattena tattha damito,
tika-s0201t:1056_8: sutasomakāle pana bārāṇasirājā porisādabhāvapaṭisedhanena yattha damito,
tika-s0201t:1057_1: te uttarakuruto āgatā manussā tattha rakkhitaniyāmeneva pañca sīlāni rakkhiṃsu,
tika-s0201t:1057_3: so desadhammavasena avicchedato vattamāno kuruvattadhammoti paññāyittha,
tika-s0201t:1057_5: So aparabhāge yattha paṭhamaṃ saṃkiliṭṭho jāto,
tika-s0201t:1057_7: Yattha bhagavato vasanokāso koci vihāro na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1057_9: yathā taṃsakkesu viharati devadahaṃ nāma sakkānaṃ nigamoti imamatthaṃ dassento “avasanokāsato”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1059_1: Kasmā bhagavā imaṃ suttamabhāsīti asādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati,
tika-s0201t:1059_3: tena suttanikkhepo pucchitoti katvā itaro “kururaṭṭhavāsīna”ntiādinā aparajjhāsayoyaṃ suttanikkhepoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1059_5: Ajjhattikaṃ pana asādhāraṇañca mūlapariyāyasuttādiṭīkāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1059_6: Kururaṭṭhaṃ kira tadā tannivāsīnaṃ sattānaṃ yebhuyyena yonisomanasikāravantatāya pubbe ca katapuññatābalena utuādisampannameva ahosi.
tika-s0201t:1059_9: Keci pana “pubbe kuruvattadhammānuṭṭhānavāsanāya uttarakuru viya yebhuyyena utuādisampannameva hontaṃ
tika-s0201t:1059_10: bhagavato kāle sātisayaṃ utusappāyādiyuttaṃ taṃ raṭṭhaṃ ahosī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1059_17: dhammānupassanāvasena pañcasu ṭhānesūti evaṃ ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu.
tika-s0201t:1059_18: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvāti catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ yathā arahattaṃ pāpeti,
tika-s0201t:1059_20: Suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakasuvaṇṇamañjūsāsu pakkhittāni sumanacampakādinānāpupphāni maṇiputtādisattaratanāni ca yathā bhājanasampattiyā savisesaṃ sobhanti,
tika-s0201t:1059_22: evaṃ sīladassanādisampattiyā bhājanavisesabhūtāya kururaṭṭhavāsiparisāya desitā ca bhagavato ayaṃ desanā bhiyyosomattāya sobhati,
tika-s0201t:1059_23: kiccakārī ca hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “yathā hi puriso”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:1060_3: Vissaṭṭhaattabhāvanāti aniccādivasena kismiñci yonisomanasikāre cittaṃ aniyojetvā rūpādiārammaṇe abhirativasena vissaṭṭhacittena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0201t:1061_3: atha kho aññepi bahū maggapariyāyāti paduddhāraṃ karonto “maggassa hī”tiādi vatvā yadi maggapariyāyo ayana- saddo,
tika-s0201t:1061_4: kasmā puna maggoti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1061_6: Na hi nibbānagāmī maggo añño atthīti.
tika-s0201t:1061_12: Uddese pana satiyā eva gahaṇaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1061_13: Na dvedhāpathabhūtoti iminā imassa maggassa anekamaggatābhāvaṃ viya anibbānagāmibhāvābhāvañca dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1061_20: Seṭṭhopi loke “eko”ti vuccati “yāva pare ekato karosī”tiādīsūti āha “ekassāti seṭṭhassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1061_21: Yadi saṃsārato nissaraṇaṭṭho ayanaṭṭho aññesampi upanissayasampannānaṃ sādhāraṇo kathaṃ bhagavatoti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1062_0: Nānāmukhabhāvanānayappavattoti kāyānupassanādimukhena tatthāpi ānāpānādimukhena bhāvanānayena pavatto.
tika-s0201t:1062_10: Avibhāgena sabbepi satte hitena anukampatīti hitānukampī.
tika-s0201t:1063_4: “Sakimpi uddhaṃ gaccheyyā”tiādīsu viya “sakiṃ ayano”ti iminā byañjanena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1063_5: Evaṃ atthaṃ yojetvāti evaṃ padatthaṃ yojetvā.
tika-s0201t:1063_10: anekañcassa ayanaṃ hotīti pacchimanayassa ca paṭikkhepo.
tika-s0201t:1064_0: Imasmiṃ padeti “ekāyano ayaṃ bhikkhave maggo”ti imasmiṃ vākye,
tika-s0201t:1065_3: Evaṃ “madhuraṃ imaṃ kuhiṃ chaḍḍemā”ti achaḍḍentā ucchubhāraṃ viya paggahetvā na vicaranti.
tika-s0201t:1065_6: Ettāvatā idhādhippetatthe siddhe tasseva alaṅkāratthaṃ so pana yassa pubbabhāgamaggo,
tika-s0201t:1065_7: taṃ dassetuṃ “maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko”tiādikā gāthāpi paṭisambhidāmaggatova ānetvā ṭhapitā.
tika-s0201t:1066_0: Nibbānagamanaṭṭhenāti nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati etenāti nibbānagamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1066_11: “Abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhī”ti pana iminā sabbesampi upakkilesānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ te visuṃ uddhaṭā.
tika-s0201t:1066_12: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti vuttassa atthassa ekantikataṃ dassento “tathā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1066_14: cittavisuddhi eva panettha adhippetāti dassetuṃ “rūpamalavasena panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1066_16: atha kho idamettha āhaccabhāsitanti dassento “tathā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1067_0: Sā panāyaṃ cittavisuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anuppādāya saṃvattati,
tika-s0201t:1067_2: Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ cetaso santāpo antonijjhānaṃ soko.
tika-s0201t:1067_7: Taṃ panassa samatikkamāvahataṃ nidassanavasena dassento “ayaṃ hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1068_0: Tattha yaṃ pubbe taṃ visodhehīti atītesu khandhesu taṇhāsaṃkilesavisodhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1068_7: No ce gahessasīti na upādiyissasi ce.
tika-s0201t:1068_9: Upasanto carissasīti evaṃ addhattayagatasaṃkilesavisodhane sati nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya upasanto hutvā
tika-s0201t:1069_5: puttā vā pitā vā bandhavā vā antakena maccunā adhipannassa abhibhūtassa maraṇato tāṇāya na honti,
tika-s0201t:1069_7: Na hi ñātīnaṃ vasena maraṇato ārakkhā atthi,
tika-s0201t:1069_8: tasmā paṭācāre “ubho puttā kālakatā”tiādinā mā niratthakaṃ paridevi,
tika-s0201t:1070_0: Sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitāti yathānulomaṃ pavattitāya sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāya pariyosāne sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍite sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
tika-s0201t:1070_1: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ satipaṭṭhānamaggavasena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsīti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1070_2: Na hi catusaccakammaṭṭhānakathāya vinā sāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamo atthi.
tika-s0201t:1070_3: “Imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā”ti pana idaṃ sokavinodanavasena pavattitāya gāthāya paṭhamaṃ sutattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1070_7: Tasmāti yasmā rūpādīnaṃ aniccādito anupassanāpi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā, tasmā.
tika-s0201t:1071_0: Pañcasate coreti satasatacoraparivāre pañca core paṭipāṭiyā pesesi.
tika-s0201t:1071_1: Te araññaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ pariyesantā anukkamena therassa samīpe samāgacchiṃsu.
tika-s0201t:1071_4: Therassa hi sīlaṃ paccavekkhato suparisuddhaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjamānaṃ ūruṭṭhibhedajanitaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ vikkhambhesi.
tika-s0201t:1073_0: Pītavaṇṇāya paṭākāya pariharaṇato mallayuddhacittakatāya ca pītamallo.
tika-s0201t:1073_2: Mallā sīhaḷadīpe sakkārasammānaṃ labhantīti tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ āgamma.
tika-s0201t:1073_3: Taṃyeva aṅkusaṃ katvāti “rūpādayo ‘mamā’ti na gahetabbā”ti na tumhākavaggena pakāsitamatthaṃ attano cittamattahatthino aṅkusaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1073_5: Byākaritvāti attano vīriyārambhassa saphalatāpavedanamukhena sabrahmacārīnaṃ ussāhaṃ janento aññaṃ byākaritvā.
tika-s0201t:1073_10: Tayidaṃ me saṅkhārānaṃ accantavūpasamakāraṇanti dassento “aniccā vatā”ti gāthaṃ āhari.
tika-s0201t:1073_11: Tena idānāhaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhaṅgasaṅkhātassa rogassa abhāvena arogo parinibbutoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1074_4: Accharānaṃ nirayūpapattiṃ disvā tato pabhuti satataṃ pavattamānaṃ attano cittutrāsaṃ sandhāyāha “niccaṃ utrastamidaṃ citta”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:1075_11: Kilesesu hi nissaṭṭhesu kammavaṭṭaṃ vipākavaṭṭañca nissaṭṭhameva hotīti.
tika-s0201t:1076_1: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo,
tika-s0201t:1076_2: ariyamaggoti āha “ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1076_6: sattehi vā dukkhaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti vānanti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1076_8: na vā etasmiṃ adhigate puggalassa vānanti nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1077_0: Nanu “visuddhiyā”ti cittavisuddhiyā adhippetattā visuddhiggahaṇenevettha sokasamatikkamādayopi gahitā eva honti,
tika-s0201t:1077_1: te puna kasmā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1077_3: Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpetīti ye ye bodhaneyyapuggalā saṅkhepavitthārādivasena yathā yathā bodhetabbā,
tika-s0201t:1077_4: attano desanāvilāsena bhagavā te te tathā tathā bodhento taṃ tamatthaṃ ñāpeti.
tika-s0201t:1077_5: Taṃ taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassentoti atthāpattiṃ agaṇento taṃ taṃ atthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento.
tika-s0201t:1077_9: Yasmā anatikkantasokaparidevassa na kadāci cittavisuddhi atthi sokaparidevasamatikkamamukheneva cittavisuddhiyā ijjhanato,
tika-s0201t:1077_11: Yasmā pana domanassapaccayehi dukkhadhammehi puṭṭhaṃ puthujjanaṃ sokādayo abhibhavanti,
tika-s0201t:1077_12: pariññātesu ca tesu te na honti,
tika-s0201t:1077_16: Sacchikiriyābhisamayasahabhāvīpi itarābhisamayo tadavinābhāvato sacchikiriyābhisamayahetuko viya vutto “ñāyassādhigamo nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1077_17: Phalañāṇena vā paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1078_2: atha kho aññatthāpi satthā akāsiyevāti dassento “yatheva hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1078_10: Seṭṭhacariyabhāvato sāsana brahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca vo pakāsessāmīti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
tika-s0201t:1078_19: Na saṃkīyantīti idānipi tehi na apanīyanti.
tika-s0201t:1078_20: Na saṃkīyissantīti anāgatepi tehi na apanīyissanti.
tika-s0201t:1079_12: Pavāḷanti pallavopi vuccatīti rattajambunadādipadehi te visesitā.
tika-s0201t:1080_1: kāyavedanācittavimuttassa tebhūmakadhammassa visuṃ vipallāsavatthantarabhāvena gahitattā ca heṭṭhāgahaṇesu
tika-s0201t:1080_3: pañcamassa pana vipallāsavatthuno abhāvā “na uddha”nti āha.
tika-s0201t:1080_6: na idha pāḷiyaṃ vuttassa satipaṭṭhānasaddassa atthadassananti.
tika-s0201t:1080_10: manasikārasamudayā dhammānaṃ samudayo”ti satipaṭṭhānāti vuttānaṃ satigocarānaṃ pakāsake suttapadese saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1080_14: Dānādīni satiyā karontassa rūpādīni kasiṇādīni ca satiyā ṭhānaṃ hontīti taṃnivāraṇatthamāha “padhānaṃ ṭhāna”nti. Pa-
tika-s0201t:1080_15: saddo hi idha “paṇītā dhammā”tiādīsu viya padhānatthadīpakoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1082_4: satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya “idaṃ vo hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāyā’ti.
tika-s0201t:1082_12: anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1083_4: Tassa ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti…pe… vattanti.
tika-s0201t:1083_6: na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā vattanti. Tatra,
tika-s0201t:1083_12: Anattamanatañca attamanatañca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhato viharati sato sampajāno.
tika-s0201t:1085_2: Buddhānaṃyeva hi niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti āveṇikadhammabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1085_5: ārambho ca pavattīti katvā āha “pavattayitabbatoti attho”ti.
tika-s0201t:1085_6: Satiyā karaṇabhūtāya paṭṭhānaṃ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Ana-
tika-s0201t:1086_2: saddo bhūsatthavisiṭṭhaṃ pakkhandhanaṃ dīpetīti “okkantitvā pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1087_0: Yadi evanti yadi sati eva satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1087_7: teneva niyyānikabhāvena ekattupagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0201t:1087_8: atthikehi ca tadatthaṃ maggīyatīti attanāva pubbe vuttaṃ paccāharati “vuttañceta”nti.
tika-s0201t:1087_9: Tattha catassopi cetāti kāyānupassanādivasena catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo.
tika-s0201t:1087_11: Kiccaṃ sādhayamānāti pubbabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu subhasaññādividhamanena visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe
tika-s0201t:1087_12: sakiṃyeva tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0201t:1087_15: Evañca satīti maggaṭṭhena ekattaṃ upādāya “maggo”ti ekavacanena ārammaṇabhedena catubbidhataṃ upādāya “cattāro”ti ca vattabbatāya sativijjamānattā.
tika-s0201t:1087_18: Vuttamevatthaṃ nidassanena paṭipādetuṃ “mārasenappamaddana”nti suttapadaṃ ānetvā “yathā”tiādinā nidassanaṃ saṃsandeti.
tika-s0201t:1088_0: Visesato kāyo ca vedanā ca assādassakāraṇanti tappahānatthaṃ tesu taṇhāvatthūsu oḷārikasukhumesu asubhadukkhabhāvadassanāni
tika-s0201t:1088_1: mandatikkhapaññehi taṇhācaritehi sukarānīti tāni tesaṃ “visuddhimaggo”ti vuttāni tathā “niccaṃ attā”ti
tika-s0201t:1088_2: abhinivesavatthutāya diṭṭhiyā visesakāraṇesu cittadhammesu aniccānattatādassanāni sarāgādivasena saññāphassādivasena
tika-s0201t:1088_3: nīvaraṇādivasena ca nātippabhedaatippabhedagatesu tesu tappahānatthaṃ mandatikkhapaññānaṃ diṭṭhicaritānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1088_5: Ettha ca yathā cittadhammānampi taṇhāya vatthubhāvo sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:1088_6: tathā kāyavedanānampi diṭṭhiyāti satipi nesaṃ catunnampi taṇhādiṭṭhiyā vatthubhāve yo yassa sātisayapaccayo,
tika-s0201t:1088_8: Tikkhapaññasamathayāniko oḷārikārammaṇaṃ pariggaṇhanto tattha aṭṭhatvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya vedanaṃ pariggaṇhātīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1088_10: Vipassanāyānikassa pana sukhume citte dhammesu ca cittaṃ pakkhandatīti cittadhammānupassanānaṃ mandatikkhapaññāvipassanāyānikānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1089_3: Pañca kāmaguṇā savisesā kāye labbhantīti visesena kāyo kāmoghassa vatthu,
tika-s0201t:1089_4: bhavesu sukhaggahaṇavasena bhavassādo hoti bhavoghassa vedanā vatthu,
tika-s0201t:1089_5: santatighanagahaṇavasena visesato citte attābhiniveso hotīti diṭṭhoghassa cittaṃ vatthu,
tika-s0201t:1089_6: dhammesu vinibbhogassa dukkarattā dhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya duppaṭivijjhattā sammoho hotīti avijjoghassa dhammā vatthu,
tika-s0201t:1090_2: dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhabhūtā vedanā visesena byāpādakāyaganthassa vatthu,
tika-s0201t:1090_3: citte niccaggahaṇavasena sassatassa attano sīlena suddhītiādi parāmasanaṃ hotīti sīlabbataparāmāsassa cittaṃ vatthu,
tika-s0201t:1090_4: nāmarūpaparicchedena bhūtaṃ bhūtato apassantassa bhavavibhavadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto idaṃsaccābhiniveso hotīti tassa dhammā vatthu,
tika-s0201t:1090_5: sukhavedanāssādavasena paralokanirapekkho “natthi dinna”ntiādikaṃ parāmāsaṃ uppādetīti diṭṭhupādānassa
tika-s0201t:1090_6: vedanā vatthu santatighanagahaṇavasena sarāgādicitte sammoho hotīti mohāgatiyā cittaṃ vatthu,
tika-s0201t:1090_7: dhammasabhāvānavabodhena bhayaṃ hotīti bhayāgatiyā dhammā vatthu.
tika-s0201t:1090_10: Tathā hi oghesu vuttanayā eva yogāsavesupi yojanā atthato abhinnattā.
tika-s0201t:1090_11: Tathā paṭhamoghatatiyacatutthaganthayojanāya vuttanayā eva kāyacittadhammānaṃ itarūpādānavatthutā yojanā,
tika-s0201t:1090_12: tathā kāmoghabyāpādakāyaganthayojanāya vuttanayā eva kāyavedanānaṃ chandadosāgati vatthutā yojanā vā.
tika-s0201t:1091_4: kāyādiparijānanena pariññātā hontīti āha “catubbidhāhārapariññattha”nti pakaraṇanayoti nettipakaraṇavasena
tika-s0201t:1092_1: Saranti gacchanti nibbānaṃ etāyāti satīti imasmiṃ atthe ekatte ekasabhāve nibbāne samosaraṇaṃ samāgamo ekattasamosaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1092_3: Ekanibbānapavesahetubhūtā vā samānatā eko satipaṭṭhānassa bhāvo ekattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1092_6: Etasmiṃ atthe saraṇekattasamosaraṇāni saheva satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇatthena vuttānīti daṭṭhabbāni,
tika-s0201t:1092_8: Saraṇavasenāti vā “gamanavasenā”ti atthe sati tadeva gamanaṃ samosaraṇanti,
tika-s0201t:1092_9: samosaraṇe vā satisaddatthavasena avuccamāne dhāraṇatāva satīti satisaddatthantarābhāvā purimaṃ satibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1092_10: pacchimaṃ ekabhāvassāti nibbānasamosaraṇepi sahitāneva tāni satipaṭṭhānekabhāvassa kāraṇāni vuttāni honti.
tika-s0201t:1092_14: pañcavidhenāti idaṃ upari pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ ānāpānapabbādīnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1092_15: tesaṃ pana antarabhedavasena tadanugatabhedavasena ca bhāvanāya anekavidhatā labbhatiyeva.
tika-s0201t:1093_2: caratha sake pettike visaye”tiādivacanato bhikkhugocarā ete dhammā,
tika-s0201t:1093_7: Satthu cariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanasampaṭiggāhakattā ca sabbappakārāya anusāsaniyā bhājanabhāvo.
tika-s0201t:1094_0: Samaṃ careyyāti kāyādivisamacariyaṃ pahāya kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya.
tika-s0201t:1094_6: Ariyabhāve ṭhito so evarūpo bāhitapāpasamitapāpabhinnakilesatāhi brāhmaṇo samaṇo bhikkhūti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1095_1: “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”tiādīsu nāmakāyo kāyoti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “kāyeti rūpakāye”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1096_0: Asammissatoti “vedanādayopi ettha sitā ettha paṭibaddhā”ti kāye vedanādianupassanāpasaṅgepi āpanne tato asammissatoti attho.
tika-s0201t:1096_3: tathā ārammaṇādivibhāgena anekabhedabhinnampi cittaṃ cittabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “citte”ti ekavacanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1096_4: vedanā pana sukhādibhedabhinnā visuṃ visuṃ anupassitabbāti dassentena “vedanāsū”ti bahuvacanena vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1096_6: dhammā ca paropaṇṇāsabhedā anupassitabbākārena ca anekabhedā evāti tepi bahuvacanavaseneva vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1096_11: kesādike ca bhūtupādāyarūpehi vinibbhujjanto “tathā na kāye”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1096_13: nagaraṃ nāma koci attho atthīti pana kesañci samaññātidhāvanaṃ siyāti itthipurisādisamaññātidhāvane nagaranidassanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1096_15: kesalomādisamūho bhūtupādāyasamūho ca yathāvuttasamūhe tabbinimutto kāyopi nāma koci natthi,
tika-s0201t:1097_4: purisaṃ passāmī”ti pana pavattasaññāya vasena “yaṃ passatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1097_7: taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ na hotīti attho viparītaggāhavasena micchāparikappitarūpattā.
tika-s0201t:1097_8: Atha vā taṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ na hoti acakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyattā,
tika-s0201t:1097_10: Yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ taṃ na passatīti yaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ kesādibhūtupādāyasamūhasaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1097_11: taṃ paññācakkhunā bhūtato na passatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1097_12: Apassaṃ bajjhateti imaṃ attabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paññācakkhunā apassanto “etaṃ mama,
tika-s0201t:1098_2: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotītiādinā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
tika-s0201t:1098_4: lakkhaṇapathavimeva vā anekappabhedaṃ sakalasarīragataṃ pubbāpariyabhāvena ca pavattamānaṃ samūhavasena gahetvā “kāyo”ti vadati.
tika-s0201t:1099_0: Evaṃ gahetabbassāti “ahaṃ mama”nti evaṃ attattaniyabhāvena andhabālehi gahetabbassa.
tika-s0201t:1099_1: Idāni sattannaṃ anupassanākārānampi vasena kāyānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1099_3: evaṃ passanto evaṃ cassa aniccākārampi anupassatīti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1099_4: Tathābhūtassa cassa niccaggāhassa lesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ “no niccato”ti tathāhesa “niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1099_6: kāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “no niccato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1099_7: Na cettha dukkhato anupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ paṭiyogīnivattanaparattā eva- kārassa,
tika-s0201t:1100_2: aniccassa dukkhattā tameva kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati,
tika-s0201t:1100_4: Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā,
tika-s0201t:1100_9: So evaṃ arajjanto rāgaṃ nirodheti no samudeti,
tika-s0201t:1100_11: Evaṃ paṭipanno ca paṭinissajjati no ādiyati.
tika-s0201t:1100_12: Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ kāyatannissayakhandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato,
tika-s0201t:1100_13: saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato “pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cā”ti vuccati,
tika-s0201t:1100_14: tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati,
tika-s0201t:1100_16: tathābhūto ca nibbattanavasena kilese na ādiyati,
tika-s0201t:1100_19: Idānissa tāhi anupassanāhi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1100_20: taṃ dassetuṃ “so taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1101_0: Viharatīti iminā kāyānupassanāsamaṅgino iriyāpathavihāro vuttoti āha “iriyatī”ti iriyāpathaṃ pavattetīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1101_3: Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātāpa-
tika-s0201t:1101_4: saddo pana vīriyeyeva niruḷhoti vuttaṃ “vīriyassetaṃ nāma”nti.
tika-s0201t:1101_5: Atha vā paṭipakkhapahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati,
tika-s0201t:1101_8: atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti. Sammā,
tika-s0201t:1101_13: uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā sayaṃ pajānantoti attho.
tika-s0201t:1101_16: Sabbatthikanti sabbattha bhavaṃ sabbattha līne uddhate ca citte icchitabbattā,
tika-s0201t:1101_17: sabbe vā līne uddhate ca bhāvetabbā bojjhaṅgā atthikā etāyāti sabbatthikā.
tika-s0201t:1101_18: Satiyā laddhūpakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte kāye kammaṭṭhāniko bhikkhu kāyānupassī viharati.
tika-s0201t:1101_21: Upāyapariggaheti ettha sīlavisodhanādi gaṇanādi uggahakosallādi ca upāyo,
tika-s0201t:1101_23: Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassati yathāvuttaupāyaṃ na pariccajati,
tika-s0201t:1101_27: Tenāti upāyānupāyānaṃ pariggahaparivajjanesu apariccāgāpariggahesu ca asamatthabhāvena assa yogino.
tika-s0201t:1102_1: tasmāssa sampayuttā dhammā vīriyādayo aṅganti āha “sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā”ti. Aṅga-
tika-s0201t:1102_3: satiggahaṇeneva cettha samādhissati gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0201t:1102_5: Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1102_8: tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya sampayogaṅgadassanatāti aṅga-
tika-s0201t:1102_13: tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento “tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1103_0: Avisesena dvīhipi nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vuttanti katvā puna ekekena vuttaṃ pahānavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “visesenā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1103_1: Atha vā “vineyya nīvaraṇānī”ti avatvā abhijjhādomanassavacanassa payojanaṃ dassento “visesenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1103_2: Kāyānupassanābhāvanāya hi ujuvipaccanīkānaṃ anurodhādīnaṃ pahānaṃ dassanaṃ etassa payojananti.
tika-s0201t:1104_1: Sabbatthikakammaṭṭhānanti buddhānussati mettā maraṇassati asubhabhāvanā ca.
tika-s0201t:1104_2: Idañhi catukkaṃ yoginā parihariyamānaṃ “sabbatthikakammaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati atisampajaññabalena avicchinnassa tassa pariharitabbattā,
tika-s0201t:1104_3: satiyā vā samatho vutto tassā samāddhikkhandhena saṅgahitattā.
tika-s0201t:1105_0: Tenāti saddatthaṃ anādiyitvā bhāvatthasseva vibhajanavasena pavattena vibhaṅgapāṭhena saha.
tika-s0201t:1105_1: Aṭṭhakathānayoti saddatthassapi vivaraṇavasena yathārahaṃ vutto atthasaṃvaṇṇanānayo.
tika-s0201t:1105_2: Yathā saṃsandatīti yathā atthato adhippāyato ca avilomento aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti,
tika-s0201t:1106_0: Vedanādīnaṃ puna vacaneti ettha nissayapaccayabhāvavasena cittadhammānaṃ vedanāsannissitattā pañcavokārabhave
tika-s0201t:1106_1: arūpadhammānaṃ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttito ca vedanāya kāyādianupassanāpasaṅgepi āpanne tadasammissato vavatthānadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1106_5: atha kho vedanānupassīyevāti vedanāsaṅkhāte vatthusmiṃ vedanānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1106_7: na tasmiṃ samaye dukkhā adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā.
tika-s0201t:1106_8: Yasmiṃ vā pana samaye dukkhā adukkhamasukhā vā vedanā,
tika-s0201t:1106_9: na tasmiṃ samaye itarā vedanā”ti vedanābhāvasāmaññe aṭṭhatvā taṃ taṃ vedanaṃ vinibbhujitvā dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dhuvabhāvaviveko dassito hoti.
tika-s0201t:1106_10: Tena tāsaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānadassanena aniccatāya tato eva dukkhatāya anattatāya ca dassanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1106_16: yathā nāma bālo amaṇisabhāvepi udakabubbuḷake maṇiākārānupassī hoti,
tika-s0201t:1106_19: atha kho khaṇabhaṅguratāya avasavattitāya kilesāsucipaggharaṇatāya ca aniccaanattaasubhākārānupassī,
tika-s0201t:1106_20: vipariṇāmadukkhatāya saṅkhāradukkhatāya ca visesato dukkhānupassīyevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1106_21: Evaṃ cittadhammesupi yathārahaṃ puna vacane payojanaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1106_23: Esa nayoti iminā yathā cittaṃ dhammā ca anupassitabbā,
tika-s0201t:1107_0: Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addāti yo bhikkhu sukhavedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya “dukkha”nti paññācakkhunā addakkhi.
tika-s0201t:1107_1: Dukkhamaddakkhi sallatoti dukkhavedanaṃ pīḷājananato antotudanato dunnīharaṇato ca sallanti addakkhi passi.
tika-s0201t:1107_3: Santanti sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikatāya paccayavasena vūpasantasabhāvatāya ca santaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1107_4: Aniccatoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato tāvakālikatoniccapaṭikkhepato ca “anicca”nti yo addakkhi.
tika-s0201t:1107_5: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu ekaṃsena paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya sammā passanakoti attho.
tika-s0201t:1108_1: Sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti sabbaṃ taṃ vedayitaṃ dukkhasmiṃ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannaṃ vadāmi saṅkhāradukkhatānativattanato.
tika-s0201t:1108_2: Sukhadukkhatopi cāti sukhādīnaṃ ṭhitivipariṇāmaññāṇasukhatāya vipariṇāmaṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca vuttattā tissopi sukhato,
tika-s0201t:1108_3: tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho. Rūpādi-
tika-s0201t:1108_13: “Kāmañcetthā”tiādinā pubbe pahīnattā puna pahānaṃ na vattabbanti codanaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:1108_14: maggacittakkhaṇe vā ekattha pahīnaṃ sabbattha pahīnameva hotīti visuṃ visuṃ na vattabbanti.
tika-s0201t:1108_17: Lokiyabhāvanāya hi kāye pahīnaṃ na vedanādīsu pahīnaṃ hoti yadipi na pavatteyya,
tika-s0201t:1108_18: na paṭipakkhabhāvanāya tattha sā abhijjhādomanassassa appavatti hotīti puna tappahānaṃ vattabbamevāti.
tika-s0201t:1108_19: Ekattha pahīnaṃ sesesupi pahīnaṃ hotīti maggasatipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1108_20: lokiyabhāvanāya vā sabbattha appavattimattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1108_21: “Pañcapi khandhā loko”ti hi vibhaṅge catūsupi ṭhānesu vuttanti.
tika-s0201t:1112_1: Bāhirakesupi ito ekadesassa sambhavato sabbappakāraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ “sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1112_2: Tena ye ime ānāpānapabbādivasena āgatā cuddasappakārā,
tika-s0201t:1112_10: Tattha tathābhāvapaṭisedhanoti sabbappakārakāyānupassanānibbattakassa puggalassa aññasāsanassa nissayabhāvapaṭisedhano.
tika-s0201t:1112_18: Parappavādāti paresaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ nānappakārā vādā titthāyatanāni.
tika-s0201t:1113_2: Dohanakāle yathā thanehi anavasesato khīraṃ na paggharati,
tika-s0201t:1114_1: Satiyāti sammadeva kammaṭṭhānassa sallakkhaṇavasena pavattāya satiyā.
tika-s0201t:1115_3: aññena kammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa ca padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1115_5: Bhikkhu dīpisadiso araññe ekākī viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanena icchitatthasādhanato.
tika-s0201t:1116_3: tathābhūto vā hutvā tisso sikkhā pavattayato.
tika-s0201t:1116_9: Añño satto vā puggalo vā natthīti visuddhadiṭṭhi “tayidaṃ dhammamattaṃ na ahetukaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1116_11: atha kho avijjādīhi eva sahetuka”nti addhattayepi kaṅkhāvitaraṇena vitiṇṇakaṅkho “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā
tika-s0201t:1116_12: kalāpasammasanavasena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā udayabbayānupassanādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento anukkamena
tika-s0201t:1117_0: Parassa vā assāsapassāsakāyeti idaṃ sammasanacāravasenāyaṃ pāḷi pavattāti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1117_1: samathavasena pana parassa assāsapassāsakāye appanānimittuppatti eva natthīti.
tika-s0201t:1117_3: bahiddhā”ti ca vuttaṃ idaṃ dhammadvayaghaṭitaṃ ekato ārammaṇabhāvena na labbhati.
tika-s0201t:1118_4: Taṃ pana samudayadhammaṃ upamāmukhena dassento “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1118_9: evaṃ tepi assāsapassāsakāyasambandhino hetubhāvenāti “samudayadhammā kāyasmi”nti vattabbataṃ labhantīti vuttaṃ “samudaya…pe…
tika-s0201t:1118_12: saddo “jātidhammāna”ntiādīsu viyāti kāyassa paccayasamavāye uppajjanapakatikānupassī “samudayadhammānupassī”ti vutto. Tenāha –
