tika-s0201t:1118_14: Evañca katvā kāyasminti bhummavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1118_15: Vayadhammānupassīti ettha ahetukattepi vināsassa yesaṃ hetudhammānaṃ abhāve yaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1118_16: tadabhāvo tassa abhāvassa hotu viya voharīyatīti upacārato karajakāyādiabhāvo assāsapassāsakāyassa vayakāraṇaṃ vutto.
tika-s0201t:1118_19: Dutiyavikappavasena pana upacārena vināyeva attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1118_20: Ajjhattabahiddhānupassanā viya bhinnavatthuvisayatāya samudayavayadhammānupassanāpi ekakāle na labbhatīti
tika-s0201t:1119_1: saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti “kāyova atthī”ti vatvā avadhāraṇena nivatthitaṃ dassento “na satto”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1119_5: Tassa sattanikāyassa pūraṇato ca cavanupapajjanadhammatāya galanato ca “puggalo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1119_14: kevalaṃ kāyo eva atthīti attattaniyasuññatameva kāyassa vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1119_18: Imassa hi vuttanayena “atthi kāyo”ti aparāparuppattivasena paccupaṭṭhitā sati bhiyyoso mattāya tattha ñāṇassa satiyā ca paribrūhanāya hoti.
tika-s0201t:1120_2: Tathābhūto ca loke kiñci “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahetabbaṃ na passati,
tika-s0201t:1120_6: saddo heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhassa tādisassa atthassa abhāvato avuttasamuccayatthoti dassento “upari atthaṃ upādāyā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1120_7: “Eva”nti pana niddiṭṭhākārassa paccāmasanaṃ nigamanavasena katanti āha “iminā pana…pe…
tika-s0201t:1120_11: tassa samuṭṭhāpikā taṇhā tassāpi samuṭṭhāpikā eva nāma hoti tadabhāve abhāvatoti āha “tassā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1123_5: Gacchanto vā hi satto kāyena kattabbakiriyaṃ kareyya ṭhito vā nisinno vā nipanno vāti.
tika-s0201t:1123_11: Gacchanto vātiādi gamanādimattajānanassa gamanādigatavisesajānanassa ca sādhāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1123_13: gamanādigatavisesajānanaṃ pana adhippetanti taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tattha kāma”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1123_14: Sattūpaladdhinti satto atthīti upaladdhiṃ sattaggāhaṃ na jahati na pariccajati “ahaṃ gacchāmi,
tika-s0201t:1123_16: Tato eva attasaññaṃ “atthi attā kārako vedako”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ na ugghāṭeti nāpaneti apaṭipakkhabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1123_18: Evaṃ bhūtassa cassa kuto kammaṭṭhānādibhāvoti āha “kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1123_20: Tameva hi atthaṃ vivarituṃ “idaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1123_24: Kiṃkāraṇāti pana paṭikkhittakattukāya gamanakiriyāya aviparītakāraṇapucchā “gamananti attā manasā saṃyujjati,
tika-s0201t:1124_0: Na koci satto vā puggalo vā gacchati dhammamattasseva gamanasiddhito tabbinimuttassa ca kassaci abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1124_2: Tattha cittakiriyā ca sā vāyodhātuyā vipphāro vipphandanañcāti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāro, tena.
tika-s0201t:1124_6: “Gacchatī”ti vatvā yathā pavattamāne kāye “gacchatī”ti vohāro hoti,
tika-s0201t:1125_0: “Eseva nayo”ti atidesavasena saṅkhepato vatvā tamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “tatrāpi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1126_0: Evaṃ pajānatoti evaṃ cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva gamanādibhāvo hotīti pajānato tassa evaṃ pajānanāya
tika-s0201t:1126_1: nicchayagamanatthaṃ “evaṃ hotī”ti vicāraṇā vuccati loke yathābhūtaṃ ajānantehi micchābhinivesavasena,
tika-s0201t:1126_3: Atthi panāti attano eva vīmaṃsanavasena pucchāvacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1127_0: Nāvā mālutavegenāti yathā acetanā nāvā vātavegena desantaraṃ yāti,
tika-s0201t:1127_1: yathā ca acetano tejanaṃ kaṇḍo jiyāvegena desantaraṃ yāti,
tika-s0201t:1127_2: tathā acetano kāyo vātāhato yathāvuttavāyunā nīto desantaraṃ yātīti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1127_3: Sace pana koci vadeyya “yathā nāvāya tejanassa ca pellakassa purisassa vasena desantaragamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1127_6: Yathā hi nāvā tejanānaṃ saṃhatalakkhaṇasseva purisassa vasena gamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1128_0: Tattha payuttanti heṭṭhā vuttanayena gamanādikiriyāvasena payojitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1128_8: Vajeti vajeyya gaccheyya ko nāmāti sambandho.
tika-s0201t:1128_10: saddoti hetupaccayavirahena ṭhānagamanapaṭikkhepamukhena sabbāyapi dhammappavattiyā paccayādhīnavuttitāvibhāvanena
tika-s0201t:1129_0: Paṇihitoti yathā yathā paccayehi pakārato nihito ṭhapito.
tika-s0201t:1129_2: pubbe visuṃ visuṃ iriyāpathānaṃ vuttattā idaṃ tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vacananti attho.
tika-s0201t:1129_3: Purimanayo vā iriyāpathappadhāno vuttoti tattha kāyo appadhāno anunipphādīti idha kāyaṃ padhānaṃ appadhānañca
tika-s0201t:1129_4: iriyāpathaṃ anunipphādaṃ katvā dassetuṃ dutiyanayo vuttoti evampettha dvinnaṃ nayānaṃ viseso veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1130_0: Iriyāpathapariggaṇhanampi iriyāpathavato kāyasseva pariggaṇhanaṃ tassa avatthāvisesabhāvatoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0201t:1130_5: saddena yathā “taṇhāsamudayā kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā”ti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rupakkhandhassa
tika-s0201t:1130_6: udayaṃ passatīti ime cattāro āhārā saṅgayhanti,
tika-s0201t:1130_7: evaṃ “avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhā”tiādayopi pañca ākārā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1133_8: Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ paṭikkantanti āha “paṭikkantaṃ vuccati nivattana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1134_1: tena attanā kātabbassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti āha “sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1134_3: Sampajaññaṃ karotevāti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti eva.
tika-s0201t:1134_4: Sampajānassa vā kāro etassa atthīti sampajānakārī.
tika-s0201t:1134_5: Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena saha atthena pavattatīti sātthakaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1134_8: Sappāyassa attano upakārāvahassa hitassa sampajānanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare,
tika-s0201t:1134_9: aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1135_1: Attho nāma dhammato vaḍḍhīti yaṃ sātthakanti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1135_2: taṃ sappāyamevāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1135_6: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1136_1: ananuvattanakathā pana tassā dutiyā nāma hotīti āha “dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1137_2: Yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti vuccatīti āha “kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara”nti.
tika-s0201t:1137_7: Na paccāharatīti āhārūpabhogato yāva divāṭṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paṭineti.
tika-s0201t:1138_1: Dve tayo pallaṅketi dve tayo nisajjāvāre,
tika-s0201t:1138_8: “Paribhogacetiyato sarīracetiyaṃ garutara”nti katvā “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1138_9: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā bodhisākhā haritabbā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1139_0: Janasaṅgahatthanti “mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī”ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahatthaṃ. Tasmāti.
tika-s0201t:1139_2: yasmā ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā.
tika-s0201t:1141_5: yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati,
tika-s0201t:1141_6: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti evaṃ vutta pañcavidhacetokhilavinibandhacitto.
tika-s0201t:1142_4: Atha vā viññūnaṃ nibbisesattā attabhāvapariyāpannattā ca attā nāma dhammo,
tika-s0201t:1142_9: Soyeva nayoti “ayaṃ bhikkhū”tiādiko yo ṭhāne vutto,
tika-s0201t:1143_0: Bahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmīti amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena cha vassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ evāhaṃ yathāsatti pūjessāmīti.
tika-s0201t:1144_0: Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito ca anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha “vīthiyo sallakkhetvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1145_3: Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca tajjaṃ puññañāṇasambharaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1145_6: itaresaṃ atītāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭasannissayavasena nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1145_7: Bāhiyo dārucīriyoti bahi visaye sañjātasaṃvaḍḍhatāya bāhiyo,
tika-s0201t:1146_1: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute… mute…
tika-s0201t:1147_2: Attā abhikkamatīti iminā andhaputhujjanassa diṭṭhiggāhavasena abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0201t:1147_4: tadubhayaṃ pana taṇhāya vinā na hotīti taṇhāggāhavasenapi sammuyhanaṃ dassitameva hoti.
tika-s0201t:1147_5: “Tathā asammuyhanto”ti vatvā taṃ asammuyhanaṃ yena ghanavinibbhogena hoti,
tika-s0201t:1147_7: Tattha yasmā vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo.
tika-s0201t:1147_8: Uddharaṇagatikā hi tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1147_12: Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo.
tika-s0201t:1147_13: Tiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1147_21: ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā purato haraṇaṃ atiharaṇaṃ khāṇuādipariharaṇatthaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1147_25: tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇanti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0201t:1148_0: Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjanassa paccayo.
tika-s0201t:1148_1: Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātūti vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1148_5: Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo,
tika-s0201t:1148_6: patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1148_7: tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirumbhanassa sijjhanato tatthāpi pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuanugatabhāvo,
tika-s0201t:1148_10: tesu vā vuttesu uddharaṇādīsu chasu koṭṭhāsesu.
tika-s0201t:1148_13: taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā arūpadhammā ca atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0201t:1148_19: Atiittaro hi rūpadhammānampi pavattikkhaṇo gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1148_21: Yathā tilānaṃ bhajjiyamānānaṃ paṭapaṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati,
tika-s0201t:1149_0: Saddhiṃ rūpenāti idaṃ tassa tassa cittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakarūpadhammānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1149_9: Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāvento eva uppajjantīti
tika-s0201t:1149_12: evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanivatti soḷasahi cittehi hotīti taṅkhaṇāyukatā tesaṃ icchitā,
tika-s0201t:1149_18: pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva,
tika-s0201t:1150_1: aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1150_3: taṃ pana nirujjhantaṃ aparassa anantarādipaccayabhāveneva nirujjhatīti tato laddhapaccayaṃ aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1150_4: Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ antaro labbheyyāti noti āha “avīcimanusambandho”ti,
tika-s0201t:1150_7: evaṃ anu anu sambandho cittasantāno rūpasantāno ca nadīsotova nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya vattati.
tika-s0201t:1151_1: Yasmā yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati vā,
tika-s0201t:1151_3: tasmā tadanugataṃ vidisālokanaṃ vilokitanti āha “vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1151_6: pacchato āgacchantaparissayassa parivajjanādīsu apalokitassa siyā sambhavoti āha “iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1152_2: So hi āyasmā vipassanākāle eva “yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto,
tika-s0201t:1152_7: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
tika-s0201t:1153_0: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca ālokitavilokitassa veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1153_3: khandhādikammaṭṭhānā añño upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1153_5: tasmā tassa yāthāvato jānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ “abbhantare”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1154_1: na hotī”ti idaṃ pañcadvāraviññāṇavīthiyaṃ “itthī puriso”ti rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1154_2: Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobho,
tika-s0201t:1154_8: Āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1154_9: Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesūti heṭṭhimassa uparimassa ca aparāparaṃ bhaṅgappattimāha.
tika-s0201t:1155_1: Tatthāti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokane paññāyamāne tabbinimutto ko eko āloketi,
tika-s0201t:1156_0: Maṇisappo nāma ekā sappajātīti vadanti. Laḷananti kampananti vadanti, līḷākaraṇaṃ vā laḷanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1157_1: Sīlassa vidūsanena ahitāvahattā micchājīvavasena uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1157_2: Cīvarampi acetanantiādinā cīvarassa viya “kāyopi acetano”ti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena “abbhantare”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1158_1: Pathavīsandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātunāva āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha “vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1158_8: Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasaṃcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu karoti,
tika-s0201t:1158_9: na kevalāti tāni pathavīdhātuyāpi kiccabhāvena vuttāni.
tika-s0201t:1158_10: Allattañca anupāletīti vāyuādīhi atisosanaṃ yathā na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1158_11: tathā anupāleti allaādīhi atisosanaṃ yathā na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1158_14: Sā hi anto paviṭṭhaṃ āhāraṃ paripāceti.
tika-s0201t:1158_15: Añjaso hotīti āhārassa pavesanādīnaṃ maggo hoti.
tika-s0201t:1158_21: Atha vā sammāpayogaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ anvāya āgamma ābhujati samannāharati.
tika-s0201t:1158_22: Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1159_4: Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo,
tika-s0201t:1159_7: Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo.
tika-s0201t:1160_2: Nissaṭṭhattā neva attano kassaci anissajjitattā jigucchanīyattā ca na parassa.
tika-s0201t:1161_2: Cuṇṇikairiyāpathā vihāre aññatthāpi ito cito ca parivattanādivasena pavattāti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1161_3: “Gateti gamane”ti pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamaggahaṇena gamanenapi purato pacchato ca kāyassa atiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahitanti keci.
tika-s0201t:1162_0: Yasmā mahāsīvattheravāde anantare anantare iriyāpathe pavattarūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitā,
tika-s0201t:1162_2: tasmā vuttaṃ “tayidaṃ mahāsīvattherena vuttaṃ asammohadhuraṃ imasmiṃ satipaṭṭhānabhutte adhippeta”nti.
tika-s0201t:1162_3: Sāmaññaphale pana sabbampi catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ labbhati yāvadeva sāmaññaphalavisesadassanaparattā tassā desanāya.
tika-s0201t:1162_7: Na hi kadāci satirahitā ñāṇappavatti atthi.
tika-s0201t:1162_10: Imināpi sampajaññassa viya satiyāpi padhānataṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1163_1: eko bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati,
tika-s0201t:1163_3: tathā eko tiṭṭhanto nisīdanto sayanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento sayati,
tika-s0201t:1163_5: etthakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti.
tika-s0201t:1163_6: Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti “pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā
tika-s0201t:1163_8: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddā,
tika-s0201t:1163_9: caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0201t:1163_10: caṅkame pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0201t:1163_13: evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti,
tika-s0201t:1163_15: ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:1163_18: tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā sayati “kāyo acetano,
tika-s0201t:1164_2: tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotīti pariggaṇhanto jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0201t:1164_3: Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:1164_4: Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṃ desentopi bāttiṃsatiracchānakathaṃ pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sappāyakathaṃ kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0201t:1164_5: Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannopi tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0201t:1164_6: Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhāravirahato visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāma.
tika-s0201t:1164_7: Rūpadhammasseva pavattiākāravisesā abhikkamādayoti vuttaṃ “rūpakkhandhasseva samudayo ca vayo ca nīharitabbo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1167_4: Antarenapi hi bhāvavācinaṃ saddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti.
tika-s0201t:1167_7: Vatthādīhi pasibbakākārena bandhitvā kataṃ āvaṭanaṃ putoḷi.
tika-s0201t:1167_8: Vibhūtākāroti paṇṇattiṃ samatikkamitvā asubhabhāvassa upaṭṭhitākāro. Iti-
tika-s0201t:1167_9: saddassa ākāratthataṃ dassento “eva”nti vatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sarūpato dassento “kesādipariggahaṇenā”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1170_1: Dhātumanasikāravasenāti pathavīdhātuādikā catasso dhātuyo ārabbha pavattabhāvanāmanasikāravasena,
tika-s0201t:1170_3: Dhātumanasikāro dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ catudhātuvavatthānanti hi atthato ekaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1170_7: saddassa vā gativinivattiatthatāya aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya bodhako,
tika-s0201t:1170_8: idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha “catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhita”nti.
tika-s0201t:1170_10: Ṭhānādayo hi iriyāpathasaṅkhātāya kāyikakiriyāya patho pavattimaggoti “iriyāpatho”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0201t:1170_15: Ṭhitanti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1170_16: Paṇihitanti paccayakiccavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1171_0: Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ bhāvatthavibhāvanavasena dassetuṃ “yathā goghātakassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1171_5: Gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni yathāsanniviṭṭhāni upādāya gāvīsamaññā matamattāyapi gāviyā,
tika-s0201t:1171_7: Vilīyanti bhijjanti vibhujjantīti bīlā bhāgā va-
tika-s0201t:1171_17: Dhātuso paccavekkhatoti ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa.
tika-s0201t:1171_19: vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato.
tika-s0201t:1171_20: Evañhi sati yathāvuttaopammatthena upameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti.
tika-s0201t:1171_23: yathājāte sūnasmiṃ naṅguṭṭhakhuravisāṇādivante aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamudāye avibhatte gāvīsamaññā,
tika-s0201t:1171_26: Catumahāpatho viya catuiriyāpathoti gāviyā ṭhitacatumahāpatho viya kāyassa pavattimaggabhūto catubbidho iriyāpatho.
tika-s0201t:1174_1: Sivathikāya apaviddhauddhumātakādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ odhiso pavattānaṃ kathānaṃ tadabhidheyyānañca uddhumātakādiasubhabhāgānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1174_4: Uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānāti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ.
tika-s0201t:1174_12: Kucchitaṃ vinīlaṃ vinīlakanti kucchanattho vā ayaṃ ka-
tika-s0201t:1174_13: kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā “pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1175_0: So bhikkhūti yo “passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍita”nti vutto,
tika-s0201t:1175_8: na āyuādīnaṃ avigame viya mattasoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1176_1: Sesāvasesamaṃsalohitayuttanti sabbaso akhāditattā tahaṃ tahaṃ sesena appāvasesena maṃsalohitena yuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1176_2: Aññena hatthaṭṭhikanti avisesena hatthaṭṭhikānaṃ vippakiṇṇatā jotitāti anavasesato tesaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ dassento “catusaṭṭhibhedampī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1176_4: Tāni pana saṃvaccharaṃ vītivattāni hontīti āha “atikkantasaṃvaccharānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1176_5: Purāṇatāya ghanabhāvavigamena vicuṇṇatā idha pūtibhāvoti so yathā hoti,
tika-s0201t:1176_7: Khajjamānatādivasena dutiyasivathikapabbādīnaṃ vavatthitatthā vuttaṃ “khajjamānādīnaṃ vasena yojanā kātabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1178_0: Imāneva dveti avadhāraṇena appanākammaṭṭhānaṃ tattha niyameti aññapabbesu tadabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1178_3: tena pabbadvayassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānatāpi appaṭisiddhāti daṭṭhabbā aniccādidassanato.
tika-s0201t:1178_4: Saṅkhāresu ādīnavavibhāvanāni sivathikapabbānīti āha “sivathikānaṃ ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttattā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1178_5: Iriyāpathapabbādīnaṃ anappanāvahatā pākaṭā evāti “sesāni dvādasāpī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1181_4: khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca ābādhanti sukhā.
tika-s0201t:1182_0: “Vohāramattaṃ hotī”ti etena “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī”ti idaṃ vohāramattanti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1182_4: Dhammavinimuttassa aññassa kattu abhāvato dhammasseva kattubhāvaṃ dassento “vedanāva vedayatī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1182_6: Balavato vedanāvegassa nirodhane ādīnavaṃ disvā tassa avasaradānavasena nitthunanto.
tika-s0201t:1182_7: Vīriyasamataṃ yojetvāti adhivāsanavīriyassa adhimattattā tassa hāpanavasena samādhinā samarasatāpādanena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā.
tika-s0201t:1182_9: Lokiyānampi vā sati uppattikāle tattha samatthataṃ sandhāyāha “saha paṭisambhidāhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1183_1: evaṃ dukkhanti yathā “sukhaṃ vedayatī”tiādinā sampajānavediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1183_6: khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sātanti dukkhā.
tika-s0201t:1183_13: Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ kathesīti etthāpi “yebhuyyenā”ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1184_0: Yebhuyyaggahaṇena tadaññadhammavasenapi arūpakammaṭṭhānakathāya atthitā dīpitāti taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tividho hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1184_4: sammasanaṃ pana anavasesatova dhamme pariggahetvā vattati.
tika-s0201t:1184_5: Pariggahite rūpakammaṭṭhāneti idaṃ rūpamukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1184_6: arūpamukhena pana vipassanābhiniveso yebhūyyena samathayānikassa icchitabbo,
tika-s0201t:1184_7: so ca paṭhamaṃ jhānaṅgāni pariggahetvā tato paraṃ sesadhamme pariggaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1184_8: Paṭhamābhinipātoti sabbe cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyabhāvena vuccantīti phasso cittassa paṭhamābhinipāto vutto,
tika-s0201t:1184_10: cittacetasikarāsi vā ārammaṇena phuṭṭho phassasahajātāya vedanāya taṃsamakālameva vedeti,
tika-s0201t:1184_11: phasso pana obhāsassa viya padīpo vedanādīnaṃ paccayaviseso hotīti purimakālo viya vuccati,
tika-s0201t:1184_14: Ayañhi arūpadhammatā ekadesena anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhu,
tika-s0201t:1184_15: saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇañca phusanto viya saṅghaṭṭento viya ca pavattati.
tika-s0201t:1185_0: Ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantīti issaravatāya visavitāya sāmibhāvena ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavantī.
tika-s0201t:1185_1: Phassādīnañhi sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe ekadeseneva pavatti phusanādimattabhāvato,
tika-s0201t:1185_2: vedanāya pana iṭṭhākārasambhogādivasena pavattanato ārammaṇe nippadesato pavatti.
tika-s0201t:1185_4: vedayitābhāvena gahaṇaṃ yathākāmaṃ sabbānubhavanaṃ evasabhāvāneva tāni gahaṇānīti na vedanāya viya phassādīnampi
tika-s0201t:1185_7: Viññāṇañhi minitabbavatthuṃ nāḷiyā minanto puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ paricchijja vibhāventaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0201t:1185_9: Tathā hi anena kadāci lakkhaṇattayavibhāvanāpi hoti.
tika-s0201t:1185_10: Imesaṃ pana phassādīnaṃ tassa tassa pākaṭabhāvo paccayavisesasiddhassa pubbābhogassa vasena veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1186_4: abhijāna”nti ca evamādivacanato sabbe sammasanupagā dhammā pariggahetabbāti dassento “tattha yassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1186_5: Tattha phassapañcamakeyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ tadantogadhattā taggahaṇeneva gahitattā catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1186_7: tattha ca phassacetanāggahaṇena sabbasaṅkhārakkhandhadhammasaṅgaho cetanāpadhānattā tesaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1186_8: Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhavibhaṅge “cakkhusamphassajā cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā,
tika-s0201t:1187_1: saddo karajakāyavisayoti kathamidaṃ viññāyatīti āha “yaṃ sandhāya vutta”ntiādi.
tika-s0201t:1187_5: Pañcakkhandhavinimuttaṃ nāmarūpaṃ natthīti idaṃ adhikāravasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1187_9: vicaratīti iminā balavavipassanaṃ vatvā puna tassa ussukkāpanaṃ visesādhigamanañca dassento “so”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1188_1: tassā pana vedanānupassanāvasena kathetabbattā bhagavā vedanāvasena kathesi.
tika-s0201t:1188_2: Yathāvuttesu ca tīsu kammaṭṭhānābhinivesesu vedanāvasena kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso sukaro vedanānaṃ vibhūtabhāvatoti
tika-s0201t:1188_4: Na pākaṭaṃ hotīti idaṃ tādise puggale sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1188_5: yesaṃ ādito vedanāva vibhūtatarā hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0201t:1188_9: Vedanānaṃ uppattipākaṭatāyāti ca idaṃ sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1188_12: Tadubhayaggahaṇamukhena vā gahetabbattā itarāyapi pavatti viññūnaṃ pākaṭā evāti “vedanāna”nti avisesaggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1188_14: Neva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedetīti tasmiṃ sukhavedanāsamaṅgisamaye neva dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti niruddhattā,
tika-s0201t:1189_0: Kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisaṃ nāma pañca kāmaguṇā,
tika-s0201t:1189_3: Ito paranti “atthi vedanā”ti evamādipāḷiṃ sandhāyāha “kāyānupassanāyaṃ vuttanayamevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1192_5: sammasanacārassa pana idhādhippetattā tebhūmakasseva gahaṇanti “lokiyakusalābyākata”nti vatvā “idaṃ panā”tiādinā tameva adhippāyaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0201t:1192_9: tannimittakatāya pana siyā taṃsahitatālesoti nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukavinimuttatā evettha labbhatīti āha “neva purimapadaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1192_13: Akusalamūlesu saha moheneva vattatīti samohanti āha “vicikicchāsahagatañceva uddhaccasahagatañcā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1192_14: Yasmā cettha saheva mohenāti samohanti purimapadāvadhāraṇampi labbhatiyeva,
tika-s0201t:1192_16: Yathā pana atimūḷhatāya pāṭipuggalikanayena savisesaṃ mohavantatāya momūhacittanti vattabbato vicikicchuddhaccasahagatadvayaṃ
tika-s0201t:1192_19: Sampayogavasena thinamiddhena anupatitaṃ anugatanti thinamiddhānupatitaṃ pañcavidhaṃ sasaṅkhārikākusalacittaṃ saṅkuṭitacittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1192_21: Paccayavisesavasena thāmajātena uddhaccena sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti uddhaccasahagataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1193_0: Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya vipulaphalatāya dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ gataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1193_1: mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gataṃ paṭipannanti mahaggataṃ.
tika-s0201t:1193_2: Taṃ pana rūpārūpabhūmikaṃ tato mahantassa loke abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1193_4: Tassa cettha paṭiyogī parittamevāti āha “amahaggatanti kāmāvacara”nti.
tika-s0201t:1193_5: Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha uttarehīti sauttaraṃ,
tika-s0201t:1193_18: taṃ ubhayavimuttirahitanti gayhamāne lokuttaracittepi siyā āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “samuccheda…pe…
tika-s0201t:1197_1: Pahātabbādidhammavibhāgadassanavasena pañcadhā dhammānupassanā niddiṭṭhāti ayamattho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti
tika-s0201t:1197_5: Yesañhi veneyyānaṃ pahātabbadhammesu paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇāni vibhāgena vattabbāni,
tika-s0201t:1197_6: tesaṃ vasenettha bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ nīvaraṇesu dhammānupassanā kathitā.
tika-s0201t:1197_9: bhāvetabbesu bojjhaṅgesu pariññeyādivibhāgesu saccesu ca uttarā desanā desitā,
tika-s0201t:1197_10: tasmā cettha samathabhāvanāpi yāvadeva vipassanatthaṃ icchitā,
tika-s0201t:1197_11: vipassanāpadhānā vipassanābahulā ca satipaṭṭhānadesanāti tassā vipassanābhinivesavibhāgena desitabhāvaṃ vibhāvento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1197_17: So pana “kāmacchandassa uppādo hotī”ti vuttattā kāmacchandassa kāraṇākārova,
tika-s0201t:1198_3: tenākārena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā “subhanimitta”nti ca. Iṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1198_7: Tatthāti nipphādetabbe ārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhepi subhanimitte.
tika-s0201t:1199_3: Kesādīsu hi saññā asubhasaññāti girimānandasutte vuttāti.
tika-s0201t:1199_4: Ettha ca catubbidhassa ayonisomanasikārassa yonisomanasikārassa ca gahaṇaṃ niravasesadassanatthaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1200_4: Bhojane mattaññuno thinamiddhābhibhavābhāvā otāraṃ alabhamāno kāmacchando pahīyatīti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1201_0: Paṭighampi purimuppannaṃ paṭighanimittaṃ parato uppajjanakapaṭighassa kāraṇanti katvā.
tika-s0201t:1202_0: Mettāyanassa sattesu hitapharaṇassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ mettānimittassa uggaho.
tika-s0201t:1202_5: vihārādiuddesarahitaṃ puratthimādidisāvasena anodhisakadisāpharaṇanti evaṃ vā dvidhā uggahaṇaṃ sandhāya “odhisakaanodhisakadisāpharaṇāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1202_12: sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū”ti catudhā pavattito vīsatividhā anodhisakapharaṇā mettā,
tika-s0201t:1202_13: “sabbā itthiyo, purisā, ariyā, anariyā, devā, manussā,
tika-s0201t:1202_14: vinipātikā”ti sattodhikaraṇavasena pavattā sattavidhā aṭṭhavīsatividhā vā,
tika-s0201t:1202_15: dasahi disāhi disodhikaraṇavasena pavattā dasavidhā ca,
tika-s0201t:1202_16: ekekāya vā disāya sattādiitthādiaverādibhedena asītādhikacatusatappabhedā ca odhibhopharaṇā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1203_4: Ukkaṇṭhitā pantasenāsanesu adhikusalesu dhammesu ca uppajjanabhāvariñcanā.
tika-s0201t:1204_1: tappaṭipakkhānaṃ visosanasabhāvatāya ca ārambhadhātuādito pavattavīriyanti āha “paṭhamārambhavīriya”nti.
tika-s0201t:1204_4: Yasmā pana aparāparuppattiyā laddhāsevanaṃ uparūparivisesaṃ āvahantaṃ ativiya thāmagatameva hoti,
tika-s0201t:1204_5: tasmā vuttaṃ “paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavatara”nti.
tika-s0201t:1205_2: ettake na hotī”ti thinamiddhassa kāraṇākāraṇaggāho hotīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1205_3: Divā sūriyālokanti divā gahitanimittaṃ sūriyālokaṃ rattiyaṃ manasikarontassapīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1206_0: Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena samānalakkhaṇamevāti “avūpasamo nāma avūpasantākāro,
tika-s0201t:1207_0: Bahussutassa ganthato atthato ca suttādīni vicārentassa atthavedādipaṭilābhasabbhāvato vikkhepo na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1207_1: yathāvidhipaṭipattiyā yathānurūpapaṭikārappavattiyā ca katākatānusocanañca na hotīti “bāhusaccenapi…pe…
tika-s0201t:1207_5: Buddhasevitā ca buddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetaso vūpasamakarattā uddhaccakukkuccapahānakārī vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1207_6: Buddhattaṃ pana anapekkhitvā vinayadharā kukkuccavinodakā kalyāṇamittā vuttāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1207_7: Vikkhepo ca bhikkhuno yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko hotīti “kappiyākappiyaparipucchāmahulassā”tiādinā vinayanayeneva paripucchakatādayo niddiṭṭhā.
tika-s0201t:1207_9: Kukkuccassa domanassasahagatattā anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo vutto.
tika-s0201t:1208_6: Sā hi purimuppannā parato uppajjanakavicikicchāya sabhāgahetutāya asādhāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1209_6: Kusalāpi vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā hīnā,
tika-s0201t:1209_17: Atha vā kaṇhasukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā ca kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā.
tika-s0201t:1209_19: dukkhā ca vedanā sukhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgāti.
tika-s0201t:1210_1: tathāpi ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā sesavicikicchāti katvā āha “tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1210_3: Vinaye pakataññutā “sikkhāya kaṅkhatī”ti vuttāya vicikicchāya pahānaṃ karotīti āha “vinaye ciṇṇavasībhāvassapī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1214_1: Upādānehi ārammaṇakaraṇādivasena upādātabbā vā khandhā upādānakkhandā.
tika-s0201t:1214_9: tasmā “iti rūpa”nti iminā bhūtupādādivasena yattako rūpassa bhedo,
tika-s0201t:1214_10: tena saddhiṃ rūpaṃ anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1214_14: na ito paraṃ vedanā atthīti sabhāvato vedanaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā,
tika-s0201t:1214_15: sabhāvatoti ca anubhavanasabhāvato sātādisabhāvato cāti evamādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1217_1: Chasu ajjhattikabāhiresūti “chasu ajjhattikesu chasu bāhiresu”ti “chasū”ti padaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1217_4: Cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā pariyāpannassa hi viññāṇakāyassa cakkhāyatanameva uppattidvāraṃ,
tika-s0201t:1217_17: Rūpayati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti rūpaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1217_18: Sappati attano paccayehi harīyati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gamīyatīti saddo.
tika-s0201t:1217_25: vitthāro pana visuddhimagge taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya ca vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1218_0: Cakkhuñca pajānātīti ettha cakkhu nāma pasādacakkhu,
tika-s0201t:1218_3: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo”ti. Ca-
tika-s0201t:1218_5: Yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇavasenāti aviparītassa attano rasassa ceva lakkhaṇassa ca vasena,
tika-s0201t:1218_6: rūpesu āviñchanakiccassa ceva rūpābhighātārahabhūtapasādalakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1218_7: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”tiādīsu samuditāniyeva rūpāyatanāni cakkhuviññāṇuppattihetu,
tika-s0201t:1218_8: na visuṃ visunti imassa atthassa dassanatthaṃ “rūpe cā”ti puthuvacanaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1218_9: tāya eva ca desanāgatiyā kāmaṃ idhāpi “rūpe ca pajānātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1218_10: rūpabhāvasāmaññena pana sabbaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “bahiddhā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpañcā”ti ekavacanavasena attho vutto.
tika-s0201t:1218_11: Sarasalakkhaṇavasenāti cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvakiccassa ceva cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇassa ca vasenāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1219_3: nippariyāyakathā nāma abhidhammasannissitā evāti abhidhammanayeneva saṃyojanāni dassento “kāmarāga…pe…
tika-s0201t:1219_6: kāmo ca so rāgo cāti kāmarāgo,
tika-s0201t:1219_12: kammunā vā vipākaṃ saṃyojeti bandhatīti saṃyojanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1219_14: Sarasalakkhaṇavasenāti ettha pana sattassa vaṭṭato anissajjanasaṅkhātassa attano kiccassa ceva yathāvuttabandhanasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0201t:1220_5: Padadvayenapi balavato kāmarāgassa paccayabhūtā kāmarāguppatti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1220_7: Etaṃ ārammaṇanti etaṃ evaṃsukhumaṃ evaṃdubbibhāgaṃ ārammaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1220_10: Bhavaṃ patthentassāti “īdise sampattibhave yasmā amhākaṃ idaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ sulabhaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1220_11: tasmā āyatimpi sampattibhavo bhaveyyā”ti bhavaṃ nikāmentassa.
tika-s0201t:1220_14: Aññassa maccharāyatoti aññena asādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇena macchariyaṃ karoto.
tika-s0201t:1221_0: Tañca kāraṇanti subhanimittapaṭighanimittādivibhāvaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādirūpārammaṇañceva tajjāyonisomanasikārañcāti tassa tassa saṃyojanassa kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1221_4: Tañhi tassa tadaṅgavasena ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca pahānakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1221_6: Yadi evaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī”ti suttapadaṃ kathanti?
tika-s0201t:1221_9: ayaṃ pana abhidhammanayena saṃvaṇṇanāti nāyaṃ doso.
tika-s0201t:1221_15: tappaccayānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ uppādādipajānanā ca vuttanayeneva veditabbāti dassento “eseva nayo”ti atidisati.
tika-s0201t:1222_3: evañca anavasesato saparasantānesu āyatanānaṃ pariggaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0201t:1222_4: Parassa vā dhammesūti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0201t:1222_12: Khandhapabbe viya āyatanapabbepi lokuttaranivattanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ gahitaṃ natthīti āha “lokuttaradhammā na gahetabbā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1225_5: Udayabbayañāṇuppādato paṭṭhāya sambodhipaṭipadāyaṃ ṭhito nāma hotīti āha “āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1227_2: Taṃ sabbattha satokāribhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hoti.
tika-s0201t:1227_3: Yathā paccanīkadhammānaṃ pahānaṃ anurūpadhammasevanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti,
tika-s0201t:1227_6: tattha ca yuttapayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti “satisampajañña”ntiādinā.
tika-s0201t:1228_6: Tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāroti kusalādīsu taṃtaṃsabhāvarasalakkhaṇādikassa yāthāvato avabujjhanavasena uppanno ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo.
tika-s0201t:1229_1: Ācariye payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1229_3: imassa ko attho”ti khandhāyatanādiatthaṃ pucchantassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati.
tika-s0201t:1230_6: Sedamalamakkhitanti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ. Ca-
tika-s0201t:1230_14: Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0201t:1230_19: atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā taṃnissitāparisuddhi viya
tika-s0201t:1231_1: Yathāpaccayaṃ saddheyyavatthusmiṃ adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca sithilatādinā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1231_3: Tatoti tasmā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvato itaresañca mandattā.
tika-s0201t:1231_4: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho,
tika-s0201t:1231_12: Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati,
tika-s0201t:1231_13: taṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā.
tika-s0201t:1231_14: Sahajātadhammesu indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi,
tika-s0201t:1232_2: Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1232_4: Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti “ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1232_6: Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0201t:1232_7: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hoti.
tika-s0201t:1232_10: Tathā amanasikārenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1232_12: Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesavasena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya.
tika-s0201t:1232_14: dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1232_16: vīriyādīnaṃ paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1233_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanapasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā “kiṃ te, vakkali,
tika-s0201t:1233_1: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali,
tika-s0201t:1233_3: so maṃ passatī”tiādinā ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi.
tika-s0201t:1233_4: Atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsagissajjanena atthānaṃ dassetvā –
tika-s0201t:1236_1: So tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0201t:1236_2: saddhāya pana balavabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ na otarati.
tika-s0201t:1236_3: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā tassa indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi.
tika-s0201t:1236_4: So satthārā dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0201t:1237_3: Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati,
tika-s0201t:1237_4: evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhiyattā tassā.
tika-s0201t:1237_5: Tathāhi sā samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa
tika-s0201t:1237_10: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto “mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1237_11: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
tika-s0201t:1237_12: kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu
tika-s0201t:1237_13: phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0201t:1237_14: Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
tika-s0201t:1237_15: Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0201t:1238_2: Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānātivattanaṃ visesato icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1238_4: evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samarasatāya sati aññamaññūpatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1238_11: Tathā hi so avatthusmiṃ pasīdati seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā.
tika-s0201t:1238_13: Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni parikappeti hetupatirūpakehi vañcito,
tika-s0201t:1238_14: evaṃbhūto ca sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati,
tika-s0201t:1238_17: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho,
tika-s0201t:1239_3: Saddahantoti “pathavīti manasikāramattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti acintetvā “addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī”ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento.
tika-s0201t:1239_4: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto.
tika-s0201t:1239_7: Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha “samatāyapī”ti,
tika-s0201t:1239_13: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samatā icchitā,
tika-s0201t:1239_14: kathaṃ satīti āha “sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1239_25: sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena bojjhaṅgena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā,
tika-s0201t:1239_28: Tassa hi sati paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya.
tika-s0201t:1240_2: Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha “samapaññāsa…pe…
tika-s0201t:1240_4: Ñeyyadhammassa gambhīrabhāvavasena tapparicchedakañāṇassa gambhīrabhāvaggahaṇanti āha “gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1240_5: Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1240_6: tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā,
tika-s0201t:1240_9: evaṃ so eva paññāvepullappattopīti āha “arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1241_0: “Tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī”tiādinā pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇaṃ niraye nibbattasattassa yebhuyyena
tika-s0201t:1241_1: sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti devadūtasuttādīsu tassā ādito vuttattā ca āha “pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato
tika-s0201t:1241_4: saddena tadaññaṃ manussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhiyamānakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1241_5: Ekaṃ buddhantaranti idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesuyeva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1241_6: ekaccānaṃ vā petānaṃ ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya tathā dīghāyukabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1241_7: Tathā hi kāḷo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ adhigatarūpadassano.
tika-s0201t:1242_0: Evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinoti vīriyāyatto eva sabbo lokuttaro lokiyo ca visesādhigamoti evaṃ vīriye ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa.
tika-s0201t:1242_2: Sā hi bhikkhuno vaṭṭanissaraṇāya gantabbā paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadāti katvā gamanavīthi nāma.
tika-s0201t:1242_5: Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍassa bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā piṇḍāpacāyanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1243_1: Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvā.
tika-s0201t:1243_2: Manussasampatti dibbasampatti ante nibbānasampattīti tisso sampattiyo.
tika-s0201t:1243_3: Dātuṃ sakkhissasīti “tayi katena dānamayena veyyāvaccamayena ca puññakammena khettavisesabhāvūpagamanena
tika-s0201t:1243_4: aparāparaṃ devamanussasampattiyo ante nibbānasampattiñca dātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti thero attānaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0201t:1243_5: Sitaṃ karontovāti “akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.
tika-s0201t:1244_1: Evaṃ yathā asammāpaṭipanno putto tāya eva asammāpaṭipattiyā kulasantānato bāhiro hutvā pitu santikā dāyajjassa na bhāgī,
tika-s0201t:1244_2: evaṃ kusītopi teneva kusītabhāvena asammāpaṭipanno satthu santikā laddhabbaariyadhanadāyajjassa na bhāgī.
tika-s0201t:1245_0: Mahāti sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto vipulo anaññasādhāraṇo.
tika-s0201t:1245_1: Taṃ panassa guṇamahattaṃ dasasahassilokadhātukampanena loke pākaṭanti dassento “satthuno hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1246_0: Yasmā satthusāsane pabbajitassa pabbajjupagamena sakyaputtiyabhāvo sampajāyati,
tika-s0201t:1247_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1247_2: “Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā”tiādinā bhāvanārambhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanā āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā. Tenāha –
tika-s0201t:1247_4: Visuddhimagge pana jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti idaṃ dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1247_6: Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā hoti lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1248_0: Purimuppannā pīti parato uppajjanakapītiyā kāraṇabhāvato “pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1248_1: tassā pana bahuso pavattiyā puthuttaṃ upādāya bahuvacananiddeso,
tika-s0201t:1249_1: Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānoti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno.
tika-s0201t:1249_2: Dhammaguṇe anussarantassapi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti.
tika-s0201t:1249_3: Evaṃ sesaanussatīsu pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāyañca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena taggatikattā.
tika-s0201t:1249_6: Saṅkhārānañhi sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tathā paññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho
tika-s0201t:1249_7: hutvā upacārasamādhiṃ āvahanto tathārūpapītisomanassasamannāgato pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti.
tika-s0201t:1249_9: sā tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha “asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve”ti.
tika-s0201t:1251_2: Tañhi tividhaṃ sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0201t:1251_3: Ahetukaṃ sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhaṃ dukkhanti ayameko anto,
tika-s0201t:1251_5: ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti.
tika-s0201t:1251_8: Ayañhi pahāya sāraddhakāyataṃ passaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṃ hontī passaddhidvayaṃ āvahati,
tika-s0201t:1252_0: Yathāsamāhitākārasallakkhaṇavasena gayhamāno purimuppanno samatho eva samathanimittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1252_1: Nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo.
tika-s0201t:1252_2: Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca vutto.
tika-s0201t:1252_4: So eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1253_1: samādhānāvahāpi tā honti samādhānāvahabhāveneva paññāvahabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “vatthuvisada…pe…
tika-s0201t:1254_1: rakkhaṇakosallassa ca tammūlakattā “nimittakusalatā nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1254_3: Asubhanimittassādikassapi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa uggahaṇakosallaṃ nimittakusalatā evāti.
tika-s0201t:1255_2: Tassa paggahaṇanti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuddharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1256_12: so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0201t:1256_17: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti?
tika-s0201t:1257_0: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1258_2: Tassa niggahaṇanti tassa uddhatacittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito nisedhanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1259_14: bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti?
tika-s0201t:1260_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1261_4: Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0201t:1261_5: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1261_6: anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na janeti,
tika-s0201t:1261_8: tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā upasamasukhaṃ na vindati,
tika-s0201t:1261_12: Tassa saṃveguppādanaṃ pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti taṃ dassento “aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1261_13: Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādi-
tika-s0201t:1261_16: tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni.
tika-s0201t:1261_19: tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1261_20: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanatāti ayaṃ sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayena tena saṃvejanavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā,
tika-s0201t:1262_0: Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammāti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṃ sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma.
tika-s0201t:1262_12: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
tika-s0201t:1263_0: Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvūpagamanato ca upacārajjhānampi samādānakiccanipphattiyā
tika-s0201t:1263_1: puggalassa samāhitabhāvasādhanamevāti tattha samadhurabhāvenāha “upacāraṃ vā appanaṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1264_0: Upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā dhammāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttānusārena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1265_0: Anurodhavirodhavippahānavasena majjhattabhāvo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ sati sijjhanato,
tika-s0201t:1265_2: so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti āha “sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1265_3: Tadubhaye ca virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti anurujjhanasseva pahānavidhiṃ dassentena “sattamajjhattatā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1266_0: Dvīhākārehīti kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ attasuññatāpaccavekkhaṇanti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi.
tika-s0201t:1266_3: Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ aññañca kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-s0201t:1268_0: Ayaṃ satipaṭṭhānadesanā pubbabhāgamaggavasena desitāti pubbabhāgiyabojjhaṅge sandhāyāha “bojjhaṅgapariggāhikā sati dukkhasacca”nti.
tika-s0201t:1271_2: yo yo vā sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo, tato,
tika-s0201t:1271_4: Janikaṃ samuṭṭhāpikanti pavattalakkhaṇassa dukkhassa janikaṃ nimittalakkhaṇassa samuṭṭhāpikaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1272_0: Sasantatipariyāpannānaṃ dukkhasamudayānaṃ appavattibhāvena pariggayhamāno nirodhopi sasantatipariyāpanno
tika-s0201t:1272_1: viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ “attano vā cattāri saccānī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1272_4: “imasmiṃyeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi samanake lokañca paññapemi,
tika-s0201t:1272_10: evañca katvā lokuttarabojjhaṅge uddissapi pariggaho na virujjhati.
tika-s0201t:1272_12: ṭhapetvā nirodhasaccaṃ sesasaccavasena samudayavayā veditabbāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1274_0: “Aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ samaṃsa”ntiādikā satta sivathikā aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānatāya itarāsaṃ uddhumātakādīnaṃ
tika-s0201t:1274_6: Iriyāpathā ālokitādayo ca rūpadhammānaṃ avatthāvisesamattatāya na sammasanupagā viññattiādayo viya.
tika-s0201t:1274_9: Kesādiapadesena tadupādānadhammā viya iriyāpathādiapadesena tadavatthā rūpadhammā pariggayhanti,
tika-s0201t:1274_10: nīvaraṇādimukhena ca taṃ sampayuttā taṃnissayadhammāti adhippāyena mahāsīvatthero “iriyāpathādīsupi abhiniveso jāyatī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1274_11: Atthi nu kho metiādi pana sabhāvato iriyāpathādīnaṃ ādikammikassa anicchitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1275_3: bhikkhū”tiādinā uddesaniddesesu tattha tattha bhikkhuggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0201t:1275_5: desanā pana sabbasādhāraṇāti dassetuṃ “yo hi koci,
tika-s0201t:1275_9: Dassanamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānantī sikhāppattā aggamaggapaññā aññā nāma,
tika-s0201t:1275_11: Appatarepi kāle sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassentoti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1287_6: Titthiyaparideviteti titthiyānaṃ “kiṃ bho samaṇoyeva gotamo samaṇo”tiādinā vippalapanimittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1287_7: “Mahālābhasakkāro uppajjī”ti vatvā samantapāsādikatthaṃ tassa uppattikāraṇaṃ dassento “catuppamāṇiko hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1287_12: Pamināti uḷāratādivisesaṃ etenāti pamāṇaṃ rūpaṃ rūpakāyo pamāṇaṃ etassāti rūpappamāṇo.
tika-s0201t:1288_2: Sā ca kho tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle pamāṇayuttā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1288_6: Tattha pamāṇaṃ gahetvāti tasmiṃ rūpe rūpasampattiyaṃ pamāṇabhāvaṃ upādāya.
tika-s0201t:1289_0: Paravaṇṇanāyāti “amuko ediso ca ediso cā”ti yasaguṇavacanena.
tika-s0201t:1290_2: Vividhaṃ vā dukkarakārikanti dhutaṅgasevanādivasena pavattaṃ nānāvidhaṃ dukkaracariyaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1291_0: Sīlaṃ vā passitvāti sīlapāripūrivasena visuddhaṃ kāyavacīsucaritaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā passitvā.
tika-s0201t:1292_3: yassā rucirabhāvo visuddhe vigatavalāhake deve puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakalābhāgamaṇḍalaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ abhibhavitvā atirocati,
tika-s0201t:1292_5: sommakiraṇarasasamujjalabhāvehi tadubhayehi abhibhuyya vattamānaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
tika-s0201t:1292_6: vijjotanasamatthaṃ mahābrahmuno pabhāsamudayaṃ abhivihacca bhāsate tapate virocati ca.
tika-s0201t:1293_0: Satipi aṅgapariccāgādīnaṃ dānapāramibhāve pariccāgavisesabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca aṅgapariccāgādiggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1293_6: “so dhammaṃ desetī”tiādinā vuttāya sattupakārakiriyāya ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1293_7: Sammāsambuddheyeva pasīdati yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇabhāvato acchariyabbhutabhāvato ca.
tika-s0201t:1294_0: “Cīvaralūkhaṃ disvā”ti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ “sace bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1294_1: Sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarenāti matakaḷevaraṃ paliveṭhetvā chaḍḍitena tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā gahitena sāṇapaṃsukūlacīvarena.
tika-s0201t:1295_5: Tena brahmassaratākaravīkabhāṇitādassanena lakkhaṇahāranayena avasesalakkhaṇapāripūriṃ viya tadavinābhāvato buddhānaṃ desanāvilāsañca vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1297_4: Loke uppajjamāneyeva uppannāti attano diṭṭhivādassa purātanabhāvaṃ dīpenti.
tika-s0201t:1298_0: Sesapadesupīti “idha dutiyo samaṇo”tiādīsu sesavāresupi yathā hi “vivicceva kāmehī”ti ettha kato niyamo
tika-s0201t:1298_1: “vivicca akusalehī”ti etthāpi katoyeva hoti sāvadhāraṇasseva atthassa icchitabbattā,
tika-s0201t:1298_4: Sāmaññaphalādhigamavasena nippariyāyato samaṇabhāvoti tesaṃ vasenettha cattāro samaṇā desitāti tamatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1298_6: Paṭipattikkamena desanākkamena ca sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ dutiyāditā vuttāti sotāpannassa paṭhamatā avuttasiddhāti na coditā.
tika-s0201t:1298_8: Kasmā panettha mahāparinibbāne viya maggaṭṭhā tadatthāya paṭipannā ca na gahitāti?
tika-s0201t:1298_10: Tattha hi maggādhigamatthāya vipassanāpi ito bahiddhā natthi,
tika-s0201t:1298_11: kuto maggaphalānīti dassentena bhagavatā “ñāyassa dhammassa padesavattī,
tika-s0201t:1298_13: Idha pana niṭṭhānappattameva taṃtaṃsamaṇabhāvaṃ gaṇhantena phalaṭṭhakasamaṇāva gahitā “maggaṭṭhato phalaṭṭho savisesaṃ dakkhiṇeyyo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1300_3: Tena hi nibbānaṃ ñāyati gammati paṭivijjhatīti.
tika-s0201t:1300_4: So eva nibbānasampāpakahetutāya dhammoti āha “ñāyassa dhammassā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1301_0: Tesaṃ parappavādasāsanānaṃ akhettatā khettatā ca ariyamaggassa abhāvabhāvā suparisuddhassa sīlassa suparisuddhāya
tika-s0201t:1301_3: so ca asammāsambuddhasammāsambuddhapaveditatāyāti parājikāya satthu vipattihetutāya sāsanassa aniyyānabhāvoti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1302_0: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pariyāyato ca pāḷiyā ca samatthetuṃ “tenāha bhagavā”tiādinā pāḷiṃ dassetvā upamāpadesena
tika-s0201t:1302_2: Tattha yasmā ekaccānaṃ visesato sīhānaṃ purimaṃ pādadvayaṃ hatthakiccampi karoti,
tika-s0201t:1302_8: Sineruparibhaṇḍe simbalirukkhehi sañchādito paññāsayojano daho simbalidaho,
tika-s0201t:1302_11: Aññatitthāvāsabhūmiyaṃ imesu samaṇesu ekacco na uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:1302_13: sabbena sabbaṃ na uppajjantevāti dassento “ekasamaṇopī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1303_1: Suṭṭhu nadanaṃ nāma hetuyuttaṃ suṭṭhu katvā kathananti āha “hetunā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1303_2: So ca hetu aviparīto eva icchitabboti āha “nayenā”ti,
tika-s0201t:1303_4: Evaṃbhūto ca so yathādhippetatthaṃ karoti sādhetīti dassento āha “kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1303_5: Yadi tiracchānasīhassa nādo sabbatiracchānaekaccamanussāmanussanādato seṭṭhattā seṭṭhanādo,
tika-s0201t:1303_7: Yadi tiracchānasīhanādassa seṭṭhanādatā nibbhayatāya appaṭisattutāya icchitā,
tika-s0201t:1303_11: Tattha atthitāyāti iminā sīhanādassa uttamatthataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1303_13: Tāya eva bhūtaṭṭhatāya abhītanādatāti dassento “ime samaṇā…pe…
tika-s0201t:1303_15: Abhūtañhi vadato kutoci bhayaṃ vā āsaṅkā vā siyāti “idhevā”ti niyamassa aviparītataṃ dassento “amhākampi…pe…
tika-s0201t:1304_4: Titthaṃ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo tabbinimuttassa kassaci diṭṭhivipphanditassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1304_5: Pāragamanasaṅkhātaṃ taraṇaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ tattha tattheva aparāparaṃ ummujjananimujjanavasena pilavananti āha “taranti uppalavantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1304_8: yathāvuttaṃ vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti titthikā,
tika-s0201t:1305_1: saddoti tassa “bhagavatā”tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato satthubhāvena adhigato supākaṭo ca,
tika-s0201t:1305_2: taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanapaṭipadāya atthabhāvena dassento “yo so…pe…
tika-s0201t:1305_4: Satipi ñāṇadassanasaddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ savisaye visesappavattidassanatthaṃ
tika-s0201t:1305_10: Anaññasādhāraṇapuññānubhāvanibbatto anuttarañāṇādhigamaladdhapurāvattako ca bhagavato rūpakāyo atikkammeva
tika-s0201t:1305_14: Tāya hi sabbaso ñeyyadhammesu sammohassa vidhamitattā pacchā pavattajānanaṃ tassa jānanaṃ viya vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1306_2: tesaṃ hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ ajjhupekkhanaṃ vā.
tika-s0201t:1306_8: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā,
tika-s0201t:1307_2: Kāmaṃ asekkhāpi asekkhāya samasikkhatāya sahadhammikā eva,
tika-s0201t:1307_3: ciṇṇabrahmacariyatāya pana sahadhammaṃ carantīti na vattabbāti asekkhavāro na gahito.
tika-s0201t:1307_4: Sabbepeteti ete yathāvuttā bhikkhuādayo sotāpannādayo ca puthujjanā ariyā cāti sabbepi ete taṃtaṃsikkhāhi
tika-s0201t:1307_14: Tattha piyamanāpaggahaṇena sīlesu paripūrakāritāpadesena ekadesena gahitaṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1307_17: Ettāvatāti “atthi kho no āvuso”tiādinayappavattena ratanattayapasādajotanena akkhātā tesu tesu suttapadesesu.
tika-s0201t:1308_1: Satthari pasādoti pasādaggahaṇena “bhagavatā”tiādinā vā pasādanīyā dhammā gahitā.
tika-s0201t:1308_5: Yena cittena aññattha anupalabbhamānena sāsaneyeva samaṇo ito bahiddhā natthīti ayamattho,
tika-s0201t:1308_12: sammāsambuddhattā cassa svākhāto dhammoti atthi dhamme pasādo,
tika-s0201t:1308_13: tato eva ca atthi sīlesu paripūrakāritāti sahadhammikā…pe…
tika-s0201t:1308_14: pabbajitā cāti evamettha satthari pasādena dhamme pasādo,
tika-s0201t:1308_15: tena saṅghasuppaṭipattīti ayañca nayo lesenapi parappavādesu natthīti idheva samaṇo…pe…
tika-s0201t:1309_0: Paṭividdhasaccānaṃ pahīnānurodhānaṃ gehassitapemassa asambhavo evāti “idānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1309_6: Na hi bhagavā bhikkhū saṃkilese niyojeti.
tika-s0201t:1309_7: Evarūpaṃ pemaṃ sandhāyāti pasādāvahaguṇāvahato pūraṇādīsu bhatti pasādo na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1309_13: Visuṃ katvāti aññehi vivecetvā attano āveṇikaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1309_14: “Amhākaṃ satthā”ti byāvadantānaṃ aññesaṃ satthā na hotīti atthato āpannameva hoti,
tika-s0201t:1309_15: tathā ca padesavattiniṃ tassa satthutaṃ paṭijānantā paripuṇṇalakkhaṇasatthutaṃ icchantānampi tato viruddhā satthubhāvapariyesanena parājitā honti.
tika-s0201t:1309_18: kukkurasīlādīsūti idaṃ yebhuyyena aññatitthiyānaṃ tādisaṃ vatasamādānasabbhāvato vuttaṃ, ādi-
tika-s0201t:1309_20: Adhippayāsoti adhikaṃ payasati payujjati etenāti adhippayāso,
tika-s0201t:1310_0: Tassa pasādassa pariyosānabhūtāti tassa satthari dhamme ca pasādassa niṭṭhānabhūtā.
tika-s0201t:1310_2: Samayavādīnañhi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye tadupadesake ca pasādo yāvadeva mokkhādhigamanaṭṭho.
tika-s0201t:1310_3: Diṭṭhigatikā tathā tathā attano laddhivasena niṭṭhaṃ parikappenti yevāti āha “niṭṭhaṃ apaññapento nāma natthī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1310_5: Tesaṃ ekacce brahmunā salokatā niṭṭhāti vadanti,
tika-s0201t:1310_12: Tattha hi nesaṃ niccābhiniveso yathā taṃ bakassa brahmuno.
tika-s0201t:1310_16: Mahābrahmā viya paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ ābhassaresu eko sabbaseṭṭho natthīti “ābhassarā”ti puthuvacanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1310_18: Anto ca mano ca etassa natthīti anantamānaso.
tika-s0201t:1311_3: Yathā pañcasu ṭhānesu ekova kileso lobho āgato,
tika-s0201t:1311_4: evaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu tayo kilesā āgatā “doso moho diṭṭhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1312_1: Padantarena rāgavisesassa vuccamānattāādito vuttaṃ sarāgavacanaṃ oḷārikaṃ rāgavisayanti āha “pañcakāmaguṇikarāgavasenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1312_3: “Anuruddhapaṭiviruddhassā”ti ekapadavasena pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā ekajjhaṃ paduddhāro kato.
tika-s0201t:1312_6: Papañcuppattidassanavasenāti kilesakammavipākānaṃ aparāparuppattipaccayatāya saṃsārassa papañcanaṃ papañco,
tika-s0201t:1312_13: Evaṃ viddhaṃsethāti kāmarāgabhavataṇhādivasena lobhaṃ kasmā evaṃ vippakiretha.
tika-s0201t:1312_15: Subhanti hi ārammaṇe pavatto rāgo “subha”nti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1313_3: Diṭṭhivasena hi “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0201t:1313_4: asassato attā ca loko cā”ti ca diṭṭhigatikā paññapenti.
tika-s0201t:1313_8: Taṇhārahitāya diṭṭhiyā abhāvato taṇhāvaseneva ca attano sassatabhāvābhinivesoti katvā vuttaṃ “taṇhādiṭṭhivasenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1313_11: Ajjhositāti tāya diṭṭhiyā gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpitā viya tadantogadhā.
tika-s0201t:1313_14: evaṃ pabbajitānaṃ diṭṭhajjhosānanti āha “vibhavadiṭṭhiyā te paṭiviruddhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1314_1: Diṭṭhinibbattiggahaṇeneva cettha yathā diṭṭhīnaṃ paṭiccasamuppannatā vibhāvitā,
tika-s0201t:1314_2: evaṃ diṭṭhivatthunopīti ubhayesampi aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā ca vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1314_5: Tattha khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇaṭṭhena “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0201t:1314_18: saccaṃ musāti dvayadhammamāhū”ti “takkī hoti vīmaṃsī”ti ca ādi.
tika-s0201t:1314_20: Yathāha bhagavā “tasseva ayoniso manasikaroto channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati,
tika-s0201t:1314_21: atthi me attāti assa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjatī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1314_28: Cattāro hi ariyamaggā yathārahaṃ tassa tassa saṅkhāragatassa accantanirodhahetu,
tika-s0201t:1315_2: Tattha samparāyiko duggatiparikilesatāyaādīnavapakkhiko evāti itaraṃ dassento “yaṃ sandhāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1315_7: Nissarati etenāti nissaraṇanti vuccamāne dassanamaggo eva diṭṭhīnaṃ nissaraṇaṃ siyā,
tika-s0201t:1315_8: tassa pana atthaṅgamapariyāyena gahitattā sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ diṭṭhīhipi nissaṭanti katvā vuttaṃ “diṭṭhīnaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma nibbāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:1316_1: Diṭṭhicchedanaṃ dassentoti sabbupādānapariññādassanena sabbaso diṭṭhīnaṃ samucchedavidhiṃ dassento.
tika-s0201t:1319_1: Kāmaṃ ito bāhirakānaṃ “imāni upādānāni ettakāni cattāri,
tika-s0201t:1319_2: na ito bhiyyo”ti īdisaṃ ñāṇaṃ natthi,
tika-s0201t:1319_8: attadiṭṭhiyā pana micchābhāvaṃ sabbaso na jānanti eva.
tika-s0201t:1319_11: tathāpi sabbassa pariññeyyassa pariññeyyaṃ paññapemaicceva tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0201t:1319_12: Evaṃbhūtānaṃ pana nesaṃ tattha yādisī paṭipatti,
tika-s0201t:1319_16: Tena tesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vijjamānatāya avicchedataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1319_23: Idāni taṃ atthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “kecī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1319_25: paramahaṃsa- kājaka- tidaṇḍa- monavata- seva- pārupaka-
tika-s0201t:1319_28: mugabbata- carabāka- tāpasa- niganthā- jīvaka- isi-
tika-s0201t:1319_45: Vatthupaṭisevanaṃ kāmanti byāpārassa vatthuno paṭisevanasaṅkhātaṃ kāmaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1319_46: Theyyena sevantīti paṭihatthaādisamaññāya lokassa vacanavasena sevanti.
tika-s0201t:1321_0: Yo titthiyānaṃ attano satthari dhamme sahadhammikesu ca pasādo vutto,
tika-s0201t:1321_6: Titthiyā hi kohaññe ṭhatvā lokaṃ vañcentā dhammaṃ kathemāti “sattime kāyā akaṭā akaṭavidhā”tiādinā yaṃ
tika-s0201t:1321_7: kiñci kathetvā tathā “vinayaṃ paññapemā”ti gosīlavaggulivatādīni paññapetvā tādisaṃ sāvake sikkhāpetvā
tika-s0201t:1321_11: Parittampi nāma puññaṃ kātukāmaṃ maccheramalābhibhūtatāya nivārentassa antarāyaṃ tassa karoto diṭṭheva
tika-s0201t:1321_12: dhamme viññūhi garahitabbatā samparāye ca duggati pāṭikaṅkhā,
tika-s0201t:1321_13: kimaṅgaṃ pana sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāvahe jinacakke pahāradāyino titthakarassa tadovādakarassa cāti
tika-s0201t:1321_15: Yathā so pasādo samparāye na sammaggato attano pavattivasenāti dassento “kañci kālaṃ gantvāpi pacchā vinassati yevā”ti āha,
tika-s0201t:1321_16: aveccappasādo viya accantiko na hotīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1322_2: Sabbampi kāraṇabhedanti sabbampi yathāvuttaṃ titthakarānaṃ sāvakānaṃ apāyadukkhāvahaṃ micchāpaṭipattisaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇavisesaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1322_3: So panesa pasādo na niyyāti micchattapakkhikattā surāpītasiṅgāle pasādo viya.
tika-s0201t:1323_2: Sabbopi lobho kāmupādānanteva vuccatīti āha “arahattamaggena kāmupādānassa pahānapariñña”nti.
tika-s0201t:1323_4: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānānaṃ apāyesu apatanavasena dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhamme.
tika-s0201t:1324_0: Namassamāno aṭṭhāsi dve asaṅkhyeyyāni paccekabodhipāramīnaṃ pūraṇena tattha buddhasāsane paricayena ca bhagavati pasannacittatāya ca.
tika-s0201t:1324_3: Duggateso na gacchatīti duggatiṃ eso na gamissati.
tika-s0201t:1325_1: Kiṃ pana vattabbanti dhammepi paramatthe nimittaṃ gahetvā suṇantānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1325_2: Sāmaṇeravatthūti pabbajitadivaseyeva sappena daṭṭho hutvā kālaṃ katvā devalokaṃ upapannasāmaṇeravatthu.
tika-s0201t:1327_0: Vuttanayānusārenevāti yasmā idhāpi yathāvuttaṃ sabbampi kāraṇabhedaṃ ekato katvā dassento satthā “taṃ kissa hetū”ntiādimāha,
tika-s0201t:1327_1: tasmā tattha aniyyānikasāsane vuttanayassa anussaraṇavasena yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1328_2: Tesaṃ paccayaṃ dassetunti upādānānaṃ pariññā nāma pahānapariññā.
tika-s0201t:1328_4: so ca paccayanirodhena hotīti tesaṃ paccayaṃ mūlakāraṇato pabhuti dassetuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1328_5: Ayanti idāni vuccamāno ettha “ime cā”tiādipāṭhe “kiṃ nidānā”tiādisamāsapadānaṃ attho.
tika-s0201t:1328_7: Iminā eva ca sabbaggahaṇena “phassanidānā”tiādīnampi padānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1328_8: Ime aññatitthiyā upādānānampi samudayaṃ na jānanti,
tika-s0201t:1328_10: tathāgato pana tesaṃ tappaccayapaccayānampi samudayañca atthaṅgamañca yāthāvato jānāti, tasmā – “idheva,
tika-s0201t:1328_13: suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti yathāraddhasīhanādaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassento “ime ca,
tika-s0201t:1328_15: cattāro upādānā”tiādinā nayena desanaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamukhena otārento vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā “yato ca kho”tiādinā
tika-s0201t:1328_16: vivaṭṭaṃ dassento arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi,
tika-s0201t:1332_7: usmā ca nāma īdisassa saviññāṇakatāya bhaveyyāti “siyā gabbho”ti cintesi.
tika-s0201t:1332_11: Dārakānaṃ puññūpanissayato aṅguṭṭhakato cassa khīraṃ nibbatti,
tika-s0201t:1332_13: Carimakabhave bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu viya udaracchaviyā acchavippasannatāya nicchavi viyāti katvā āha “nicchavī ahesu”nti.
tika-s0201t:1332_16: Abhisiñcitvā rājānaṃ akaṃsu rajjasampattiyā dāyakassa kammassa katattā,
tika-s0201t:1333_0: Purassa apareti purassa aparadisāya gāvutamatte ṭhāne jīvakambavanaṃ viya sapākāramandirake.
tika-s0201t:1333_7: Bhāvanāmanasikārena vinā pakatiyāva manussehi nibbattetabbo dhammoti manussadhammo,
tika-s0201t:1335_1: rūpāyatanaṃ jānāti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1335_3: Sammasanupage ca pana dhamme lakkhaṇattayañca tathā jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1335_5: cattāri vā saccāni asammohapaṭivedhato jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṃ, maggo.
tika-s0201t:1335_7: Paccavekkhaṇā maggādhigatassa atthassa paccakkhato jānanaṭṭhena ñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1335_10: tasmiñhi paṭisiddhe sabbesampi buddhaguṇānaṃ asambhavoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1336_0: Sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ nāma jhānavipassanādikaṃ ācariyānuggahena gahitaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-s0201t:1336_2: evaṃ bhavissatī”ti taṃtaṃdassetabbamatthatakkanena vitakkanamattena parito āhataṃ parivattitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1336_12: Aphusitatte hi sukhena vacīghoso na niccharati.
tika-s0201t:1336_14: Jivhāpi thaddhatāya sukhena vacīghoso na niccharatīti āha “mudukā jivhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1337_0: Pañca dhammāti gambhīrañāṇacariyabhūtānaṃ khandhādīnaṃ uggahaṇa- savana- dhāraṇa- paricaya-
tika-s0201t:1337_3: saddo ubhayatthāpi yojetabbo “sammā takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1337_7: tassa niyyānaṃ atthato dhammasseva niyyānanti āha “so dhammo…pe…
tika-s0201t:1338_2: Yasmā pana sunakkhatto kodhavasena kurūro pharusavacano ca,
tika-s0201t:1338_4: Tasmiṃ attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthīti tasmiṃ attabhāve uppajjanārahānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayo natthi.
tika-s0201t:1338_5: Taṃ buddhā “moghapuriso”ti vadanti yathā taṃ sudinnalāḷudāyiādike.
tika-s0201t:1338_6: Upanissaye satipi tasmiṃ khaṇe magge vā phale vā asati “moghapuriso”ti vadanti yathā taṃ dhaniyūpasenattherādike.
tika-s0201t:1338_8: Yathā “makkhali moghapuriso manussakhippaṃ maññe”ti tathā sunakkhattopīti āha “imassa panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1339_2: Saddaṃ sotukāmoti so kira dibbacakkhunā tāvatiṃsabhavane devatānaṃ rūpaṃ passanto oṭṭhacalanaṃ passati,
tika-s0201t:1339_7: So ca atīte ekaṃ sīlavantaṃ bhikkhuṃ kaṇṇasakkhaliyaṃ paharitvā badhiramakāsi,
tika-s0201t:1339_9: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “upanissayo natthīti ñatvā parikammaṃ na kathesī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1339_10: Cintesīti attano micchāparivitakkitena ayoniso ummujjanto cintesi.
tika-s0201t:1340_1: Niyyāno vā ariyamaggo bodhetabbo etassa atthīti niyyāniko desanādhammo.
tika-s0201t:1340_2: Attani atthitaṃ dasseti kiccasiddhidassanena tattha tattha pākaṭīkatattā,
tika-s0201t:1340_4: Tathā hi yathāparādhaṃ taṃtaṃsikkhāpadapaññattiyā yathādhammaṃ veneyyajjhāsayānurūpañca aviparītadhammadesanāya
tika-s0201t:1340_5: devamanussehi yathābhisaṅkhatapañhānaṃ tadajjhāsayānukūlaṃ ṭhānaso vissajjanena ca bhagavato sabbattha
tika-s0201t:1340_9: Anveti yathāgahitasaṅketassa anugamanavasena eti jānātīti anvayo.
tika-s0201t:1340_12: Evaṃ yojanā veditabbāti yathā sabbaññutaññāṇena yojanā katā,
tika-s0201t:1340_13: evaṃ “evarūpampi nāma mayhaṃ iddhividhañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ uttarimanussadhamma”ntiādinā tattha tattha yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1343_1: Yadipi ādito abhiññāttayavasena desanāya āgatattā cetopariyañāṇānantaraṃ upari tisso abhiññā vattabbā siyunti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-s0201t:1343_2: atthato pana vijjāttayaṃ yathāvuttaabhiññāttayamevāti katvā “tisso vijjā vattabbā siyu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1343_3: Kasmā panettha “tāsu vuttāsu upari dasabalañāṇaṃ na paripūratī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1343_4: nanu imāni ñāṇāni sesābhiññā viya attano visayassa abhijānanaṭṭhaṃ upādāya abhiññāsu vattabbāni,
tika-s0201t:1343_5: akampiyaṭṭhaṃ pana upatthambhanaṭṭhañca upādāya balañāṇesu yathā sammāsatiādayo indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgesūti?
tika-s0201t:1343_7: Tattha hi dhammānaṃ dhammakiccavisesavibhāvanaparāya desanāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1343_8: idha pana satthu guṇavisesavibhāvanaparāya desanāya tathā vattuṃ na sakkā atthato anaññattā,
tika-s0201t:1343_9: ekaccānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ uppajjeyya “kimidaṃ bhagavā heṭṭhā vuttaguṇe punapi gaṇhanto guṇādhikadassanaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1344_4: na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ kadācipi uppajjantīti aññehi asādhāraṇānīti.
tika-s0201t:1344_6: Imameva hi yathāvuttalesaṃ apekkhitvā tadabhāvato āsayānusayañāṇādīsu eva asādhāraṇaguṇasamaññā niruḷhā.
tika-s0201t:1345_0: Pakatihatthikulanti giricaranadīcaravanacarādippabhedā gocariyakālāvakanāmā sabbāpi balena pākatikā hatthijāti.
tika-s0201t:1345_3: Ekassāti ca tathā heṭṭhākathāyaṃ āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1345_5: tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ,
tika-s0201t:1345_9: “Saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni sattasattati ñāṇānī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1345_10: tattha pana nidānavagge sattasattati āgatāni catucattārīsañca,
tika-s0201t:1345_11: tesattati pana paṭisambhidāmagge sutamayādīni āgatāni dissanti,
tika-s0201t:1345_14: aññattha ca “pubbante ñāṇa”ntiādinā brahmajālādīsu ca “tayidaṃ tathāgato pajānāti,
tika-s0201t:1345_15: imāni diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni evaṃ gahitānī”tiādinā vuttāni anekāni ñāṇappabhedāni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0201t:1345_16: Yāthāvapaṭivedhato sayañca akampiyaṃ puggalañca taṃsamaṅgiṃ neyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha “akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1346_5: Idaṃ panāti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbaññutameva vadati.
tika-s0201t:1346_6: Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1347_3: tatra vata maṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatīti nimittametaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1347_6: Abhītanādaṃ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena dasabalohanti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0201t:1348_1: purimasappurisūpassayādiṃ upanissāya pacchimasappurisūpassayādīnaṃ sampattipavatti vā vuttāti ādi-
tika-s0201t:1348_10: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1348_11: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti “aññātakoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe…
tika-s0201t:1348_13: Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ
tika-s0201t:1349_4: na gatinivattīti āha “uppajjati ceva pavattati cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1350_1: tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:1350_2: Kammameva vā kammasamādānanti etena samādānasaddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagatasadde gatasaddassa viya.
tika-s0201t:1351_4: Bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu kāmaṃ sabbesaṃ cetanā tassevekassa jīvitindriyārammaṇā,
tika-s0201t:1351_6: Tesu hi eko ādarena chandajāto karoti,
tika-s0201t:1351_7: eko “ehi tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito karoti,
tika-s0201t:1351_8: eko samānacchando viya hutvā appaṭibāhamāno vicarati.
tika-s0201t:1351_9: Tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati,
tika-s0201t:1351_30: idaṃ aññena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1352_0: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva,
tika-s0201t:1352_2: Tesu hi eko ādarena karotīti sesaṃ purimasadisaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1352_18: esa bhummadevesū”tiādinā tattha tattha hīnapaṇītasuvaṇṇadubbaṇṇaappaparivāramahāparivāratādibhedaṃ taṃ taṃ visesaṃ āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1353_1: “iminā nīhārena esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-s0201t:1353_16: esa jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0201t:1354_2: kāmapaṭisaṃyuttato ca kāmo dhātu kāmadhātu. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:1354_7: Khandhāyatanadhātulokanti anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ khandhalokaṃ āyatanalokaṃ dhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1354_27: dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā dhātulokassa anekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca pajānāti.
tika-s0201t:1354_30: “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto,
tika-s0201t:1354_37: imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1354_38: imassa phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ rassaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ mudukaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1354_39: duggandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ kaṭukaṃ ambilaṃ kasāvaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1354_40: imassa kaṇṭako tikhiṇo kuṇṭho ujuko kuṭilo tambo kāḷo odāto hotī”tiādinā pajānāti.
tika-s0201t:1355_2: So pana hīnapaṇītatāsāmaññena pāḷiyaṃ dvidhāva vuttopi hīnapaṇītādibhedena anekavidhoti āha “hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāva”nti.
tika-s0201t:1355_3: Tattha tattha ye ye sattā yaṃyaṃadhimuttikā,
tika-s0201t:1355_4: te te taṃtadadhimuttike eva sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti dhātusabhāgato.
tika-s0201t:1355_8: yaṃ) hīnajjhāsayā dussīlādīhi eva saṃsandanti samenti,
tika-s0201t:1355_10: Taṃ nesaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ bhagavā yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti.
tika-s0201t:1356_0: Vuddhiñca hāniñcāti paccayavisesena sāmatthiyato adhikataṃ anadhikatañca.
tika-s0201t:1356_1: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇaniddese “āsayaṃ jānāti anusayaṃ jānātī”ti āsayādijānanaṃ kasmā niddiṭṭhanti?
tika-s0201t:1356_2: Āsayajānanādinā yehi indriyehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti,
tika-s0201t:1356_7: taṃ tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ vā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ vā āsayo.
tika-s0201t:1356_9: Taṃ pana bhagavā sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto tesaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1357_0: “Kāmaṃ sevantaṃyeva bhagavā jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0201t:1357_1: Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0201t:1357_5: ālokasaññaṃ sevantaṃyeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo thinamiddhagaruko thinamiddhāsayo thinamiddhādhimutto’ti”.
tika-s0201t:1358_0: Paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānanti rūpāvacarānaṃ paṭhamādīnaṃ paccanīkajhāpanaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṭṭhena ca jhānānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1358_2: Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānanti ettha paṭipāṭiyā satta appitappitakkhaṇe paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato ārammaṇe ca adhimuccanato vimokkhā nāma,
tika-s0201t:1358_3: aṭṭhamo pana sabbaso saññāvedayitehi vimuttattā apagamavimokkho nāma.
tika-s0201t:1358_6: nayadvayepi upari tīsu jhānesu samādhi avitakkaavicāro,
tika-s0201t:1358_10: Hānabhāgiyadhammanti appaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādianupakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1358_11: Visesabhāgiyadhammanti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ dutiyajjhānādipakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1358_17: Tañhi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādiadhigamassa paccayattā “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1358_18: Ye pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānanti pāḷi natthī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0201t:1358_19: te “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā.
tika-s0201t:1358_21: kammaṭṭhānaṃ samānaṃ eva “na kammaṭṭhāna”nti saññī hoti,
tika-s0201t:1359_2: Na tathā daṭṭhabbanti yathā paravādinā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1359_4: Sakasakakiccameva jānātīti ṭhānāṭṭhānajānanādiṃ sakaṃ sakaṃyeva kiccaṃ kātuṃ jānāti,
tika-s0201t:1359_11: “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā”tiādinā tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1359_13: Appetuṃ na sakkoti aṭṭhamanavamabalāni viya taṃsadisaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ viya vikubbituṃ.
tika-s0201t:1359_16: Yadipi hi “jhānādipaccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ sattamabala”nti tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1359_17: tathāpi “jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthī”ti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1359_18: Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “jhānaṃ hutvā
tika-s0201t:1359_19: appetuṃ na sakkoti iddhi hutvā vikubbituṃ na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1359_20: na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1359_21: Evaṃ kiccavisesavasenapi dasabalañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ visesaṃ dassetvā idāni vitakkattikabhūmantaravasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1360_4: anadhigamassa pana tadubhayaṃ yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhānañca ṭhānañcāti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “lokiya…pe…
tika-s0201t:1360_6: Tattha lokiyasammādiṭṭhiyā ṭhiti āsavakkhayādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ kilesāvaraṇābhāvassa kāraṇattā.
tika-s0201t:1360_7: Sā hi tasmiṃ sati na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1360_9: Etena tassā aṭṭhitiyā tassa aṭṭhānatā vuttā eva.
tika-s0201t:1360_21: buddhānaṃ pana yadipi āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamato pageva dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamo,
tika-s0201t:1360_22: tathāpi tathā parikammakaraṇaṃ natthi vijjāttayasiddhiyā sijjhanato.
tika-s0201t:1360_23: Sesābhiññāttaye cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamena pattanti ca vattabbataṃ labhatīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1361_0: Puna evarūpiṃ vācaṃ na vakkhāmīti cittaṃ uppādento taṃ vācaṃ pajahati nāma.
tika-s0201t:1361_1: Vācāya pana so attho pākaṭo hotīti “vadanto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1361_5: nāssa nirayūpapattiyā koci vibandho ekaṃsiko ayamatthoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1362_2: tadatthāya vipassanāya ca vinā aññārādhanassa asambhavato “lokiyalokuttarā sīlasamādhipaññā veditabbā”ti
tika-s0201t:1362_3: vatvā puna āsannatare sīlādike dassento “lokuttaravaseneva vinivattetumpi vaṭṭatī”ti āha,
tika-s0201t:1362_5: Aggamaggaṭṭhassa hi diṭṭheva dhamme ekaṃsikā aññārādhanā,
tika-s0201t:1362_12: Tatrāyaṃ yuttiniddhāraṇā “nirayūpago ariyūpavādī tadādāyassa avijjamānato seyyathāpi micchādiṭṭhī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1362_13: Ettha ca “taṃ vācaṃ appahāyā”tiādivacanena tadādāyassa appahānena ca ariyūpavādo antarāyiko anatthāvaho ca,
tika-s0201t:1362_14: pahānena pana accayaṃ desetvā khamāpanena anantarāyiko atthāvaho ca yathā taṃ vuṭṭhitā desitā ca āpattīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1365_5: Taṃ pana ñāṇasampadaṃ pahānasampadaṃ desanāvisesasampadaṃ khemaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ catubbidhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1365_9: na pana dassanaṃ tādisasseva dhammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1365_10: Bhagavatā eva vā “ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti parassa vacanavasena dassitadhammesu.
tika-s0201t:1366_2: Evaṃbhūtā pana te yasmā antarāyakarā nāma honti,
tika-s0201t:1366_4: Asañcicca vītikkamo na tathā sāvajjoti katvā vuttaṃ “sañcicca vītikkantā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1366_5: Satta āpattikkhandhātiādi nidassanamattaṃ itaresampi catunnaṃ “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṃ tabbhāve byabhicārābhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1366_6: Idha pana methunadhammo adhippetoti idaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena vuttaṃ ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:1366_7: Yasmā taṅkhaṇampi kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā viratto hoti ce,
tika-s0201t:1366_12: Tattha yassa kassacīti na kevalaṃ pabbajitasseva,
tika-s0201t:1369_1: Purisassa sūratarabhāvo nāma saṅgāme pākaṭo hoti,
tika-s0201t:1369_3: evaṃ vesārajjañāṇassa ānubhāvo paṇḍitaparisāsu yattha katthacīti dassento “vesārajjañāṇassa baladassanattha”nti āha.
tika-s0201t:1369_5: Eseva nayo sabbatthāti atidesena āvibhāvitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “mārakāyikāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ sadisatthavisayattā atidesassa.
tika-s0201t:1369_6: Yathā hi khattiyānaṃ samūho khattiyaparisāti ayamattho labbhati,
tika-s0201t:1369_8: mārassa parisāti pana māraparisāti ayamattho adhippeto.
tika-s0201t:1369_13: evaṃ uggā khattiyā attano puññatejenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1369_14: Brāhmaṇā tīsu vedesūti idaṃ itaresaṃ avisayadassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1369_15: Vede sajjhāyantāpi hi khattiyā vessā ca tadatthavicāraṇāya yebhuyyena asamatthā evāti.
tika-s0201t:1369_18: Yāmādayo hi uḷāruḷāre kāme paṭisevantā tatthābhigiddhatāya dhammassavanāya sabhāvena cittampi na uppādenti,
tika-s0201t:1369_19: mahābodhisattānaṃ pana buddhānañca ānubhāvena ākaḍḍhiyamānā kadāci tesaṃ payirupāsanādīni karonti tādise mahāsamaye.
tika-s0201t:1369_20: Teneva hi vimānavatthudesanāpi tannimittā bahulā nāhosi.
tika-s0201t:1370_0: Paracakkavāḷesu ca manussānaṃ visesādhigamo natthīti pucchati “kiṃ pana bhagavā aññāni cakkavāḷānipi gacchatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1370_2: vāsanāya pana tattha gantvā dhammaṃ desetīti dassento “āmagacchatī”ti āha.
