tika-s0201t:1609_5: Uppilati purimāvatthāya bhijjati visesaṃ āpajjatīti uppilaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1609_8: Yāya uppannāya kāyacittaṃ vātapūritabhattā viya uddhumāyanākārappattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1609_10: Saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthāti dukkhameva uppajjati nirujjhati ca,
tika-s0201t:1609_11: na añño satto nāma atthīti evaṃ jānituṃ asamatthā “attā nāma atthī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhino appahīnavipallāsā.
tika-s0201t:1610_1: Anattaniyepi khandhapañcake micchāgāhavasena attaniyasaññāya pavattassa chandarāgassa pahānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1610_2: Amhākaṃ neva attāti yasmā rūpavedanādiyeva attaggāhavatthu tabbinimuttassa lobhaneyyassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1610_6: Ajjhattikassa vatthuno neva attāti paṭikkhittattā bāhiravatthu attaniyabhāvena paṭikkhittaṃ hotīti āha “amhākaṃ cīvarādiparikkhāropi na hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1610_7: Khandhapañcakaṃyevāti bāhiravatthuṃ nidassanaṃ katvā khandhapañcakaṃyeva na tumhākanti pajahāpeti.
tika-s0201t:1611_4: Yāva imaṃ ṭhānanti “evaṃ svākkhāto”ti yāvāyaṃ pāḷipadeso.
tika-s0201t:1611_5: Suviññeyyabhāvena akkhātattāpi svākkhātoti āha “sukathitattā eva uttāno vivaṭo pakāsito”ti.
tika-s0201t:1611_8: tato eva tattha tattha sibbitagaṇṭhikatajiṇṇavatthaṃ pilotikā,
tika-s0201t:1611_14: tādisaṃ idha natthīti āha “na hettha…pe… atthī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1611_15: Patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhatīti pesalehi saddhiṃ saṃvāsavasenapi patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati,
tika-s0201t:1612_0: Kāraṇḍavaṃ niddhamathāti vipannasīlatāya kacavarabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ kacavaramiva nirapekkhā apanetha.
tika-s0201t:1612_1: Kasambuñcāpakassathāti kasaṭabhūtañca naṃ khattiyādīnaṃ majjhagataṃ sambhinnaṃ paggharitakuṭṭhaṃ caṇḍālaṃ viya apakassatha nikkaḍḍhatha.
tika-s0201t:1612_7: assamaṇe samaṇamānineti yathā palāpā antosārarahitā ataṇḍulā bahi thusena vīhi viya dissanti,
tika-s0201t:1612_8: evaṃ pāpabhikkhū antosīlarahitāpi bahi kāsāvādiparikkhārena bhikkhū viya dissanti,
tika-s0201t:1612_11: Paramatthato assamaṇe vesamattena samaṇamānine evaṃ niddhamitvāna…pe…
tika-s0201t:1612_15: Patissatāti pati pati satā sampajānantā suṭṭhu pajānantā.
tika-s0201t:1612_17: Athevaṃ suddhā suddhehi saṃvāsaṃ kappentā diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena samaggā.
tika-s0201t:1613_0: Vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ natthi paññāpanāya sabbaso samucchinnavaṭṭamūlakattā.
tika-s0201t:1614_7: paññā vā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti paññāvāhītipi vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1614_9: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo paññāsaṅkhātena dhammena sarati anussaratīti dhammānusārī.
tika-s0201t:1614_11: saddhā vā imaṃ puggalaṃ vahatīti saddhāvāhītipi vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1614_13: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpo puggalo saddhāya sarati anussaratīti saddhānusārī.
tika-s0201t:1614_14: Saddhāmattanti “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā buddhasubuddhatāya saddahanamattaṃ. Matta-
tika-s0201t:1614_18: Evaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnānanti kalāpasammasanādivasena āraddhavipassanānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1614_20: tato eva ekā seṭṭhā uḷārā saddhā uppajjati.
tika-s0201t:1614_22: Sagge ṭhapitā viya hontīti tesaṃ saddhāpemānaṃ saggasaṃvattaniyatāya abyabhicārībhāvamāha.
tika-s0201t:1617_2: Viññujātikā hi paraṃ piyena samudācarantā “bhava”nti vā,
tika-s0201t:1617_7: Mahākassapauruvelakassapādayo aññepi kassapanāmakā atthīti “katarassa kassapassā”ti pucchanti.
tika-s0201t:1617_12: Puññāni karontoti kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca nibbattitvā dānādīni puññāni bhāvento.
tika-s0201t:1617_15: Satthā upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinayakammenevassā bhikkhuniyā pabbajjāya arogabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1618_8: Kassapabhagavato kāle niruḷhasamaññāvasena vacanasantatiyā avicchedena ca imasmimpi buddhuppāde taṃ “andhavana”ntveva paññāyittha,
tika-s0201t:1619_1: saddo apākaṭe viya pākaṭepi vattati eka-
tika-s0201t:1619_4: saddassa atthuddhāraṃ idha dassento evaṃ heṭṭhā tattha tattha katā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā parato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
tika-s0201t:1619_7: Chavigatā pana vaṇṇadhātu eva “suvaṇṇavaṇṇo”ti ettha vaṇṇaggahaṇena gahitāti apare.
tika-s0201t:1619_11: Vaṇṇīyati phalaṃ etena yathāsabhāvato vibhāvīyatīti vaṇṇo, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1619_18: saddassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe pavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1620_1: Kevalakappāti ettha keci īsaṃ asamattā kevalā kevalakappāti vadanti,
tika-s0201t:1620_5: saddena padavaḍḍhanaṃ katvā kevalā eva kevalakappā.
tika-s0201t:1621_1: saddo panāyaṃ saupasaggo anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappanīyapade labbhamānaṃ okappasaddamattaṃ nidasseti,
tika-s0201t:1621_12: Anavasesaṃ pharituṃ samatthassapi obhāsassa kenaci kāraṇena ekadesapharaṇampi siyā,
tika-s0201t:1621_13: ayaṃ pana sabbasova pharīti dassetuṃ samantattho kappa-
tika-s0201t:1622_3: Papañco esāti eso tumhesu āgatesu yathāpavatto paṭisanthāro kathāsamudācāro ca amhākaṃ papañco.
tika-s0201t:1623_6: iminā ca sīghaṃ gantvā satthā pucchitabboti turitaṃ ālapīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1624_0: Vammikapariyāyena karajakāyaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā dassentī devatā “ayaṃ vammiko”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1624_1: Tāya pana bhāvatthassa abhāsitattā saddatthameva dassento “purato ṭhitaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:1624_7: Tassa nivāsato vāto mā kho bādhayitthāti “uparivātato apagammā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1624_8: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ devatā iminā nīhārena ime pañhe therassa ācikkhīti?
tika-s0201t:1624_10: yathāsutamatthaṃ upamābhāvena gahetvā attano paṭibhānena upameyyatthaṃ manasā cintetvā taṃ bhagavāva imassa ācikkhissati.
tika-s0201t:1624_11: Sā ca desanā atthāya hitāya sukhāya hotīti “ayaṃ vammiko”tiādinā upamāvaseneva pannarasa pañhe therassa ācikkhi.
tika-s0201t:1624_12: Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kira bārāṇasiyaṃ eko seṭṭhi aḍḍho mahaddhano mahantaṃ nidhānaṃ nidahitvā palighādiākārāni kānicipi laṅgāni tattha ṭhapesi.
tika-s0201t:1624_13: So maraṇakāle attano sahāyassa brāhmaṇassa ārocesi –
tika-s0201t:1624_15: taṃ mama puttassa viññutaṃ pattassa dassetī”ti vatvā kālamakāsi.
tika-s0201t:1624_16: Brāhmaṇo sahāyakaputtassa viññutaṃ pattakāle taṃ ṭhānaṃ dassesi.
tika-s0201t:1624_18: nāgo attano puttaṃ disvā “sukheneva dhanaṃ gaṇhatū”ti apagacchi.
tika-s0201t:1624_20: Ayaṃ pana devatā tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ gahapatikule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute uraṃ datvā
tika-s0201t:1624_21: sāsane pabbajito pañcahi sahāyakabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samaṇadhammamakāsi.
tika-s0201t:1624_22: Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “pañca bhikkhū nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1624_24: Apare pana “devatā attano paṭibhānena ime pañhe evaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā therassa ācikkhī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1625_7: Asucikalimalaṃ vamatīti ettha mukhādīhi pāṇakānaṃ niggamanato pāṇake vamatīti ayampi attho labbhateva.
tika-s0201t:1625_9: Dukkhasaccapariññāya vā sabbassapi tebhūmakadhammajātassa pariññātattā sabbopi kāyo ariyehi chandarāgappahānena vanto eva.
tika-s0201t:1625_10: Taṃ sabbanti yehi tīhi aṭṭhisatehi ussito,
tika-s0201t:1625_16: “Yathā cā”tiādinā vattabbopamatopi vammiko viya vammikoti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1626_2: Upaciyati etenāti upacayo’ odanakummāsaṃ upacayo etassāti odanakummāsūpacayo. Tassa.
tika-s0201t:1627_0: Kodho dhūmoti ettha dhūmapariyāyena kodhassa vuttattā dhūma-
tika-s0201t:1627_1: saddo kodhe vattatīti vuttaṃ “dhūmo viya dhūmo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1627_10: Timūlanti tīhi mūlehi patiṭṭhitaṃ viya acalaṃ pavattanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1627_11: Rajo ca dhūmo ca mayā pakāsitāti rajasabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena “rajo”ti ca dhūmasabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena “dhūmo”ti ca mayā pakāsitā.
tika-s0201t:1627_14: Ayaṃ rattiṃ dhūmāyanāti yā divā kattabbakammante uddissa rattiyaṃ anuvitakkanā,
tika-s0201t:1628_0: Sattannaṃ dhammānanti idaṃ sutte āgatanayena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1629_0: Etanti “sattha”nti etaṃ adhivacanaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ sasanato samucchindanato.
tika-s0201t:1629_4: lokuttarāya paññāya pavattikkhaṇe lokuttaravīriyaṃ gahetabbanti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1630_2: Te hi brāhmaṇā araññe eva vācenti “mā aññe assosu”nti.
tika-s0201t:1631_3: Kammaṭṭhānauggahaparipucchāvasenāti catusaccakammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanena tassa atthaparipucchāvasena ceva vipassanāsaṅkhāta-
tika-s0201t:1631_7: Vipassanā ca aniccādito sabbatebhūmakadhammānaṃ ñātuṃ icchati.
tika-s0201t:1632_1: saddo paṃsuantare vā mattikantare vāti avuttavikappattho.
tika-s0201t:1632_6: Disā vilokanaṃ pāpeti yattha bādhetabbo ṭhito,
tika-s0201t:1632_9: Yena kodhena aniggahitena mātādikaṃ aghātetabbaṃ ugghātetvā “ayuttaṃ vata mayā kata”nti attānampi hanati,
tika-s0201t:1632_11: Yena vā parassa haññamānassa vasena ghātakopi ghātanaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0201t:1632_13: Kodhasāmaññena hetaṃ vuttaṃ “paraṃ ghātetvā attānaṃ ghātetī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1634_1: Samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayato paṭhamaṃ samathena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1634_2: vipassanā pana tadaṅgavaseneva tāni nīharatīti vuttaṃ “vikkhambhanatadaṅgavasenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1635_0: “Kummova aṅgāni sake kapāle”tiādīsu kummassa aṅgabhāvena visesato pādasīsāni eva vuccantīti āha “pañceva aṅgāni hontī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1635_1: Vipassanācārassa vuccamānattā adhikārato sammasanīyānameva dhammānaṃ idha gahaṇanti “sabbepi saṅkhatā dhammā”ti visesaṃ katvāva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1636_4: Vatthukāmānaṃ upari katvāti vatthukāmesu ṭhapetvā te accādhānaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1637_1: Nandīrāgaṃ upagamma vaṭṭaṃ vaḍḍhentīti sammūḷhattā evaādīnavaṃ apassantā nandīrāgassa ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā taṃ paribrūhenti.
tika-s0201t:1637_4: Tattha sajjattā eva dukkhaṃ patvāpi na ukkaṇṭhanti na nibbindanti.
tika-s0201t:1637_5: Idha anavasesappahānaṃ adhippetanti āha “catutthamaggena nandīrāgappahānaṃ kathita”nti.
tika-s0201t:1638_6: Etassa pañhassāti etassa pannarasamassa pañhassa attho.
tika-s0201t:1638_7: Evaṃ itaresupi vattabbaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ khīṇāsavaguṇehi matthakaṃ pāpento yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0201t:1638_13: Antarapucchāvasena desanāya aparivattitattā ārambhānurūpameva pana desanā niṭṭhapitā.
tika-s0201t:1641_7: Aññepettha pakāreti rājūhi disvā sammā patiṭṭhāpitattā tesaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi rājagahaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1641_8: Ārakkhasampattiādinā anatthuppattihetutāya upagatānaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ gahaṃ gahabhūtantipi rājagahaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1641_12: Buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle cāti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1642_4: sā imesaṃ nivāsoti jātibhūmakāti āha “jātibhūmakāti jātibhūmivāsino”ti.
tika-s0201t:1642_5: Kassa panāyaṃ jātibhūmīti āha “taṃ kho panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1642_6: Tena anaññasādhāraṇāya jātiyā adhippetattā sadevake loke supākaṭabhāvato visesanena vināpi visiṭṭhavisayova idha jāti-
tika-s0201t:1645_3: atha kho kāyavacīpayogehipi veditabboti dassento “dhammagarutāyeva hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1645_4: Tiyāmarattiṃ dhammakathaṃ katvāti ettha “kumbhakārassa nivesane tiyāmarattiṃ vasanto dhammakathaṃ katvā”ti evaṃ vacanasesavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1645_5: Aññathā yathālābhavasena atthe gayhamāne tiyāmarattiṃ dhammakathā katāti āpajjati,
tika-s0201t:1645_8: Dasabalādiguṇavisesā viya dhammagāravahetukā parahitapaṭipattipi sabbabuddhānaṃ majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ
tika-s0201t:1645_9: viya sadisā evāti imassa bhagavato dhammagāravakittane “kassapopi bhagavā”tiādinā kassapabhagavato dhammagāravaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1646_1: Janapadacārikāya akāle nikkhantattā kosalarājādayo vāretuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
tika-s0201t:1646_3: Puṇṇāya sammāpaṭipattiṃ paccāsīsanto bhagavā “kiṃ me karissasī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1647_0: Anahātovāti dhammasavanussukkena sāyanhe buddhāciṇṇaṃ nhānaṃ akatvāva.
tika-s0201t:1647_1: Attahitaparahitapaṭipattīsu ekissā dvinnañca atthitāsiddhā catubbidhatā paṭipattikatā eva nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “paṭipannako ca nāma…pe…
tika-s0201t:1647_3: Paṭikkhepapubbakopi hi paṭipanno atthato paṭipannattho evāti.
tika-s0201t:1647_4: Kāmaṃ attahitāya paṭipanno tāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sāsanaṃ sobhati,
tika-s0201t:1647_6: na ca kāruṇikassa bhagavato sabbathā manorathaṃ pūreti.
tika-s0201t:1647_7: Tathā hi bhagavā paṭhamabodhiyaṃ ekasaṭṭhiyā ca arahantesu jātesu – “caratha,
tika-s0201t:1647_10: Tena vuttaṃ “evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhagavā na pucchati, kasmā?
tika-s0201t:1648_0: Samudāyo appakena ūnopi anūno viya hotīti bākulattheraṃ catuttharāsito bahi katvāpi “asītimahātherā viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1648_1: Asītimahātherasamaññā vā avayavepi aṭṭhasamāpattisāmaññā viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1648_2: Īdise ṭhāne bahūnaṃ ekato kathanaṃ mahatā kaṇṭhena ca kathanaṃ satthu cittārādhanamevāti tehi bhikkhūhi
tika-s0201t:1648_3: tathā paṭipannanti dassento “te bhikkhū meghasaddaṃ sutvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1651_1: saddassa parittapariyāyataṃ manasi katvā āha “byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1651_3: saddo panettha abhāvatthoti sakkā viññātuṃ “appābādhatañca sañjānāmī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0201t:1652_0: Atricchatā nāma atra atra icchāti katvā.
tika-s0201t:1652_1: Asantaguṇasambhāvanatāti attani avijjamānaṃ guṇānaṃ vijjamānānaṃ viya paresaṃ pakāsanā.
tika-s0201t:1652_2: Saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti vattapaṭipattikārakavisesalābhīti jānātu “vattapaṭipattiāpāthakajjhāyitā”ti evamādinā.
tika-s0201t:1654_0: Appicchatāpadhānaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena catubbidhaṃ icchāpabhedaṃ dassetvā punapi puggalādhiṭṭhānena catubbidhaṃ
tika-s0201t:1655_0: Ekabhikkhupi na aññāsi sosānikavatte sammadeva vuttittā.
tika-s0201t:1655_2: Dutiyo maṃ na jāneyyāti dutiyo sahāyabhūtopi yathā maṃ jānituṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
tika-s0201t:1655_3: tathā saṭṭhi vassāni nirantaraṃ susāne vasāmi,
tika-s0201t:1656_1: nu kho ayyassa santikeva dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti kolāhalavasena mahājanaṃ khobhetvā.
tika-s0201t:1656_3: tena rattiyaṃ dhammakathā katā”ti jānanabhayena pariyattiappicchatāya pariveṇaṃ gato.
tika-s0201t:1657_0: Tayo kulaputtā viyāti pācīnavaṃsadāye samaggavāsaṃ vutthā tayo kulaputtā viya.
tika-s0201t:1657_1: Pahāyāti pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena pacchā aggamaggeneva pajahitvā.
tika-s0201t:1660_0: Pakatidubbalādīnaṃ garucīvarādīni naphāsubhāvāvahāni sarīrakhedāvahāni ca hontīti payojanavasena naatricchatādivasena
tika-s0201t:1660_1: tāni parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogo na santosavirodhīti āha “lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1660_3: bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvāpi tāni vissajjetvā tadaññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti āha “tesaṃ…pe…
tika-s0201t:1660_5: Evaṃ sesapaccayesupi yathābalayathāsāruppasantosaniddesesu apisaddaggahaṇe adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1663_8: Paramavodānappattānanti vitakkāditaṃtaṃjhānapaṭipakkhavigamena paramaṃ uttamaṃ vodānaṃ pattānaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1666_8: Sotaviññāṇavīthivasenāti idaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ savanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1666_13: Tattha paṭhamaṃ jātake veditabbanti itaraṃ dassento “daharo kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1666_14: Kāmarāgena viddhoti rāgasallena hadaye appito anto anuviddho.
tika-s0201t:1667_2: Tasmiṃ kira gāme yebhuyyena itthiyo abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā,
tika-s0201t:1667_3: tasmā thero “sace antogāme na carissasī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1668_3: Yāya kāyacipi itthiyā santakaparibhogavasena uppannarāgopi sambhogasaṃsaggova.
tika-s0201t:1671_3: Gāhamuttakoti ayoniso āmisehi saṅgaṇhanakehi sayaṃ muccanako.
tika-s0201t:1672_1: Pāpuṇituṃ na deti uppannameva taṃ paṭisaṅkhānabalena nīharanto vikkhambheti.
tika-s0201t:1672_5: evaṃ khaṇamattampi kilesehi saha na saṃvasatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1673_2: Vipassanāya pādakā vipassanāpādakāti aṭṭhasamāpattiggahaṇena yathā lokiyasamādhi gahito,
tika-s0201t:1673_3: evaṃ vipassanāpādakā etesanti vipassanāpādakāti aṭṭhasamāpattiggahaṇeneva lokuttaro samādhi gahito.
tika-s0201t:1673_4: Yathā hi cattāri rūpajjhānāni adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā pavatto maggasamādhi vipassanāpādako,
tika-s0201t:1673_5: evaṃ cattāri arūpajjhānāni adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā pavattopi.
tika-s0201t:1674_1: santuṭṭhatāya laddhā te agadhito amucchitoādīnavadassī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati,
tika-s0201t:1674_2: evaṃbhūto ca katthaci alaggamānasatāya pavivekaṃ paribrūhento kenaci asaṃsaṭṭho viharati gahaṭṭhena vā pabbajitena vā.
tika-s0201t:1674_3: So evaṃ ajjhāsayasampanno vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā,
tika-s0201t:1674_5: Ārabhanto ca yathāsamādinnaṃ attano sīlaṃ paccavekkhati,
tika-s0201t:1674_6: tassa sīlassa suparisuddhataṃ nissāya uppajjati avippaṭisāro,
tika-s0201t:1674_8: Tassa avippaṭisāramūlakehi pāmojjapītipassaddhisukhehi sammā brūhitaṃ cittaṃ sammadeva samādhiyati,
tika-s0201t:1674_15: tato vimuttito ñāṇadassananti etesaṃ dasannaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ anupubbī veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1674_21: itarā karuṇāpubbaṅgamā karuṇāsampayuttā cāti sabbaṃ ñāṇakaruṇākaṇḍaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1675_0: Dasahi kathāvatthūhi karaṇabhūtehi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ deti,
tika-s0201t:1675_1: “bhikkhunā nāma atricchatādike dūrato vajjetvā sammadeva appicchena bhavitabba”ntiādinā taṃ taṃ kathāvatthuṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upadisatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1675_2: Upadisanto hi tāni “tehi bhikkhū ovadatī”ti vutto.
tika-s0201t:1675_4: Sukhumaṃ atthaṃ parivattetvāti evampi appicchatā hoti evampīti appicchatādivasena aparāparaṃ appicchatāvuttiṃ
tika-s0201t:1675_5: dassetvā tattha sukhumanipuṇaṃ appicchatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ jānāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0201t:1675_14: Ussāhajananavasenāti yathā taṃ samādānaṃ niccalaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1675_15: evaṃ ussoḷhiyā uppādanavasena sammadeva uttejetīti samuttejako.
tika-s0201t:1675_17: Vaṇṇaṃ vatvā tattha sampattiṃ āyatiñca labbhamānaguṇaṃ kittetvā sampahaṃseti sammadeva pakārehi tosetīti sampahaṃsako.
tika-s0201t:1678_3: Mandamando viyāti ati viya acheko viya.
tika-s0201t:1678_4: Abalabalo viyāti ati viya abalo viya.
tika-s0201t:1678_5: Bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko viyāti ati viya dummukho viya.
tika-s0201t:1678_7: dasa kathāvatthūni sarūpato visesato ca anupariggahetvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1678_8: Pariggaṇhanaṃ pana nesaṃ anupavisanaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “anupavisitvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1682_0: Pubbe dhammagarutākittanapasaṅgena gahitaṃ aggahitañca mahākassapapaccuggamanādiṃ ekadesena dassetvā
tika-s0201t:1682_1: vanavāsitissasāmaṇerassa vatthuṃ vitthāretvā janapadacārikaṃ kathetuṃ “bhagavā hī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1682_3: Saṅghakammena sijjhamānāpi upasampadā satthu āṇāvaseneva sijjhanato “buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī”ti vuttanti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1682_4: Apare “aparipuṇṇavīsativassasseva tassa upasampadaṃ anujānanto satthā ‘buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī’ti avocā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1683_3: Aññenapi kāraṇenāti bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanātaruṇabhāvato aññenapi majjhimamaṇḍale veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākādikāraṇena nikkhamati,
tika-s0201t:1683_5: Sattahi vātiādi “ekaṃ māsaṃ vā”tiādinā vuttānukkamena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1684_0: Sarīraphāsukatthāyāti ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nibaddhavāsena ussannadhātukassa sarīrassa virecanena phāsubhāvatthāya.
tika-s0201t:1684_1: Aṭṭhuppattikālābhikaṅkhanatthāyāti aggikkhandhūpamasutta maghadevajātakādidesanānaṃ viya dhammadesanāya aṭṭhuppattikālassa ākaṅkhanena.
tika-s0201t:1685_5: Tadā pana kāyaviveko na sakkā laddhunti idamettha kāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1685_7: Therassa parisā suvinītā ciṇṇagaruvāsā garuno icchānurūpameva vattati.
tika-s0201t:1686_0: Vuttakāraṇayutte addhānagamane cārikānaṃ vohāro sāsane niruḷhoti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1686_1: Kenacideva nimittena kismiñci atthe pavattāya saññāya tannimittarahitepi aññasmiṃ pavatti ruḷhī nāma.
tika-s0201t:1686_3: Aññaṃ sevitvāti “mama āgatabhāvaṃ satthu ārocehī”ti ārocanatthaṃ aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ sevitvā.
tika-s0201t:1687_0: Bhagavā dhammaṃ desento taṃtaṃpuggalajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tadanucchavikameva dhammiṃ kathaṃ karotīti dassento “cūḷagosiṅgasutte”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1687_5: Satipaṭilābhikanti jotipālatthere lāmakaṃ ṭhānaṃ otiṇṇamatte mahābodhipallaṅke pana sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūrento āgato.
tika-s0201t:1687_6: Tādisassa nāma pamādavihāro na yuttoti yathā kassapo bhagavā bodhisattassa satiṃ paṭilabhituṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi,
tika-s0201t:1687_7: tathā ayaṃ bhagavā tameva pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ghaṭikārasuttaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0201t:1687_12: ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso cā”ti ime cattāro dhammuddese kathesi.
tika-s0201t:1687_13: Kāmañcete dhammuddesā raṭṭhapālasutte āyasmatā raṭṭhapālattherena rañño korabyassa kathitā,
tika-s0201t:1687_14: te pana bhagavato eva āharitvā therena tattha kathitāti vuttaṃ “raṭṭhapālasutte”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1687_17: tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena cattāro dhammuddesā uddiṭṭhā”tiādi pānakānisaṃsakathanti
tika-s0201t:1687_18: “aggihuttaṃ mukhaṃ yaññā”tiādinā anumodanaṃ vatvā puna pakiṇṇakakathāvasena pānakapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ ānisaṃsakathaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0201t:1687_20: yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ bhaguṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1687_23: ayampi appicchakathāyevā”tiādi bahūhi pariyāyehi nānānayaṃ deseti.
tika-s0201t:1687_24: Kathaṃ tathā desitaṃ thero aññāsīti āha “paṭisambhidāpattassa…pe… ahosī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1690_2: Yadā jātibhūmakā bhikkhū satthu sammukhā therassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu,
tika-s0201t:1690_4: Sīsānulokī hutvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhanaṃ therena samāgame ādaravasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1690_7: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīna”ntiādi,
tika-s0201t:1690_9: Na hi dhammasenāpati tassa therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇena jānituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0201t:1690_10: “Kacci nu kho maṃ adisvāva gamissatī”ti ayampi cintā ādaravasenevāti yuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1690_11: Na hi satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgato sāvako api āyasmā aññātakoṇḍañño satthukappaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ tattha vasantaṃ adisvāva gacchanako nāma atthi.
tika-s0201t:1691_3: Pacchimakathā na jāyatīti pacchā vattabbakathāya avasaro na hoti.
tika-s0201t:1691_7: tasmā “catupārisuddhisīlādīsu ṭhitassapi brahmacariyavāso matthakaṃ na pāpuṇātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1692_5: So hi attano phalaṃ upādiyati upādānavasena gaṇhatīti upādānanti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1692_8: “Anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī”ti vacanato arahattaphalaṃ anupādāparinibbānanti kathenti.
tika-s0201t:1692_9: Na ca upādānasampayuttanti upādānehi etaṃ na sahitaṃ nāpi upādānehi saha pavatti hutvā.
tika-s0201t:1692_10: Na ca kañci dhammaṃ upādiyatīti kassaci dhammassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena na upādiyati.
tika-s0201t:1692_13: kathentānañca yathā tassa koci paccayo nāma natthi,
tika-s0201t:1692_14: evaṃ adhigatopi yathā koci paccayo nāma na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1692_16: Puna pucchaṃ ārabhi anupādāparinibbānaṃ sarūpato patiṭṭhāpetukāmo.
tika-s0201t:1693_8: Yo pana catubbidhe vivaṭṭūpanissaye sīle ṭhito,
tika-s0201t:1696_3: Cittavisuddhi hettha sīlavisuddhiṃ payojeti tassa tadatthattā.
tika-s0201t:1696_7: diṭṭhivisuddhiyaṃ ṭhitassa cittavisuddhakiccaṃ kataṃ nāma hotītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1697_2: Accāyikassa kiccassa uppādakālo viya navameneva khaṇena pattabbassa abhisamayakiccassa upādakālo.
tika-s0201t:1697_3: Yathā rañño sattamena rathavinītena sākete antepuradvāre oruḷhassa na tāva kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0201t:1697_4: saṃvidhātabbasaṃvidhānaṃ ñātimittagaṇaparivutassa surasabhojanaparibhoge niṭṭhitaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-s0201t:1697_5: evametaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā kilese khepetvā tesaṃyeva paṭippassaddhipahānasādhakaariyaphalasamaṅgikāle abhisamayakiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0201t:1697_8: Tattha paropaṇṇāsa kusaladhammā nāma cittuppādapariyāpannā phassādayo paropaṇṇāsa anavajjadhammā.
tika-s0201t:1698_1: byañjanameva nānanti tesaṃ atthato anaññabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “itī”ti āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1698_2: Āyasmā puṇṇo dasa kathāvatthūni vissajjesīti satta visuddhiyo nāma vissajjantopi dasa kathāvatthūni vissajjesi tesaṃ atthato anaññattā.
tika-s0201t:1698_3: Eteneva dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero satta visuddhiyo pucchanto dasa kathāvatthūni pucchīti ayampi attho vuttovāti veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1698_5: Kiṃ jānitvā pucchīti visuddhipariyāyena kathāvatthūni pucchāmīti kiṃ jānitvā pucchi.
tika-s0201t:1698_6: Dasakathāvatthulābhinaṃ theraṃ visuddhiyo pucchanto pucchitaṭṭhāneyeva pucchanena kiṃ titthakusalo vā pana hutvā visayasmiṃ pucchi,
tika-s0201t:1698_7: udāhu pānīyatthikamatitthehi chinnataṭehi pātento viya atitthakusalo hutvā apucchitabbaṭṭhāne avisayasmiṃ pucchīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1698_10: taṃ dassentena “titthakusalo hutvā”tiādiṃ vatvā visuddhikathāvatthūnaṃ atthato anaññattepi ayaṃ viseso veditabboti dassetuṃ “yaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1698_13: taṃ iminā idāni vuccamānena nayena vidhinā veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1699_0: Ekā sīlavisuddhīti visuddhīsu visuṃ ekā sīlavisuddhi.
tika-s0201t:1699_1: Dasasu kathāvatthūsu cattāri kathāvatthūni hutvā āgatā appicchatādīhi vinā sīlavisuddhiyā asambhavato.
tika-s0201t:1699_5: sabhāvato vā catunnaṃ kathāvatthūnaṃ sīlavisuddhisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1701_2: Aṭṭhānaparikappenāti akāraṇassa vatthuno parikappanena tadā asambhavantaṃ atthaṃ parikappetvā vacanena.
tika-s0201t:1702_2: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne imasmiṃ kāraṇe ekapadeneva sāvakavisaye anaññasādhāraṇaguṇāvikaraṇanimittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1703_0: “Anumassa anumassa pucchitā”ti vuttattā vicāraṇavasenāha “kiṃ pana pañhassa pucchanaṃ bhāriyaṃ udāhu vissajjana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1703_3: Pucchanampīti evaṃ sahadhammena pucchitabbamatthaṃ sayaṃ sampādetvā pucchanampi bhāriyaṃ dukkaraṃ.
tika-s0201t:1703_8: ante vasībhāvappattaṃ paññaṃ dassetvā desanāya niṭṭhāpitattāti.
tika-s0201t:1706_7: “Mayaṃ viya aññe ke īdisaṃ labhissantī”ti mānamadaṃ āpajjissanti.
tika-s0201t:1706_9: Tiracchānā hi vijātiyabalavatiracchānavasanaṭṭhānesu sāsaṅkā ubbiggahadayā appamattā honti visesato māgavikādimanussūpacāre,
tika-s0201t:1706_15: Tattha nīvāravanaṃ viyāti nīvārassa samūho viya.
tika-s0201t:1708_1: Bhayena bhogatoti bhayena saha sabhayaṃ nivāpaparibhogato.
tika-s0201t:1708_5: tañca atthato manasikāramaggehi aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakavātoti vuttaṃ “aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇavāyodhātū”ti.
tika-s0201t:1709_8: Tassa pana sappadesatā mahāokāsatāyāti vuttaṃ “mahantaṃ okāsa”nti.
tika-s0201t:1711_2: Lokapariyāpannaṃ hutvā kilesehi āmasitabbatāya lokāmisānīti vā.
tika-s0201t:1711_4: Vasaṃ vattetīti kāmaguṇehi kāmaguṇe giddhe satte tasseva gedhassa vasena attano vase vattetīti. Tenāha –
tika-s0201t:1713_0: Tena taṃ bādhayissāmi, na me samaṇa mokkhasī”ti. ;
tika-s0201t:1715_1: Kāmato cittassa vimutti idha cetovimuttīti adhippetāti āha “cetovimutti nāma…pe…
tika-s0201t:1715_3: Kāme vissajjetvā puna tattha nimuggatāya dutiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇā dutiyamigajātūpamā vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1716_1: Tatiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇā yathāpariccatte kāme pariccajitvā evaṃ ṭhitā,
tika-s0201t:1716_2: na dutiyā viya tattha nimuggāti adhippāyena “kiṃ pana te akaṃsū”ti pucchati.
tika-s0201t:1716_3: Itare kāmaṃ ujukaṃ kāmaguṇesu na nimuggā,
tika-s0201t:1716_4: pariyāyena pana nimuggā diṭṭhijālena ca ajjhotthaṭāti dassento “gāmanigamajanapadarājadhāniyo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1716_5: Diṭṭhijālampi taṇhājālānugatamevāti āha “mārassa pāpimato diṭṭhijālena parikkhipitvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1717_1: Khandhakilesābhisaṅkhāramārā vā idha māraggahaṇena gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1717_4: Kiñcāpi māro yaṃ kiñci jhānaṃ samāpannassapi bhikkhuno cittaṃ imaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ nissāya vattatīti na jānāti,
tika-s0201t:1717_6: Teneva pariyāyenāti “na mārassa akkhīni bhindī”ti evamādinā yathāvuttapariyāyena.
tika-s0201t:1717_8: Cakkhussa padaṃ patiṭṭhāti ca idha ārammaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ taṃ pariggayha pavattanatoti āha “appatiṭṭhaṃ nirārammaṇa”nti.
tika-s0201t:1717_11: Yasmā maggena catusaccadassanahetu āsavā na parikkhīṇā.
tika-s0201t:1718_1: Sattavisattabhāvenāti laggabhāvena ceva savisesaṃ āsattabhāvena ca.
tika-s0201t:1718_3: Visatāti vitthaṭā rūpādīsu tebhūmakadhammesu byāpanavasena visaṭāti purimavacanameva takārassa ṭakāraṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1718_6: Ratto hi rāgavatthunā pādena tāliyamānopi sahati.
tika-s0201t:1718_9: Visaṃharatīti yathā tathā kāmesu ānisaṃsaṃ dassentī vividhehi ākārehi nekkhammābhimukhappavattito cittaṃ saṃharati saṅkhipati,
tika-s0201t:1718_12: Visaṃvādikāti aniccādiṃ niccādito gaṇhāpentī visaṃvādikā hoti.
tika-s0201t:1718_14: visaṃ vā dukkhadukkhādibhūtā vedanā mūlaṃ etissāti visamūlā.
tika-s0201t:1718_20: taṃ dassetuṃ puna “visālā vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1718_23: Tena tena maggena uddhamuddhaṃ tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo.
tika-s0201t:1722_6: Dhanapariccāgo kato nāma natthi bhagavato dharamānakāleti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1723_2: Vuttañhetaṃ “sukhumattā chaviyā kāye rajojallaṃ na limpatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1723_3: Yadi evaṃ kasmā bhagavā nahāyatīti āha “utuggahaṇattha”nti.
tika-s0201t:1724_4: mañcānaṃ pana appamahantatāhi pādānaṃ patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānassa hānivaḍḍhiyo hontiyeva.
tika-s0201t:1725_1: Nhānavattanti “pabbajitena nāma evaṃ nhāyitabba”nti nahānacārittaṃ dassetvā.
tika-s0201t:1725_3: tasmā tahaṃ tahaṃ vinissatajātihiṅgulakarasūpasobhitaṃ upari mahaggharatanāvaḷisañchāditaṃ jaṅgamamiva kanakagirisikharaṃ virocittha.
tika-s0201t:1725_4: Tasmiñca samaye dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhamitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo samantato asītihatthappamāṇe padese ādhāvantī vidhāvantī ratanāvaḷiratanadāma-
tika-s0201t:1725_19: gaganatalaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ pavanañca sammā pharanti.
tika-s0201t:1725_22: Upamāyoti “īdiso ca hotī”ti yathārahaṃ tadanucchavikā upamā.
tika-s0201t:1726_3: Kiṃ panāyaṃ nayo buddhānampi sarīre hotīti? Na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1726_4: vattadassanatthaṃ panetaṃ katanti dassetuṃ “buddhānaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1727_3: Tañhi mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ mahantañca cakkavattisiriṃ pajahitvā sadevakassa
tika-s0201t:1727_4: lokassa samārakassa ca acinteyyāparimeyyabhedassa mahato atthāya hitāya sukhāya pavattattā mahanīyatāya
tika-s0201t:1728_0: Purimoti “katamāya nu kathāya sannisinnā bhavathā”ti evaṃ vuttaattho.
tika-s0201t:1728_1: Kā ca pana voti ettha ca-
tika-s0201t:1728_3: Tena yathāpucchitāya kathāya vakkhamānaṃ vippakatabhāvaṃ joteti. Pana-
tika-s0201t:1728_5: Yāya hi kathāya te bhikkhū sannisinnā,
tika-s0201t:1728_6: sā eva antarākathābhūtā vippakatā visesena puna pucchīyati.
tika-s0201t:1728_14: kāni cassa saṃkilesavodānānī”tiādinā appicchādinissitā sīlādinissitā ca kathā.
tika-s0201t:1729_3: dvaya”nti aṭṭhuppattivasena desanā pavattāti tassā uparidesanāya sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “dvemā,
tika-s0201t:1729_6: Ayaṃ tumhākaṃ pariyesanāti yā mahābhinikkhamanapaṭibaddhā dhammī kathā,
tika-s0201t:1729_7: sā tumhākaṃ dhammapariyesanā dhammavicāraṇā ariyapariyesanā nāma.
tika-s0201t:1730_2: Parato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā sabbadā jātarūpameva hotīti jātarūpaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1730_4: Idha pana suvaṇṇaṃ ṭhapetvā yaṃ kiñci upabhogaparibhogārahaṃ rajataṃteva gahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1730_13: Malaṃ gahetvāti yehi sahayogato malinaṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1730_16: Ye pana jātidhammavārepi jātarūpaṃ na paṭhanti,
tika-s0201t:1730_17: tesaṃ itaresaṃ viya jīraṇadhammavāre sarūpato anāgatampi upadhiggahaṇena gahitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1730_18: Pariggahe ṭhitānaṃ pana vasena vuccamāne apākaṭānampi jātijarāmaraṇānaṃ vasena yojanā labbhateva.
tika-s0201t:1730_19: Jātarūpasīsena cettha sabbassapi anindriyabaddhassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1731_2: ariyānaṃ pariyesanāti vā ariyapariyesanāti samāsadvayaṃ dasseti “ayaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1732_3: Yasmā te bhikkhū tattha mahābhinikkhamanakathāya sannisinnā,
tika-s0201t:1732_5: tasmā bhagavā tesaṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya mahābhinikkhamanakathaṃ kathetuṃ ārabhi.
tika-s0201t:1732_6: Ahampi pubbeti visesavacanaṃ aparipakkañāṇena sayaṃ carimabhave tīsu pāsādesu tividhanāṭakaparivārassa
tika-s0201t:1732_10: Pañcavaggiyāpīti yathāsakaṃ gihibhogaṃ anuyuttā taṃ pahāya pabbajitvā attakilamathānuyoge ṭhitā satthu
tika-s0201t:1733_2: saddo “daharaṃ kumāraṃ mandaṃ uttānaseyyaka”nti ettha bāladārake āgato,
tika-s0201t:1733_3: “bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato”ti pana vakkhamānattā yuvāvatthā idha dahara-
tika-s0201t:1733_10: taṃ pana vatvā “rudantāna”nti vacanaṃ balavasokasamuṭṭhānaṃ ārodanavatthuṃ pakāsetīti āha “kanditvā rodamānāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:1733_11: Kiṃ kusalanti gavesamānoti kinti sabbaso avajjarahitaṃ ekanta niyyānikaṃ pariyesamāno.
tika-s0201t:1733_18: Sutvāva uggaṇhinti tena vuccamānassa savanamatteneva uggaṇhiṃ vācuggataṃ akāsiṃ.
tika-s0201t:1734_5: Aññepi bahūti aññepi bahū mama tathābhāvaṃ jānantā “ayaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ jānātī”ti,
tika-s0201t:1734_7: Lābhīti aññāsīti dhammassa uddisanena mahāpaññatāya “ayaṃ attanā gatamaggaṃ pavedeti,
tika-s0201t:1734_10: Etadahosīti etaṃ “na kho āḷāro kālāmo”tiādi manasi ahosi,
tika-s0201t:1735_0: Heṭṭhimasamāpattīhi vinā uparimasamāpattīnaṃ sampādanassa asambhavato “satta samāpattiyo maṃ jānāpesī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1736_2: Bodhisattassa tā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā ṭhitassa purimajātiparicayena ñāṇassa ca mahantatāya tāsaṃ gati ca abhisamparāyo ca upaṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0201t:1736_5: Ekaccānaṃ virāgabhāvanāsamatikkamāvahopi neva tesampi accantāya samatikkamāvaho,
tika-s0201t:1737_0: Yāvadeva ākiñcaññāyatanupapattiyāti sattasu samāpattīsu ukkaṭṭhaṃ gahetvā vadati.
tika-s0201t:1737_1: Uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya acutidhammaṃ pariyesituṃ yuttattā tañca anatikkantajātidhammamevāti mahāsatto pajahatīti āha “yañca ṭhānaṃ pāpetī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1737_2: Tato paṭṭhāyāti yadā samāpattidhammassa gatiñca abhisamparāyañca abbhaññāsi,
tika-s0201t:1737_6: Mahantena ussāhenāti idaṃ katipāhaṃ tattha bhāvanānuyogamattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1737_8: Na hi antimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ samāpattinibbattane bhāriyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0201t:1737_9: Analaṅkaritvāti anu anu alaṃkatvā punappunaṃ “iminā na kiñci payojana”nti katvā.
tika-s0201t:1738_0: 278. Vācāya uggahitamattovāti ettha pubbe vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1739_4: Uru maru sikatā vālukā vaṇṇu vālikāti ime saddā samānatthā,
tika-s0201t:1740_5: Idha pana bodhipallaṅko adhippeto ariyapariyesanāya vuccamānattā.
tika-s0201t:1741_1: “Ñāṇadassana”nti ca ekajjhaṃ gahitapadadvayavisayavisesassa anāmaṭṭhattā “me”ti ca gahitattā anavasesañeyyāvabodhanasamatthameva ñāṇavisesaṃ bodheti,
tika-s0201t:1741_3: na dassanamattanti āha “sabbadhammadassanasamatthañca me sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ udapādī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1741_6: Ārammaṇasantatāyapi tadārammaṇānaṃ atthi viseso yathā taṃ “āneñjavihāre”ti āha “akuppārammaṇatāya cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1742_1: Paṭividdhoti sayambhuñāṇena “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā paṭimukhaṃ nibbijjhanavasena patto,
tika-s0201t:1742_3: Gambhīroti mahāsamuddo viya makasatuṇḍasūciyā aññatra samupacitaparipakkañāṇasambhārehi aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭho.
tika-s0201t:1742_6: so ogāhitumasakkuṇeyyatāya sarūpato ca passituṃ na sakkāti āha “gambhīrattāva duddaso”ti.
tika-s0201t:1742_9: tassa ogāhetvā anu anu bujjhane kathā eva natthīti āha “duddasattāva duranubodho”ti.
tika-s0201t:1742_14: katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā”ti suttapadaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1742_19: Ettha ca nirodhasaccaṃ santaṃ ārammaṇanti santārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1742_21: Anupasantasabhāvānaṃ kilesānaṃ saṅkhārānañca abhāvato nibbutasabbapariḷāhatāya santapaṇītabhāveneva ca asecanakatāya atappakatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1742_26: bālānaṃ avisayattā paṇḍitehi eva veditabboti paṇḍitavedanīyo.
tika-s0201t:1743_2: Atthato pana ṭhānanti ca paṭiccasamuppādo eva adhippeto.
tika-s0201t:1743_7: Idappaccayā eva idappaccayatā yathā “devo eva devatā”ti,
tika-s0201t:1743_8: idappaccayānaṃ vā avijjādīnaṃ attano phalaṃ pati paccayabhāvo uppādanasamatthatā idappaccayatā.
tika-s0201t:1744_0: Sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādi sabbanti sabbasaṅkhārasamathādisaddābhidheyyaṃ sabbaṃ atthato nibbānameva.
tika-s0201t:1744_1: Idāni tassa nibbānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1744_5: Tathā santā savisesaṃ upasantā nāma hontīti āha “vūpasammantī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1744_8: Sabbasaṅkhatavisaṃyutte ca nibbāne sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamapariyāyo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1744_12: Sabbe kilesarāgāti kāmarāgarūparāgādibhedā sabbepi kilesabhūtā rāgā,
tika-s0201t:1745_0: Ciranisajjācirabhāsanehi piṭṭhiāgilāyanatālugalasosādivasena kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1745_1: Sā ca kho desanāya atthaṃ ajānantānaṃ vasena vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1745_2: jānantānaṃ pana desanāya kāyaparissamopi satthu aparissamova.
tika-s0201t:1745_7: Ubhayanti cittakilamatho ceva cittavihesā cāti ubhayampetaṃ buddhānaṃ natthi bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā.
tika-s0201t:1746_7: Kappānaṃ satasahassaṃ cattāri ca asaṅkhyeyyāni sadevakassa lokassa dhammasaṃvibhāgakaraṇatthameva pāramiyo
tika-s0201t:1747_6: ekaṃsena vā alaṃ nippayojanaṃ evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa dhammassa desitanti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1747_7: Halanti vā “ala”nti iminā samānatthaṃ padaṃ “halanti vadāmī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0201t:1747_8: Rāgadosapariphuṭṭhehīti phuṭṭhavisena viya sappena rāgena dosena ca samphuṭṭhehi abhibhūtehi.
tika-s0201t:1747_9: Rāgadosānugatehīti rāgena ca dosena ca anubandhehi.
tika-s0201t:1748_2: Na dakkhantīti yāthāvato dhammaṃ na paṭivijjhissanti.
tika-s0201t:1748_3: Evaṃ gāhāpetunti “anicca”ntiādinā sabhāvena yāthāvato dhammaṃ jānāpetuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1749_1: Dhammadesanāya appossukkatāpattiyā kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kasmā panā”tiādinā sayameva codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0201t:1749_2: Tattha aññātavesenāti imassa bhagavato sāvakabhāvūpagamanena aññātarūpena.
tika-s0201t:1749_9: (Tattha paṭipakkhā nāma rāgādayo kilesā sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarattā.
tika-s0201t:1749_10: Tesaṃ balavabhāvato ciraparibhāvanāya sattasantānato dubbisodhiyatāya te satte mattahatthino viya dubbalapurisaṃ
tika-s0201t:1749_11: adhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā anekasatayojanāyāmavitthāraṃ sunicitaṃ ghanasannivesaṃ
tika-s0201t:1749_14: Tattha ca anto amaṭṭhatāya kañjiyapuṇṇā lābu.
tika-s0201t:1749_18: hīnūpamā cetā rūpapabandhabhāvato acirakālikattā ca malīnatāya,
tika-s0201t:1749_19: kilesasaṃkileso eva pana dubbisodhanīyataro anādikālikattā anusayitattā ca.
tika-s0201t:1750_4: so garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ ajjhesanahetukoti panāḷikāya sattānaṃ dhammasampaṭipattiyā brahmayācanānimittanti taṃ dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1751_1: apparajaṃ akkhi paññācakkhu yesaṃ te taṃsabhāvāti katvā apparajakkhajātikāti ayamattho vibhāvito “paññāmaye”tiādinā.
tika-s0201t:1751_2: Appaṃ rāgādirajaṃ yesaṃ taṃsabhāvā apparajakkhajātikāti evampi saddattho sambhavati.
tika-s0201t:1752_0: Rāgādimalena samalehi pūraṇādīhi chahi satthārehi satthupaṭiññehi kabbaracanāvasena cintākaviādibhāve
tika-s0201t:1752_2: Te kira buddhakolāhalānussavena sañjātakutūhalaṃ lokaṃ vañcetvā kohaññe ṭhatvā sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānantā yaṃ kiñci adhammaṃyeva dhammoti dīpesuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1752_4: Apāpuretanti etaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti pihitaṃ nibbānanagarassa mahādvāraṃ
tika-s0201t:1753_1: na paṃsupabbato missakapabbato cāti āha “sele yathā pabbatamuddhanī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1756_0: Uṭṭhehīti vā dhammadesanāya appossukkatāsaṅkhātasaṅkocāpattito kilāsubhāvato uṭṭhaha.
tika-s0201t:1757_1: Garuṭṭhāniyaṃ payirupāsitvā garutaraṃ payojanaṃ uddissa abhipatthanā ajjhesanā,
tika-s0201t:1757_2: sāpi atthato yācanāva hotīti āha “ajjhesananti yācana”nti.
tika-s0201t:1757_3: Padesavisayaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ ahutvā buddhānaṃyeva āveṇikabhāvato idaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ “buddhacakkhū”ti vuccatīti
tika-s0201t:1757_5: Tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānanti heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ “dhammacakkhū”ti nāmaṃ catusaccadhammadassanamattabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1757_7: aggamaggañāṇaṃ pana ñāṇakiccassa sikhāppattiyā na dassanamattaṃ hotīti “dhammacakkhū”ti na vuccati,
tika-s0201t:1757_19: taṃ imāya atthavaṇṇanāya aññadatthu saṃsandati sametīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1758_0: Ayaṃ panettha pāḷīti ettha apparajakkhādipadānaṃ atthavibhāvane ayaṃ tassatthassa vibhāvanī pāḷi.
tika-s0201t:1758_1: Saddhādīnaṃ vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ balavabhāvo tappaṭipakkhānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ dubbalabhāveneva hoti,
tika-s0201t:1758_2: tesañca balavabhāvo saddhādīnaṃ dubbalabhāvenāti vimuttiparipācakadhammānaṃ atthitānatthitāvasena apparajakkhamahārajakkhatādayo
tika-s0201t:1759_0: Puna ekakadukādivasena lokaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “eko loko”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1759_1: Āhārādayo viya hi āhāraṭṭhitikā saṅkhārā lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti.
tika-s0201t:1759_2: Ettha eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti yāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavutti,
tika-s0201t:1759_3: tāya sabbe saṅkhārā ekova loko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1759_4: Dve lokātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1759_5: Nāmaggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā.
tika-s0201t:1759_6: Nanu ca āhāraṭṭhitikāti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphalānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
tika-s0201t:1759_8: Atha vā na lujjati na palujjatīti yo gahito tathā na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1760_0: Vivaṭṭajjhāsayassa adhippetattā tassa ca sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ garahitabbaṃ vajjitabbañca hutvā upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ “sabbe abhisaṅkhārā vajjaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1760_2: Apparajakkhamahārajakkhādīsu pañcasu dukesu ekekasmiṃ dasa dasa katvā “paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1760_3: Atha vā anvayato byatirekato ca saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ paropariyattaṃ jānātīti katvā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1760_4: Ettha ca apparajakkhādibhabbādivasena āvajjentassa bhagavato te sattā puñjapuñjāva hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, na ekekā.
tika-s0201t:1761_3: Yāni udakassa anto nimuggāneva hutvā pusanti vaḍḍhanti,
tika-s0201t:1762_6: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena saṃkhittena mātikāya ṭhapiyamānāya desanānusārena
tika-s0201t:1762_7: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ samattho puggalo “ugghaṭitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1762_8: Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ saṃkhittena mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho puggalo “vipañcitaññū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1762_13: Anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hotīti anukkamena arahattappatti hoti.
tika-s0201t:1762_14: Na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hotīti tena attabhāvena maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā antamaso jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0201t:1762_15: Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo padaparamoti ayaṃ puggalo byañjanapadameva paramaṃ assāti padaparamoti vuccati.
tika-s0201t:1763_9: Bhavaṅgapaññāya pana paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa paccayo na hoti,
tika-s0201t:1763_11: Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu sammattaniyāmasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ okkamituṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1765_1: Dhammaṃ desessāmīti evaṃ pavattitadhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyuttassa vitakkassa sattamasattāhato paraṃ aṭṭhamasattāheyeva
tika-s0201t:1765_3: Na itarasattāhāni viya paṭiniyatakiccalakkhitassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma pavattitassa sabbhāvā.
tika-s0201t:1766_0: Vivaṭanti devatāviggahena vivaṭaaṅgapaccaṅganiddāya janānaṃ pākaṭaṃ vippakāranti attho.
tika-s0201t:1766_1: “Buddhattaṃ anadhigantvā na paccāgamissāmī”ti uppannavitakkātisayahetukena pathavīparivattanacetiyaṃ nāma dassetvā.
tika-s0201t:1766_5: pakkamantiyā cassā mahāsatto ākāraṃ dassesi suvaṇṇathālaggahaṇāya,
tika-s0201t:1767_0: Divāvihāraṃ katvāti nānāsamāpattiyo samāpajjanena divāvihāraṃ viharitvā.
tika-s0201t:1767_3: upasussatu sarīre maṃsalohita”ntiādinā sutte āgatanayena caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā.
tika-s0201t:1768_6: ahaṃ imassa pallaṅkassa anucchaviko”ti vatvā tattha sakkhiṃ otārento attano parisaṃ niddisi.
tika-s0201t:1771_2: Imassa pallaṅkassa atthāyāti pallaṅkasīsena adhigatavisesaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1771_3: Tattha hi sikhāppattavimuttisukhaṃ avijahanto antarantarā ca paṭiccasamuppādaṅgaṃ manasikaronto ekapallaṅkena nisīdi.
tika-s0201t:1771_4: Ekaccānanti yā adhigatamaggā sacchikatanirodhā ekadesena ca buddhaguṇe jānanti,
tika-s0201t:1771_6: Aññepi buddhattakarāti visākhāpuṇṇamato paṭṭhāya rattindivaṃ evaṃ niccasamāhitabhāvahetukānaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ upari aññepi buddhattasādhakā,
tika-s0201t:1771_7: “ayaṃ buddho”ti buddhabhāvassa paresaṃ vibhāvanā dhammā kiṃ nu kho atthīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1772_2: Ratanabhūtānaṃ sattannaṃ pakaraṇānaṃ tattha ca anantanayassa dhammaratanassa sammasanena taṃ ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jātantipi vadanti.
tika-s0201t:1772_4: Chabbaṇṇānaṃ rasmīnaṃ dantehi nikkhamanato chaddantanāgakulaṃ viyāti nidassanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1773_0: Heṭṭhā lohapāsādappamāṇoti navabhūmakassa sabbapaṭhamassa lohapāsādassa heṭṭhā lohapāsādappamāṇo.
tika-s0201t:1774_3: Na hi buddhā bhagavanto mahagghaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti paribhuñjanti vā.
tika-s0201t:1774_4: Piṇḍapātanti ettha manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0201t:1774_6: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti ayaṃ parivitakko.
tika-s0201t:1775_2: Medhāvīti tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāsaṅkhātāya taṃtaṃitikattabbatāpaññāsaṅkhātāya ca medhāya samannāgatoti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0201t:1775_6: gantvā desiyamānaṃ dhammampissa sotuṃ sotapasādopi natthīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1775_7: Kiṃ pana bhagavatā attano buddhānubhāvena te dhammaṃ ñāpetuṃ na sakkāti? Āma, na sakkā.
tika-s0201t:1775_8: Na hi parato ghosaṃ antarena sāvakānaṃ dhammābhisamayo sambhavati,
tika-s0201t:1775_13: paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya parato ca ghoso ajjhattañca yonisomanasikāro”ti.
tika-s0201t:1775_17: So hi pubbepi tattha yuttappayutto viharanto mahāpurisena khippaññeva samāpattīnaṃ nibbattitabhāvaṃ sutvā
tika-s0201t:1775_18: saṃvegajāto mahāsatte tato nibbijja pakkante ghaṭento vāyamanto nacirasseva aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi.
tika-s0201t:1776_2: “Dveva gatiyo bhavanti anaññā”ti vuttaniyāmena nicchinituṃ asakkontā brāhmaṇā vuttameva paṭipajjiṃsu,
tika-s0201t:1776_4: Ime pana koṇḍaññādayo pañca “ekaṃsato buddho bhavissatī”ti jātanicchayattā mantapadaṃ atikkantā.
tika-s0201t:1777_1: Vapanatthaṃ bījāni nīharaṇantena tattha aggaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ bījaggadānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0201t:1777_5: Yathā lūnaṃ hatthakaṃ katvā veṇivasena bandhanaṃ veṇikaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1777_7: Khale kalāpānaṃ ṭhapanadivase aggaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ khalaggaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1777_8: Madditvā vīhīnaṃ rāsikaraṇadivase aggaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ bhaṇḍaggaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1777_11: Navannaṃ aggadānānaṃ dinnattāti idaṃ tassa rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvatthāya katābhinīhārānurūpaṃ pavattitasāvakapāramiyā ciṇṇante pavattitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1777_12: Tiṇṇampi hi bodhisattānaṃ taṃtaṃpāramiyā sikhāppattakāle pavattitaṃ puññaṃ apuññaṃ vā garutaravipākameva hoti,
tika-s0201t:1777_13: dhammassa ca sabbapaṭhamaṃ sacchikiriyāya vinā kathaṃ rattaññūnaṃ aggabhāvasiddhīti.
tika-s0201t:1777_14: Bahukārā kho ime pañcavaggiyāti idaṃ pana upakārānussaraṇamattakameva paricayavasena āḷārudakānussaraṇaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:1778_3: Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarā-
tika-s0201t:1779_1: Catubhūmakadhammaṃ anavasesaṃ ñeyyaṃ sabbaso ñeyyāvaraṇassa pahīnattā sabbaññutaññāṇena avediṃ.
tika-s0201t:1779_3: Appahātabbampi kusalābyākataṃ tappaṭibaddhakilesamathanena pahīnattā na hotīti āha “sabbaṃ tebhūmakadhammaṃ jahitvā ṭhito”ti.
tika-s0201t:1780_2: lokuttaradhamme panassa lesopi natthīti āha “lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1780_6: Cattāri saccānīti idaṃ tabbinimuttassa ñeyyassa abhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1780_11: Veneyyānaṃ amatādhigamāya ugghosanādiṃ katvā satthu dhammadesanā amatadundubhīti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1781_1: Evampi nāma bhaveyyāti evaṃvidhe nāma rūparatane īdisena ñāṇena bhavitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0201t:1781_4: Tathā hi bhagavā tena samāgamatthaṃ padasāva taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
tika-s0201t:1783_3: dibbayogaṃ upajjhagunti te upakā dayo mānusaṃ attabhāvaṃ jahitvā orambhāgiyasaṃyojanappahānena avihesu
tika-s0201t:1784_11: “Anena pubbepi na kiñci micchā vuttapubba”nti satiṃ labhitvā.
tika-s0201t:1785_0: Antovihāreyeva ahosi daharakumāro viya tehi bhikkhūhi pariharito.
tika-s0201t:1785_2: Gāmato bhikkhūhi nīhaṭaṃ upanītaṃ bhattaṃ etassāti nīhaṭabhatto,
tika-s0201t:1785_16: asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ nibbānaṃ ajjhagamanti, atha kho,
tika-s0201t:1785_20: natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti imasseva suttapadassa attho vibhāvitoti katvā vuttaṃ “bhagavā yaṃ pubbe avaca
tika-s0201t:1786_3: Micchājīvavasenapi anariyapariyesanā hotīti tato visesanatthaṃ “pañcakāmaguṇavasenā”ti vuttaṃ sacchandarāgaparibhogassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0201t:1786_4: Idāni catūsu paccayesu kāmaguṇe niddhāretuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1786_6: Ayaṃ pana rasasamānatāvasena gahaṇaṃ upādāya “raso”ti vutto,
tika-s0201t:1786_8: Sabhāvena gahaṇaṃ upādāya pītisomanassaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ siyā,
tika-s0201t:1787_1: Luddako hi pāsaṃ oḍḍento na ekaṃyeva,
tika-s0201t:1787_3: atha kho taṃtaṃmigānaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ sallakkhetvā tattha tattha oḍḍento bahūyeva oḍḍeti,
tika-s0201t:1787_4: tasmā te cittena ekato gahetvā “pāsarāsī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1790_5: Evaṃ vuttenāti evaṃ “setāya suda”ntiādinā pakārena saṃyuttamahāvagge vuttena.
tika-s0201t:1791_1: Idaṃ kira tassa brāhmaṇassa jāṇussoṇiṭṭhānantaraṃ jātisiddhaṃ paramparāgataṃ cārittaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1792_1: Paṇḍito maññeti ettha maññeti idaṃ “maññatī”ti iminā samānatthaṃ nipātapadaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1792_3: saddaṃ ānetvā atthaṃ dassento “paṇḍitoti maññatī”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1792_6: “Taṃ kiṃ maññati bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiya”nti hi vuttamevatthaṃ puna gaṇhanto “paṇḍito maññe”ti āha.
tika-s0201t:1793_2: Ko cāti hetunissakke paccattavacananti āha “kuto cā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1793_4: yena kāraṇena samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ jāneyyaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1793_7: abuddhassa sabbathā buddhañāṇānubhāvaṃ jānituṃ na sakkāti.
tika-s0201t:1793_12: yena puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyya, atthi,
tika-s0201t:1793_15: yehi tathāgatassa yathābhuccaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā”ti ca.
tika-s0201t:1793_17: Pasattha pasatthoti pasatthehi attano guṇeheva so pasattho,
tika-s0201t:1793_22: Sadevake loke pāsaṃsānampi pāsaṃsoti dassetuṃ “pasatthehi vā”ti dutiyavikappo gahito.
tika-s0201t:1794_2: tassa tassa payogassa ānisaṃsabhūtaṃ phalanti āha “atthavasanti atthānisaṃsa”nti.
tika-s0201t:1794_3: Attho vā vuttalakkhaṇo vaso etassāti atthavaso, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1794_4: Nāgavanavāsikoti hatthināgānaṃ vicaraṇavane tesaṃ gahaṇatthaṃ vasanako.
tika-s0201t:1794_5: Anuggahitasippoti asikkhitahatthisippo āyatavitthatassa padamattassa dassanena “mahā vata,
tika-s0201t:1794_8: Uggahitasippo puriso nāgavanikoti āgato āyatavitthatassa padassa uccassa ca nisevitassa byabhicārabhāvaṃ
tika-s0201t:1794_9: ñatvā tattakena niṭṭhaṃ agantvā mahāhatthiṃ disvāva niṭṭhāgamanato.
tika-s0201t:1794_13: Cattārīti pana vineyyānaṃ idha khattiyapaṇḍitādivasena catubbidhānaṃyeva gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:1795_1: Puggalesu paññāya ca nipuṇatā paṇḍitasamaññā nipuṇatthassa dassanasamatthatāvasenevāti āha “sukhumaatthantarapaṭivijjhanasamatthe”ti. Kata-
tika-s0201t:1795_8: Tadubhayampi ekato katvā pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti āha “viññātaparappavāde ceva parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicaye cā”ti,
tika-s0201t:1795_12: Vālanti anekadhā bhinnassa vālassa aṃsusaṅkhātaṃ vālaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1795_13: Bhindantā viyāti ghaṭādiṃ saviggahaṃ muggarādinā bhindantā viya,
tika-s0201t:1795_15: “Atthaṃ guyhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ katvā pucchissāmā”ti saṅkhataṃ padapañhaṃ pucchantīti dassetuṃ “dupadampī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1795_21: evaṃ vissajjeyyā”ti ca pucchāvissajjanānaṃ sikhāvagamanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1796_0: Evaṃ attano vādavidhamanabhayenapi pare bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ na visahantīti vatvā idāni vādavidhamanena
tika-s0201t:1796_1: vināpi na visahanti evāti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1796_2: Cittaṃ pasīdati pare attano attabhāvampi vissatthaṃ niyyādetukāmā honti odhisakamettāpharaṇasadisattā tassa mettāyanassa.
tika-s0201t:1798_7: Kāmaṃ tena vuttakathāmaggenapi hatthipadopamabhāvena vuccamāno dhammo paripuṇṇova arahattaṃ pāpetvā paveditattā,
tika-s0201t:1798_9: na vitthāratoti āha “na ettāvatā vitthārena paripūro hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1798_10: Yadi yathā vitthārena hatthipadopamo paripūro hoti,
tika-s0201t:1798_12: atha kasmā kusaloti na vuttoti codanā.
tika-s0201t:1799_19: saddo saṃsayitanicchayattho yathā aññatthāpi “ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu.
tika-s0201t:1800_0: Nāgavanaṃ viyāti mahāhatthino vāmanikādīnañca padadassanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ nāgavanaṃ viya.
tika-s0201t:1800_1: Ādito paṭṭhāya yāva nīvaraṇappahānā dhammadesanā tathāgatassa bāhiraparibbājakādīnañca padadassanabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1800_2: Ādito paṭṭhāyāti ca “taṃ suṇāhī”ti padato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0201t:1800_3: Kusalo nāgavaniko viya yogāvacaro pariyesanavasena pamāṇaggahaṇato.
tika-s0201t:1800_4: Matthake ṭhatvāti imassa suttassa pariyosāne ṭhatvā.
tika-s0201t:1800_5: Imasmimpi ṭhāneti “evameva kho brāhmaṇā”tiādinā upameyyassa atthassa upaññāsanaṭṭhānepi.
tika-s0201t:1801_6: Sesapadadvaye pana saddantarasannidhānamattena taṃ taṃ upādāya vuttatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1802_1: saddādīnaṃ atthaviseso mūlapariyāyaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu vutto eva.
tika-s0201t:1802_2: Tathāgatassa sattanikāyantogadhatāya “idha pana sattaloko adhippeto”ti vatvā tatthāyaṃ yasmiṃ sattanikāye,
tika-s0201t:1802_5: Tattha imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷeti imissā eva lokadhātuyā.
tika-s0201t:1802_9: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyu”nti ettha jātikhettabhūtā
tika-s0201t:1802_11: Idha pana imaṃyeva lokadhātuṃ sandhāya “imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1802_12: Tisso hi saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane visayakhettaṃ āṇākhettaṃ jātikhettanti tividhe khette
tika-s0201t:1802_13: ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi,
tika-s0201t:1802_17: ekomhi sammāsambuddho”ti evamādīni imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā –
tika-s0201t:1802_20: atthetarahi añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā samasamo sambodhiyanti evaṃ puṭṭhāhaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0201t:1802_21: noti vadeyya”nti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ –
tika-s0201t:1802_23: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1802_24: uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti.
tika-s0201t:1803_0: Sujātāyātiādinā vuttesu catūsu vikappesu paṭhamo vikappo buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattidassanavasena vutto.
tika-s0201t:1803_1: Āsannatarāya hi paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito “uppajjatī”ti vuccati uppādassa ekantikattā,
tika-s0201t:1803_5: Na hi mahāsattānaṃ tusitabhavūpapattito paṭṭhāya bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-s0201t:1803_7: Bodhiyā niyatabhāvāpattito pabhuti hi viññūhi “buddho uppajjatī”ti vattuṃ sakkā uppādassa ekantikattā,
tika-s0201t:1803_10: evaṃ uppādatthāya paṭipajjanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya catūsu vikappesu “uppajjati nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1803_11: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvanti sabbehi upari vuccamānehi visesehi paṭhamaṃ tathāgatassa uppannatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthitāvisesaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1804_2: Imaṃ lokanti nayidaṃ mahājanassa sammukhāmattaṃ lokaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1804_3: atha kho anavasesaṃ pariyādāyāti dassetuṃ “sadevaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1804_7: Sadevakanti ca avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho.
tika-s0201t:1804_9: Tattha hi so jāto tannivāsī ca.
tika-s0201t:1804_15: “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti āha “pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa”nti.
tika-s0201t:1805_0: Arūpino sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharantā “dibbantīti devā”ti imaṃ nibbacanaṃ labhantīti āha “sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaradevaloko gahito”ti.
tika-s0201t:1805_2: Samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko gahito tassa savisesaṃ mārassa vase vattanato.
tika-s0201t:1805_3: Rūpī brahmaloko gahito arūpībrahmalokassa visuṃ gahitattā.
tika-s0201t:1805_5: Itarā pana catasso parisā samārakādiggahaṇena gahitā evāti.
tika-s0201t:1806_0: Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni tena tena visesena abhāgasova lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1806_5: ativiya dīghāyukatāyā”ti evamādīhi visesehi ativiya itarehi ukkaṭṭhā.
tika-s0201t:1806_6: Brahmā mahānubhāvotiādiṃ dasasahassiyaṃ mahābrahmuno vasena vadati.
tika-s0201t:1806_9: Bhāvānukkamo bhāvavasena paresaṃ ajjhāsayavasena “sadevaka”ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ anukkamo.
tika-s0201t:1806_12: Tena tenākārenāti sadevakattādinā tena tena pakārena.
tika-s0201t:1807_5: Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇācāratāya hi sabbapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto.
tika-s0201t:1807_7: Tena vītimissāpi kadāci bhagavato dhammadesanā hotīti āha “hitvāpī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1807_8: Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ vā deti,
tika-s0201t:1807_10: taṃ khaṇaṃ pubbabhāgena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0201t:1807_11: yathāparicchedañca samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti.
tika-s0201t:1808_0: Desakāyattena āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanāti sā pariyattidhammavasena veditabbāti āha “desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi gāthāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1808_1: Sāsitabbapuggalagatena yathāparādhādisāsitabbabhāvena anusāsanaṃ tadaṅgavinayādivasena vinayanaṃ sāsananti
tika-s0201t:1808_7: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe kathāvadhisaddappabandho gāthāvasena suttavasena ca vavatthito pariyattidhammo,
tika-s0201t:1808_9: Tassa pana attho visesena sīlādi evāti āha “bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento…pe…
tika-s0201t:1808_11: Tattha sīlaṃ dassetvāti sīlaggahaṇena sasambhāraṃ sīlaṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1808_12: Tathā maggaggahaṇena sasambhāro maggoti tadubhayena anavasesato pariyattiatthaṃ pariyādiyati.
tika-s0201t:1808_14: Atthavasena hi idha desanāya ādikalyāṇādibhāvo adhippeto.
tika-s0201t:1809_0: Na so sātthaṃ deseti niyyānatthavirahato tassā desanāya.
tika-s0201t:1809_2: dvippakāreneva vā byañjanena yuttā vā damiḷabhāsā viya.
tika-s0201t:1809_3: Sabbattha niroṭṭhaṃ katvā vattabbatāya sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā kirātabhāsā viya.
tika-s0201t:1809_4: Sabbattheva vissajjanīyayuttatāya sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā vā yavanabhāsā viya.
tika-s0201t:1809_5: Sabbattheva sānusāratāya sabbaniggahitabyañjanā vā pārasikādimilakkhabhāsā viya.
tika-s0201t:1809_6: Sabbāpesā ekadesabyañjanavaseneva pavattiyā aparipuṇṇabyañjanāti katvā “abyañjanā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1810_0: Bhagavā yamatthaṃ ñāpetuṃ ekagāthampi ekavākyampi deseti,
tika-s0201t:1810_1: tamatthaṃ tāya desanāya sabbaso paripuṇṇameva katvā deseti,
tika-s0201t:1810_3: Ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitenāti saṃkilesapakkhato vaṭṭadukkhato ca uddharaṇasabhāvāvaṭṭhitena cittena.
tika-s0201t:1810_4: Tasmāti yasmā sikkhāttayasaṅgahaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ idha “brahmacariya”nti adhippetaṃ, tasmā.
tika-s0201t:1810_5: Brahmacariyanti iminā samānādhikaraṇāni sabbapadāni yojetvā atthaṃ dassento “so dhammaṃ deseti…pe…
tika-s0201t:1811_3: Bhogārogyādivatthukā madā suppaheyyā honti nimittassa anavaṭṭhānato’ na tathā kulavijjāmadāti khattiyabrāhmaṇakulīnānaṃ
tika-s0201t:1811_4: pabbajitānampi jātivijjā nissāya mānajappanaṃ duppajahanti āha “yebhuyyena hi…pe…
tika-s0201t:1811_7: Patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkontīti suvisuddhiṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-s0201t:1811_9: Patiṭṭhātunti vā saccapaṭivedhena lokuttarāya patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-s0201t:1811_10: Yebhuyyena hi upanissayasampannā sujātā eva honti,
tika-s0201t:1812_0: Parisuddhanti rāgādīnaṃ accantameva pahānadīpanato nirupakkilesatāya sabbaso visuddhaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1812_3: Jāyampatikā vasantīti kāmaṃ “jāyampatikā”ti vutte gharasāmikagharasāminivasena dvinnaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ viññāyati.
tika-s0201t:1812_4: Yassa pana purisassa anekā pajāpatiyo honti,
tika-s0201t:1812_6: Ekāyapi tāya vāso sambādhoti dassanatthaṃ “dve”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1812_9: Rāgarajādīnaṃ āgamanapathatāpi uppajjanaṭṭhānatā evāti dvepi vaṇṇanā ekatthā,
tika-s0201t:1812_12: Evaṃ akusalakusalappavattīnaṃ ṭhānabhāvena gharāvāsapabbajjānaṃ sambādhabbhokāsataṃ dassetvā idāni kusalappavattiyā
tika-s0201t:1812_13: eva aṭṭhānaṭhānabhāvena tesaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1813_0: Saṅkhepakathāti visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāraṃ akatvā saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā.
tika-s0201t:1813_2: Akhaṇḍaṃ katvāti dukkaṭamattassapi anāpajjanena akhaṇḍitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0201t:1814_3: saddasannidhānato upari vuccamānavisesāpekkhāya ca visesaniviṭṭhova hotīti vuttaṃ “yā bhikkhūnaṃ adhisīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1814_9: “nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti vuttasikkhāpadaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ avītikkamanto hutvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1814_12: Tato hi yāva maggā sikkhāpāripūrī hotīti.
tika-s0201t:1815_2: viratovāti etena pahānassa viratiyā ca samānakālataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1815_5: Dhammānañhi paccayapaccayuppannabhāve apekkhite sahajātānampi paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena gahaṇaṃ purimapacchimabhāveneva
tika-s0201t:1815_6: hotīti gahaṇapavattiākāravasena paccayabhūtesu hirottappañāṇādīsu pahānakiriyāya purimakālavohāro,
tika-s0201t:1815_7: paccayuppannāsu ca viratīsu viramaṇakiriyāya aparakālavohāro ca hotīti “pahāya paṭivirato hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1818_1: Atha vā pāṇo atipātīyati etenāti pāṇātipāto,
tika-s0201t:1818_4: viratova hotīti avadhāraṇena tassā viratiyā kālādivasena apariyantataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1818_5: Yathā hi aññe samādinnaviratikāpi anavaṭṭhitacittatāya lābhajīvikādihetu samādānaṃ bhindanteva,
tika-s0201t:1818_7: Ayaṃ pana pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya orato viratoti.
tika-s0201t:1818_8: Adinnādānaṃ pahāyātiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0201t:1819_3: Daṇḍanasaṅkhātassa paraviheṭhanassa parivajjitabhāvadīpanatthaṃ daṇḍasatthānaṃ nikkhepavacananti āha “parūpaghātatthāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1819_5: Lajjīti ettha vuttalajjāya ottappampi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1819_8: Yassa vā dhammagarutāya dhammassa ca attādhīnattā attādhipatibhūtā lajjākiccakārī,
tika-s0201t:1819_9: tassa lokādhipatibhūtaṃ ottappaṃ kiccakaranti vattabbameva natthīti “lajjī”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1819_15: saddo anurakkhaṇatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya ca karuṇāya ca pavattatīti idha mettāya pavattamāno vutto.
tika-s0201t:1820_0: Sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti etena tassā viratiyā sattavasena apariyantataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1820_3: Yasmā pana mettā karuṇāya visesapaccayo hoti,
tika-s0201t:1820_5: Evaṃ yehi dhammehi pāṇātipātā virati sampajjati,
tika-s0201t:1820_9: nanu niravasesānaṃ pāṇānaṃ atipātato virati idhādhippetā?
tika-s0201t:1820_11: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbe pāṇabhūte hitena anukampako”ti puthuvacananiddesoti?
tika-s0201t:1820_13: pāṇabhāvasāmaññavasena panettha pāḷiyaṃ ādito ekavacananiddeso kato,
tika-s0201t:1820_14: sabbasaddasannidhānena puthuttaṃ viññāyamānamevāti sāmaññaniddesaṃ akatvā bhedavacanicchāvasena dassetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ bahuvacanavasena attho vutto.
tika-s0201t:1820_17: tabbisesato saṃvarabhedoti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ ayaṃ vacanabhedo katoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1820_18: Viharatīti vuttappakāro hutvā ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā attabhāvaṃ harati pavattetīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1821_1: atha kho ākaṅkhapissa pariccattavatthuvisayāvāti dassetuṃ “cittenapī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1821_3: Sucibhūtenāti ettha sucibhāvo adhikārato saddantarasannidhānato ca theyyasaṃkilesaviramaṇanti āha “athenattāyeva sucibhūtenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1821_5: adhikāravasena pana atthato vā vuttamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1821_10: Atha vā sucibhūtenāti etena hirottappādīhi samannāgamo,
tika-s0201t:1821_11: ahirikādīnañca pahānaṃ vuttamevāti “lajjī”tiādi na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1822_7: na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0201t:1822_11: tena ca vittiṃ āpajjatī”tiādinā vuttā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogāpi paṭivirati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1823_0: Saccena saccanti purimena vacīsaccena pacchimaṃ vacīsaccaṃ sandahati asaccena anantarikattā.
tika-s0201t:1823_2: Haliddirāgo viya na thirakato hotīti ettha kathāya anavaṭṭhitabhāvena haliddirāgasadisatā veditabbā,
tika-s0201t:1824_5: Yasmā pana anuvattanavasena sandhānassa padānaṃ ādhānaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1829_1: Atthasaṃhitāpi hi vācā ayuttakālapayogena atthāvahā na siyāti anatthaviññāpanavācaṃ anulometi,
tika-s0201t:1829_2: tasmā samphappalāpaṃ pajahantena akālavāditā pariharitabbāti vuttaṃ “kālavādī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1829_3: Kāle vadantenapi ubhayānatthasādhanato abhūtaṃ parivajjetabbanti āha “bhūtavādī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1829_7: Atthaṃ vadantenapi lokiyadhammasannissitameva avatvā lokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vattabbanti dassanatthaṃ “dhammavādī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1829_11: pañcannañca pahānavinayānaṃ vasena vuccamāno attho nibbānādhigamahetubhāvato lokuttaradhammasannissito hotīti.
tika-s0201t:1829_12: Evaṃ guṇavisesayuttova attho vuccamāno desanākosalle sati sobhati,
tika-s0201t:1829_14: na aññathāti dassetuṃ “nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1829_16: Pucchādivasena hi otiṇṇavācāvatthusmiṃ ekaṃsādibyākaraṇavibhāgaṃ sallakkhetvā ṭhapanāhetuudāharaṇaṃ saṃsandanādiṃ
tika-s0201t:1829_20: vitthārasaṅgāhikāya kathāya ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ pare yāthāvato dhamme patiṭṭhāpento “desanākusalo”ti vuccatīti evamettha atthayojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1830_1: Evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā satta mūlasikkhāpadāni vibhāvetvā satipi abhijjhādipahānaindriyasaṃvarasatisampajaññajāgariyānuyogādike
tika-s0201t:1830_2: uttaradesanāyaṃ vibhāvetuṃ taṃ pariharitvā ācārasīlasseva vibhajanavasena pāḷi pavattāti tadatthaṃ vivarituṃ
tika-s0201t:1830_5: Bhūtānaṃ jātānaṃ nibbattānaṃ rukkhagacchalatādīnaṃ samūho bhūtagāmo.
tika-s0201t:1830_6: Nanu ca rukkhādayo cittarahitatāya na jīvā,
tika-s0201t:1830_7: cittarahitatā ca paripphandābhāvato chinne viruhanato visadisajātikabhāvato catuyoniapariyāpannato ca veditabbā,
tika-s0201t:1830_8: vuḍḍhi pana pavāḷasilālavaṇānampi vijjatīti na tesaṃ jīvabhāve kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1830_9: visayaggahaṇañca nesaṃ parikappanāmattaṃ supanaṃ viya ciñcādenaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1831_4: Paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhaṇasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bījasaddo
tika-s0201t:1831_5: tadatthasaṃsiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-
tika-s0201t:1831_8: Kasmā panettha bījagāmabhūtagāmaṃ uddharitvā bījagāmo eva niddiṭṭhoti?
tika-s0201t:1831_18: Nīlatiṇarukkhādikassāti allatiṇassa ceva allarukkhādikassa ca. Ādi-
tika-s0201t:1832_2: So pana rattibhojanenapi siyāti tannivattanatthaṃ āha “rattūparato”ti.
tika-s0201t:1832_3: Evampi aparaṇhabhojīpi siyā ekabhattikoti tannivattanatthaṃ “virato vikālabhojanā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1832_4: Aruṇuggamanakālato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā ayaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma,
tika-s0201t:1832_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dutiyapadena rattibhojanassa paṭikkhittattā “atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1833_0: “Sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”ntiādinayappavattaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ accantarāguppattiyā naccādidassanaṃ na anulometīti āha “sāsanassa ananulomattā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1833_2: parehi payojāpiyamānañca naccaṃ naccabhāvasāmaññena pāḷiyaṃ ekeneva nacca-
tika-s0201t:1833_8: Yathāsakaṃ visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasabbhāvato “dassanā”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1833_9: Tenāha “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kañci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1833_10: Avisūkabhūtassa gītassa savanaṃ kadāci vaṭṭatīti āha “visūkabhūtā dassanā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1833_11: Tathā hi vuttaṃ paramatthajotikāyaṃ khuddakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ gītaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0201t:1833_13: Yaṃ kiñcīti ganthitaṃ vā aganthitaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1833_15: Tassapi “yaṃ kiñcī”ti vacanato pisitassa apisitassapi yassa kassaci vilepanādi na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-s0201t:1834_3: Uccāsayanaṃ mahāsayanañca samaṇasārupparahitaṃ adhippetanti āha “pamāṇātikkantaṃ akappiyattharaṇa”nti.
tika-s0201t:1834_5: Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārā kiriyā paṭikkhittāva hoti,
tika-s0201t:1834_7: atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi virati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1834_8: Atha vā uccāsayanamahāsayanañca uccāsayanamahāsayanañca uccāsayanamahāsayananti etasmiṃ atthe ekasesena
tika-s0201t:1834_10: āsanakiriyāpubbakattā vā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇena āsanampi gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1835_2: Aññehi gāhāpane upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti āha “neva naṃ uggaṇhāti,
tika-s0201t:1835_5: Atha vā tividhaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyena vācāya manasāti.
tika-s0201t:1835_8: manasā paṭiggahaṇaṃ sādiyananti tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “paṭiggahaṇā”ti vuttanti āha “neva naṃ uggaṇhātī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1835_13: pañca vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ sukaravasaṃ gadrabhavasa”nti vuttattā idaṃ odissa anuññātaṃ nāma,
tika-s0201t:1835_14: tassa pana “kāle paṭiggahita”nti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0201t:1838_6: Yathā hi apariggahabhāvasāmaññe satipi pabbajitehi appaṭiggahitabbavatthuvibhāgasandassanatthaṃ itthikumāridāsidāsādayo vibhāgena vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1838_7: Evaṃ parassa haraṇabhāvato adinnādānabhāvasāmaññe satipi tulākūṭādayo adinnādānavisesabhāvadassanatthaṃ vibhāgena vuttā,
tika-s0201t:1838_8: na evaṃ pāṇātipātapariyāyassa vadhassa puna gahaṇe payojanaṃ atthi,
tika-s0201t:1838_10: idha paraṃkāroti ca na sakkā vattuṃ “kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā chappayogā”ti vacanato.
tika-s0201t:1838_13: tampi pothanameva sandhāyāti ca sakkā viññātuṃ māraṇa-
tika-s0201t:1839_1: Cīvarapiṇḍapātānaṃ yathākkamaṃ kāyakucchipariharaṇamattajotanāyaṃ avisesato aṭṭhannaṃ parikkhārānaṃ antare
tika-s0201t:1840_1: tato eva sukhavihāraṭṭhānabhūtā catasso disā assa santīti vā cātuddiso.
tika-s0201t:1840_2: Tattha cāyaṃ satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena na paṭihaññatīti appaṭigho.
tika-s0201t:1840_6: abbhantarānañca kāmacchandādīnaṃ kāyacittupaddavānaṃ abhibhavanato parissayānaṃ sahitā.
tika-s0201t:1840_9: Tato eva khaggamigasiṅgasadisatāya khaggavisāṇakappo careyyāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1841_1: asañjātapakkho vā sakuṇo gantuṃ na sakkotīti “pakkhī sakuṇo”ti pakkhi-
tika-s0201t:1841_2: saddena visesetvā sakuṇo pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti āha “pakkhayutto sakuṇo”ti.
tika-s0201t:1841_3: Yassa sannidhikāraparibhogo kiñci ṭhapetabbaṃ sāpekkhāya ṭhapanañca natthi,
tika-s0201t:1841_4: tādiso ayaṃ bhikkhūti dassento “ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0201t:1841_6: tehi vā ārakāti ariyoti āha “ariyenāti niddosenā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1842_1: Yathāvutte sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhitasseva indriyasaṃvaro icchitabbo tadadhiṭṭhānato,
tika-s0201t:1842_2: tassa ca paripālakabhāvatoti vuttaṃ “so iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato bhikkhū”ti.
tika-s0201t:1842_5: tasmā tassa līnatthappakāsiniyaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1842_6: Rūpādīsu nimittādiggāhaparivajjanalakkhaṇattā indriyasaṃvarassa kilesehi anavasittasukhatā avikiṇṇasukhatā cassa vuttā.
tika-s0201t:1843_2: Ime cattāroti sīlasaṃvaro santoso indriyasaṃvaro satisampajaññanti ime cattāro araññavāsassa sambhārā.
tika-s0201t:1843_3: Tiracchānagatehi vattabbataṃ āpajjati isisiṅgassa pituādayo viya.
tika-s0201t:1843_9: Tanti pītiṃ vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhānato khayato sammasanto.
tika-s0201t:1844_2: Sā ca vivittatā nissaddabhāvena lakkhitabbāti āha “appasaddaṃ appanigghosa”nti.
tika-s0201t:1844_4: Masārakādi mañcapīṭhaṃ tattha attharitabbaṃ bhisiupadhānañca mañcapīṭhasambandhito mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1845_0: “Anucchavikaṃ dassento”ti vatvā tameva anucchavikabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1845_1: Acchannanti iṭṭhakachadanādinā antamaso rukkhasākhāhipi na channaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1846_4: saddo uparimakāyavisayoti āha “uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1846_5: Taṃ pana ujukaṭṭhapanaṃ sarūpato payojanato ca dassetuṃ “aṭṭhārasā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1846_9: Tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesappattiyā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
tika-s0201t:1846_10: Mukhasamīpeti mukhassa samīpe nāsikagge vā uttaroṭṭhe vā.
tika-s0201t:1846_14: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1846_17: tasmā pariggahitaniyyānasatinti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā,
tika-s0201t:1847_0: Vikkhambhanavasenāti ettha vikkhambhanaṃ anuppādanaṃ appavattanaṃ na paṭipakkhena suppahīnatā.
tika-s0201t:1847_1: Pahīnattāti ca pahīnasadisataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ jhānassa anadhigatatā.
tika-s0201t:1847_2: Tathāpi nayidaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya sabhāvato vigatābhijjhaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1847_5: Eseva nayoti yathā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sabhāvena vigatābhijjhaṃ abyāpannañca,
tika-s0201t:1847_8: Idaṃ pana cittaṃ bhāvanāya parisodhitattā abyāpannaṃ vigatathinamiddhaṃ anuddhataṃ nibbicikicchañcāti attho.
tika-s0201t:1848_1: Ucchinditvā pātentīti ettha ucchindanaṃ pātanañca tāsaṃ paññānaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppajjituṃ appadānameva.
tika-s0201t:1848_2: Iti mahaggatānuttarapaññānaṃ ekaccāya ca parittapaññāya anuppattihetubhūtā nīvaraṇā dhammā itarāya ca
tika-s0201t:1848_4: Idampi paṭhamajjhānaṃ veneyyasantāne patiṭṭhāpiyamānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pajjati etthāti ñāṇapadaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1849_1: Na tāva niṭṭhaṃ gato bāhirakānaṃ ñāṇena akkantaṭṭhānānipi siyunti.
tika-s0201t:1849_2: Yadi evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇe maggañāṇapade kathaṃ na niṭṭhaṅgatoti āha “maggakkhaṇepī”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1849_3: Tīsu ratanesu niṭṭhaṃ gato hotīti buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattitañca ārabbha ñāṇena niṭṭhaṃ nicchayaṃ upagato hoti.
tika-s0201t:1849_4: Kāmañcettha paṭhamamaggeneva sabbaso vicikicchāya pahīnattā sabbassapi ariyasāvakassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā natthi,
tika-s0201t:1849_5: tattha pana yathā paññāvepullappattassa arahato savisaye ñāṇaṃ savisesaṃ ogāhati,
tika-s0201t:1849_6: na tathā anāgāmiādīnanti ratanattaye sātisayaṃ ñāṇanicchayagamanaṃ sandhāya “aggamaggavasena tatthaniṭṭhāgamanaṃ vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1852_1: Jaṅgalānanti ettha yo nipicchalena amuduko nirudakatāya thaddhalūkhabhūmippadeso,
tika-s0201t:1852_3: Tabbahulatāya pana idha sabbo bhūmippadeso jaṅgalo,
tika-s0201t:1852_7: Evañhi nadīcarānampi hatthīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti.
tika-s0201t:1852_8: Samodhātabbānaṃ viya hi samodhāyakānampi jaṅgalaggahaṇena gahetabbato.
tika-s0201t:1852_9: Pathavītalacārīnanti iminā jalacārino na nivatteti adissamānapādattā.
tika-s0201t:1852_10: Pāṇānanti sādhāraṇavacanampi “padajātānī”ti saddantarasannidhānena visesaniviṭṭhameva hotīti āha “sapādakapāṇāna”nti.
tika-s0201t:1853_2: Kusalattike āgatanayena hi idha kusalā dhammā gahetabbā,
tika-s0201t:1853_6: atthaṃ aggahetvā aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva gahitattā. Saṅgaha-
tika-s0201t:1853_7: saddo tāva attano atthavasena catubbidhoti ayañhettha attho.
tika-s0201t:1853_8: Atthopi vā aniddhāritaviseso sāmaññena gahetabbataṃ patto “saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti ettha saṅgaha-
tika-s0201t:1853_9: saddena vacanīyataṃ gatoti na koci doso,
tika-s0201t:1853_15: saddassa sāpekkhasaddattā jātiyā saṅgahoti vutte attano jātiyāti viññāyati sambandhārahassa aññassa avuttattāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1853_16: Idha pana rūpakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṃ viya pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “sajātisaṅgaho”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1853_20: “Sabbe rathikā”ti vutte sabbe rathayodhā rathena yujjhanakiriyāya ekasaṅgahoti.
tika-s0201t:1853_21: “Sabbe dhanuggahā”ti vutte sabbe issāsā dhanunā vijjhanakiriyāya ekasaṅgahoti āha “evaṃ kiriyavasena saṅgaho”ti.
tika-s0201t:1853_22: Rūpakkhandhena saṅgahitanti rūpakkhandhena ekasaṅgahaṃ rūpakkhandhoteva gaṇitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1854_2: Idāni tamatthaṃ sāsanato ca lokato ca upamaṃ āha ritvā dīpetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1854_5: diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasatanti idaṃ yasmiṃ kāle taṃ suttaṃ desitaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1854_7: tato paraṃ pana sādhikāni dvesatāni sikkhāpadānīti.
tika-s0201t:1854_9: Ettha ca “sīlaṃ sikkhantopi tisso sikkhā sikkhatī”ti visamoyaṃ upaññāso.
tika-s0201t:1854_17: Iti so kulaputto sarūpato labbhamānā eva tisso sikkhā sikkhatīti dīpito,
tika-s0201t:1854_25: Imā tisso sikkhā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe tāya satiyā tena manasikārena sikkhati āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1854_27: saddābhidheyyatāmattena catūsu saccesu gaṇanantogadhā hontīti? Na,
tika-s0201t:1855_0: Catūsu ariyasaccesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti ca tato amuccitvā tasseva antogadhataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1855_1: Evañca katvā “yathā ca ekassa hatthipadassā”tiādinā dassitā hatthipadopamā samatthitā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0201t:1855_2: Ekasmimpi dvīsupi tīsupi saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā dhammāti idaṃ na kusalattikavaseneva veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1855_3: atha kho tikadukesu yathārahaṃ labbhamānapadavasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1855_4: Tattha ekasmiṃ sacce gaṇanaṃ gato dhammo asaṅkhatadhammo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0201t:1855_5: dvīsu saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā kusalā dhammā,
tika-s0201t:1855_8: tīsu saccesu gaṇanaṃ gatā saṅkhatā dhammā,
tika-s0201t:1855_9: evaṃ aññesampi tikadukapadānaṃ vasena ayamattho yathārahaṃ vibhajitvā vattabbo.
tika-s0201t:1855_12: Ekadeso hi samudāyantogadhattā viseso viya sāmaññena samūhena saṅgahaṃ labhati.
tika-s0201t:1855_14: Desanānukkamoti ariyasaccāni uddisitvā dukkhasaccaniddesavasena pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ vibhajanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1855_15: Tattha ca rūpakkhandhaniddesavasenaādito ajjhattikāya pathavīdhātuyā vibhajananti.
tika-s0201t:1856_1: Taṃ panetaṃ upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1856_6: Itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāseti pañcadhā bhinnakoṭṭhāsesu itare ca cattāro koṭṭhāse.
tika-s0201t:1856_7: Itare ca tayo koṭṭhāsetiādito catudhā bhinnakoṭṭhāsesu itare ca tayo koṭṭhāse.
tika-s0201t:1857_9: Mahāpaññatādiguṇehi sātisayaṃ anupubbabhāve ṭhitattā sammā yathābhūtaṃ vadamāno vattuṃ sakkonto vadeyya.
tika-s0201t:1858_1: Rāgarajādīnaṃ vigamena vigatarajaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ sugataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ parosahassaṃ payirupāsatīti yojanā.
tika-s0201t:1859_0: “Sevetha bhajathā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇamāha “paṇḍitā bhikkhū anuggāhakā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1859_2: atha kho ovādānusāsanīhi anuggāhakāti purimā upamā therasseva vasena udāhaṭā,
tika-s0201t:1859_3: dutiyā pana bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassapi vasena udāhaṭā.
tika-s0201t:1860_2: Ajjhattaṃ paccattanti padadvayenapi taṃtaṃpāṭipuggalikadhammā vuccantīti āha “ubhayampetaṃ niyakādhivacanamevā”ti.
tika-s0201t:1860_3: Sasantatipariyāpannatāya pana attāti gahetabbabhāvūpagamanavasena attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattaṃ ajjhattaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1860_8: Yasmā taṃ thaddhabhāvena sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti,
tika-s0201t:1860_12: Yasmā pana kharasabhāvaṃ pharusākārena upaṭṭhānato pharusākāraṃ hoti,
tika-s0201t:1860_18: Tadubhayampi idha taṇhādīhi ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena upādinnamevāti dassetuṃ “sarīraṭṭhakañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1860_25: Na hi te tayo cattāro koṭṭhāsā.
tika-s0201t:1861_1: Nānāsabhāvatoti satipi kakkhaḷabhāvasāmaññe sasambhāravibhattito pana kesādisaṅghātagatanānāsabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1861_9: Yadi evaṃ kasmā vibhaṅge bāhirāpi pathavīdhātu vitthāreneva vibhattāti?
tika-s0201t:1862_3: Siddhe hi anattalakkhaṇe dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ aniccalakkhaṇañca siddhameva hoti saṅkhatadhammesu tadavinābhāvatoti.
tika-s0201t:1863_3: Vilīyamānāti pakatiudake loṇaṃ viya vilayaṃ gacchantī.
tika-s0201t:1863_10: Vayo vināso dhammo sabhāvo etassāti vayadhammo,
tika-s0201t:1863_15: Viddhaṃsanabhāvassa pana paveditabbattā kāmaṃ aniccalakkhaṇameva vuttaṃ sarūpato,
tika-s0201t:1863_16: itarānipi atthato vuttānevāti dassento āha “yaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0201t:1864_5: Ekassa cittassa pavattikkhaṇamatteneva hi sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanakkhaṇo paricchinno.
tika-s0201t:1865_6: Lahuso vattate khaṇoti tāya eva ekakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atiittaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati vītivattatīti attho.
tika-s0201t:1866_0: Yasmā sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ aparāparasañcaraṇaṃ labhamānameva pavattati,
tika-s0201t:1866_4: Pathavīdhātuyā hi āpodhātuādīnaṃ vā aññatarapakopena balasampannopi puriso patthaddhakāyo vā,
tika-s0201t:1866_14: Catunnañhi iriyāpathānaṃ samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva jīvitaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0201t:1866_17: atisītena pana atiuṇhena vā abhibhūtassa vipajjatīti.
tika-s0201t:1867_0: Taṇhupādinnassāti iminā hi paccayuppannatākittanena sarasapabhaṅgutaṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-s0201t:1867_1: Dukkhānupassanāya taṇhāggāhassa aniccānupassanāya mānaggāhassa anattānupassanāya diṭṭhiggāhassa ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato
tika-s0201t:1867_2: ekaṃseneva tīhi anupassanāhi gāhāpi vigacchantīti āha “noteva hotī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1868_5: Balanti ca bāhirāya viya ajjhattikāyapi pathavīdhātuyā acetanābhāvadassanena rukkhassa viya akkosantepi paharantepi nibbikāratā.
tika-s0201t:1868_7: Samudācāruppannabhāvenāti āpāthagate tasmiṃ aniṭṭhe saddārammaṇe ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātauppattivasena sotadvāre javanavedanā dukkhāti vacanato.
tika-s0201t:1868_9: Vedanādayopīti “vedanā aniccā”ti ettha vuttavedanā ceva saññādayo ca.
tika-s0201t:1868_10: Te hi phassena samānabhūmikā na pubbe vuttavedanā.
tika-s0201t:1868_12: Pakkhandatīti vipassanācittaṃ aniccantipi dukkhantipi anattātipi sammasanavasena anupavisati.
tika-s0201t:1868_15: Santiṭṭhatīti iminā uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena avatthānaṃ paṭipakkhābhibhavena niccalabhāvato.
tika-s0201t:1868_17: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana samuṭṭhānavasena attho vutto “adhimokkhaṃ labhatī”ti.
tika-s0201t:1868_18: Sotadvāramhi ārammaṇe āpāthagateti idaṃ mūlapariññāya mūladassanaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1868_19: Sotadvārehi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjayato voṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobho,
tika-s0201t:1868_26: Āgantukatāvakālikapariññā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena itarabhāvavasena ca veditabbā.
tika-s0201t:1869_0: Yāthāvato dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanavasena katapariggahassapi anādikālabhāvanāvasena ayoniso āvajjanaṃ sacepi uppajjati.
tika-s0201t:1869_6: paṭṭhāne kusalattike paṭiccavārādīsu “na maggapaccayā āsevane dve,
tika-s0201t:1869_7: āsevanapaccayā na magge dve”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-s0201t:1869_9: āsevanapaccayā na magge eka”nti ca pana vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1869_10: Ekaṃ dve vāreti ettha ca ekaggahaṇaṃ vacanasiliṭṭhatāya vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0201t:1869_11: Na hi dutiye moghavāre ekavārameva voṭṭhabbanaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0201t:1869_12: Dvikkhattuṃ vā tassa pavattiṃ sandhāya ekavāraggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0201t:1869_14: Tattha dutiyaṃ tatiyañca pavattamānaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ viya hoti.
